headline: Abarundi babiri bakomeretse mu gitero ca grenade mw'ikambi y'impunzi muri Malawi
text: Abantu batanu, harimwo Abarundi babiri, nibo bakomerekeye mu gitero c’igisasu ntezwantoke (grenade) cabereye mw’ikambi y’impunzi ya Dzaleka muri Malawi, nk’uko bitangazwa n’igipolisi c’ico gihugu. Iki gitero cabaye ku wa gatatu kw’isaha imwe z’ijoro kw’isoko nkuru y’iyo kambi, nk’uko bimenyeshwa n’igipolisi, kikavuga kandi ko cahagaritse impunzi y’umunyarwanda yikekwa ko ari we yakoze ico gitero n’ibigirankana. “Barabonye umuntu yakije umwampi imbere y’uko atera ikintu ciketswe ko yari grenade”, niko Gladson M'bumpha, umuvugizi w’igipolisi mu karere ka Dowa yabwiye BBC. M'bumpha avuga ko muri aba batanu bakomeretse harimwo Butoyi Fideli arongoye impunzi z’Abarundi muri iyo kambi, hamwe kandi na Bruno Ndayishime, umunyamabanga wiwe. Avuga ko muri kino gihe bataramenya imvo yatumye uyu muntu atera iyi grenade, ariko ko uwiketswe ariko arabazwa. Gladson M'bumpha avuga ko iyo kambi  irwiriyemwo impunzi “z’Abarundi, Abanyarwanda n’Abakongomani”, ariko ko harimwo n’izindi ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye nka Tanzania na Somalia. Avuga ko iki ari co gitero ca mbere kibaye muri ino kambi yo mu karere ka Dowa, kandi ko igipolisi kiriko kirakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo kimenye uwagirizwa igituma yateye grenade abo bantu. Ati: “Iki ni ikintu catumye igipolisi kimera magabo kuko impunzi ntizemerewe gutunga ibirwanisho nk’ibi bicira umuriro”. Avuga ko iyo kambi yari isanzwe itekanye imbere y’uko iki gitero kiba. Umwe mu barundikazi barongoye abandi muri iyo kambi atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ko impunzi muri iyo kambi zifise ubwoba kuko ari ikintu kitari bwigere kibaho kuva iyo kambi itanguye. Ati: “Ni ikintu caduteye ubwoba kuko cadushikiye giturumbuka kandi tudashobora gutahura ingene cashitse, ikintu tutari tumenyereye kubona mu nkambi y’impunzi mu myaka ishika 30 imaze”. Avuga ko, n’aho uwikekwa gukora ico gitero ari impunzi y’umunyarwanda, “tubanye neza nta kibazo dufitaniye n’abanyarwanda turi kumwe mu nkambi”. Hagati aho, uyu mupfasoni avuga ko bafise ubwoba ko reta ya Malawi ishobora kubafatira ingingo zitabashimisha. Ati: “Tubaye mugihugu nk’abashitsi, si igihugu cacu, barashobora kutwiyumvira ukundi kuntu, bakerekana ko kumbure turi abicanyi, canke ibindi”. Asaba reta gukora amatohoza yimbitse kugira ngo bamenye intandaro y’ico kibi maze bashobore guhumurizwa. Abajijwe nimba ata mugambi bafise wo guhunguka nk’uko reta y’Uburundi ibatera akamo, uyo mupfasoni avuga ati: “Reta ni reta nyene kandi ivuga nka reta, umwe wese afise ivyo yagiye ahunga bitandukanye n’ivyo uwundi. “Umwe wese ashobora kuvuga ati jewe aho navuye nshobora kuhasubira nta kibazo, uwundi nawe ati jewe sinohasubira kuko mfise ibibazo. “Rero ako kamo reta itera, iragatera ariko kitabirwa n’uwubikeneye, kuko buri muntu wese afise ibibazo vyiwe vyatumye ahunga”.

headline: Dickson Etuhu: Uyu yahoze akinira Nigeriya yagiriwe na ruswa mu mukino muri Swede
text: Dickson Etuhu, yahoze ari umukinyi nserukiragihugu wa Nigeriya mu mupira w'amaguru, yagiriwe n'icaha co kugerageza kugura umukino muri sentare yunguruza imanza muri Swede. Sentare yunguruza imanza ya Stockholm mu rwandiko yasohoye kuri uno wa gatatu yavuze ko ata gukekeranya Etuhu n'uwundi yahoze ari umukinyi atavuzwe bagerageje guhenda umunyegoli wa AIK, Kyriakos "Kenny" Stamatopoulos. Bashaka kugura umukino wo mu ciciro co hejuru mu mupira w'amaguru muri Swede mu mwaka w'2017. Etuhu yakiniye amakipe menshi yo muri Premier League mu Bwongereza harimwo Manchester City, Sunderland, Preston, Blackburn na Fulham, yasimvye urw'umunyororo ariko acirwa igihano co kutaja mu nkino, ariko nta bindi vyashizwe ahagaragara. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 37, yavuye mw'ikipe ya AIK mu 2016, yavuze ko azokwunguruza kuri iyo ngingo muri sentare ntahinyuzwa. Sentare yavuze ko "ivyo abo bagabo bahaye uwo mukinyi (Stamatopoulos) vyari ibintu utokekeranya ko biri mu rwego rw'ibigize icaha ca ruswa." Etuhu yari yabanje kugirwa umwere na sentare mu mwaka uheze ariko umushinjacaha Johan Lindmark yaciye yunguruza, akaba yabwiye ikinyamakuru Espressen co muri Swede ko ashimye urubanza rw'uno munsi. Lindmark yagize ati "Nakiranye isomwa ry'urubanza rw'uno munsi n'umutima uhimbawe. Nari nunguruje nzi yuko sentare izohindura kandi sinatangaye mbonye ingingo yashitsweko." Etuhu yakiniye ikipe ya Nigeriya, Super Eagles, inshuro 20 mu gikombe ca Afrika mu 2008 no mu 2010 co kimwe no mi gikombe c'isi muri Afrika y'epfo.

headline: Guardiola ati 'Lionel Messi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona'
text: Pep Guardiola arahakana amakuru avuga ko  Lionel Messi ashobora kumuhamyva muri Manchester City, akavuga ko yizeye neza y'uko uyo mukinyi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona. Imyaka yose y'umwuga wiwe, Messi, ubu afise myaka 32, ayimaze muri Barcelona, ariko mu masezerano afitaniye nayo hakaba harimwo ikigabane kimuha uburenganzira bwo kuja ahandi mu ci riza. Guardiola yaramenyereje Messi i Camp Nou hagati ya 2008 na 2012, aho yatwaye ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru  rya Espanye, La Liga, hamwe n'ibikombe bibiri vy'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, Ligue des Champions. Guardiola ati: "Jewe ndipfuza ko yoguma hariya [muri Barça]". Uyo mumenyereza wa Man City yavuye muri Barcelona asize ayifashije gutsindira ibikombe 14 mu myaka y'inkino ine, aca aja kumenyereza umurwi Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi. Yagiye mu Budagi gutsindira ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry' Ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu myaka itatu ikurikirana. Mu Bwongereza, myaka itatu amaze amenyereza Man City amaze gutsidindira Premier League incuro zibiri zikurikirana, 2017/2018 hamwe na 2018/2019, n'aho muri uno mwaka ibintu bitifashe neza kuko Liverpool ifise ikibanza ca mbere muri iryo higanwa iyisumvya amanota 22 mu gihe hasigaye ingiko 13 gusa. Messi, umukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro zitandatu, ibikombe 10 vya La Liga hamwe n'ibikombe bine vya Ligue des Champions, afise amasezerano azorangira mu 2021 muri Barcelona. Hagati aho, aherutse gushikiriza amajambo atari meza ku wujejwe ukwinonora imitsi muri Barcelona, Eric Abidal, inyuma y'aho uyu Mufaransa yagirije abakinyi ko ata shaka berekanye igihe bamenyerezwa na Ernesto Valverde aherutse kwirukanwa. Mw'ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, Barcelona iza mu kibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Real Madrid iyisumva amanota atatu. Mu gihe hari abibaza ko Guardiola ashobora kuboneraho akarondera Messi kubera icuka kibi hagati yiwe na Abidal, uyo mumenyereza wa Man City ntaco bimubwiye. Abidal na Messi bompi barabaye abakinyi biwe. Avuga ati: "Jewe sinkunda kuvuga ivyerekeye abakinyi b'iyindi mirwi". "Ndibaza ko azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona". Lionel Messi yashitse muri Barcelona afise imyaka 13, ni ukuvuga mu 2000, aho yatanguriye gukira umupira w'amaguru mu bana batarenza imyaka 14. Yagiye atera imbere mu buryo bw'agatangaza, aho yaduga akaja muri Barça C, hanyuma muri Barça B, gushika mu murwi mukuru, ivyo bikaba vyabaye mu gihe gito cane kitari bwabeho. Mu kw'icenda guheze, uyu mukinyi w'igitangaza aherutse gutsindira agashimwe k'umukinyi wa mbere wa FIFA mu mwaka wa 2019,  ku ncuro ya gatandatu, imbere ya Christiano Ronaldo wa Juventus na Virgil van Dijk wa Liverpool.

headline: Covid-19: 83% vy'abanye-Afrika ntibararonswa urukingo rwa mbere - OMS
text: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, avuga ko abanye-Afrika 83% batararonswa urukingo rwa mbere rwa Covid-19. Ivyo yabishikirije mu buryo bw'iyakure mu nama yabereye ku murwa mukuru wa Nigeria Abuja. Hari ku munsi hibukwa umwaka uheze Afrika ironkejwe inkingo za mbere za Covid muri wa mugambi wa Covax. Covax ni umugambi mpuzamakungu ugamije kuronsa bose ku buryo bungana inkingo za Covid. Dr Tedros yavuze ko uwo mugambi wadindijwe cane n'ivyo yise "ukwigungirako urukingo ku rwego rw'ibihugu". Ngo vyatewe kandi n'amashirahamwe ahingura imiti, yashira imbere ibihugu vyifise mu gutanga izo nkingo.

headline: Umugwi wa ONU uvuga ko agateka ka muntu mu Burundi kagihonyangwa
text: Umugwi wigenga wa ONU wo gutohoza ku mabi ahonyanga agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi uvuga ko n'ubwo umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje guteza imbera ako gateza ngo n'ubu nta ngingo zifadika zirafatwa muri iyo nzira. Doudou Diene arongoye uwo mugwi umaze imyaka itanu yabivugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku munsi  uwo mugwi wari uramutse ushira ahabona icegeranyo cawo kigira gatanu. Mw'ijambo ry'intangamarara, Doudou Diene yavuze ko "inyuma y'igisa n'uko ibintu vyasubiye mu buryo, amabi akomeye yo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu abandanya mu gihugu". Reta y'Uburundi yagumye ihakana ivyegeranyo uwo mugwi wagiye urasohora ivuga ko ari ibinyoma kandi bifise intumbero ya poritike. Uwo mugwi uvuga ko kuva Prezida Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi haraheze amezi 15 "uretse ko amabi akomeye cane yabandanije akorwa, ku mpande zimwe zimwe, ibintu vyarunyutse". Uwo mugwi utanga akarorero k'abantu bo mugambwe utavuga rumwe na reta, CNL, abahoze mu gisirikare ca kera bagwiriyemwo abatusti  na bamwe mu bahungutse bafashwe n'abajejwe umutekano bagirizwa gukorana n'abitwaje ibigwanisho kuva aho hagabiwe ibitero mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020. Umugwi uvuga ko bamwe "bishwe ata rubanza baciriwe, abandi baburirwa irengero, abandi nabo barapfungwa ata mategeko akurikijwe". Uwo mugwi uvuga ko n'ubwo icuka ca poritike casa n'icabaye ciza inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020, ukutihanganira abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi n'ubu bigikomeye cane. N'aho hatangwa akarorero ku banywanyi b'umugambwe CNL babandanya gukorerwa amabi atandukanye harimwo kuburwa irengero, gufatwa bidaciye mu mategeko no kuborezwa igufa na cane cane kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatatu mu 2021. Abagirizwa ayo mabi basa n'abasanzwe bavugwa mu bindi vyegeranyo. N'abo mu rwego rw'iperereza, abapolisi, hamwe n'imbonerakure, urwaruka rw'umugwambwe uri ku butegetsi. Umugwi uvuga ko abakora ayo mabi batigera babibazwa imbere y'ubutungane hanyuma ngo babihanirwe. Abagize uwo mugwi ntibigeze bashika mu Burundi gukora amatohoza yabo. Yishura kuri ico kibazo, Françoise Hampson, icegera c'umukuru w'uwo mugwi yavuze ko  badashobora kuja mu gihugu reta yaco itabahaye uruhusha. Ariko yemeza ko ubuhinga bwa none bwatumye bashobora kuvugana n'abakozweko n'amahano atandukanye bari mu Burundi. Umugwi ugaruka ku bamenyeshamakuru bane b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu bafunguwe mu kwezi kwa 12 mu 2020 ku kigongwe c'umukuru w'igihugu, gusa ngo ntivyigeze bivugwa ko bari bafashwe bazira gukora umwuga wabo. Hari n'abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu barekuwe harimwo Germain Rukuki. Gusa uwo mugwi uvuga ko ivyo ari ibimenyetso gusa. Muri rusangi uvuga ko ubucamanza bugikoreshwa n'ubutegetsi nk'igikoresho co gucinyiza abatavuga rumwe nabwo, hakongerako ibiturire vyabumugaje na reta ubwayo iherutse kwiyemerera. Muri iyo myaka itanu umaze ukora, ivyeregaranyo vyawo vyagumye vyiyamirizwa na reta y'Uburundi. Françoise Hampson avuga ko akazi k'umugwi ujejwe gukora amatohoza atari ako guhindura ibintu. Avuga ati: "Umugwi ujejwe gutohoza no gushira ahabona mu buryo buzira akanenge bushoboka ingene ibintu biba vyifashe", akongerako ko hari izindi nzego zijejwe gukoresha ivyegeranyo umugwi wasohoye kugirango ibintu bihinduke. Doudou Diene nawe amwunganira avuga ati "Twari dusigaye turi urwego rwigenga rumwe rwonyene rwakurikirana ibibera mu Burundi" kuko izindi nzego zose zabikora reta y'Uburundi yashoboye kuzicecekesha. Avuga ko ikintu gihambaye kwari ugushobora guha ijambo "abakorewe amabi kuko akenshi iyo abo batavuze" bica bimera nk'uko ayo mabi atakozwe. Reta y'Uburundi yasavye kuva kera ko uwo mugwi wovaho. Wari umaze imyaka itanu uguma wongerwa ikiringo. Ingingo ya kazoza kawo izofatwa mu nama y'urwego rwa ONU rujejejwe agateka ka zina muntu iriko iraba muri uku kwezi kw'icenda. Nihanaho hazoshiririzwa icese ico cegeranyo gishasha. Françoise Hampson avuga ko abagize uwo mugwi atari bo bisabira  ko umugwi wabo ubandanya canke urangirizwa ikiringo. Bikorwa n'ibihugu bigize urwo rwego. Gusa avuga ko ''amakungu akeneye urwego rwo kuguma rushinze ijisho ibibera mu Burundi".

headline: South Africa: WHO iti nta cerekana ko ubwoko bushasha bwa corona bushobora kurinda urukingo
text: Urwego rwa ONU rwitaho amagara kw'isi (OMS canke WHO) ruvuga ko ata kimenyetso kihari c'uko  ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa corona bwatowe muri Africa y'Epfo bushobora kurinda urukingo. Umukuru w'igisata c'ubuhinga muri OMS, Maria Van Kerkhove,yavuze ko abanduye umugera w'ubwosko bushasha bafise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara bimeze kumwe kandi ko bidakaze. Gusa avuga ko ubwo bwoko bwongereje  ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera hafatiwe ku gitigiri umuntu umwe ashobora kwanduza. Van Kerhove yavuze ati: ''Nta kimenyetso c'uko hari ingaruka ku nkingo ziriko ziratangwa. Iyo ni inkuru nziza cane. Iyo niyo nkuru dufise gushika ubu, kandi ivyigwa biracabandanya''. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa OMS Mike Ryan yavuze ko ubwo bwoko bushasha butahinduye uburyo uwo mugera wandukira.

headline: Nijeriya niyo isa n' isigaye mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore
text: Imirwi ya Afrika mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore ntihagaze neza aho ibintu bigeze gushika ubu. Ibihugu vya Nijeriya, Kameruni na Afrika y'Epfo nivyo vyaserukiye umugabane wa Afrika muri iryo higanwa ririko ribera mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Imirwi ya Afrika y'Epfo na Kameruni yoyo ivyayo ntivyoroshe kuko mu mirwi birimwo ata nota na rimwe vyigeze bironka, bigasigura ko batigeze batsinda n'urukino na rumwe. Amaso yose asigaye yerekeje cane kuri Nijeriya mu murwi A ikaba iri kumwe n'ibihugu vy'Ubufaransa, Noroveje hamwe ka Koreya y'Ubumanuko. Nijeria iri mu mwanya wa gatatu inyuma y'Uburafansa bufise amanota atandatu, bugakurikirwa na Noroveje hamwe na Nijeriya nyene,  vyompi bifise amanota atatu atatu, ariko Noroveje ikaba ifise ibitsindo vyinshi, mu gihe Nijeriya yoyo ifise ideni ry'igitsindo kimwe. Koreya y'Epfo yoyo ifise ubusa. Rero, Nijeria isigaje guhura n'Ubufaransa. Ari nka hamwe yovyifatamwo neza igatsinda urwo rukino, irafise amahirwe yo kubandanya, ariko bikava ku kungene ibintu bizogenda hagati ya Koreya y'Ubumanuko na Noroveje. Mu biharuro vya hafi, kugira ngo Nijeria ibandanye, ni uko itsinda Ubufaransa canke bakanganya, hanyuma Koreya y'Epfo nayo igategerezwa gutsinda Noroveje. Mu gihe yoguma mu kibanza ca gatatu, voyvana n'ingene ibintu vyoba bihagaze kugira ngo ibe mu mirwi myiza iri mu bibanza vya gatatu. N'aho ivya Kameruni bitoroshe, ari nka hamwe yotsinda urukino rwayo rwo ku wa kabiri, irashobora kubandanya kuko ni iya gatatu mu murwi E n'amanota ubusa, ariko ikagira ideni ry'ibitsindo bitatu. Vyovana n'ingene iyindi mirwi iri mu bibanza vya gatatu ihagaze. Ni inkino zizobera ica rimwe ejo ku wa mbere isaha 16 mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda. Muri iryo higanwa, uno munsi mu murwi F, ibihugu ca Suwede na Tayilandi biratana mu mitwe isaha indwi mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda, mu gihe Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziza gutana mu mitwe na Shili isaha icumi. Mu zindi nkino, igihugu ca Ukraine caraye gitahukanye igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abatarenza imyaka 20 ku ruhande rw'abagabo, gitsinze igihugu ca Koreya y'Epfo ibitsindo 3-1. Muri iryo higanwa, Afrika yari yaserukiwe n'ibihugu vya Senegali, Nijeriya, Mali na Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Senegali nico cinanase kirashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (Quart de finale), mu gihe Nijeriya na Mali bitarenze igice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma (8e de finale) bimaze kurengana igice c'ugukuranamwo mu mirwi (phase de groupes).

headline: Kurwara amano biturutse kuri Covid: Icigwa kirabisigura
text: Abahinga mu bumenyi (science) bemeza ko bashobora gusigura igituma abantu bamwe bamwe banduye Covid baheza bagahurirwa canke bagafurutira ku mano canke ku ntoke. Guhurirwa canke gufurutira ku mano bisa n'uko ari imwe mu ngaruka z'umubiri uba  wafashe inzira yo kurwana kugira wivune umugera. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko batoye neza na neza ibice vy'indinganizo y'umubiri yo kwigwanira bigira uruhara muri ivyo bishikira amano. Ivyatowe, biri muri  British Journal of Dermatology - ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza candikwamwo ibijanye n'indwara z'urukoba (uruhu) -  bishobora gufasha gutora imiti yo kworohereza amano. Ni iki kurwara amano bitewe na Covid? Bishobora gushika ku myaka iyari yo yose, ariko akenshi bikarira abana n'abayabaga (abangavu). Kuri bamwe nta bubabare bitera, ariko uko gufurutira gushobora kubabaza kandi kugatera kwiyagaza cane no kuvyimba. Sofia, w'imyaka  13 aba muri Ecose (Scotland) , vyageze aho bihakwa kumunanira gutambuka canke kwambara ibirato igihe yarwara amano biturutse kuri Covid mu minsi iheze. Yageze aho yifashisha intebe ry'abagendana ubumuga canke abarwaye badashobora kwigendera  (wheel chair/chaise roulante) iyo yaba ashaka kuja kure. Igice kirwaye, - akenshi amano, ariko rimwe na rimwe n'intoke - gishobora guhishira. Hari n'abavyimba bakababara canke urukoba rukagangatara.  Hashobora kuza  n'amashira. Hari ababimarana amezi, abandi amayinga. Akenshi, nta kimenyetso na kimwe  bagira mu bisanzwe biranga indwara ya Covid, nk'inkorora idahera,  , ubushuhe no kutamoterwa canke kutumva igisosa canke ikurura. Kubera iki bishika? Ibiherutse gutorwa muri ico cigwa , bishingiye ku bipimo vy'amaraso n'urukoba , vyerekana ko hari ibice bibiri vy'indinganizo y'umubiri yo  kwirwanira bishobora kuba bfise uruhara. Vyompi bizanamwo inzira umubiri ukoresha mu kurwanya umugera. Imwe ni proteine igwanya umugera yitwa interferon y'ubwoko bwa mbere, hanyuma hari n'ubundi bwoko  bw'umusirikare w'umubiri yihenda akarwanya  uturemangingo bwite tw'umuntu, aho kurwanya uwo mugera wonyene. Uturemangingo turi ku nzira  zitwara amaraso ahaba harwaye natwo tugira uruhara nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo kuri kaminuza ya Paris mu Bufaransa. Abashakashatsi bize abantu 50 bikekwa kuba barwaye amano bitewe na Covid ku mpeshi ya 2020, n'abandi 13 bari bafise ibimenyetso bisa navyo ariko vyo  ataho bihuriye na Covid kuko vyabaye imbere cane y'uko ikiza ca Covid caduka. Bizeye ko ivyatowe bizofasha abarwaye n'abaganga  gutahura ibishikira amano. Umuganga avura indwara z'ibirenge mu Bwongereza Dr Ivan Bristow  avuga ko kenshi - guhurirwa canke gufurutira bitewe n'ibicurane canke ku bantu bafise ingorane z'itembera ry'amaraso - birikiza vyo nyene. Ariko hari n'igihe bikenerwa ko hakoreshwa amavuta yo kuhasiga canke imiti. Avuga ati "ubwo ikibitera cemejwe bizofasha kumenya ingene bivurwa neza gusumba". Avuga ko indwara zifata urukoba kubera ingaruka za Covid zishobora kuza haheze igihe umuntu yayirwaye bikomeye no ku bantu ata bindi bimenyetso bagaragaje, gutyo isano na Covid ntiryama rihari.

headline: Mu gihe Amerika iriko irungika izindi ngabo, Irani isaba ingabo mvamahanga kutegera ikigobe c’abarabu
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Irani aragabisha ko ingabo mvamahanga zihungabanya ikigobe c'Abarabu, inyuma y'aho Amerika imenyeshereje ko igiye kurungika ingabo muri ako karere. Perezida Hassan Rouhani avuga ko ingabo mvamahanga zamye "zitera umubabaro n'ubukene". Amerika ivuga ko igiye kurungika izindi ngabo mu gihugu ca Arabia Saoudite inyuma y'igitero giherutse kuba ku bigo bicukura igitoro, ivyo bihugu vyompi bikaba vyagirije Irani ko ari yo yagikoze. Uno mwaka kuva utanguye waranzwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika na Irani, kuva aho  Perezida Donald Trump  wa Amerika afatiye ingingo y'ukwiyonkora mu masezerano yasaba Irani guheba umugambi w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara, nayo igatezurirwa ibihano yafatiwe. Ibintu vyagiye gusubira kwunyuka igihe habereye ibitero vya drone n'ibisasu vya misile ku bigo bicukura igitoro vy'ahitwa Abqaiq na Khurais ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda. Abarwanya ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ca Yemen bitwa Houthi  nibo biyitiriye ico gitero, ariko Amerika na Arabia Saoudite - umwansi wa mbere wa Irani muri ako karere - vyagiriza Irani ko ari yo yagikoze, ivyo ico gihugu ciyamiriza civuye inyuma. Ijambo ryiwe yarishikirije mu birori vy'ukwibuka umunsi haduka intambara hagati ya Irani na Iraki yabaye kuva mu 1980 gushika mu 1988, ibirori vyaranzwe n'amadefire y'igisirikare ku mugwa mukuru wa Irani no mu bindi bisagara vy'igihugu. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryaciye kumboneshakure y'ico gihugu yavuze ati: "Ingabo mvamahanga zishobora gutera ingorane n'umutekano muke ku banyagihugu bacu no mu karere kacu". Avuga ko muri kahise zateye akaga, akazisaba kuguma iwabo. "Nimba koko bafise umutima, ni bareke kugira akarere kacu ikiririmbiro ry'ibirwanisho … Uko muzogenda mureka kwivanga mu biraba akarere kacu n'ibihugu vyacu, niho numutekano uzogenda usasagara". Ubushikiranganji bw'ukwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagon, bwatangaje ku munsi wa gatanu ko buzorungika ingabo nkeya muri Arabia Saoudite kubera yabisavye, zikazoba ahanini zigizwe n'abajejwe kurwanira mu kirere be no gukinga ibitero vya misire. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Mark Esper, avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo turungike mu maguru masha ibikoresho vya gisirikare". Iryo tangazo ryariyamirijwe cane n'igisata kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, Revolutionary Guard Corps, igisata c'igisirikare ca Irani, gifatwa  na Amerika nk'umurwi w'iterabwoba. Umukuru w'ico gisata, Jenerali-Majoro Hossein Salami avuga ati: "Uwo ari we wese ashaka ko igihugu ciwe kiba ikiririmbiro ry'intambara, n'abandanye. Ariko muhagabire, agasotoro ntikazoguma ari agasotoro. Tuzokurikirana uwo ari we wese azodusotora".

headline: Arteta: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal afise umujinya inyuma y'aho Liverpool ibakubitiye 3-0 muhira
text: Mikel Arteta avuga ko ari mu "mubabaro" akavuga ko ingene Arsenal yavyifashemwo mu gutsindirwa  muhira 3-0 na Liverpool ari "ibintu bidashobora kwihanganirwa". Uyu murwi w'Abarashi (The Gunners) nk'uko biyita warakubiswe bimwe bibi mu guterwa ibitsindo bitatu vyose mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino, Liverpool ikaba yarerekanye ko yisubije itoto inyuma y'imisi itari mike iri mu bibazo. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino umunani ngo ihiganwa rirangire, Arsenal iri inyuma amanota icenda yose kugira ngo ishobore gushika muri zine za mbere zifise uburenganzira bwo kuja muri rya higanywa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League/Ligue des Champions). Arteta ati: "Baradusumbije kabisa muri vyose. Vyose vyamvuyeko". "Turasaba imbabazi ku bantu baco n'abafana bacu". Arsenal, umurwi wigeze kuba rurangiranwa, uzwi ko mu mwaka wa 2003/2004 watsindiye ihiganwa utigeze utakaza urukino na rumwe, iri mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, biboneka ko amahirwe yonyene isigaranye kugira ngo ishobore kuja muri Champions League, ni uko itsindira ihiganwa rya Europa League. Arsenal iheruka gukina muri Champions League mu 2016/2017, kuva ico gihe irirabira kure. Ku wa kane, izokwakira umurwi Slavia Prague wo muri Tchéquie (canke République tchèque/ Czech Republic) mu rukino rwa mbere rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri  Europa League. Arteta asaba abakinyi biwe guhagarara rugabo inyuma y'amarorerwa baraye bakorewe na Liverpool. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru inyuma y'urukino, Arteta yavuze ati: "Uno musi wari umubabaro mwinshi cane mu murwi. Ubu ndababaye cane kuko ni ibintu ntari niteze". "Ni ukuri ibi bintu ntibigasubire. Nishize mu kibanza c'umurwi n'abakunzi bawo, ibi ntibishobora kwihanganirwa. Ni ngombwa ko duhaguruka". "Ntegerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo nsubize ibintu mu buryo. Uno musi ibintu ntivyari vyifashe neza na gato". Jermaine Jenas,yahoze akina hagati muri Tottenham no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza aranegura ubuhinga Arteta yakoresheje. Ati: "Narorereye umurwi utari wizeye ubuhinga bwa Mikel Arteta". "Vyaboneka ko abakinyi ba Arsenal batari bamerewe neza. Basa n'uko ata shaka bari bafise ryo gukina canke ryo kurondera umupira canke ryo kurondera kwinjiza ibitsindo". "Ndiko ndibaza umubabaro abakunzi ba Arsenal bafise ubu". "Ni kangahe tubona Arsenal batakaza imipira inyuma bagaca batsindwa? Ubu ibintu bisigaye biteye isoni".

headline: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
text: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

headline: Russia yarakajwe n’uko UN iyisaba gutanga indishi kubera igitero kuri Ukraine
text: Uburusiya buriyamiriza burakaye cane akamo buterwa n’amakungu ko gutanga indishi y’akababaro ku vyo bwasambuye muri Ukraine. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho Ikoraniro ry’ishirahamwe ONU ryemereje icemezo c’uko Uburusiya bukwiye kwemera inkurikizi z’ivyo buriko burakora, harimwo gutanga indishi y’akababaro. Ivyemezo vy’ikoraniro rikuru bifise uburemere, ariko nta nguvu rifise zo kubishirisha mu ngiro. Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya) ivuga ko izokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ibuze Uburengero kuyifatira amatungo ifise mu makungu kugira ntakoreshwe nk’indishi. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov yagiriza Uburengero ko buriko bugerageza “kwemeza ubusuma” no guhonyanga amabwirizwa agenga amatungo bwite n’amategeko mpuzamakungu. Iki cemezo kivuga ko Uburusiya “butegerezwa kwemanga ingaruka ku bikorwa bibi vyose bukorera mu mahanga, harimwo gutanga indishi ku bubabare bwateje, harimwo ivyononekaye ivyo ari vyo vyose, kubera ibikorwa nk’ibi”. Gisaba kandi ibihugu bihurukiye mw’ishirahamwe ONU gukorana na Ukraine bigashiraho igitabo mpuzamakungu co kwegeranirizamwo ivyemezo n’ibirego ku Burusiya. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine yakiranye yompi iki cemezo, akavuga ko indishi y’akababaro izorihwa n’Uburusiya ari “kimwe mu bigize ukuri gushingiye ku mategeko mpuzamakungu”. Imbere y’uko iyi ngingo yemezwa, uwuserukira Kyiv muri ONU, Sergiy Kyslytsya, yabwiye abari muri iyo nama ko Uburusiya bwononye ibintu vyose muri ino ntambara, kuva ku mahinguriro gushika no ku mazu atuwemwo n’abantu n’inyubakwa z’ibitaro. Hampande y’amafaranga akenewe yo gusanura ivyasambutse, avuga ko gukira ibikomere “bitazokwigera birangira hatabayeho ubutungane ku basinzikajwe n’intambara y’Uburusiya”, yongerako ati: “Harageze Uburusiya bwishura ivyo bwakoze”. Uwuserukira Uburusiya muri ONU Vassily Nebenzia avuga ko iki cemezo “imbere y’amategeko ata na kimwe kivuze”, anagiriza Uburengero “kugerageza kudindiza no kwunyura intambara”. Iki cemezo cashigikiwe n’ibihugu 94 kuri 193 bigize ishirahamwe ONU, mu gihe 14 – harimwo Uburusiya, Ubushinwa na Iran – vyatoye bigihakana. Ibindi bihugu bisigaye vyose vyanse kwerekana aho bihagaze. Tugereranije n’ubuheruka, ibihugu 143 vyaremeje icemezo mu kw’icumi co kwiyamiriza ingingo ya Moscou yo kwihagira uturere twa Ukraine mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko. Hariho uturorero tw’ibihugu vyategetswe kuriha indishi y’akababaro inyuma y’intambara. Iyabaye rurangiranwa ni iy’imiriyaridi 269 y’amafaranga y’ama mark (yahoze ari amafaranga y’Ubudagi) ibihugu vyari vyishize hamwe vyategetse Ubudagi kuriha inyuma y’intambara ya mbere y’isi yose  - hafi imiriyaridi 300 y’amadorari y’abanyamerika muri kino gihe. Ubudagi bwatangishijwe amafaranga menshi nk’aya mu ntumbero yo kuraba ko butohava busubira guteza iyindi ntambara vuba. Ariko vyagiye kurangira bivuyemwo igihushane, kuko abahinga benshi mu vya kahise bavuga ko indishi zabumugaje n’ingingo yo “kwegeka icaha” ku Budagi, vyateje umujinya wagiye kwadukamwo intambara ya kabiri y’isi yose. Ubudagi n’ibindi bihugu vyari bihurikiye hamwe kandi vyategetswe kuriha indishi inyuma y’iyo ntambara, ariko bashimikira cane ku gusanura ivyasambutse i Bulaya hakwibanda ku guhana Ubudagi ku bikorwa vyabwo.

headline: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
text: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

headline: Tanzania: Umwaka umwe Perezida Samia Suluhu amaze ku butegetsi, bimeze gute?
text: Muri ino ndwi Abatanzania bariko baribuka umwaka umwe uwari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu wa Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan yimitswe nk'umukuru w'ico gihugu wa mbere w'umugore. Mu gihe ari we mukuru w'igihugu w'umugore wenyene muri Afrika, ntashaka kwitwa ya mazina y'ubutegetsi, wewe akaba yipfuza ko bamwita Samia, canke, nk'uko abivuga, "Mama Samia". Yimitswe mu kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uheze, igihe igihugu n'isi yose vyari bihanzwe n'ikiza ca covid-19, inyuma y'aho uwo yasubiriye John Magufuli asandabiye giturumbuka. Kuva ico gihe, yitayeho guteza imbere Tanzania muri rusangi. Bimwe mu vyo yakoze, harimwo ukwamamaza igihugu biciye mw'ireresi iriko irategurwa izwi nka "The Royal Tour" yitezwe gusohoka mu kwa kane kw'uno mwaka. Mama Samia yazungurutse igihugu cose, ari kumwe n'abakora amareresi b'abanyamerika kugira ngo yerekane ubutunzi bw'igihugu ciwe. Muri bwo, nk'uko abivuga atebura, isi itegerezwa kumenya ko umusozi wa Kilimanjaro n'ishamba ry'ibikoko rya Serengeti biri ku butaka bw'igihugu ciwe. None, Abatanzania bakiriye gute Mama Samia nk'umukuru w'igihugu: "Genda ubabaze uno musi. Ndumva ko ndiko ndakora akazi kanje. Ndumva ko ndiko ndakora ivyo niyemeje", niko avuga. Amaze kuragwa igihugu na Perezida Magufuli atemera ibijanye na Covid-19, Mama Samia avuga ati: "Hagufata amafaranga tukayashira mu vyo kugura udupfukamunwa n'imiti yo gukaraba be n'incanco, twaciye tuyashira mu migambi yo guteza imbere amagara meza mu mitumba  - mu kwubaka amavuriro no kwagura amasomera yari mato mu mashure. Umugambi w'amazi warateye imbere". Ni igiki co kwishimira gusumba ibindi gushika ubu amaze gushikako nk'umukuru w'igihugu?  Avuga ati: "Nibaza ko ikintu nyamukuru nashitseko ari ukubungabunga amahoro, ituze n'umutekano mu gihugu canje. Ico nico kintu nyamukuru novuga ko nashoboye gushikako". N'aho avuga ibi, umwanya muto amaze ku butegetsi waratosekajwe n'ihagarikwa ry'umunyaporitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe, Freeman Mbowe, mu kw'indwi kw'umwaka uheze. Ariko irekurwa ryiwe mu kwezi guheze, hampande yo kubonana na bamwe mu batavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi,  ni ikintu gikomeye cane kibonwa nk'ikimenyetso c'uko reta yiwe ishobora kwemerera abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bagakora bidegemvya. Ati: "Nk'uko ibwirizwashingiro ryacu ribivuga, iki gihugu naco kikaba kigendera ku mategeko, aya nayo akaba avuga ko imigambwe yemerewe gukora poritike, kuko niko kazi kayo, ntibashoora gukora poritike bapfunzwe, ntako boshobora gukora ibikorwa bategerezwa gukora bapfunzwe". Abajijwe ivyo yaganiriye n'umunyaporitike Freeman Mbowe, Mama Samia yishura ati: "Twavuganye ku bijanye no kwubaka icizere, ukwizigiranira, tukemera ko iyi Tanzania atari iy'umuntu umwe, ahubwo ko ari Tanzania ya twese. "Ni ngombwa ko twese tugira uruhara mu kwubaka Tanzania kuko iterambere rya Tanzania riraba buri wese. Buri wese ategerezwa guhagararira amahoro n'umutekano w'igihugu cacu, agahagararira iteka ry'igihugu cacu".

headline: Coronavirus: Uyu muganga yagerageje kugabisha abantu, igipolisi kiti 'numa'
text: Mu ntango z'ukwa mbere, abategetsi b'igisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa baragerageje kunyegeza ivyerekeye umugera mushasha wa coronavirus wariko uravuka. Umuganga umwe yagerageje kugabisha abaganga bagenziwe, igipolisi cagiye iwe kimutegeka kunuma. Haciye ukwezi aho aryamye mu bitaro yafashwe nk'incungu, inyuma y'aho amenyeshereje ivyamubayeko. Ni ibisigabwenge vyerekana ingene abategetsi ba Wuhan mu ndwi za mbere za coronavirus bayifashe minenerwe. Uyo muganga yari asanzwe akora mu karere uwo mugera watanguriyemwo mu kwa 12 igihe yabona abantu indwi bafise ibimenyetso vy'umugera avuga ko wasa n'uwa SARS - umugera wakoze ibara mu mwaka wa 2003. Abo barwayi biketswe ko bakora mw'isoko rya Huanan ridandarizwamwo ibiva mu mazi mu karere ka Wuhan, bakaba bari bashizwe mu cumba ca bonyene. Ku wa 30 z'ukwa 12 yarungikiye abaganga bagenziwe ubutumwa kuri telephone ngendanwa abagabisha ko hari indwara y'icaduka yabonetse, abahanura ko bokwambara impuzu z'ukwikingira kugira ntibandure. Gusa ico atamenye ico gihe ni uko uyo mugera watowe wari umugera mushasha wa coronavirus. Haciye iminsi ine, niho abategetsi bo mu biro bijejwe umutekano w'abanyagihugu bamugendera bakamutegeka gutera igikumu ku rwandiko. Muri urwo rwandiko yagirijwe ko yariko "akwiragiza ibinyoma vyahungabanije umutekano w'abanyagihugu". Rwavuga ruti: "Turakugabishije: ukabandanya wica amatwi, n'iyo ngendo y'ukutisonera, ubandanya n'ibi bikorwa bigayitse, uzoshikirizwa ubutungane - wavyumvise"? Urwo rwandiko rwaherahejwe n'amajambo yanditswe na muganga Li ati: "Ego navyumvise". Ni umwe mu bantu umunani igipolisi kivuga ko cariko gikorako amatohoza bagirizwa "gukwiragiza ibihuha". Mu mpera z'ukwa mbere, muganga Li yarerekanye urwo rwandiko ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi Weibo rwo mu Bushinwa, asigura ingene vyagenze. Imbere y'aho, abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bari bamusavye imbabazi ariko izo mbabazi zaje gusabwa igihe cararenganye. Mu ndwi za mbere z'ukwezi kwa mbere, abategetsi ba Wuhan baguma bashimangira ko uwo mugera wafata abakorakoye ibikoko bifise uwo mugera. Nta buryo abaganga bahawe bwo kwikingira. Ariko haciye indwi imwe gusa igipolisi kimugendeye, muganga Li yakiriye umugore yari arwaye indwara y'amaso ya 'glaucoma'. Ntiyari azi ko uyo mugore yari yanduye umugera wa coronavirus. Muri ubwo butumwa yacishije kuri Weibo, yasiguye ingene ku wa 10 z'ukwa mbere yafashwe n'inkorora, umunsi ukurikira ameneka umutwe, inyuma y'iminsi ibiri yisanga ari mu bitaro. Abavyeyi biwe nabo nyene baranduye baca bajanwa mu bitaro. Haciye iminsi cumi, ni ukuvuga ku wa 20 z'ukwa mbere, leta y'Ubushinwa yatangaje ko uwo mugera wabaye ikiza. Muganga Li avuga ko yipimishije incuro nyinshi ibipimo vyerekana ko ameze neza, ariko ku wa 30 z'ukwa mbere yanditse ubundi butumwa avuga ati: "Ibipimo vy'amaraso vyerekana ko nanduye". Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baranditse ubutumwa bwo kumushigikira. Umwe muri bo ati: "Muganga Li Wenliang ni incungu". Abandanya yerekana ubwoba afise ko muri kazoza "abaganga batazokwubahuka kugabisha abanyagihugu mu gihe bazobona ibimenyetso vy'indwara z'ivyaduka". "Ivuriro nyaryo …rikeneye amamiliyoni aharurwa muri mirongo y'abantu nka Li Wenliang". Video : M'Ubushinwa, ubu abategetsi bafata igihugu nk'ikiri mu ntambara

headline: Coronavirus: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana yifatiye ingingo ya Guma mu rugo
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo, yifatiye ingingo ya guma mu rugo mu kiringo c'iminsi 14 ku mpanuro yahawe n'abaganga, inyuma y'aho umwe mu bamwegereye yapimwe agasanga yaranduye wa mugera coronavirus. Iyo ngingo yamenyeshejwe mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na leta y'igo gihugu ejo ku wa gatandatu, rivuga riti: "Uno munsi nta mugera bamutoye, ariko yahisemwo iyi ngingo mu kwinengesera". Iryo tangazo rivuga ariko ko Perezida Akufo-Addo azobandanya akora akazi muri ico kiringo cose, ariko akurikiza ingingo zose zijanye no kwikingira Covid-19. Hagati aho, iryo tangazo ntirimenyesha nimba  uyo muntu amwegereye ari umukozi canke ari uyo mu muryango wiwe. Gushika ubu, igihugu ca Ghana giharurwamwo abanduye coronavirus 19.388, kikaba ari kimwe mu bihugu vyo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye. Muri abo, 117 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara, nayo 14.330 nabo bakaba bayikize. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji n'amahinguriro muri ico gihugu co mu burengero bwa Afrika, Carlos Kingsley Ahenkorah, yaratanze imihoho hirya y'ejo ku wa gatanu kubera yarenze ku mategeko ya guma mu rugo inyuma y'aho apimiwe agasanga yaranduye.

headline: Umunonotsi Francine Niyonsaba avuga ko atawuzomubuza guhiganwa
text: Umunonotsi w'Umurundikazi, Francine Niyonsaba, ahiganwa mu gusiganwa imetero 800, yabwiye BBC ko ata n'umwe ashobora kumubuza kubandanya ahiganwa. Ibi ni nyuma y'aho urwego mpuzamakungu rujejwe inkino zo kunonora imitsi rutegekeye ko abagore bafise imisemburo ya kigabo irenze urugero mu mubiri, bagomba gufata imiti iyigabanya. Mu banonotsi iyo ngingo iraba harimwo Francine Niyonsaba hamwe na Caster Semenya wo muri Afrika y'epfo, ariko iyo ngingo yajanywe muri sentare. Avugana na BBC mu gihe ikinyamakuru Forbes giheruka kumushira ku rutonde rw'abagore 30 bahambaye muri Afrika, Francine yavuze ko azobandanya ahiganwa mu kunonora imitsi, uko vyogenda kwose. Yavuze ko iyo ngingo yo gushaka kubakumira irimwo akarenganyo gakomeye. Francine avuga ko icatumye agira ishaka ryo kurondera ari uko yakuriye mu buzima bugoye. Yagize ati: "Jewe nakuze mpabwa ibintu bike mu buzima, nakuriye mu muryango ukenye. Sinaronse amahirwe yo kubana n'abavyeyi bose, ivyo rero vyarankujije mu mutwe." "... ndabona yuko ntegerezwa kurwana n'ubuzima. Umuvyeyi wanje nawe nyene yarampaye icitegererezo gikomeye kuri we kuko yarambwira ati 'mwana mu buzima ntacoroshe..." Francine yabaye Umurundi agira kabire muri kahise k'ico gihugu yaronse umudari mu nkino Olempike, aho yaronka umudari w'umwakaka mu nkino zo mu 2016 muri Brezil, mu kwiruka imetero 800. Uwundi ni Venuste Niyongabo, yaronse umudari w'inzahabu mu gusiganwa imetero 1500 mu nkino Olempike z'i Atlanta muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1996. Ku ngingo y'uko yobuzwa guhiganwa kubera ico kibazo c'imisemburo, Francine yagize ati "Nifuza yuko umwanya nkifise hano kw'isi abantu batovuga ngo harabaye ntihakabe, bovuga bati harabaye harakaba." Ushobora gukurikirana ikiganiro Francine Niyonsaba yagiranye na BBC ukanze ngaha.

headline: Amakuru ku ntambara ya Russia na Ukraine: Uburusiya bugabisha Uburengero ku ngaruka zititezwe
text: Uburusiya bwagabishije ku mugaragaro Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika - n'ibindi bihugu bicuditse nazo - ku mugambi wavyo wo guha ibirwanisho Ukraine. Iri gabisha ryacishijwe mu rwandiko rw'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Moscou, ikopi ikaba yashitse mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru muri Amerika. Uru rwandiko rw'impapuro zibiri - ibiro vy'ubuserukizi vy'Uburusiya i Washington bikaba vyarurungikiye ibiro vy'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire  - rugabisha ko ingendo ya Amerika na OTAN/NATO yo kurungika ibirwanisho muri Ukraine "isongera isibe" kuri iyi ngwano ya Ukraine, igashobora gutuma haba ivyo abajejwe imigenderanire b'Uburusiya bita "ingaruka zitari zitezwe". Rwarungitswe ku wa kabiri, igihe bitanguye kumenyekana ko Amerika igomba ihe Ukraine iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare. Haciye amasaha makeya gusa, Perezida Joe Biden akaba yaciye atera igikumu kw'itegeko ritanga uburenganzira bwo kurungika  imfashanyo ya gisirikare ingana n'imiriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika - harimwo, ubu bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere,  ibirwanisho rutura birasa kure nk'ivyitwa howitzers - ni mu ntumbero yo guha Ukraine inguvu za gisirikare zingana n'iz'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu butegetsi bwa Amerika yasubiwemwo avuga ko iri gabisha rishobora gufatwa nk'icemezo c'uko Uburusiya bwemera ko imfashanyo ya Amerika na OTAN kuri Ukraine yabaye ngirakamaro. Igice ca mbere c'iyi mfashanyo citezwe gushika muri Ukraine mu misi mike iri imbere, mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya kwitegura mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, imbere y'igitero gikomeye citezwe mu ntara irwanirwa  cane ya Donbas muri Ukraine mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere. Kuva intambara itanguye, Amerika imaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ifise agaciro k'imiriyaridi zirenga zitatu z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zishika 3000 zimaze gupfa, abarenga 10.000 nabo bakaba bamaze gukomereka kuva igitero gitangura. Yabivugiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure CNN yo muri Amerika, aho avuga ko abari hagati ya 2500 na 3000 bamaze gupfa, ari naho yaciye agabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora gukora igitero ca nikleyeri. Haraciye ukwezi Zelensky avuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 1500 zari zimaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Ariko, aho hose yama avuga ko Abarusiya basumba kure ivyo bitigiri vy'abamaze gupfa. BBC ubwayo ntirashobora guhinyuza ibi bitigiri bitarimwo abasivire. Impande zompi zama zitangaza ibitigiri vyo ku rundi ruhande vy'abo zimaze kwica - akenshi bikaba ari ivy'umurengera bisumba kure cane ibitangazwa n'urudi ruhande. Isi yoba iritegurira ko Uburusiya bushobora kuzotera Ukraine bukoresheje ikirwanisho ca nikleyeri, nk'uko vyaraye bivuzwe na Perezida Zelensky. Zelensky yari abajijwe na CNN  nimba yari afise ubwoba ku biherutse kuvugwa n'umukuru wa CIA, aho ku wa kane yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora guhindura amayeri bugakoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. "Si jewe gusa - ni isi yose, ibihugu vyose bitegerezwa kuba maso kuko ishobora kuba atari inkuru yo, ariko ishobora kuba ari ukuri", niko Zelensky avuga, mu majambo make y'icongereza yakoresheje kugira ngo ashimangire. Abandanya ati: "Ni ngombwa ko twiyumvira aho gutinya, ntidutinye ahubwo twitegure. Ariko ico si ikibazo ca Ukraine - si Ukraine gusa - ariko ni ikibazo c'isi yose, niko nibaza". Mu kwezi guheze, umuvugizi wa Kremlin yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora kwikora ku birwanisho vya nikleyeri gusa mu gihe vyoboneka ko ukubaho kwabwo kubangamiwe. Zelensky kandi yabajijwe ku bwato rutura bw'intambara bw'Uburusiya bwazamye, buzwi nka Moskva, ariko yariyubaye ku makuru avuga ko ubu bwato bwatewe misire zibiri za ukrane. "Ico tuzi ni uko butakibaho. Kuri twebwe, ni ikirwanisho gikomeye cane kibangamiye igihugu cacu, rero izama ryabwo ntabwo ritubabaje. "Mu gihe Uburusiya bwokehanirwa n'ibirwanisho bukoresha mu kudutera, yoba ari amahirwe kuri twebwe". Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije mu masaha yitereye y'ijoro ryakeye, avuga ko bigoye kumenya igihe iyi ntambara izomara. Ati: " Nivyo, ndumva kandi ibitandukanye bivugwa. Mfise amakuru menshi gusumba ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe ku bijanye n'intumbero n'ubushobozi igisirikare c'Uburusiya gifise. "Ku bijanye na kazoza k'ubutunzi bw'Uburusiya. Kubijanye n'ingene abanyagihugu biyumva mu Burusiya". Avuga ko hari ibintu bibiri bizokwerekana igihe intambara izomara. Avuga ati: "Ingene abasirikare bacu bazovyifatamwo neza ni ikintu gikomeye. "Ni ikintu nyamukuru mu mateka yacu. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo twomore abigaruriye ubutaka bwacu. Ariko tuzobakubita". "Ibihano ku Burusiya ni ikintu gikomeye cane. Bihungabanya ubutunzi. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo igisirikare c'Uburusiya kibure ibikibeshaho. Dukeneye ibirwanisho bikomeye, bishobora kubasambura". Yongerako ati: "Umuntu avuze ati: umwaka canke myaka, nishura nti: intambara urashobora kuyigira nto gusumba. Ni twaronka hakiri kare ibirwanisho binini twasavye, niho tuzogira inguvu kandi niho tuzoshobora kugarukana amahoro vuba". Umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine wazindutse uterwa amabombe nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisagara. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri Instagram, Vitali Klitschko yavuze ko aya mabombe yatewe mu karere ka Darnytskyi kari ku nkengera y'igisagara. Yongera ko y'uko igitigiri c'abapfuye n'abakomeretse kitazwi kandi ko abajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi bari aho vyabereye. Nk'uko vyagenze kuri Kyiv, ibibombe kandi vyumvikanye mu gisagara ca Lyiv kiri mu burengero bwa Ukraine muri aka gatondo. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri app ya Telegram, buramatari Maksym Kozytskyi yavuze ko habaye igitero c'indege hagati y'isaha cumi n'imwe n'iminoa 46 (05:46) n'isaha imwe n'iminota ibiri (07:02 ) mu masaha y'aho muri ico gihugu. Avuga ko abajejwe gucungera ikirere ba Ukraine bariko barakora, ariko akaba atatomoye ku hatewe iyo mabombe, hamwe n'abakomeretse canke bakahasiga ubuzima.

headline: France: Urugendo rurerure rwa 'Extreme-droite' rwo gushikira ubutegetsi mu Bufaransa
text: Marine Le Pen yaragize urugendo, ashikana umugambwe wa 'Extreme-droite' (uhagaze ku migenzo ya kera no gudashima abimukira) mu kibanza ushobora gukabakaba ubutegetsi mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. N'inyuma y'aho asubiriye se wiwe ku burongozi bwa Front National, muri 2011, yamaze imyaka agerageza gushika ku rugero rwo kuwukurako iceyi, rwari rukenewe kugira wiyumve nk'umugambwe wimirije gufata ubutegetsi. Politike yiwe ku bimukira no gushira imbere guha inzu n'akazi abafaransa yarabigumije, ariko uwo mupfasoni arongoye uwo mugambwe wa Front National yerekana isura y'umuntu ari hagati na hagati kandi atahurwa n'abantu benshi. "Ego ndi umuntu yorora inyabu yabigize umwuga, mu yindi nzira ndi umurimyi," uko ni ko yavugiye kuri France Inter mu kwezi kwa mbere. Le Pen afise inyabu zitandatu kandi ziragaragara ku mavideo yo ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Tik Tok eka mbere no ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Instagram. Igihe umuhinga muri politike Chloe Morin yabaza umugwi w'abazitaba amatora i Lille mu mwaka uheze uko babona uwo mudamu, inyabu ni zo zaza imbere. Ni nde atokwizera urya mupfasoni w'inyabu? Ashobora kuboneka nk'umuntu ari hagati na hagati, ariko politike yiwe nta ho itandukaniyeko n'iyahahoze ku bimukira, ku bwenegihugu no kuri Islam. Emmanuel Macro yavuze ko politike yiwe ishingiye ku macakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. James Shields, yigisha igifaransa muri kaminuza ya Warwick avuga ko amajambo yerekana amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba atagikoreshwa. Ariko amategeko n'ingingo vy'uwo mugambwe wa se wiwe umaze igihe kirekire vyo kugwanya abimukira ntibirahinduka na gato. Le Pen agiye mu ngunga ya kibiri y'amatora yo ku musi w'Imana afise amahirwe yo gutsinda. Bitandukanye no mu myaka itanu iheze aho atari yiteguye, aho yabuze ayo acira n'ayo amira mu kiganiro co ku mboneshakure imbere y'amatora Macron yatsinze aronse ibice bibiri kuri bitatu vy'amajwi. Ariko aramaze kuvyifatamwo neza gusumba se wiwe, Jean-Marie Le Pen, yatsindiye kuja mu ngunga ya kabiri y'amatora mu 2002 yishimikije kugwanya abimukira  no gusubiza igihugu ku murongo. Yatsinzwe kubera ibice 82% biyamirije politike yiwe bagereranije n'ubumara. Uwo yari umugabo atahengeshanije kuvuga, kuva mu 1987, ko ivyumba vy'abanazi biciramwo abantu hakoreshejwe gaz ari "akantu gato kabaye mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose" kandi yagumye yagirizwa urwanko ku bayahudi. Imyiyamamazo yiwe ubu ifise ivyivugo vya Marine prezida kandi "Ku bafaransa bose". Nta zina rya Le Pen rivugwa, ukwikurako iceyi gusa n'ukuriko kurakunda. Afise imyaka icenda, ni ho yabona uko se wiwe ameze, igihe yacika kw'icumu ku gitero ca bombe co mu 1976, cononye cane inzu y'umuryango wa Le Pen hagati mu gisagara ca Paris. Mu gitabo c'ubuzima bw'iwe arasigura ingene we na bakuru we babiri "bari bapfukamye hasi, bagugumwa, bafatanye amaboko... aho twumva ijwi rya data avugira hejuru: "Bakobwa bakobwa muracari bazima?" Mu nyuma, abana bigana bahawe itegeko ryo kutamwegera: "Haciye hashirwaho umuzingi wo kwikingira iruhande yacu - Ntimwegere ba Le Pen." Hanyuma igihe yari afise imyaka 16, nyina wiwe Pierrette yaciye ajana n'umwanditsi w'igitabo c'ubuzima bwa se wiwe. Ku mwana w'umuyabaga nka Marine, cabaye igihe kibabaje catumye yegera cane se wiwe. Mu gitabo c'ubuzima bwiwe casohotse mu 2011 avuga ati: "Namaze ukwezi kose n'igice nyogwa buri musi. Ntivyakunda ko nigaburira." Imyaka yamaze muri ivyo bintu yatumye akomantara cane inyuma nk'uko asanzwe abizwiko. Agatwengo yerekana imbere y'abafata amafoto kamara umwanya urume rumara. Umugenzi wiwe Steeve Briois yabwiye BBC ati: "Inyuma y'ibintu vyose yaciyemwo mu buto bwiwe, yaciye yiyugara". Yagumye ari umugenzi wiwe wa hagafi, nk'umukuru w'igisagara afise ku muzirikanyi ca Henin-Beaumontm mu buraruko bw'Ubufaransa. Inyuma yo kuronka urupapuro rw'umutsindo muri imwe muri za kaminuza z'i Paris zigisha amategeko mu ntango za 1990, yaciye akora akazi ko kuburanira abadashobora kuronaka amahera yo kuriha abashingwamanza. Rimwe na rimwe wasanga harimwo abimukira badakurikije amategeko. Babimubajije mu nyuma, yavuze ko atabona ahari ubudasa: "Ni ibiremwa muntu, barafise uburenganzira, ntawobarenganya ku bijanye na politike y'abimukira." Umushingwamanza w'i Paris, Basile Ader yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndatangarira ingene aguma atuje kandi akanashobora kugumana imigenderanire myiza mu kazi n'aho yaba yikoreye umuzigo w'uko se wiwe avugwa." Mu 1998, ntiyari bwamenyere neza akazi. Narababajwe n'ingene abandi bashingwamanza bamwigira kure kubera politike ya se wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, yaciye ava muri ako kazi, agenywe mu kibanza co hejuru kiraba ivyo amategeko muri Front National. Hariho akantu ka mpinga yanje aho mu 2004 yaratowe nk'umushingamateka w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya anamarayo imyaka 13. Ugutandukana na se. N'imbere y'uko asubirira se wiwe  nk'umukuru wa Front National, vyaragaragara ko afise amakenga kuri bimwe mu vyiyumviro vyerekeye kahise k'abanazi. Igihe mu 2005, Jean-Marie Le Pen yabwira ikinyamakuru ca 'Extreme-droite' ko igihe abadagi bigarurira Ubufaransa "ata bikorwa bibi vyakorewe abantu n'aho habaye amakosa amwe amwe", yariyumviriye gutanga imihoho mu mabanga y'icegera ciwe. Umuhanuzi wiwe Bruno Bilde avuga ko mu mutima wiwe yaniyumviriye guheba politike. Kazoza ka se wiwe kagiye kwerekanwa n'igihe mu matora ya 2007 yaronka amajwi 10% hanyuma mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, Marine Le Pen ni we yahagarariye umugambwe. Igihe yariko ariyamamariza kurongora uwo mugambwe, isura ya kazoza ya Front National yarateje agashavu. Yabwiye abamushigikiye i Lyon ko kubona aba Islam bariko barasengera mu mabarabara vyasa n'igihe abanazi bigarurira Ubufaransa. Ubwa mbere haje "ukwongerekana kwo kwambara ibitambara" hanyuma "ukwiyongera kwa Burkha". Ubu nta bimodoka bitamenwa canke abasirikare bahari "ariko haracari ukwigarurirwa kandi biraremera abanyagihugu". "Extreme-droite ni isura y'ubuntu" ni ko umufaransa Bernard-Henri Lévy yagereranije Marine mu gihe kimwe. Yaranakuweko iceyi co guhembera urwanko. Yaciye kandi yihutira kwikurako bamwe mu batama bari bashigikiye Le Pen, benshi muri bo berekana ko bashima intwaro ya Vichy yakoranye n'aba Nazi mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Ariko guha amahera "Extreme-droite" mu Bufaransa biracaboneka nabi ku buryo yagiye gusaba ideni Uburusiya rya miliyoni 11 z'ama Euro mu mwaka Vladimir Putin yigarura ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Yaranashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya mu matora y'amayeri yo kwigarurira Crime. Le Pen yashize inguvu nyinshi k'uco abona kibangamiye ubuzima bw'abafaransa: "Ikwiragira rya Islam, gufatira mu kivunga, EU n'ifaranga rya Euro. Mu matora ya 2012 yabaye uwa gatatu. Mu 2017, Front National yari irongowe n'urwaruka rw'abahinga mu gukoresha YouTube aho baronse ababashigikira benshi hirya no hino mu Bufaransa. Uwo mugambwe wararonse intsinzi mu matora y'ibanze, aya Buraya hamwe n'ay'uturere, unavuga ko ufise aba Islam n'abayahudi bawushigikiye. N'aho yatsinzwe cane na Emmanuel Macron mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu, yararonse amajwi ashika ku miliyoni 7.7. Yoba yaramaze ubumara muri 'Extreme-droite'? Inyuma y'imyaka itanu, ashobora kwishimira kuba yaratumye uwo mugambwe ushobora gutorwa mbere cane, kubera izina ryoroheje rya Rassemblement National no kwemerera abantu kwicisha bugufi bitangukanye n'ivyo bagiriza prezida ko aterekwa abantu bato bato. Ariko aratembera mw'isoko yemereye abantu ko "Nzotwara igihugu nk'umuvyeyi - ata gusesagura kandi nkurikije uko bibereye". Mu gihe rero ingorane ya mbere y'amatora ari ingene ubuzima bugenda buzimba, yibanze cane ku kugira imyiyamamazo kuri ico kintu. Abantu ntibagishoboye gutunga imodoka: Yavuze vyo. Prof James Shields yagize ati: "Imigambi ya Rassemblement National  co kimwe n'iya Front National yayitanguriye, iracubakiye ku bafaransa ubwabo ubwa mbere, kubaronsa akazi imbere y'abandi, amazu, imfashanyo zo mu mibano hamwe n'amagara yabo. Yibaza ko Le Pen ashobora kutabandanya ashigikira kuva muri Eu, ariko imigambi yiwe ishobora gutuma haba ugukwaruzanya, bishobora gutuma impera n'imperuka Ubufaransa bukura meza muri iryo shirahamwe. Ku ba Islam b'abafaransa, ivyo asaba vyo kwirinda kwitwikira mu bibanza bigenewe abantu benshi birabateye amakenga cane. Igihe umupfasoni ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru yitwikiriye yamuhamagarira kubaha amahoro mu ndwi iheze, Le Pen yavuze ko mu bice bimwe bimwe biba ngombwa ko abapfasoni bitwikira kugira ntibahave babonwa nabi. Uwo mupfasoni yitwa Fatima, yasiguye ko yatanguye kwitwikira amaze gukura, ashaka kuvuga ko yari afise abuzukuru. Le Pen yagirizwa n'abo bahanganye ko yiyamamariza gusa aho afise abanywanyi. Ariko igihe abamwiyamiriza batangura gusemerera ngo "Fasciste" bakamusaba gukinjura, yaragerageje kubandanya amwenyura, avuga ko uko inyishu zikariha ari na ko aguma aronka amahirwe yo gutsinda amatora. Mu gihe yotahukana intsinzi, se wiwe Jean-Marie Le Pen ashobora kunezerwa cane. Ariko abandanya yemeza ko hari "ibihumbi" vy'ubudasa hagati yabo. Marine yasiguye ati: "Yari prezida w'umuhari mu ntango wo kwerekana akababaro hanyuma uhinduka uwutavuga rumwe na reta. Naratunganije akazi ku migwi yanje "ku buryo dushobora kuja ku butegetsi tukanashira mu bikorwa ivyiyumviro vyacu".

headline: Amwe mu mafoto yaranze Africa muri ino ndwi
text: Aya ni amwe mu mafoto meza ku mugabane wa Africa no hanze: Amasanamu yose yatangiwe uruhusha.

headline: Zinedine Zidane yavuye muri Real Madrid kubera uwo mugwi 'utari ukimufitiye icizere'
text: Zinedine Zidane yavuze ko yatanze imihoho muri Real Madrid kubera yabona ko uwo mugwi "utakimufitiye icizere'. Uwo mugabo w'umufaransa yasezeye muri uwo mugwi wo muri Espagne ubwa kabiri nk'umumenyereza itariki 27 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu inyuma yo kunanirwa gutwara igikombe c'umwaka wa 2020-21. Zidane yamenyereje Real hagati ya 2016 - 2018 imbere y'uko agaruka inyuma y'amezi cumi mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2019. Zidane w'imyaka 48 yavuze ati:"Ndagiye, ariko sindaheba umwuga, kandi sindaruha gukora akazi k'ubumenyereza." Mw'ikete rigenewe abafana, ryashizwe ahabanona n'ikinyamakuru co muri Espange ca AS, yongeyeko ati: "Ndagiye kubera ko mbona  umugwi utakimfitiye icizere nkeneye, kandi utakinshigikiye mu migambi yanje ya hafi canke ya kure." "Ndazi ivyo umupira w'amaguru kandi ndazi ico umugwi nka Real Madrid uba ukeneye. Ndazi ko iyo udatahukanye intsinzi utegerezwa gukura meza. "Mu buzima bwanje nkunda gutsinda kandi nari ngaha kugira ntsinde , ariko abantu bafise agaciro gusumba ivyo, uko biyumva, ubuzima ubwabwo, numva umenga ivyo bintu vyose ntivyahawe agaciro. "Ntitwashoboye kandi gutegera ko ivyo bintu arivyo bituma umugwi ukomeye nk'uyu ubandanya mu  nzira yo gutera imbere. Rimwe na rimwe mbere vyaratumye nebagurwa. " Uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'Umufaransa, yakiniye Real kuva 2001 gushika mu 2006, yatwaye igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya incuro zitatu yikurikiranya, igikombe c'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne mu kiringo ca mbere yamaze muri uwo mugwi. Yarasubiye aratwara igikombe c'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne agarutse hagati mu mwaka wa 2019-20, akaba yarasigaje umwaka umwe ku masezerano yari afitaniye n'uwo mugwi. Zidane yavuze ko imyaka 20 amaze muri Real cari " ikintu ca mbere ciza camushikiye' mu buzima bwiwe kandi ashobora "kubandanya ashimira" prezida w'uwo mugwi, Florentino Perez. Zidane yongeyeko ati: "Nshaka ko haba icubahiro ku vyo twashitseko twese. Nari gushima ko imigenderanire hagati yanje n'umugwi hamwe na prezida mu mezi make arangiye yari kuba itandukanye n'iyo abandi bamenyereza. "Nta karusho kadasanzwe nigeze nsaba kiretse kwibukwa neza gusa. Muri iyi myaka , akazi k'umumenyereza mu migwi ikomeye n'ibiringo bibiri canke birenga gato. "Kugira uhamare umwanya munini, imigenderanire myiza hagati y'abantu ni ngombwa, irakomeye cane gusumba n'amahera, gusumba ukumenyekana cane, gusumba ikintu cose. Birakenewe kubungabungwa. "

headline: Pablo Escobar: hatowe amafaranga menshi yanyegejwe mu nzu y'uyu yahoze acuruza ibiyayuramutwe
text: Umuhungwabo w'uwahoze ari rurangiranwa mu rucuruza rw'ibiyayuramutwe Pablo Escobar avuga ko yatoye isashe yuzuye amafaranga angana na miliyoni 18 z'amadolari yari anyegeje mu ruhome rw'imwe mu nzu za se wabo. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Colombia aho bashobora gusanga aya mafaranga mu nzu asanzwe abamwo mu gisagara ca Medellín. Avuga ko atari bwo bwa mbere atoye amafaranga mu bibanza se wabo atashaka kubonamwo umuntu, ni mu gihe uyu Escobar avugwa ko yasize anyegeje amamiliyoni menshi mu mazu yiwe. Yapfuye mu mwaka wa 1993 arashwe n'abapolisi. Igihe yagera kw'isonga ry'umwuga wiwe, Escobar yaramenyekanye ko yari umuntu agira indwi atunze kw'isi yose. Kuva apfuye, hagumye hari ibihuha i Medellín  ko Escobar yanyegeje amatungo yiwe, inyuma y'imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo arwana na leta ya Colombia yashaka kumurungika muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zariko ziramuhiga. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Colombia Red+ Noticias ko yatoye kandi n'imashini yo kwandika, amatelefone yakorana naza satellite, ikaramu y'inzahabu, kamera hamwe na firime y'amafoto atari bwogeshwe. Ati: "Igihe cose naricara mu cumba co gufungura, nkaraba muri parikingi y'imodoka, nama mbona umugabo yinjira muri ico kibanza agaca agenda". "Umunuko wari muri ico kibanza wari uteye ubwoba. Umunuko wasumvya incuro ijana uwuva mu kintu capfuye". Nicolás Escobar, yari asanzwe aba muri iyo nzu mu myaka itanu iheze, avuga ko amwe mu manoti amaze imyaka mirongo yari yaboze ku buryo atokoreshwa. Mu kiganiro, avuga ko kenshi yama aherekeza se wabo, kandi ko igihe kimwe yigeze kunyuruzwa n'abantu bariko barondera aho Escobar yari yinyegeje. Ati: " Naraborejwe igufa mu kiringo c'amasaha indwi yose. Bamwe mu bakozi banje bakubiswe umusumenu". Escobar yavukiye ahitwa Rionegro muri Colombia mu 1949, akaba yatanguje akarwi kacuruza ibiyayuramutwe mu gisagara ca Medellín mu myaka ya 1970. Mu myaka uru rudandazwa rwari rukomeye cane, aka karwi niko kinjije mu buryo bwa magendo hafi ibice 80% vy'urumogi rwinjijwe muri Amerika. Ubutunzi bwiwe bwamutumye ashirwa ku rutonde rwa Forbes (ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru y'ubutunzi) rw'abatunzi ba mbere w'isi mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi yose. Igihe Amerika isohoreye umutahe wo kumurondera, Escobar yararwanye intambara kugira ntashobore gufatwa, aho akarwi kiwe kakoze ibitero ku banyapolitike, abapolisi n'abamenyeshamakuru. Amaze gufatwa mu 1991, Escobar yapfungiwe mw'ibohero yubatswe ku ntumbero we nyene yatanze, yari yataziriwe Katederari (Cathedral), ayo yabandanije agenzura urudandaza rwiwe i Medellín. Muri rusangi, Escobar aharurwako abantu bagera ku 4000 bishwe. Ariko rero, amamuko yiwe y'umuntu yicisha bugufi yatumye amenyekana mu Banyakolombiya batari bake bari bamushigikiye kubera amafaranga menshi yabaha, mbere akaba yarafashije uturere dukenye mu gisagara ca Medellín.

headline: Africa mu mafoto: Aya ni amwe mu mafoto yaranze iyi ndwi 25/6- 01/7
text: Irabire amafoto meza yashoboye kuboneka ku mugabane muri ino ndwi n'ahandi: Amasanamu yose yaherewe uburenganzira.

headline: Aba-Maasai TikTok yazaniye aba-fana ba Bollywood
text: Mu mwambaro wabo uranga aba-Maasai kandi bakikijwe n'inka, abanya-Tanzania ba vuba mu kuba rurangiranwa kuri Tik Tok, abavukana Kili na Neema Paul, bariko bitegurira gufata video yabo ya vuba. Terefone ngendanwa igezweho yashinzwe ku nkingi imetero nkeya imbere y'inzu yabo muri Mindu Tulieni, ikigwati gito co mu ntara ya Pwani yo mu buseruko, Igisagara kiri hafi, Lugoba, kiri ku rugendo rw'isaha n'amaguru. Mu gihe ico kigwati ata muyagankuba gifise, Kili akigendera buri munsi kugira ashire umuriro muri terefone yiwe. Mu kwitegurira gufata iyo video , Kili, w'imyaka 26, ahagaze inyuma ya mushikiwe w'imyaka 23, Neema. Umuziki umaze gutangura kuvuga, Kili na mushikiwe baca bakurakuranwa mu kwigana  mu gi-Hindi bongera batamba  ku murindi w'izo ndirimbo zizwi cane muri  film/sinema za Bollywood [ingene bakubita iminwa bigahurirana neza neza n'amajambo y'iyo ndirimbo nk'uko womenga ijwi ni iryabo kandi humvikana iry'uwayiririmvye bwite; Lip sync). Mu mezi make aheze, izo video zabo zo gukubita iminwa zararabwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro mu Buhindi. Video yabo yamenyekanye cane, bigana  Raataan Lambiyan yo muri Shershaah , film y'uyu mwaka ya Bollywood, yarabwe incuro zirenga miriyoni imwe mu minsi mike gusa. Yakwiragijwe n'abakinyi bakuru muri iyo film Kiara Advani na Sidharth  Malhotra. Nyene kuririmba ubwa mbere iyo ndirimbo,  Jubin Nautiyal, yaratunguye abo bavukanyi igihe bagira ikiganiro c'ikibiriraho kuri imwe mu maradiyo yo mu Buhindi. Nautiyal yababwiye ati : "Bose barabazi  mu Buhindi. Muri rurangiranwa". Video bakoreye muri Mindu Tulieni, aho benshi badatunze terefone zigezweho, Kili na Neema ntibigeze bibaza ko zoshikiriye abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni mu Buhindi no kw'isi nzima. Kili ati: "Tugitangura, vyari ibintu vyo kwiryohera gusa, ntitwigeze twibaza ko tuzomenyekana isi yose. "Maze gutangura kubona abantu bariko barayiraba n'ico bavuga mu Buhindi, naratangaye. Nararengewe." Icabatumye gukora izo video n'ugukunda film za Bollywood Kili yatanguye kuraba igihe yagenda mu mashure ku murwa mukuru , Dodoma. N'ubwo batari bazi urwo rurimi, we na mushikiwe bariyigishije kuririmba mu gi-Hindi. Kili avuga ati: "Kuva nkiri muto, nararaba ama film ya Bollywood mu ma cinema yo muri Tanzania nca ndakunda cane izo film n'indirimbo zirimwo. Iyo ukunda ikintu, biroroshe kuciga". "Binsaba iminsi mike yo kwiga amajambo y'indirimbo no kwimenyereza kuyisubiramwo. Ndarondera ico ayo majambo asigura mu congereza kugira menye uko ndayitamba neza." "N'imbere y'uko numva ico indirimbo ivuga, mba namaze kujana n'umuziki wayo." Kili yatanguye asubiramwo izo ndirimbo wenyene, mu nyuma azana mushikiwe nawe nyene asanzwe akunda film za  Bollywood. Neema avuga ati: "Igihe musazanje yansaba kugira video hamwe nawe, nabanje kwanka kuko nari mfise isoni zo kuja imbere ya camera." "Ariko mu nyuma ntangura kubimenyera. Ivy'abaye ni amayobera - ntitwigeze twibaza ko umunsi nk'uwo woshitse." Abo bavukana babiri, ubwa mbere bakuze baragira inka bakora no mu mirima, ubu umwanya bawumara batanga ibiganiro kuri television na radiyo zikomakomeye zo mu Buhindi. Ariko no mu gihugu cabo ca Tanzania, ubu baratanguye kumenyekana nka bamwe mu bazwi cane kuri Tik Tok. Konte izwi ya Kili kuri Tik Tok  ubu ifise miriyoni 1,8 y'abantu bamukurikira . Nta mwaka urakwira kuva atanguje iyo konte yiwe - amaze kumenya ivyerekeye Tik Tok abibwiwe n'abagenzi. Neema nawe aramaze kwuguruza konte yiwe kuri Instagram, ubu ikaba ifise abayikurikira bashika hafi 65.000. Ariko  mu gihe inkuru y'abo bavukana iriko irabica bigacika ku mbuga hwaniro hirya no hino kw'isi, mu muryango no mu babanyi ho basa n'uko ataco bazi kuba abana babo bariko baraba ba rurangiranwa. Kili avuga ati: "Abantu benshi ngaha ntibatunze terefone zigezweho kandi ntibazi ivyerekeye imbuga hwaniro. Na Neema nta vyinshi atahura. Biramuryohera gusa ariko ntazi ingaruka biriko biragira". "Nta muntu n'umwe yumva ivyari vyo igihe abanyamakuru batangura kuza mu kigwati iwacu bazanye n'ama-camera ya television. "Ubwa mbere umuryango wanje waguma wibaza igituma ndirimba  kandi ngatamba aho kuragira inka. "Ubu baratanguye gutahura ko ndiko ndakora ikintu ciza." Nta mafaranga barakura muri ivyo biyumviriye gukora, ariko vuba barashobora kuva mu buzima bwo mu kigwati bakaja gukina film/sinema. Ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buhindi bivuga ko baja bamaze gutangura kuronderwa cane  na Bollywood. Ni indoto zabaye ukuri kuri Kili  na Neema, bavuga ko kuva kera bamye bashaka gukora ivyo guteramisha abantu, ariko batigeze bibaza ko vyoshobotse. "Tuva mu kigwati gito hanze y'igisagara, nico gituma ntigeze nibaza ko indoto zanje zo kuba umukinyi w'ama-film no guhagarara imbere ya camera zobaye ukuri. Ivyo nabigumanye mu mutima wanje", ivyo bivugwa na Neema, we bitandukanye na musazawe,  atigeze ava muri Mundu Tulieni. "Amahirwe yo kuja mu Buhindi yoba ari igitangaza." Amakungu arorera, abo bavukana bavuga ko bafise ishaka ryo gutangura gukora izindi video zo guha ababakurikira. "Dushaka ko abantu baraba izi video bakaryoherwa, nico gituma twatanguye kuzikora." "Vyinshi biri mu nzira, abafana bacu rero ni bagume hafi." Priya Sippy n'umunyamakuru akorera uwubimusavye aba  London.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19: Umuntu yayirwaye akingirwa ryari?
text: Muganga abandanya kwishura ku bibazo mufise ku kiza ca Coronavirus, muturungikira biciye kuri facebook. Muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa, yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura yishura ikibazo ca Nicole Iranzi, yabajije ati "mbega iyo umuntu yarwaye Covid-19, arindira igihe kingana gute kugira bashobore kumukingira?"

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Bellingham, Ronaldo, Gabriel, Spence, Zinchenko
text: Real Madrid yahindukiriye umwongereza Jude Bellingham w’imyaka 19 akina hagati  muri Borussia Dortmund, avugwa kandi ko aronderwa na Liverpool. (Marca) Umuserukizi wa Frenkie de Jong yabwiye Manchester United ko uyu mukinyi wo hagati wa Hollande w’imyaka 25 yemera kuva muri Barcelona ariko akaba adashaka kwimukira muri Old Trafford. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Barca iriko iraraba nimba ikwiye kutajana De Jong mu bakinyi bazofata urugendo ruzobashikana muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kugira ngo yemere kwimukira muri uyo murwi w’Amashetani atukura (Red Devils). (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Cristiano Ronaldo ariteguye kwanka umushahara yemerewe n’umurwi wo muri Arabie Saoudite mu gihe, Bayern Munich na Atletico Madrid irondera uyu munya Portugal w’imyaka 37. (ESPN) Juventus yegereye Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Brezili Gabriel Magalhaes w’imyaka 24 kugira irabe ko yosubiriza umunya Hollande akina inyuma Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22 yiteze kwimukira muri Bayern Munich. (Independent) Barcelona irarondera umwongereza akina hagati Carney Chukwuemeka w’imyaka 18 asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye na Aston Villa . (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki Espagnol) Arsenal iriko irarondera ingene yoronka umukinyi w’inyuma wa Ukraine  ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Oleksandr Zinchenko w’imyaka 25 asanzwe akina muri Manchester City. (The Athletic) Arsenal kandi iriko iraraba ko yogura umunya-Espagne akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Sergio Gomez w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akina muri Anderlecht. Mu gihe boronka Zinchenko canke Gomez, Nuno Tavares ashobora guca agenda, mu gihe Marseille isanzwe irondera uyu munya-Portugal w’imyaka 22 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) Leeds United iri hafi yo kwemera amasezerano y’imiriyoni 25 z’ama euros na Paris St-Germain kugira ishobore kugura umusatirizi w’umufaransa Arnaud Kalimuendo w’imyaka 20. (90min) Newcastle United iriko irategura imiriyoni 20 z’amapawundi kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Leeds United umwongereza Jack Harrison w’imyaka 25, ariko uyu murwi rwa Elland Road ushobora kuba umushakako amafaranga menshi. (Mail) Ibiganiro birabandanya hagati ya Arsenal n’abaserukizi b’umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester umubirigi Youri Tielemans w’imyaka 25. (Football London) Arsenal kandi iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Lyon Lucas Paqueta w’imyaka 24 ariko ntiramenyesha amafaranga ishaka gutanga kuri uno munya-Brezili. (Media Foot – mu gifaransa) Everton iracari mu biganiro na Wolves kugira irabe ko yoronka umwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka  22, inyuma y’aho igiciro c’imiriyoni 22 z’amapawundi cankiwe mu ndwi iheze. (Sky Sports) Newcastle United iriko iraronderera ahandi inyuma y’aho ikuriye meza mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Real Sociedad umunya Suède Alexander Isak w’imyaka 22, be n’umufaransa akina ku ruhande Moussa Diaby w’imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Bayer Leverkusen, kubera amafaranga asabwa mu kubagura be n’imishahara. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Bayern Munich umudagi Leroy Sane w’imyaka 26 yemerewe kwinjira muri Real Madrid. (Marca) Paris St-Germain iripfuza umusatirizi wa Benfica umunya Portugal Goncalo Ramos w’imyaka  21, be n’umusatirizi wa Reims umufaransa Hugo Ekitike w’imyaka  20. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) PSG kandi irarondera umufaransa akina hagati Khephren Thuram w’imyaka 21, umuhungu w’uwahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubufaransa Lilian Thuram, asanzwe akina muri Nice. (L'Equipe - in French) West Ham yemeye guha Sassuolo imiriyoni 40 z’ama-euros ku musatirizi w’umutaliyano Gianluca Scamacca w’imyaka23, mu gihe PSG yoyo yemeye ko yotanga imiriyoni 35 z’ama euros. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) AC Milan iriteguye guha ayandi masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire umunya-Portugal akina ku ruhande Rafael Leao mu gihe idashaka kugurisha uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 23 muri Chelsea ku giciro ico ari co cose kiri musi y’imiriyoni 127 z’amapawundi. (Mail) Cesc Fabregas w’imyaka 35 ariteguye kuja gukinira umurwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri (Serie B) mu Butaliyano, Como, inyuma yo kuva muri Monaco. (Gianluca di Marzio) Southampton na Leicester irarondera umwongereza akina inyuma Levi Colwill, yamaze umwaka w’inkino uheze akina muri Huddersfield yari yatijijwemwo. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 19 ntarasaba ko yova burundu muri Chelsea ariko aripfuza ko kazoza kiwe gatomoreka. (CBS Sports, Twitter) Crystal Palace ishobora kwinjira mu rugamba rwo kurondera Colwill, mu gihe Arsenal, Brighton na Everton nayo nyene imurondera. (Mail)

headline: US - WHO: Nancy Pelosi abwira Trump ati ‘dutegerezwa kubwirwa ukuri’
text: Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Amerika , Nancy Pelosi, yatanguye kwifatira mu gahanga Perezida Donald Trump, inyuma y'aho atangarije ko agiye guhagarika intererano ico gihugu gitanga mu muryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, Pelosi avuga ati: "Abanyamerika bategerezwa kwima amatwi ibinyoma bakumviriza abahinga babifitiye ubumenyi kugira ngo twikingire dukingire n'abacu". Bwana Trump yategetse ubutegetsi bwiwe guhagarika intererano Amerika itanga muri OMS/WHO, ayagiriza ko yatumye coronavirus ikwirakwira kw'isi, kandi ko wegamiye ku ruhande rw'u Bushinwa. Umupfasoni Pelosi yagiriza umukuru w'igihugu cabo ko "yafashe minenerwe amakuru yo kugabisha, kandi ko yagumye areze amaboko bigatuma ibara rigwa none abantu bariko baratikira". Ati: "Hari ingingo nyinshi zimirije gufatwa. Ariko mu gihe tutokorera ku kuri, abapfa bazobandanya bapfa, ubutunzi buzobandanya buyonga". "Ubu dukeneye ukuri gusumba ibindi bihe vyose. Ukuri ni uko Donald Trump yasambuye uburyo yari yahawe bwo kwitegurira ikiza, ivyatumye abantu bapfa maze ubutunzi nabwo buja mu kaga". Gushika ubu, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nico gihugu gifise abanduye n'abamaze guhitanwa na coronavirus benshi kw'isi. Mu bantu barenga imiliyoni zibiri bamaze kwandura uwo mugera kw'isi yose, abashika 608,300 babarizwa muri  Amerika, nayo abarenga ibihumbi 26 baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima.

headline: Ginette Karirekinyana yiyemeje kurwanya malaria akoresheje uburyo kama
text: Malaria ni indwara ibangamiye ibihugu bikenye, ikaba iharurwa mu ntambanyi zibangamira iterambere rirama. Ginette Karirekinyana yemeza y'uko ishoboka gutuzwa burundu hakoreshejwe uburyo kama. Icegeranyo c'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS mu kwezi kw'icumi uno mwaka, kivuga ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kw'icumi 2019, abantu barenga imiliyoni indwi baranduye malaria, abashika 2691 nabo irabahitana. Umupfasoni Karirekinyana yabwiye BBC ko yatanguje umugambi wo gukinga iyo ndwara akoresheje ivyo yita ivyatsi, ahinguramwo ibintu bitandukanye bikoreshwa mu kwirinda kuribwa n'imibu. Hagati aho, abona ko hakiri intambwe kugira Abarundi bose bawumve. Arongoye ishirahamwe ACECI (Agence Consultative en Ethique de la Coopération Internationale) rihingura ivyo vyatsi, akaba yanashinze ishirahamwe yise Karire Products mu 2016 ryo gukwiragiza ivyo ahingura. Umupfasoni Karirekinyana avuga ko yatanguje umugambi wiwe kubera yababajwe n'ukubona malaria yama ibica bigacika muri Afrika, mbere mu Burundi hoho ikaboneka nk'akaranda. Kubw'iwe , "nimba malaria ari ingorane ya Afrika, ibihugu vya Afrika vyo nyene ubwavyo bitegerezwa kuyironderera umuti". Ati: "Nico catumye kuva mu myaka ya 2007 gushika 2010 nguma niyumvira icokorwa kugira ngo twirinde malaria, atari ugukiza gusa, ahubwo kuyirinda", ico gihe akaba yari muri Canada. Avuga y'uko ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko hariho ibiti vyinshi bishobora kuvamwo imiti ya malaria, canke bigahingurwa kugira ngo havemwo ibintu bitari bike bishobora gukoreshwa mu kwikingira kuribwa n'imibu, iyo nayo ikaba ariyo itera iyo ndwara. Mu mwaka wa 2010, niho yafata ingingo yo gutanguza mu Burundi umugambi yise "Bayi bayi malaria" umugambi w'ukurima ivyatsi, cataria na Artemisia, yazanye mu gihugu abikuye muri Canada,  mu ntumbero yo kurwanya malaria. Umugambi wiwe wagiye kwemererwa mu Burundi mu 2011, aho umukuru w'igihugu ubwiwe ari we yawuguruye, hari ku wa 25 z'ukwa kane, umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kurwanya malaria. Avuga ko intumbero yiwe ari ugufasha kurwanya iyo ndwara burundu kuko yasanze  abadandaza imiti ya malaria bobo badashira imbere ineza y'umuntu, ahubwo bishakira inyungu mu rudandaza rwabo. Ati : "Turavye abaza kugurisha imiti ya malaria mu Burundi, abenshi ntibaza bashaka gukiza canke gutuza iyo ndwara, ahubwo baza bashaka kugurisha imiti yabo n'ukwironderera ubutunzi". Mu mugambi wiwe, Karirekinyana avuga ko ashira imbere gukinga malaria akongera akanaha ubumenyi umunyagihugu buzomufasha kwikingira, ari naco gituma akwiragiza ivyo vyatsi mu gihugu cose. Muri ivyo vyatsi cataria na Artemisia, nk'uko we nyene avyita, arahinguramwo amasabuni be n'ubwoko bwinshi bw'amavuta yo kwisiga kugira ntibaribwe n'imibu. Arahinguramwo kandi n' ingaburo be n'inyobwa 'tisane'inyobwa nk'icayi, vyose bikoreshwa mu kurwanya malaria. Karirekinyana avuga ko amaze imyaka itari mike yigisha abanyagihugu uyo mugambi, akemeza ko abatari bake bamaze gusezera iyo ndwara. "Iyo nyigisho barayakiriye kandi abantu badukurikiye bagakurikirana inyigisho zacu kuva mu 2011, baza barategereye y'uko malaria itari ikwiye kwitwa ikiza, ahubwo ko bashobora kuyirinda". N'ubwo biri uko, malaria iguma ari ikiza Karirekinyana avuga ko mu Burundi hakiri ibintu vyinshi vy'ugukora kugira ngo abanyagihugu banyurwe n'uko malaria idategerezwa kuba ikiza. Avuga ko malaria ibandanya iba ikiza kubera y'uko leta itarashiramwo inguvu zayo, n'aho ishigikiye uwo mugambi n'ivyo ukora. Ati: "Gushika ubu irashigikiye uwo mugambi, mugabo ntirashobora kuza ngo dushire inguvu hamwe. Muri ico gihe rero, biragora y'uko twebwe nk'ishirahamwe rikiri ritoya n'uburyo butoya dushikira abanyagihugu bose". "Iyaba leta yari imaze kugira rwayo uwo mugambi, jewe novuga y'uko mu myaka itanu twoba tumaze gusezera malaria mu Burundi". Avuga ko uwo mugambi udashobora kubonwa neza n'amashirahamwe makuru makuru asanzwe akorana n'amahinguriro makuru makuru nyene kw'isi ahingura imiti. Karirekinyana avuga ati: "Abo ni abantu batarabona y'uko umuntu ariwe ashirwa imbere canke kurwanira, ni amashirahamwe ashira imbere inyungu". "Muca mwumva ko umugambi wo gutuza malaria  udashobora kwakirwa kubera woba uje kubakura amata mu kanwa". "Abo rero nibo ntambamyi ku Burundi no kuri Afrika mu mugambi wo kurwanya indwara nka malaria".
