Avuga ko muri ayo mashirahamwe hari ayamaze kwumva umugambi wiwe kandi ko yagerageje kumurwanya ariko ko yashoboye kurinda akibandaniriza intumbero yiwe. "Hagira hahere imyaka cumi dutanguye uwo mugambi, twarahanganye n'ibitari bike". Kubwiwe "malaria turashobora kuyisezera dukoresheje ivyo biti n'ivyo vyatsi. Ikiriho ni uko abantu batotinya ayo mahinguriro canke amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu usanga kenshi afise inguvu zirengeye iz'ibihugu". Gushika ubu Ginette Karirekinyana akorera mu ntara za Bujumbura na Gitega,ariko intego yiwe ikaba ari uko igihugu cose kimenya uwo mugambi.

headline: Eto'o ashaka 'gusubiriza Afrika mu ndumane' yifashishije amashure
text: Icamamare c'umunyafrika mu mupira w'amaguru Samuel Eto'o avuga ko ashaka gukoresha ubumenyi azokura mu cigwa c'ubutunzi muri  Kaminuza ya Havard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu gusubiriza mu ndumane umugabane wa Afrika. Uyo yatsindiye incuro 4 agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza wo ku mugabane wa Afrika gatangwa buri mwaka  yamenyesheje ko agiye mu zabukuru mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 38 mu kwezi kwa 9. Eto'o yizera ko kujabuka ibahari Atlantique aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kwiga ibijanye n'ubutunzi bizofasha intumbero yiwe yo gufasha umugabane wa Afrika. Eto yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa, Jeune Afrique, candikirwa kuri Internet ati: "Ngomba gufasha no gutanga intererano nziza mu guhindura umugabane wacu". ''Iyo uri umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru urariha amafranga abantu kugira bagufashe mu kazi kawe n'ibindi vya nkenerwa muri rusange." ''Ariko iyo ari wewe utegerezwa gutunganya akazi abantu bakora, kandi ukaba ushaka kubateza imbere, utegerezwa kwiga ubundi ubumenyi bushasha." Uyo yahoze ari umukinyi w'imbere w'igihugu ca Cameroun n'ikipe ya Barcelona, akaba kandi ari we yinjirije igihugu ciwe ibitsindo vyinshi, bishika 56 mu nkino 118, yaremanze ingingo yiwe yo kwiga ubuzima bwiwe bwose niyahagarika gukina umupira w'amaguru. Yasiguye ati: ''Mu kwezi kwa mbere nzotangura ivyigwa vyo gutunganya ibijanye n'ubutunzi muri Kaminuza ya Havard inyuma y'aho iyo Kaminuza ingiriye neza ikanyemerera  inyigisho z'umwihariko''. "Nzoba mba mu gisagara ca Boston mu kiringo kingana hafi umwaka. Ntibizoba vyoroshe, ariko ni ibitoroshe binezereye, mukaba musanzwe muzi ko jewe nkunda cane ibimbiza akuya". Eto'o yatsindiye ibikombe vyinshi mu gukina kwiwe muri Espagne no mu Butaliyano, ariko aho yabiciye bigacika ku rwego rw'amakipe ni muri Barcelona aho yakinye kuva mu 2004 gushika mu 2009. Mu bikombe yaronse muri iyo kipe harimwo 3 vyo mw'ihiganwa La Liga na bibiri vya Champions League. Yaratsindiye kandi Champions League amenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho muri Inter Milan mu 2010, akaba kandi afise umudari w'inzahabu mw'ihiganwa Olempike ku rwego rw'ikipe y'igihugu ca Cameroun mu 2000. Eto'o mu mwuga wiwe yakinye kandi mu bihugu nka Turkiya, Uburusiya hamwe na Qatar, akaba kandi ari nawe amaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo vyinshi mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika, akaba afise ibitsindo 18. Yakinye mu mahiganwa ane y'igikombe c'isi aserukiye ikipe ya Cameroun izwi nka "Les Lions Indomptables" mu 1998, 2002, 2010 no mu  2014 aho yakinye incuro 8 akinjiza ibitsindo 3. Uyo musatirizi kandi yanatsindiye ibikombe vya Afrika bibiri yikurikiranya akinira igihugu ciwe, mu 2000 n'i 2002.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: De Jong, Werner, Fofana, Barnes, Firmino, Gueye
text: Chelsea igiye kurondera umukinyi akina hagati wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25, kandi mu gihe yoramuka avuye Nou Camp, uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ushobora guca urondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City, umunya-Portugal Bernardo Silva w’imyaka 27. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Umumenyereza wa Barcelona  Xavi avuga ko atazi nimba De Jong, asanzwe aronderwa cane na Manchester United, azoguma muri uyo murwi w’ihiganwa ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Espagne, La Liga, muri rino ci. (Metro) Chelsea iriko iragerageza kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Leicester City umufaransa Wesley Fofana w’imyaka 21,hamwe n’umunya-Hollande akina inyuma na we nyene Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira  Inter Milan. (Athletic). Chelsea yemeye guha Real Madrid yo muri Espagne umusatirizi w’umudagi Timo Werner  w’imyaka 26. (Marca) Newcastle United iriko irakurikirana umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leicester City umwongereza Harvey Barnes w’imyaka 24, inyuma y’aho uyu murwi uzwi nka Foxes wankiye igiciro yari yemeye gutanga kuri mugenziwe James Maddison w’imyaka 25 akina hagati. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Liverpool Roberto Firmino araronderwa na Juventus ariko uyu munya-Brezili w’imyaka 30 avuga ko yipfuza kwigumira i Anfield. (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w’inyuma, umunya-Hollande Virgil van Dijk w’imyaka 31 avuga ko mugenziwe bakinana muri Liverpool, Mohamed Salah w’imyaka 30 ashobora kuba yaragizweko ingaruka n’ibiganiro ku vyerekeye amasezerano yiwe mu mwaka w’inkino uheze, ariko ko ubu “akina ata bibazo biri mu mutwe” inyuma yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. (Liverpool Echo) Everton irabandanya ibiganiro na Paris St-Germain mu ntumbero yo guheraheza amasezerano azotuma umunya-Senegal akina hagati Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 32, asubira muri Goodison Park. (Times) Manchester United iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umusatirizi wa Stuttgart umunya-Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w’imyaka 25, be n’umunya Slovenia Benjamin Sesko w’imyaka 19 akina imbere muri Red Bull Salzburg, mu gihe kazoza ka Cristiano Ronaldo i Old Trafford kadatomoye. (Mail) Umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri RB Leipzig Angelino w’imyaka 25, ni we ashobora kuvuvudukirwa na Barcelona mu gihe yonanirwa no kugura mugenziwe wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w’imyaka 31 asanzwe akinira Chelsea. (Sport – muki Espagnol) Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Bayern Munich Oliver Kahn yari aherutse kuvuga ko umusatirizi wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Kane yari "indoto ya kazoza ", avuga ko uyu murwi wo mu Budagi ata mugambi ufise wo kugura uyu musatirizi. (90 Min) Roma yarondeye umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Andrea Belotti w’imyaka 28, asanzwe yirebanga inyuma yo kuva muri Turin/Torino muri rino ci. (Football Italia)

headline: CECAFA U 23: Umumenyereza w'ikipe y'u Burundi avuga ko gushika muri 1/2 bitari vyoroshe
text: Umumenyereza w'ikipe y'u Burundi y'abari munsi y'imyaka 23 avuga yuko umukino wabahaye itike yo kuja mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa rya CECAFA bayikuye kure. Jimmy Ndayizeye yavuze yuko abakinyi biwe bategerejwe gukora iyo bwabaga kugira bikure imbere ya Ethiopia bakanganya 1-1. U Burundi bwari bukeneye inota rimwe gusa kugira burengane nyuma yo gutsinda Eritrea mu rukino rwa mbere ibitsindo 3-0. Umumenyereza Jimmy Ndayizeye yagize ati: "Novuga yuko rutari urukino rwari rworoshe kuri twebwe [...] Ethiopie kuva match itangura gushika ihere baturushije bakinira muri 'camp' yacu, hanyuma badutangura igitsindo ariko ntitwigeze ducika intege." Ikipe Intamba mu Rugamba yari ikeneye kunganya muri uru rukino kugira ibandanye mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa, umumenyereza Ndayizeye akavuga ko ashimiria cane abakinyi biwe. Yagize ati: "Ndashimiye cane abakinyi banje ingene bashoboye gukina. Ni match twari dukeneyemwo inota rimwe kugira dushobore kurengana. Ni urukino rutari rworoshe." Mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa u Burundi buzohura n'igihugu ca Kenya kandi umumenyereza Jimmy Ndayizeye aremera ko naho nyene bitazokworoha kuko ikipe ya Kenya ifise inguvu hamwe n'ubuhinga. Yagize ati: "Naragerageje kuraba uko bakina, tugiye kubikorerako muri entraînements nka zibiri tugiye gukora turabe yuko dushobora kubatsinda." Izi nkino za CECAFA z'abatarenza imyaka 23 zibera mu muji wa Bahir Dar mu gihugu ca Ethiopia.

headline: Zelensky arishimira ‘inkuru nziza’ inyuma yo kwisubiza uturere twari twigaruriwe n’Uburusiya
text: Perezida Volodymyr Ukraine wa Ukraine avuga ko afise “agakuru keza” ko bigaruriye uturere tutari duke twari mu minwe y’ingabo z‘Uburusiya. Hari ibihuha vyari bimaze imisi bivuga ko bishoboka ko hari intambwe yatewe mu buseruko bwa Kharkiv, ariko abategetsi ba Ukraine bakaba ataco bari bwashikirize. Perezida Zelensky ntiyashatse kudoma urutoke ku turere twigaruriwe, akavuga ati “ubu si igihe co kuvuga amazina” yatwo. Abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko Ukraine iriko iratera intambwe bukebuke ariko ikomeye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ingabo z’Uburusiya. Mw’ijambo ryiwe yashikirije abanya-Ukraine abicishije kuri videwo nijoro,  Zelensky yavuze ko hari “amakuru meza” ku vyerekeye ibihuha bivuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zateye intambwe. Ashimagiza ingabo n’ubutwari bwazo ku rugamba, avuga ati: "Ndibaza ko buri munyagihugu yishimira ingabo zacu”. Ariko, yongerako ati: "Ubu si igihe co kuvuga amazina y’utu turere twasubiye kuduza ibendera rya Ukraine”. Ukraine yarakomeje ibikorwa vyayo vy’umutekano mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, ariko igatanga amakuru make ku vyerekeye ibikorwa vyo kwivuna vyari birindiriwe mu buseruko no mu bumanuko. Ingabo za Ukraine zaratanguje urugamba mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Kharkiv, amaja mu ntara ya Donetsk iri mu buseruko, igenzurwa bikomeye n’igisirikare c’Uburusiya kuva intambara itanguye, haraciye amezi atandatu. Hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zoba ziri hafi y’igisagara ca Izyum, igisagara ngirakamaro mu gushikana ibikoresho ku ngabo z’Uburusiya. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu birori muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Colin Kahl – icegera c’umunyamabanga ajejwe imigambi yo kwivuna abansi – yavuze ko ingabo za Ukraine ziriko ziravyitwaramwo neza gusumba iz’Uburusiya mu turere tumwe tumwe. Yasubiwemwo n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters  avuga ati: "Haracari kare. Nibaza ko abanya-Ukraine bariko batera intambwe bukebuke ariko ikomeye. Tuzoraba ingene bizogenda. "Ariko ndibaza neza ko ibintu biriko bigenda neza ku ruhande rwa Ukraine muri kino gihe mu bumanuko gusumba uko bimeze ku ruhande rw’Uburusiya”. Hagati aho, ibintu biracameze nabi. Igihe vyariko bitanga amakuru y’ingene ibintu vyifashe mw’ijoro ry’ejo ku wa gatatu, ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare vya Ukraine vyavuze ko igisirikare cabo; “Casubije inyuma ibitero vyose vy’Uburusiya” mu ntara za Kharkiv na Donetsk – ariko ko impande zompi zibandanya ziterana vya muzinga n’ibitero vy’indege, ibibanza bitari bike bikaba bihononekarira. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Perezida Zelensky yavuze kandi ko amafaranga reta ya Ukraine izokoresha mu mwaka uza azoba ari ay’igihugu kiri mu ntambara – aho imiriyaridi 27 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika azoshirwa mu gisata co kwivuna abansi. Ariko yemeye ko ivya nkenerwa mu mibereho y’abanyagihugu, nk’agafashanyo ko mu za bukuru bizobandanya bitangwa. Hagati aho, agabisha ati: "Ni nkenerwa kugabanya mu buryo bwose bushoboka ibintu bidakenewe cane, ibintu vyose bidafasha mu kwivuna umwansi, bidafasha mw’iterambere ry’ubutunzi bw’igihugu cacu, mu mubereho n’akaranga vy’abanyagihugu bacu." Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi muri Amerika no mw’ishirahamwe ONU berekanye amakenga yabo kuri kazoza k’abasivire muri Ukraine mu gihe intambara ibandanya. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu gisata kijejwe agateka ka muntu mw’ishirahamwe ONU avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifise impungenge ku bantu bata izabo muri Ukraine – cane cane kazoza k’abana. Ilze Brands Kehris, icegera c’umunyamabanga mukuru w’ishami rijejwe agateka ka muntu, avuga ati: "Hari amakuru yo kwizera avuga abana batwarwa ku nguvu batari kumwe n’abavyeyi babo mu karere kigaruriwe n’Abarusiya, canke mu Burusiya bwo nyene”. Ishirahamwe ryiwe rifise amakenga ko Uburusiya bwashinze “uburyo bworoshe” bwo guha abo bana ubwenegihugu bw’Uburusiya, mbere bukabashira mu minwe y’imiryango y’Abarusiya kugira babe ari bo babarera, nk’uko abivuga. Abona ko iyi ngendo ishobora guhonyanga amasezerano ya Geneva. Eka na Amerika ifise amakenga nk’aya nyene, aho ejo ku wa gatatu yavuze ko hari abanya-Ukraine, ariko bakuze, batwarwa ku nguvu. Ibiro vy’ubunyamabanga bujejwe imigenderanire bwagiriza Kremlin ko ifise urutonde rw’abanya-Ukraine bategerezwa gutwarwa ku nguvu mu turere tw’igihugu turi mu minwe y’Uburusiya.

headline: Ethiopia – Tigray: Ingene isasika ry'abantu ryagenze mu gisagara ntakorwako ca Aksum muri Ethiopia
text: Ingabo za Eritrea zagwanye mu ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia zarishe abantu amajana muri Aksum cane cane mu minsi ibiri yo mu kwezi kwa 11, nk'uko ababibonye babivuga. Ubwicanyi bw'ikivunga bwo kw'itariki 28 na 29 z'ukwa 11 bushobora kuba ari icaha  gikorewe zina muntu, nk'uko Amnesty International ibivuga mu cegeranyo cayo. Uwabibonye yabwiye BBC ingene imivyimba y'abantu yamaze iminsi  mu mabarabara itarahambwa, myinshi iribwa n'imfyisi. Ministre wa Eritrea wo kumenyesha amakuru Yemane G. Meskel yiyamirije ico cegeranyo avuga ko "kidashoboka" kandi ari "irementanya". Yanditse kuri Twitter ngo abo Amnesty yita ababibonye ni abagwanyi bashigikiye TPLF, umugambwe wahora urongoye Tigray,  ari nawo ukutumvikana kwawo na reta ya Ethiopia kwakweze iyo ntambara muri iyo ntara. Ubu reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gufatanya n'amakungu mu gukora amatohoza. N'ubwo ifise amakenga ku buryo Amnesty yakoresheje mu gukora ico cegeranyo, reta yemeye ko hari ibibazo bikwiye gutera impungenge cane biri muri co. Ethiopia na Eritrea vyompi birahakana ko ingabo za Eritrea zagize uruhara mu ntambara ya Tigray. Iyo ntambara yadutse itariki 4 z'ukwa 11 mu 2020 igihe reta ya Ethiopia yagaba igitero kugira ituze TPLF inyuma y'aho abagwanyi b'uwo mugambwe bafatiye amakambi y'ingabo za reta muri Tigray. Ministre wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed, yaronse agashimwe k'amahoro kitirirwe Nobel, yabwiye inama nshingamateka ku wa 30 ukwa 11 ko ata ''munyagihugu asanzwe (civil) n'umwe yishwe muri ico gitero". Ariko ababibonye baravuze ingene uwo munsi batanguye guhamba bamwe mu banyagihugu ata birwanisho bafise bari bishwe n'ingabo za Eritrea - benshi muri abo bakaba bari abahungu n'abagabo barasiwe mu mabarabara mw'isakwa ry'inzu ku nzu. Amnesty  International ifise amasanamu  ya satellite y'urugero runini mu kubona neza yo ku  wa 13 ukwezi kwa 12 yerekana ubutaka bw'amasinde bihuye n'imva za vuba ku masengero abiri muri Aksum, igisagara ca kera c'intakorwako ku ba Kristu b'aba Orthodoxe bo muri Ethiopia. Uguca uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no kubuza gushika muri Tigray vyatumye amakuru y'ivyabereye muri iyo ntara ateba kumenyekana. Muri Aksum, amatara m'amaterefone bivugwa ko vyahagaze gukora ku munsi wa mbere w'intambara. Ingabo za Ethiopia na Eritrea zatanguye gusukira ibisasu ku buseruko bwa Aksum ku wa kane itariki 19 ukwezi kwa 11 , nk'uko bivugwa n'abantu bo muri ico gisagara. Umukozi umwe wa reta yabwiye BBC ati: "Ico gitero carakomeje amasaha atanu kandi kidahagarara. Abantu bari mu masengero, mu buriro, mu mahoteri no mu ngo zabo barapfuye. Mu ngabo zifise ibigwanisho  muri ico gisagara nta wigeze asubiza -ubiravye cari kigambiriye abanyagihugu basanzwe [aba civil]". Amnesty yatororokanije ubuhamya bwinshi busa n'ubwo buvuga ingene gusukira ibisasu vyakomeje ku banyagihugu basanzwe kuri uwo mugoroba. Bamaze kugenzura ico gisagara, abasirikare, akenshi  baboneka ko ari abanyaEritrea, bakoze  isakwa ryo kurondera abasirikare ba TPLF canke abandi bagwanyi canke ''uwo wese afise inkoho'', nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty. Umugore umwe yabwiye  Amnesty ati: ''Hari ubwicanyi bwinshi... ku nzu ku nzu''. Deprose Muchena wa Amnesty avuga ko hari ivyemezo bifadika vyinshi vy'uko  ingabo za Ethiopia na Eritrea zakoze ''ivyaha vyinshi vyo mu ntambara mu gitero cazo co kugaruza Aksum". Ku ndwi ikurikira , ubuhammya buvuga ko ingabo za Ethiopia zagumye muri Aksum, iza Eritrea zo zikaja hirya mu buseruko mu gisagara ca Adwa. Uwabibonnye yabwiye BBC uko ingabo za Ethiopia zasahuye amabanki yo muri ico gisagara ico gihe. Ingabo za Eritrea bivugwa ko zagarutse haheze  indwi. Intambara yo ku wa 28 ukwa 11 yakabuwe n'igitero c'abagwanyi ba TPLF batari bafise ibigwanisho bikwiye, ku bw'icigeranyo ca Amnesty. Hagati y'abagwanyi 50 na 80 bo muri Aksum bagavye igitero ku kirindiro c'ingabo za  Eritrea ku mutumba uhanamiye igisagara mu gitondo. Umugabo w'imyaka 26 yari  muri ico gitero yabwiye Amnesty ati: "Twashaka gukingira igisagara cacu duca tugerageza kukigwanira na cane cane mu kwanka ko abanyaEritrea bacinjira…Bari bazi kurasa kandi bari bafise amaradiyo, guhanahana amakuru….Nta nkoho nari mfise, inkoni yonyene." Ntibiziwi neza umwanya iyo ntambara yamaze, ariko kuri uwo muhingamo, ama kamyo n'ibiduga bitamenwa n'amasasu vyaciye  vyinjira muri Aksum, nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty. Ababibonye bavuga ko abanyaEritrea baciye birara mu bantu,barasa abagabo n'abahungu  basanzwe ata bigwanisho bafise bari hanze ku mabarabara, barabandanya gushika ku mugoroba. Umugabo  w'imyaka nka 20 yabwiye Amnesty ivyerekeye ubwicanyi bwabereye kw'ibarabara rikuru: "Nari mw'igorofa ya kabiri ry'inyubakwa ndaba ,ncishije mw'idirisha abanyaEritrea bariko barica abakiri bato." Abasirikare,bamenyekanye ko ari abanya-Eritrea atari ukubera umwambaro wabo n'imparati z'imodoka zabo gusa ahubwo kubera indimi bavuga(icarabu n'igiTigrinya co muri Eritrea),baciye batangura gusaka inzu ku nzu. "Novuga ko kwari ukwihora," nk'uko umusore umwe yabwiye BBC. "Bica umugabo wese babonye. Wuguruye umwango bakabonamwo umugabo, baca bamwica,utuguruye baca barasa bakugurura ku nguvu." Yari yinyegeje mu nzu y'ubutambiro hanyuma arabona umugabo yatowe akicwa n'abasirikare b'abanyaEritrea kandi aguma abasaba ngo bamureke: "yabawira ngo: 'Jewe ndi umu civil,nkora muri banki." Uwundi mugabo yabwiye BBC ko yabonye abagabo batandatu bishwe, nk'abayonzwe,  hanze y'inzu yiwe hafi y'ihoteri Abnet ku munsi ukurikira ku wa 29 ukwezi kwa 11. "Barabatondetse umurongo hanyuma babarasa mu mugongo babahagaze inyuma.Babiri muri bo nari ndabazi. Twarabana.Barababajije:'Inkoho zanyu zirihe' hanyuma nabo barishura: 'Nta nkoho tugira,turi aba civil." Ababibonye bavuga ko mu ntango abasirikare ba Eritrea batashaka ko hari uwegera abiciwe  ku mabarabara-uwugerageje kubikora baca bamurasa. Umugore umwe, abahungwabo babiri b'imyaka 29 na 14 bishwe, yavuze ko amabarabara ''yari yuzuye ibiziga". Amnesty ivuga ko inararibonye n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia bamaze kubijamwo, gushingura abantu vyahavuye bitangura haheze iminsi myinshi,amaziko menshi akaba yabaye itariki 30 z'ukwa 11 abantu benshi bamaze kuzana ibiziga ku masengero -rimwe na rimwe 10 icarimwe bari mu nkorofani z'ibiti zikwegwa n'ifarasi canke indogobwe. Kw'ihoteri Abnet, umukozi wa reta yavuganye na BBC yavuze ko hari ibiziga vyamaze iminsi ine bitaravanwa aho abantu biciwe. "Ibiziga vyari iruhande y'ihoteri Abnet na cinema ya Seattle vyariwe n'imfyisi.Twasanze amagufa gusa. Twahamvye amagufa. "Novuga ko hishwe abanyagihugu basanzwe amajana 8 muri Aksum." Ibi avuga  birahura n'ibivugwa n'umu diyakoni wo kw'isengero yabwiye Associated Press ko ibiziga vyinshi vyari vyarariwe n'imfyisi. Yarafashije kwegeranya indaangamuntu z'abishwe  hanyuma arafasha mu guhamba mu binogo rusangi,nawe nyene akaba yibaza ko hishwe abantu amajana 8 mu mpera z'iyo ndwi. Abantu 41 barokotse n'abavyiboneye Amnesty yabajije batanze amazina y'abantu  barenga amajana abiri bazi bishwe. Ababibonye bavuga ko abanyaEritra bagiye mu bikorwa vyo gusahura , abantu bamaze guhunga ari benshi, vyaciye biba hose kandi bikuzako. Kaminuza,  amazu y'abantu,amahoteri,ibitaro, ibigega vy'intete,ahakorerwa imiduga,banki,imangazini,aho bakorera imikate n'ayandi mabutike bivugwa ko vyari mu vyo batumbera. Umugabo umwe yabwiye Amnesty ko abasirikare ba Ethiopia bananiwe no kubuza abanyaEritrea gusahura inzu y'uwo bavukana. "Baratwaye TV,imodoka y'ijipe,frigo,metela zitandatu,ivyo kurya vyose vyari mu nzu n'amavuta yo guteka,amavuta yo gusiga umukate, ifu ya teff [indya ngenderwako muri Ethiopia], ububati bwo mu gikoni, impuzu, inzoga ziri muri frigo, icuma co kuduza amazi, na laptop." Uwo musore yavuganye na BBC yavuze ko azi imodoka 15 z'umugwizatunga wo muri ico gisagara zasahuwe. Ibi vyaragize ingaruka ku basigaye muri Aksum, vyabasize batagira indya zo kubatunga n'imiti yo kwivuza, nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty. Abibonye  bavuga ko ubusuma bw'ivyuma vyo gupompa amazi vyatumye basigara banywa amazi yo mu nzuzi. Kivugwa ko ariho havukiye Umwamikazi wa Sheba avugwa muri Bibiriya yagize urugendo i Yaruzaremu agiye kuraba Umwami Salomon. Baravyaranye umwana w'umuhungu-Menelek I-bivugwa ko ariwe yazanye i Aksum L'Arche d'Alliance/The Ark of Covenant (Isandugu ry'Isezerano),bivugwa ko ariyo yarimwo amabwirizwa 10 Imana yahaye Musa. Yama icunzwe buri gihe mw'isengero rya Our Lady Mary of Zion iri muri ico gisagara kandi nta n'umwe arekuriwe kuyibona. Ibirori bikomeye vy'idini birakorerwa kuri iyo sengero buri 30 ukwezi kwa 11, bikitabwa n'abaje gushengera bavuye irya n'ino muri Ethiopia no kw'isi, ariko mu mwaka uheze  ntivyabaye kubera intambara. Uwo mukozi wa reta yavuganye na BBC yavuze ko abasirikare ba Eritrea baje kuri iyo sengero itariki 3 ukwezi kwa 12 ''baratera ubwoba abapatiri babahatira kubaha umusaraba w'inzahabu n'ifeza''. Ariko avuga ko abadiyakoni n'abandi bakiri bato bagiye gukingira iyo sandugu. "Wari umugumuko udasanzwe. Umugabo wese n'umugore wese barabagwanya. Bararashe barica bamwe, ariko turanezerewe ko twashoboye gukingira ibintu vyacu vy'agaciro."

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Shawcross, Gibbs, Martinez, Solskjaer, Klopp, Hodgson
text: Inter Miami, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Amerika Major League Soccer washinzwe na David Beckham hamwe na Phil Neville, wipfuza kugura abahoze ari abakinyi mpuzamakungu b'Ubwongereza-  Ryan Shawcross w'imyaka 33 akina hagati muri Stoke City hamwe na Kieran Gibbs w'imyaka 31 akina inyuma muri West Brom. (Sun) Manchester City igiye kuva inyuma mu ruhigi rwo kurondera kugura umusatorizi wa Inter Milan Lautaro Martinez akomoka muri Argentine mu gihe uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 23 yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Eurosport) Jurgen Klopp ntiyishimiye poritike ya Liverpool ijanye no kugura abakinyi inyuma y'aho mu kwa mbere guheze uyu murwi unaniriwe no kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w'imyaka 29 asanzwe akina muri Napoli. (Sun) Ander Herrera kina hagati muri Paris St-Germain avuga ko amategeko ajanye no kutarenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga (Financial Fair Play) azobuza uyu murwi kugura umusatirizi wa Barcelona Lionel Messi ubu afise imyaka 33. (El Larguero via AS) Umukuru wa Bayern Munich Karl-Heinz Rummenigge avuga ko ryoba ari "iteka" ari nka hamwe boshobora kugura umukinyi Mohamed Salah wa Liverpool ariko agashimangira ko uyu murwi ata mugambi ufise wo kurondera uyo musatirizi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Misiri.  (ON Time Sports via Mirror) Kizigenza wa Real Madrid Sergio Ramos yanse ayandi masezerano y'imyaka ibiri akaba afise integuro yo kuja gukinira uwundi murwi wo ku mugabane wa Buraya mu gihe amasezerano n'uyu murwi wiwe azoba arangiye mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. (Cope - in Spanish) Manchester United bizoyibera ngombwa ko irindira ihiganwa rirangire kugira ngo ishobore gutangura ibiganiro n'umumenyereza wayo, umunya Norgeve Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, amasezerani akaba azorangira mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino wa 2021-22. (Sun) Real Madrid niyo ifise amahirwe yo gutahukana umukinyi wo kuruhande rw'i buryo inyuma wa Bayern Munich, umunya Autriche David Alaba w'imyaka 28, mu gihe Chelsea idashaka gushitsa umusharaha asaba ungana na 400.000 y'ama pawundi ku ndwi.  (ESPN) AC Milan iriteguye gutangura ibiganiro n'umusatirizi wa Suwede Zlatan Ibrahimovic w'imyaka 39 kugira ngo irabe ko yotera igikumu ku yandi masezerano yomutuma akinira uyu murwi gushika ashikanye imyaka 41. (Sun) Manchester City igiye gutangura ibiganiro n'umukinyi w'umwongereza John Stones w'imyaka 26 mu ci riza, icerekana ko afise uruhara ntangere muri uyu murwi uriko uhiganira gutahukana ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza. (Times - subscription required) Crystal Palace ntirabona neza nimba ikwiye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano mashasha n'umumenyereza Roy Hodgson w'imyaka 73 kugira abandanye amenyereza uyu murwi mu mwaka uza. Amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza.  (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Newcastle United umwongereza Dwight Gayle w'imyaka 31 ntiyishimiye ingene ataronka umwanya wo gukina, agashobora kuva muri uyu murwi mu mpera z'iri higanwa igihe amasezerano afitaniye na wo azoba arangiye.  (Chronicle) Umunyegori wa Roma w'umunya Suwede Robin Olsen w'imyaka 31 aripfuza ko yokwinjira burundi muri Everton asanzwe akinira nk'intizo. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola ariko araraba ingene yoreka umunyegori wa Brezili Ederson 27 akaba ari we atera ya mipira yo ku metero 11 (penalty) - ni mu gihe uyu murwi umaze gutakaza penalties zitatu muri indwi bamaze kuronka muri iri higanwa ry'uwu mwaka. (Independent) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United Gary Neville avuga ko uyu murwi ukeneye kugura umukinyi wo hagati ku ruhande rw'inyuma (milieu defensif) hamwe n'uw'inyuma mu ci riza.  (Sky Sports, via Goal)

headline: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
text: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

headline: Ethiopia: Uko intambara yo muri Tigray yahindutse indwano yo hagati mu gihugu
text: Intambara yo mu ntara ya Tigray yo mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia  ubu yahavuye iba indwano yo hagati mu gihugu iteye impungenge zo  kumanyagura ico gihugu no guhungabanya akarere kose. Abagararije ubutegetsi batumbereje ibitero berekeza mu bumanuko bagana umurwa mukuru mpuzantara, Addis Ababa, bituma umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed, yaronse agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel akaba yanahoze ari umusikirikare w'ipete rya lieutenant colonel - aja ku rugamba kuyobora ingabo z'igihugu. Aho indwano ikomereye gusumba vyaciye bituma abanyamahanga baturuka mu bihugu vya Buraya n'abakozi badakenewe cane ba ONU bava muri ico gihugu, bavuga ko umutekano wunyutse. Inyuma y'indwano yo mu gihugu mu myaka ya 1970 na 1980, Ethiopia yaciye iba kimwe mu bihugu vy'ubutunzi bwihuta cane kuduga muri Afrika, yongera iba inkingi  y'amaragamo mu karere. None ubu intureka ihitana abantu yakwiye igihugu iturutse mu karere k'abagarariji bo muri Tigray aho intambara yatanguriye, ikwira intara ya Amhara bihana urubibe mu buraruko bushira uburengero na Afar mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Intsinzi za vuba z'ingabo z'igihugu ku rugamba nta kinini zagize kugira zivaneho ubwoba  bw'indwano iguma ikomera aho imaze kugwamwo abantu ibihumbi , abaharurwa muri za miriyoni nabo bagateshwa izabo. Umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF)  wagararije ubutegetsi uvuga ko  ibitero vyawo vyo mu bumanuko bigamije kugondoza reta kugira ireke ukwugarana intara ya Tigray kwatumye ugutumatumanako no gushikira imfashanyo y'abari mu kaga bigorana cane. Ariko, ubutegetsi bwa Abiy bwagirije  abagararije gukwiragiza bakoresheje ibigwanisho ko hakenewe ko intwaro ihinduka, bigarukana ubwoba ko TPLF  ishaka kugaruka ku butegetsi. TPLF yamaze imyaka 27  yiganziye urubuga rwa poritike muri Ethiopia inyuma yo gushoza intanbara y'ubugarariji nk'iyo y'ubu mu 1991  kuri reta ya gi-komunista. Ubutegetsi bwabo bwashikanye igihugu kw'iyubakwa ry'ibikorwa remezo vyinshi vyadugije cane ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia, ariko buca burangwa n'agacinyizo ka poritike n'imibano. Ico ca nyuma nico cateye imyiyerekano yo kwanka reta yatumye Abiy ashika ku butegetsi muri Ndamukiza (ukwezi kwa 4) mu 2018 aho yaca atanguza impinduka z'imibano, poritike n'umutekano. Mu kurwanya iyo reta, TPLF yaciye yunga ubucuti bwo gukomeza ubushobozi bwayo bwo kugwana no kwongereza igihagararo cayo inyuma yo gushigikirwa n'imigambwe ishingiye ku bwoko itavuga rumwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Iyo ntambara ubwa mbere yari hagati ingabo za TPLF n'ingabo z'igihugu, zishigikiwe n'utugwi tw'abigenza nk'abagwanyi  two muri Amhara  hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea. Indongozi za TPLF  zaromowe mu minsi mike, ariko ubugarariji bwariko burarandagata muri Tigray hagati, bwunyura ibintu vyari bisanzwe bimeze nabi ku buryo abantu babayeyo. Abantu barenga 90% y'ababa muri iyo ntara -bashika miriyoni 5,2 - bakeneye imfashanyo yihuta, nk'uko ONU ibigereranya. Abaharurwa mu bihumbi barahungiye mu gihugu kibanyi ca Sudan -naco gisanzwe kiri mu bibazo  bijanye  n'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi. Inyeshamba zahuje umwanya wo gufata umurwa mukuru w'intara Mekelle mu kwezi kwa gatandatu n'igihe Ethiopia yari irindiriye ibiva mu matora kugira bahungabanye ukwemerwa kwa Abiy Ahmed. Inyeshamba zimaze  gushikana intambara hakurya y'imbibe za Tigray, imigwi yitwara nk'ingabo yo mu ntara zishingiye ku moko zirimwo Somali na Oromia yaciye yinjiramwo. Akamo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yagumye atera k'uko abantu bafata ibigwanisho kugira batangire inyeshamba katumye  ikoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho rirushirizaho guhabwa ikibanza. Mw'itangazo ryahavuye rifutwa kuri Facebook ku wa 4 Munyonyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) kubera  ryashobora kugumura, Abiy yavuze ati: "Ni inshingano z'umwe umwe muri twebwe gupfira Ethiopia. Nico gituma abantu bategerezwa kubanza gushira ivyabo ku ruhande hanyuma bitunganye mu buryo bwemewe hanyuma baje ahabona n'ikigwanisho cose n'ubushobozi bashobora kuronka kugira bazibire kandi bahambe abaterabwoba ba TPLF, biyemeje gusambura." Intumbero y'igihugu ya Abiy yerekanye intege nke zikiri mu ntwaro y'intara nyinshi zishingiye ku moko  zigahurira kuri reta imwe , nk'uko biri mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro ryo mu 1994. N'ubwo iryo bwirizwa nshingiro ryarondera kwongera imigwi y'amoko uburenganzira bwo gutunganya ivy'intara zayo, imwe imwe yabandanije gahunda zo kurondera kuronka ubwigenge bwuzuye kuva Abiy ashitse ku butegetsi. Mu kwezi kw'umunani, TPLF yagiraniye urunani n'umuhari w'abitwaje ibigwanisho ba Oromo (Oromo Liberation Army, OLA) wo mu bwoko nyamwinshi muri Ethiopia ariko bwagumye bukumirwa n'intwaro zari zagiye zirakurikirana. Abiy niwe yabaye uwa mbere wo mu bwoko bw'aba Oromo yagiye mu kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ariko reta imaze gufata igapfunga abanyeporitike bakomeye b'aba-Oromo, OLA yaciye ikora ikomeza kutavuga rumwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere. .  Urunani rwa OLA na TPLF rwatumye abagwanya reta bafata ibisagara bikomakomeye muri Amhara -harimwo Kemise, Dessie na Kombolcha - uko baguma basugereza umurwa mukuru. Ugusugereza umurwa mukuru kwaranakomejwe no gushigikirwa n'iyindi migwi ya poritike n'iyitwaje ibigwanisho icenda, na cane cane ishingiye mu mahanga yakangisha gukura umushikiranganji wa mbere. Reta ya Ethiopia kuva ico gihe imaze gutangaza ko yaguruje bimwe mu bisagara vyari vyafashwe n'abayirwanya. Abizeye ibiganiro barazerutse Itariki indwi za Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) , intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Africa (AU), uwahoze ari umukuru wa Nigeria Olusegun Obasanjo, yari yatanze  icizere  ko impande zirwana zari zugurukiye ibiganiro. Ariko inyeshamba n'umushikiranganji wa mbere  Abiy bakomeje guterana ibidashika. Umukuru wa TPLF Debretsion Gebremichael haheze iminsi ibiri abonanye n'intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Afrika yavuze ati: "Ingabo z'akagwi k'abatwaza igitugu zahumbahumbwe. Ubu rero zirindiriye guhambwa nk'abandi bose batwaza umukazo, kandi ivyo bizoba vuba." Mu kwishura, umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy nawe yavuze ati izo nyeshamba "zizokwicwa rubi  vuba". Muri uwo mwanya nyene,  kwotswa igitutu n'akarere vyaragaganutse, akamo k'amakungu k'ibiganiro nako kabonwa nko kwivanga mu biraba Ethiopia. Ukuba ishirahamwe rya Afrika ataho ryegamiye -rifise icicaro caryo muri Ethiopia -  nakwo hari abagufiseko  amakenga. Ivyo vyabaye na cane cane inyuma y'inyandiko yaryo kuri Twitter mu kwezi kw'umunani, kuva ico gihe ryaciye rivanwako, ryanegura akamo ka Amerika ko gusaba ko haba ibiganiro. Imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vy'i Buraya n'ibinyamakuru vyo mu mahanga yagumye yiyongera i Addis Ababa no mu banya-Ethiopia baba hanze.

headline: South Africa yizeye kuronka incanco z'umugera wa coronavirus mu kwezi kuza
text: Africa y'Epfo yizigiye kuronka incanco za Covid-19 mu kwezi kuza, ariko ivyo biterwa 'uko ibiganiro n'ibigo bizikora bizoba vyagenze neza, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Reta ifise ihangiro ryo guha urucanco nibura 67 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu bose-n'ukuvuga abarenga hafi miliyoni 40.3-gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka kugira haboneke ubudahangarwa kuri iyo ndwara. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu Zweli Mkhize yavuze ko gushika bamaze kuronka incanco zikwiye kugira bakingire 10 kw'ijana vy'abanyagihugu. Yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa mungu ko gutangura gutanga izo ncanco bitegerezswa ''gukorwa mu buryo bwihuta''. Yanavuze kandi ko reta iriko iravugana n'ibigo vyose bikora izo ncanco hamwe n'ivyemera guzitanga vuba kuruta ibindi. Africa y'Epfo cabaye igihugu ca mbere co muri Africa cashikanye abamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 barenga umuliyoni. Mu minsi iheze muri ico gihugu haratowe ishami ry'uwo mugera rinyaruka kwandukira gusumba, vyibazwa ko arico catumye igitigiri c'abandura ciyongera. Ubu Africa y'Epfo yemeza abantu 1.100.748 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19, abashika 29.577 bamaze gupfa n'abakize 903.679 kuva ico kiza cadutse mu kwezi kwa gagatu guheze.

headline: Madagascar: Abantu 'barya ivu rivanze n'icamwa c'ishamba' kubera uruzuba
text: Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP rivuga ko abantu bo mu bumanuko bwa Madagascar bariko bararya ivu rivanze n'icamwa co mw'ishamba (cizwi nka tamarind) mu kwivuna inzara, mu gihe uruzuba rwononye ibiterwa mbumbarugo muri ako karere. AFP isubiramwo amajambo y'umurimyi Doday Fandilava Noelisona agira iti: "Turyita ivu [igitaka mu Kinyarwanda] ry'ubukiriro kuko rifasha mu kumira ico camwa ca 'Tamarind' kirura, mu kwivuna inzara." "Muri iyi minsi ntiturondera imfungurwa zo kutubeshaho, ahubwo turondera uburyo bwo kuzuza umushishito ugaragara [urimo ubusa]." 'Cactus', ibindi vyamwa vyo mw'ishamba abantu bari basanzwe bikorako, na vyo vyarumye kubera ibura ry'imvura. AFP irasubiramwo amajambo y'uwundi murimyi, Avianay Idamy, yavuze ko yatanguye kudandaza amakara kugira aronke amahera akwiye yotuma umuryango wiwe ushobora kurya umutsima rimwe ku munsi. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe imfungurwa kw'isi (PAM/WFP) rivuga ko abantu umuliyoni n'igice  bo mu karere ko mu bumanuko bwa Madagascar bakeneye imfashanyo y'ibifungurwa vyihuta. Si ubwa mbere ako karere gaterwa n'uruzuba nk'urwo. Mu 2016, ONU yamenyesheje ko abantu bababa umuliyoni n'igice bo mu bumanuko bwa Madagascar bageramiwe na kigoyi kubera uruzuba rwinshi rwatewe n'ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'iciswe 'El Nino'. ONU ikaba yavuze ko umwimbu w'ibigori wagabanutse ku bice mirongo umunani kw'ijana muri uwo mwaka, ibindi biterwa mbumbarugo birimwo nk'imyumbati bikaba bitapfa kuboneka. Icegeranyo ca ONU cagira kiti: "Abantu bariko barikora ku mbuto, kugurisha ivyo batunze hamwe n'ibikoresho bakoresha mu burimyi eka mbere n'ibiribwa vyo mw'ishamba."

headline: DR Congo: Inama nshingamateka yabogoje umukuru wayo asanzwe acuditse na Kabila
text: Inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeje ko umukuru wayo abogozwa. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho inama nshingamateka isohoreye urwandiko rwo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Jeanine Mabunda, asanzwe acuditse cane na Josepf Kabila, hamwe n'abo bakorana, bakagirizwa uburongozi bubi. Iyi ni intsinzi kuri Perezida Félix Tshisekedi amaze igihe atumvikana n'uwo yasubiriye, Perezida Kabila. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, haradutse akaguma mu nama nshingamateka, biba ngombwa ko igipolisi kiza kubanguranya abari bashamiranye. Jeanine Mabunda, umukuru w'iyi nama nshingamateka, ni akadasohoka na Josepf Kabila, akaba yabogojwe n'amajwi 281 kuri 200. Niwe mukenyezi wa mbere yari yizigiwe ngo arongore inama nshingamateka ya Congo, ariko mu nyuma ico cizere bari bamuhaye kikaba cagiye gisubira inyuma. Abashingamateka begamiye ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi bamwagiriza ko ahengamira ku ruhande rwa Kabila mu ngingo ziwe, arico gituma yabogojwe. Wewe arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Aya matora yatumye abashingamateka benshi baja ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi. Ubu rero, ni akanya keza kuri we ko gushira mu ngiro imigambi yatangaje ku wa Mungu uheze, harimwo gushinga reta nshasha avuga ko yomworohereza gukorera bikwiye abanyagihugu ba Congo. Iri bogozwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ni uruhombo rudasanzwe kuri Perezida Kabila, yashikirije ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 18 arongoye iki gihugu. Hagti aho, n'aho yari yashikirije ubutegetsi amaze gutsindwa mu matora, yagumanye ibibanza vyinshi mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka z'uburere.

headline: Qatar 2022: N'iyihe migwi imaze kuronka uburenganzira bwo kuja muri izo nkino n'izigifise icizere?
text: Urugendo rwo kuja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar mu 2022 ruregereje,  imigwi izoja muri izo nkino izomenyekana muri iyi ndwi, co kimwe n'izizokura meza hamwe z'igigifise icizere co kubandanya. Ku ruhande rwa Buraya, imigwi 10 ya mbere yo mu matsinda izokwitaba izo nkino za nyuma, zizoba hagati y'itariki 21 Munyonyo ( 11) gushika itariki 12 Kigarama (12) mu 2022. Ihiganwa ryo muri Qatar rizoba ribaye irya nyuma rigiyemwo imigwi 32, kubero igitigiri c'imigwi carongerekanye gushika kuri 48 kuva ku nkino za nyuma zo mu 2026 zizobera muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Mexique na Canada. Ku ncuro ya mbere, igihugu ca Qatar kizokwitaba izo nkino nk'igihugu categuye izo nkino, bikaba vyitezwe ko azoba ari wo mugwi usanzwe uzoba witavye iryo higanwa. UEFA: Umugabane wa Buraya Umugabane wa Buraya uzoserukirwa n'imigwi 13, 10 ziza imbere mu matsinda ziza zaramaze kuronka uburenganzira bwo kwitaba izo nkino, ibibanza bitatu bisigaye bikaba bizohiganirwa n'imiwi 10 iri mu kibanza ca kabiri mu matsinda, hamwe n'imigwi ibiri iri mu kibanza ca gatatu canke musi ivuye mw'ihiganwa ry'ibihugu vya Buraya. 1: Ubudagi Igihugu kimaze gutwara igikombe c'isi incuro zine. Ubudagi ni co gihugu ca mbere catanguye kuronka uburenganzira bwo kuja muri izo nkino za nyuma zo mu 2022, butsinze Macedonia 4-0, hari itariki 11 Gitugutu (10), gica kiba igihugu cambere kironse ako karyo co mw'itsinda J. 2: Ubufaransa Igihugu gisanganywe ico gikombe na co caronse ubwo burenganzira, Kylian Mbappe yatsindiye ibitego 4 Ubufaransa, aho Ubufaransa bwagaraguje agati Kazakhstan mu kuyitsinda ibitego 8-0 mw'itsinda D, buca bwenurira Finlande yari isanzwe iri mu kibanza ca kabiri. 3: Ububiligi Ububiligi bwatahukanye ikibanza ca gatatu mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 2018, na bwo buzoja muri Qatar, inyuma y'aho ku musi wa gatandatu butsindiye Estonia ibitego 3-1, bituma buja mu kibanza ca mbere mw'itsinda rya E. 4: Croatia Igihugu ca Croatia cafashe ikibanza ca kabiri mu nkino zo mu 2018. Ico gihugu co mw'itsinda rya H caronse ubwo burenganzira ku musi wa gatandatu. Bahuye n'Uburusiya bwarondera inota rimwe gusa kugira buje muri izo nkino, ariko abasore ba Zlatko Dalic, baritaye ku rutare baranganya, ku gitsindo baronse ku munota wa 81, igitsindo bitsinze biciye ku mukinyi Fedor Kudryashov, bikaba vyatumye Uburusiya burindira izindi nkino kugira buronke uburenganzira bwo kwitaba izo nkino. 5: Espagne Ku musi w'Imana, Espagne yararonse uburenganzira bwo kwitaba izo nkino za nyuma ku ncuro ya 12 yikurikiranya, ikaba yari mw'itsinda B. Yatsinze Swede mu rukino rwabereye i Seville. Ico gihugu catwaye igikombe co mu 2010 cari gikeneye kunganya gusa kugira kije muri izo nkino, ariko igitego ca Alvaro Morata ni co catumye ico gihugu kironka uburenganzira bwo kuja muri izo nkino za nyuma. 6: Serbia Mu rundi rukino rutangaje, Serbia yatsinze Portugal ibitego 2-1 ku kibuga cabo kandi na Cristiano Ronaldo yakinye, uwo mugwi uca uronka uburenganzira bwo kuja muri izo nkino. Igitsindo co ku munota wa nyuma ca Aleksandar Mitrovic ni co cavunye inkokora Portugal. Ronaldo azorindira gushika mu kwezi kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uza kugira amenye ko bazobandanya ihiganwa canke ko birangiye. 7: Swisse Swisse yatsinze Bulgaria ibitego 4-0 ica ironka uburenganzira bwo kuja mu nkino za nyuma mu mwaka uza mw'itsinda C inyuma y'aho Irlande ya ruguru inganirije 0-0 n'Ubutaliyano i Belfast. Uwo mugwi nserukiragihugu umenyerezwa na Roberto Mancini, utegerezwa kurindira gushika mu kwezi kwa gatatu kugira ukine izindi nkino zo kurondera uburenganzira bwo kuja muri ico gikombe c'isi. 8: Ubwongereza Ubwongereza bwaronse uburenganzira bwo kuja mu gikombe c'isi inyuma yo gutsinda San Marino ibitego 10-0, umugwi uza ubwa nyuma mu mupira w'amaguru kw'isi. Umugwi umenyerezwa na Southgate uhabwa amahigwe menshi yo gutahukana igikombe c'isi mu mwaka uza, inyuma yo kugarukira muri kimwe ca kabiri mu nkino ziheruka kubera mu Burusiya, ukanashika mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro 2020 mu ci. Ni ubwa mbere Ubwongereza butsinda ibitego 10 kuva mu 1964, aho Harry Kane yatsinze ibitego 4 mu minota 15, Emily Smith akana bwari bwo bwa mbere atanguye mu kibuga aca aratsinda igitego kimwe, yongera afasha no gutsinda. 9: Danmark Danmark cabaye igihugu kigira kabiri kironse uburenganzira bwo kuja mu gikombe c'isi muri Qatar inyuma yo gutsinda Autriche 1-0, ikaba yaciye iba iya mbere mw'itsinda F. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, Ubuhollande bufise amanota 20, Turkiya na Norvege bose bafise amanota 18, kimwe muri ivyo bihugu vyo mw'itsinda G gishobora gukwiza imigwi 10 y'i Buraya izoja muri Qatar. Ubuhollande buza gukina na Norvege hanyuma Turkiya na yo itane mu mitwe na Montenegro. N'iyihe migwi yindi yaronse uburenganzira bwo kuja mu nkino z'isi muri uku kwezi? CONMEBOL: Amerika y'Epfo Amerika y'epfo ifise ibibanza bine vyo kuja muri iryo higanwa hamwe na bitatu vya Afrika ya ruguru, mu gihe ikibanza gisigara gihiganirwa n'imigwi yo kuri iyo migabane ibiri. Igihugu kimaze gutwara ico gikombe incuro zibiri Argentine, kizoba ikigira kabiri kironse ubwo burenganzira bwo kuja muri Qatar muri CONMEBOL, mu gihe cotsindira Brezil i San Juan uyu musi. Bananganije uwo mugwi umenyerezwa na Lionel Scaloni uca uronka uburenganzira bwo kwitabira izo nkino mu gihe Chili na Colombia zotsindwa. Ku mugabane wa Asia hari ibibanza bine. Hari ikibanza kimwe kigenewe igihugu co muri Oceania. Nta gihugu na kimwe kiratsindira kuja muri izo nkino muri Asia. Gushika ubu Amatsinda abiri y'imigwi itandatu aracabandanya guhiganwa. Imigwi ya Korea y'Epfo, Arabia Saudite na Australia bigaragara ko iriko iravyufatamwo neza. Imigwi itanu izoserukira Afrika muri izo nkino ntiramenyekana, gushika habaye izindi nkino zigira gatatu ari na zo za nyuma mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa gatatu. Gushika ubu, ibihugu bitandatu DR Congo, Ghana, Mali, Misri na Senegal ni vyo vyinjiye muri izo nkino za gatatu ari zo za nyuma. CONCACAF: Amerika ya Ruguru, hagati na, na Caraibe Gushika ubu, Amerika Mexique na Canada ni vyo bihugu biboneka ko biriko biravyifatamwo neza mu nzira yo kuja muri Qatar, n'aho urugendo rusa n'urukiri rurerure kuko hasigaye inkino indwi. OFC:Ocenia Kuri uyu mugabane wa Oceania urugendo ruracari rurerure kuko n'inkino zo gukuranamwo ntiziratangura.

headline: Uburyohe bw'umukate n'isoda nibwo bwatumye Phenny Awiti yemera kwipimisha umugera wa SIDA
text: Phenny Awiti ni umunyakenya agendana umugera wa SIDA. Yagiye kumenya ko yanduye mu mwaka wa 2008 yiga mu mwaka c'icenda igihe ishirahamwe rimwe ryariko ripima uwo mugera mu banyeshure. Yemeye ko bamufata amaraso kubera iryo shirahamwe ryari ryemereye abanyeshure ko uwemera ko amufata amaraso bakamupima aca aronka umukate n'isoda. Iryo shirahamwe ryabemerera ivyo mu ntumbero yo kubahimiriza kwipimisha. Uburyohe bw'umukate n'isoda nivyo vyatumye ico gihe Phenny yemera ivyo atokwemeye. Avuga ati: "Ico gihe jewe nari nkeneye kwironkera gusa umukate n'isoda twari twemerewe. Mbere n'impanuro bampa imbere y'uko bamfata amaraso ewe nabona ko bariko bantesha umwanya, bantevya kwironkera isoda n'umukate". Haciye akanya gato gusa inyishu z'ibipimo zirasohoka, zerekana ko Phenny yari afise umugera wa SIDA. Ivyo ntaco vyamubwiye kuko wewe ico yabona muri uwo mwanya ni uko yari yironkeye umukate n'isoda, vyari nk'inzahabu ku bana bari mw'ishure ry'uburaro. Ati: " Iciyumviro c'uko mfise umugera caje kunzamwo haciye iminsi". "Ivyiyumviro bimbanye vyinshi, niho nafata ingingo y'ukubibwira mugenzanje nari nizigiye cane ko yongumiriza akabanga, ariko nticabujije ko inkuru y'uko mfise umugera ikwiragira mu kanya gato ku buryo umuntu uwa ari we wese kw'ishure yamenye ko mfise umugera". Uyo muhererezi mu muryango w'abana batandatu yagiye gutangazwa n'uko abo bavukana bari bazi ko yari afise umugera, ariko bakabigira ibanga ku mvo bavuga ko bananiwe no kumubwira. "Numvise ko ata muntu uwo ari we wese nokwizigira, nongera ndashavurira mama yamvyaye bimwe bikomeye, eka ndamwidogera. Kuko mu bana batandatu bose, ni jewe jenyene mfise umugera". Ubwo buzima Phenny yabayemwo bwatumye anenwa. Ati: "Hari igihe narwara igihute kinini ku nda cantumye ntanashobora kugendagenda. Ndabibwiye umurezi yari kw'izamu uyo munsi, yanyishuye ko adakeneye kumenya ko mfise canke ntafise umugera, ati uragenda vyanka vyakunda. Narinanase ndandara buke buke gushika mw'ishure". N'aho vyabaye ngombwa ko aza aranyegeza imiti yafata kubera yanka kumaramara mu gihe bomubona ariko afata imiti y'ugupfupfahaza (ARV), abigisha bobo ntibamworohereje. "Hari abigisha bashobora kuza mw'ishure bakabaza bati 'Phenny ni nde', hanyuma bagaca bigira... bivuga ko bari bumvise igihuha, bagashaka kumenya uwo ari we". Ni bwo buzima yabayemwo mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri yose gushika aheze amashure. Hagati aho, muri iyo myaka yose Phenny yayibayemwo mu buguruguru. "Nari umwana aciye ubwenge cane ariko nagiye kuba umuguruguru kubera ibibazo vy'umubiri n'umutima nahuye navyo mu buzima. Nari nizigiye ko ubuguruguru bwari kuntuma nkira umugera". Uko iminsi yagenda niko Phenny yagenda ashira ubwoba, aremera uko ari. Amaze kurangiza amashure yisumbuye, yarabandanije n'ibindi vyigwa, ivyo navyo bikaba vyaramufashije kwiyemera. Umugera wa SIDA wandukira uciye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina n'umuntu asanzwe awugendana, canke umuvyeyi akandukiza umwana mu kwibaruka canke mu kumwonsa, canke gukoresha ibikoresho bitobora uruhu vyakoreshejwe n'uwusanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA. Hagati aho, Phenny yarashoboye kuronka umukunzi yemeye kwubakana nawe kandi yari akomeye, n'aho bahukanye haciye imyaka mikeya . " Namenyanye nawe ndamweretswe na mugenzanje. Ambwira ko ankunda n'aho nari mfise umugera, mbere turanavyara abana babiri bose bakomeye, Faraja na Ahadi". Mama Faraja ashimangira ko atandukije abana biwe kubera bakurikije impanuro z'abaganga. Mu mwaka wa 2017 Phenny yaritangaje ko arwaye umugera wa SIDA abicishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook. Ati: "Igihe kimwe navyutse numva naruhishijwe no kwama ndiko nsigurira umwe umwe ivyerekeye amagara yanje, niho nandika ubutumwa kuri Facebook menyesha ko ngendana umugera wa SIDA. Nari mfise abagenzi 15 bonyene kuri Facebook, ariko icantangaje ni ingene ubwo butumwa bwakwiragiye hose mu kanya gato, bintuma ngira ivyiyumviro vyinshi kuri iyo ndwara. Niho naciye numva ko nkwiye kugira uruhara mu vyerekeye ukwigisha ibijanye n'umugera wa SIDA ". Aciye kuri urwo rubuga, yaciye atangura guhimiriza abantu ku vyerekeye umugera wa SIDA. Mu kwezi guheze,  mama Ahadi yarubakanye n'uwundi mukunzi, na we nyene asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA. Phenny yatangaje abatari bake inyuma y'aho amenyeshereje ku mbuga hwaniro ko afise imbanyi kandi ko ari mu kwibaruka umwana agira gatatu. Avuga ati: "Nshaka kwereka abandi ko umuntu asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA ashobora gusama imbanyi kandi akavyara umwana akomeye " "Imbere y'uko hanatangura kuboneka imiti y'ugupfupfahaza, mu bagore bari basanzwe bagendana umugera wa SIDA, hari bamwe bavyaye abana bakomeye, abandi nabo bakavyara abamaze kwandukizwa ...ivyo bivuga ko bivana n'urugero umugera ugezeko. Umugera wandukira igihe umaze kugera ku rugero rwo hejuru. Rero iyo umuntu asanzwe afata imiti y'ugupfupfahaza (ARV), umugera uragabanuka, gutyo umuvyeyi akanashobora kwonsa umwana wiwe ntamwanduze" Ingorane nini ni uko abantu benshi bagendana umugera wa SIDA usanga banenwa mu kibano. Phenny avuga ati: "Hari abantu benshi bibaza ko inzira yonyene y'ukwandura umugera wa SIDA ari imibonano mpuzabitsina, cane cane biciye mu bumaraya, ariko sivyo. Nka jewe nandujwe na mama. Ariko haracari abantu benshi ku mbuga bakimbwira ko mbesha, ko ahubwo nawanduye nciye mubumaraya..."

headline: Pep Guardiola: Amahirwe Liverpool imaze kwiha ararengeye Man City
text: Umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, avuga ko ivyo guhiganirwa igikombe ca Premier League vyaheze nyuma yo gutsindwa 3-2 na Wolves ejo kuwa gatanu. City ni iya gatatu muri Premier League, ikaba irushwa na Liverpool ya mbere amanota 14 ikaba kandi iri inyuma ya Leicester City inota rimwe. Abajijwe niba guhiganirwa igikombe vyaheze, Guardiola yabariye BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Ubudasa bw'amanota ni bunini cane, rero ni ego". City iramaze gutsindwa imikino itanu muri Premier League mu mahiganwa y'ubu, ukaba ari umukino umwe wiyongerako imaze gutsindwa ugereranije n'amahiganwa ya 2018-19. Barusha Liverpool umikino umwe, kandi yoyo imaze gutakaza amanota abiri gusa mu mahiganwa y'ubu. Kuva mu kwezi kwa gatatu Liverpool iramaze gutsinda imikino 26 mu mikino 27, ikaba isigaje imikino ibiri kugira imare umwaka wose idatsinzwe ku rwego rwo hejuru. Guardiola yongeyeko ati "Kwoba ari nko kurota twiyumviriye Liverpool, ahubwo twiyumvira Leicester.  Turafise amahirwe yo kuronka ikibanza ca kabiri. Ndazi ko ikipe yanje ishoboye, ariko ni uko bimeze." Umukinyi akina mu mpande, Bernardo Silva yongeyeko ati: "Ni ukuri ibintu kuri twebwe bimeze nabi. Uyu mwaka watugendeye nabi cane. Nta n'umwe yaziga ko twari kwenurirwa na Liverpool nk'uku kandi ihiganwa rikiri hagati. "Dutegerezwa kubandanya. Turazi yuko gutwara igikombe bigoye cane. Sinovuga ko bidashoboka ariko biragoye cane."

headline: Sead Kolasinac wa Arsenal yarwanye n'abasuma babiri
text: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Bosnia akiniria ikipe ya Arsenal, ariko aritwa intwari ku mbuga hwaniro nyuma yo kugaragara atana mu mitwe n'abasuma babiri. Abo basuma bari biyoberanije bashaka kwiba imodoka izimvye uwo mukinyi na mugenzi wiwe bari barimwo. Sead Kolasinac yari atwawe mu modoka na rurangiranwa w'Umudage, Mesut Ozil, bari i London igihe ivyo vyaba. Video yagaragaye yerekana Kolasinac ata kirwanisho afise, ahangana n'abasuma babiri bari bambaye inkofero z'abagira kw'ipikipiki. Abo basuma kandi bari bitwje imbukiga, ariko nticabujije Kolasinac kubatesha bagata bakomoka. Ikipe ya Arsenal ivuga ko abo bakinyi bose bameze neza kandi ko ata n'umwe yakomeretse, igipolisi kikaba kiriko kirakora itohoza.

headline: Marina Ovsyannikova: Wa munyamakuru wa Russia avuga ku masaha 14 yamaze asambishwa
text: Umunyamakuru w'umurusiyakazi yatangishijwe ihadabu hanyuma ararekurwa inyuma y'imyiyerekano yakoze yo kwiyamiriza intambara ya Ukraine mu gihe hariko hashikirizwa amakuru ikibiriraho hanyuma agaca asohora ireresi yo kwiyamiriza iyi ntambara. Marina Ovsyannikova, umukuru w'uruganda rujejwe kwegeranya amakuru ku mboneshakure Channel 1 yegukira reta, yarahagaritswe ku wa mbere inyuma y'aho yiteye mu cumba c'amakuru y'ikibiriraho afise icapa kivuga ngo "Oya intambara". Avuga ko yasambishijwe amasaha arenga 14 kandi ko yari amaze imisi ibiri ataryama, kandi ko atamwunganirizi yahawe. Ihadabu y'ama rouble 30.000 (mu mafaranga y'Uburusiya, angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 280) yerekeye ubutumwa yacishije muri iyo reresi yasohoye. Arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyo gutegura ikoraniro riciye kubiri n'amategeko. Mw'iyo reresi, ahamagarira abanyagihugu b'Uburusiya kwiyamiriza iyi ntambara, akavuga ko ari bo bonyene bafise ububasha bwo "guhagarika ubu busazi". Ati: "Ntimutinye, nta na kimwe. Ntibashobora kudupfunga twese". Ntibitomoretse neza nimba azohava arengutswa ku myiyerekano yakoreye ku mboneshakure ikibiriraho, mu gihe hari ubwoba ko ashobora kwagirizwa icaha gikomeye, mw'itegeko mpanavyaha rishasha ribuza kwita igikorwa ca gisirikare c'Uburusiya muri Ukraine "igitero" canke gukwiragiza "amakuru y'ibinyoma" kuri iyi ntambara. Inyuma yo gusambishwa na sentare, umupfasoni Ovsyannikova yabwiye abanyamakuru ko akeneye kuruhuka inyuma y'imisi ibiri yari amaze adasinzira. Ati: "Nasambishijwe amasaha arenga 14, sinari nemerewe kuvugana n'umuryango wanje canke abagenzi banje. Baranyimye n'umwunganirizi". Ashimangira kandi ko ivyo gukora imyiyerekano ari we wenyene yavyiyumviriye. Ati: "Ni ingingo yanje yo kwiyamiriza intambara. Nije nafashe ingingo jenyene kuko ntashigikiye iki gitero c'Uburusiya. Ni ukuri vyari ibintu biteye ubwoba". Abashingwamanza baramaze amasaha atari make batazi iyo umupfasoni Ovsyannikova ari inyuma y'ifatwa ryiwe ku wa mbere ku mugoroba. Nta muntu yari azi iyo ari gushika hasohotse isanamu yazungurutse ku mbuga hwaniro z'Uburusiya imwerekana ari muri sentare ari kumwe n'umushingwamanza wiwe Anton Gashinsky. Amasanamu y'umupfasoni Marina ari mu myiyerekano yarakwiragiye ku muvuduko munini kw'isi yose inyuma yo kwinjira mu kiganiro c'amakuru y'ikibiriraho, kizwi nka Vremya, gikurikiranwa cane mu Burusiya, afise icapa canditseko ngo "Oya intambara, hagarika intambara, ntimwemere iyi propagande, hano barababesha". Yumvikana kandi asubiramwo amajambo ngo "oya intambara, hagarika intambara". Iki capa caraboneka neza mu kiringo c'amasegonda makeya imbere y'uko iki kiganiro gihagarikwa gushikirizwa ikibiriraho hagaca hajako amakuru yafashwe imbere y'igihe. Imbere y'uko ibi biba, yari yifashe ireresi avuga ko atewe isoni no gukorera ico yita propagande ya Kremlin. Ati: "Numva isoni kubona naremeye gushikiriza ibinyoma ku mboneshakure. Numva isoni kubona nararetse Abarusiya bakaba nk'ibishusho. Tuguma twihweza gusa ubu butegetsi butagira ubuntu ataco turi buvuge". Umupfasoni Ovsyannikova - avuga ko se wiwe ari umunya-Ukraine -  avuga ko isi yose yiyamiriza Uburusiya. "Ibisekuru cumi biri imbere ntibizoshobora kwikurako ibimaramare vy'iyi ntambara y'abavukanyi". Bagenziwe kuri Channel 1 bivugwa ko bakubiswe n'inkuba babonye ivyo yakoze. Umwe muri bo yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Faridaily - kirongowe n'uwahoze ari umunyamakuru wa BBC Farida Rustamova mu gisata c'ururimi rw'ikirusiya - ko umupfasoni Ovsyannikova, nyina w'abana babiri, atahora avuga ibintu vya poritike, ko ahubwo yakunda kwivugira "kenshi ku bana, imbwa hamwe n'inzu". Kuva ibintu vyiwe bimenyekanye, Ovsyannikova yaronse ubutumwa bwinshi ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Facebook mu kirusiya no mu congereza, bamushimira ku vyo yakoze. Eka na Perezida Zelensky wa Ukraine yaramushimiye kubera "yashikirije ukuri aho kuri". Perezida Emmanuel Macron w'Ubufaransa avuga ko igihugu ciwe kigiye gutangura utwigoro two kumukingira, ari ku biro vy'ubuserukizi canke mu buhungiro hanze, kandi ko azobivuganako na Perezida Putin basubiye kuvugana. Ariko umuvugizi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov avuga ko ivyo yakoze ari "ubugumutsi". Ni ibintu bitamenyerewe ku bakozi bakora mu binyamakuru bigenzurwa na reta kugira ico bashikirije gitandukanye n'aho Kremlin ihagaze. Ariko kuva intambara ya Ukraine itanguye abanyamakuru n'imiburiburi batatu bakorera ama televiziyo atatu makuru makuru baramaze gutanga imihoho, ari bo Zhanna Agalakova wa Channel 1, hamwe na Lilia Gildeyeva na Vadim Glusker bakora kuri NTV.

headline: Saadi Gaddafi: Umuhungu w'uwahoze atwara Libya yavuye mu munyororo i Tripoli
text: Umuhungu w'uwahora atwara Libya Muammar Gaddafi yarekuwe ava mw'ibohero yari arimwo kuva mu 2014. Saadi Gaddafi - yahora ari umukuru w'ingabo zidasanzwe za Libya - yari azwi cane kuba yagerageje umwuga wo gukina umupira w'amaguru mu Butaliyano. Mu 2003 yari  yasinye gukinira Perugia, ariko yabonetse gake cane mu kibuga. Yahungiye muri Niger igihe se yatembagazwa ku butegetsi hanyuma akicwa mu 2011, ariko mu nyuma arafatwa asubizwa muri Libya aho yejejwe ku vyaha birimwo kwica. Isoko ryo mu bushikiranganji bw'ubutungane ryabwiye itotororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko ingingo  yo kurekura uwo muhungu wa Gaddafi yafashwe hakurikijwe urubanza sentare yaciye haraheze imyaka myinshi. Bivugwa ko Saadi Gaddafi afise imyaka 47 canke 48. Irindi soko rivuga ko hari ivyategerezwa kwuzuzwa kugira ngo kurekurwa bishoboke. Yagirijwe kuba yishe umumenyereza w'umupira w'amaguru w'umunya-Libya  Bashir al-Rayani mu 2005, hamwe n'ivyaha ku bantu bari mu myiyerekano igihe  ukwiyamiriza ubutegetsi bwa se kwatangura mu 2011. Ariko mu nyuma basanze ata caha kimwagira. Imbere y'uko aja muri Perugia,  yarakiniye imigwi itandukanye muri Libya, akanakinira umugwi w'igihugu. Ubu bivugwa ko yafashe indege aja muri Turkiya. Mw'itangazo, reta ya Libya y'ubumwe bw'igihugu yavuze ko yizigiye ko irekurwa ryiwe rizofasha gukomeza ugusubiza hamwe mu gihugu. Kuva mu 2011, igihugu kirangwa n'intanbara hamwe n'akajagari.

headline: Ububiko bw'incanco za Covid-19: Miriyoni 241 z'incanco zirashobora gutabwa?
text: Prezida Joe Biden asaba abategetsi b'isi kwiyemeza gucandaga abashika 70% y'abantu baba kw'isi gushika mu kwezi kw'icenda mu mwaka uza. Ariko ubushashatsi bwerekana ko ibihugu bikize  cane n'ubu bikibitse umusesekara w'incanco, kandi ko nyinshi zishobora gutabwa vuba. Igihe yafata indege aja muri Iran muri iri ci, Bahar yaranezerewe cane no gusubira kubona se ubwa mbere mu myaka ine. Ntiyari azi ko indwara ya korona yari hafi yo kwugariza ico gihugu - n'umuryango wiwe - mu mupfunda wa kabiri wahitanye abantu benshi. Ubwa mbere yahitanye umugenzi w'umuryango, yariko arategura ubugeni bw'umuhungu wiwe igihe yafatwa n'indwara. Nta  minsi yaheze aca arapfa. Hanyuma hakurikira se wabo wa se, mu nyuma inasenge yari ageze mu za bukuru. Bahar yaciye atangura kwumva ubwoba bwa inakuru yari amaze kuronka urucanco rumwe gusa, akirindiriye urugira kabiri. Bahar afise imyaka 20 akaba aba muri Amerika aho yaronse urucanco mu kwezi kwa kane. N'ubwo we yari azi ko akingiwe, yamaze iminsi ya nyuma yiwe y'urugendo atava mu nzu kwa se  aguma yibaza uwakurikira mu kurwara korona. Bamwe bamwe mu muryango wiwe bararonse incanco mu gihugu zisanzwe ari nke cane. Amaze gusubira muri Amerika, yaciye amenya ko se nawe yafashwe n'iyo ndwara. Aho yari kure yiwe, atangura gukongatazwa n'ubwoba. Avuga ati: "Umengo ni nk'uwacitse kw'icumu yicuza. Navuye muri Iran meze neza cane, amagara yifashe neza kuko nari naronse incanco zibiri za Pfizer". Se yarakize ariko abandi batari bake mu muryango bakuze gusumba ntibaronse ayo mahirwe. "Numvise umenga hari ico niyagiriza". Ibiharuro bigaragaza ubwo busumbane mu kuronka incanco birateye agahinda. Abantu barenga 50 kw'ijana kw'isi baracarindiriye kuronka nibura urucanco rwa mbere rwa Covid -19. Ku bwa Human Rights Watch, 75% z'incanco zagiye mu bihugu 10 gusa. Ikigo Economist Intelligence Unit caharuye ko 50% y'incanco zimaze gukorwa gushika ubu zagiye ku bantu 15% b'ababa kw'isi, ibihugu vya mbere bitunze kw'isi bikaba vyatanze incanco incuro 100 kurusha ibikenye cane. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ibihugu indwi vya mbere bitunze cane bigize umugwi G7 - Canada, France,Ubudagi, Ubutaliano, Japan, Ubwongereza na reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika -  vyiyemeje guha umuriyardi  w'incanco ibihugu bikenye mu kiringo c'umwaka kuva ico gihe. Agathe Demarais ari mu banditse icegeranyo ca vuba ca Economist Intelligence Unit  kw'isabikanywa ry'incanco avuga ati: "Naratwenze igihe nabibona. Nari nsanzwe bene ivyo ndabibona. Womenya ko bitazokwigera bishika." Ubwongerea bwemeye incanco miriyoni 100 muri izo, gushika ubu bumaze gutanga iziri munsi ya miriyoni imwe. Prezida Biden yemeye miriyoni 580 muri izo Amerika ikaba imaze gutangamwo miriyoni 140. Navyo  ibihugu bigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya vyari vyemeye incanco miriyoni 250 gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka - bimaze gutanga 8% gusa y'izo. Co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu vy'ubutunzi buri hagati na hagati, Iran yaraguze incanco ziciye mu mugambi wa Covax, urwego rushigikiwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi (OMS) kugira rushikane incanco aho zikenewe cane kurusha ahandi. Covax iragura incanco hanyuma ikazigurisha ku giciro kiri hasi ku bihugu vy'ubutunzi buri hagati na hagati, ikaziha ku buntu ibihugu bikenye. Ariko Covax yarahuye n'ikibazo gikomeye c'abayikorera izo ncanco. Yari yiyemeje gutanga incanco zingana na miriyaridi 2 mu 2021 nyinshi zikozwe n'uruganda rwo mu Buhindi, ariko aho umupfunda wa kabiri uhungabanirije ico gihugu mu kwezi kwa gatanu, reta yaciye ifata ingingo yo kubuza gusubira kugurisha hanze. Kuva ico gihe Covax yikora ku ncanco ziba zitanzwe n'ibihugu bitunze. Ibintu vyaciye vyikwega ku buryo ibihugu vyari kuzihabwa gushika ubu bitarashikana abantu 2 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu bavyo bamaze gucandagwa. Aurélia Nguyen, umuyobozi wa Covax, avuga ati: "Muri iki gihe incanco ziboneka ni nke, ziboneka  ata mwanya munini wo kwitegura usigaye, kandi zitagifise igihe cazo  cose imbere y'uko ziba impfagusa - bigaca bigora cane mu buryo bwo kuzikwiragiza mu bihugu bishobora guca bizikoresha muri uwo mwanya uba usigaye". Si ingorane y'ingene incanco ziboneka kw'isi. Ibihugu bitunze vyarazegeranije gushika aho bigira n'umusesekara, nk'uko bivugwa na Airfinity, ikigo c'ubuhinga gikora ubushakashatsi ku buryo incanco ziboneka kw'isi. Ibigo  bihingura  incanco kw'isi bikora miriyaridi 1,5 buri kwezi, umwaka ukazohera hamaze gukorwa miriyaridi 11. Dr Matt Linley, umushakashatsi mukuru muri Airfinity avuga ati: "Bakora incanco nyinshi cane. Barazongereje cane muri aya mezi atatu canke ane aheze". Ibihugu bitunze cane birashobora kuba bifise miriyaridi 1,2 z'incanco bidakeneye -n'ubu vyatanguye gutanga urucanco rwo gukabura ubudahangarwa. Ica gatanu c'izo ncanco - incanco imiriyoni 241 - zirahakwa kuzotabwa niyo zitatangwa nk'imfashanyo ubu ubwa vuba, nk'uko Dr Linley avuga. Birashoboka cane ko ibihugu bikenye bitokwemera incanco kiretse zisigaje n'imiburiburi amezi abiri imbere y'uko zita agaciro. Dr Linley agira ati: "Nibaza yuko bitatewe n'uko ibihugu bikize vyagize umururumba, ahubwo ni uko bitari bizi urucanco ruzokora urwo ari rwo. Rero vyategerezwa kugura nyinshi." Yifashishije ubushakashatsi iherutse gukora, Airfinity yizera kwereka amareta yuko hari incanco zikwiye ku buryo bidakenewe gushingura umurengera wazo mu bubiko. Ahubwo barashobora gutanga izo badakeneye ubu kandi bakizera yuko izindi zizokorwa mu mezi ari imbere. Agathe Demarais agira ati: "Ntibashaka kugwa mu mutego batiteguye. Bivana kandi n'igitsure ca poritike hagati mu bihugu kuko hari igice c'abatanga amajwi mu matora bashobora gushavuzwa no kubona incanco zitangwa, mu gihe boba bumva yuko zigikenewe iwabo." Reta y'Ubwongereza ivuga yuko ata murundo w'incanco ifise mu bubiko kandi ko yagiranye amasezerano na Australia yo gusangira incanco imiriyoni zine zizosubizwa mu zigenewe Australia mu mpera z'umwaka. Umuvugizi wo mu bushikiranganji bujejwe amagara no gushikirana bw'Ubwongereza yagize ati: "Kuronka incanco no kuzitera abantu vyarateguwe vyitondewe mu Bwongereza kugira uwo wese abifitiye uburenganzira ashobore gukingirwa vuba bishoboka". Aurélia Nguyen wo muri Covax avuga yuko atari ama reta gusa akeneye kugira ico akora. Agira ati: "Turanakeneye yuko abahingura imiti bashikana ivyo biyemeje kuri Covax kandi bakadushira imbere y'amasezerano n'ibihugu ku giti cavyo bisanzwe binafise incanco zikwiye." Niba abahingura incanco kw'isi bariko barahingura miriyaridi 1.5 buri kwezi, nk'uko abandanya avuga, ikibazo ni ico kumenya igituma izishikira ibihugu bikenye ari nkeyi cane. Agira ati: "Mu gihe ivyo Covax ikeneye ari vyo vyinshi, amareta yari akwiye kuyihebera ibibanza vyayo kugira turonke incanco twatumyeko  vuba hashoboka." Kuri Bahar n'umuryango wiwe, izi ncanco si ibitigiri gusa ni ubuzima nyabwo, incuti n'umuryango. Buri minsi mikeyi ihaciye, arumva iyindi nkuru y'umuntu yapfuye. Iyo abagenzi kuri Kaminuza bavuga yuko badashaka kwicandagisha yaragerageza guharira nabo ariko ubu ntavyo agishobora, biramubabaza cane. Agira ati: "Ndagerageza kubireka ngo birengane ariko biragoye cane kwihanganira kubona abantu bareka amahirwe bafise akabaca mu myanya y'intoke."

headline: Muri Tigray 'abantu barasambanijwe ku nguvu''-reta ya Ethiopia
text: Ethiopia yemeje ivyahora bivugwa ko hari abasambanijwe ku nguvu mu ntambara ya Tigray. Abategetsi ba Ethiopia bemeje ko vyahsitse hakagira abantu basambanywa ku nguvu mu ntambara yabaye mu ntara ya Tigray igihe ingabo za reta mpuzantara zatera umugambwe watwara iyo ntara. Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'aho ONU ivugiye ko yaronse ivyegeranyo vy'amabi afatiye ku gutsina yakozwe muri iyo ntara, harimwo guhatira abantu gusambanya ku nguvu abantu bo mu miryango yabo. "Tumaze kuronka ivyegeranyo vy'umugwi twarungitse gukurikirana ivy'iriya ntara ya Tigray, basanze koko hari abasambanijwe ku nguvu, ivyo bikaba arivyo ata gukekeranya'' nk'uko vyemejwe  n'umushikiranganji w'abagore Filsan Abdullahi avyanditse kuri twitter. Uwo mushikiranganji yavuze ko umugwi ubikurikirana ukiriko uregeranya ibiharuro kugira hamenekanye igitigiri c'abashikiwe n'ayo mahano. Yavuze ko reta iriko 'irongereza ugukingira no kubuza ko haba amabi afatiye ku gitsina mu ntara ya Tigray." Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yagomoye igitero c'indege no hasi itariki zine z'ukwezi kwa 11 kugira atuze umugabwe watwara iyo ntara inyuma yo  kwigarurira  amakambi yab gisirikare. Yatangaje intsinzi muri Tigray inyuma y'ukwezi kw'intambara, ariko indongozi za TPLF  n'ubwo bararahiye ko bazobandanya kurwana. Gushika muri Tigray kuracari ikibazo ku miryango ifasha abari mu kaga ishaka gutanga imfashanyo y'ivyo kurya hamwe n'imiti bikenewe cane. Amashirahamwe atanga imfashsnyo avuga ko abantu bangana na miriyoni 4.5 bakeneye gufashwa , abo bakaba ari 60% y'abanya Tigray bose, ariko reta ya Ethiopia yo ivuga ko abantu miriyoni 2.5 ari bo bonyene bakeneye imfashanyo kandi ikemeza ko bose ishobora kubashikira. Umukuru w'Umuryango wa Croisx Rouge yo muri Ethiopia uvuga ko 80% y'abanya Tigray n'ubu badashora gushikirwa n'imfashanyo, kandi ko abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bashobora kwicwa n'inzara vuba.

headline: Nkundabantu : umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yari nde?
text: Ejo ku wa gatandatu niho umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yaririmbana na mugenziwe Alfred Nyandwi,  yitaba Imana i Bujumbura. Abo baririmvyi babiri bari bagize umurwi abatari bake bari bazi nka "Alfred na Bernard", bakaba bagiye kumenyekana cane ku rukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwiswe NKUNDABANTU. Alfred ati: " Nsigaranye umubabaro udasanzwe kuko yari umugenzi twari tumaranye imyaka n'imyaka, twavuye kure dufatana urugendo rwari rutugejeje aho tugeze, none ansize ndi umwe". Abo baririmvyi bompi basanzwe bava mu miryango y'abacuraranzi ba kera, banaririmvye indirimbo zamenyekanye cane. Bernard Ndoreyicimpa, mwene Mijuriro Mathias  na Ntahonkuriyer Valerie yavutse mu 1986, avukira muri Komine Isare ku mutumba wa Gishingano uhanamiye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Co kimwe na mugenziwe Alfred, Bernard yavukiye mu muryango w'abacuraranzi bahoze mbere baririmba mu murwi w'igihugu wari uzwi nka NAKARANGA. Alfred yabwiye BBC ati: "Uretse ko turi abavyara, twempi tuva mu miryango y'abacuraranzi, kuko papa wanje yakorana na se wa Bernard muri Nakaranga, n'aho bamaze gukukuruka". Se wiwe, Mijuriro Mathias yararirimvye indirimbo abatari bake bibuka nk'izitwa "Abanywa inzoga twaragowe", "Mariya Makurata", "Akarimi", "Musore uri muhira", n'izindi. Alfred Nyandwi yabwiye BBC ko batanguye kuvuza umuziki bari hamwe mu mwaka wa 1998 mu gihe bari bahungiye mu gisagara kubera intambara z'urutavanako zari iwabo mu Gishingano. Avuga ko batanguye kuririmbira mw'ibarabara mu ntumbero yo kurondera ingene bobaho inyuma y'aho ibintu vyabo binyagiwe, n'amazu yabo akabomorwa n'intambara. Ati:  "Ariyo mpamvu twaciye dufata umwuga wo kuririmbira mw'ibarabara, tuvugiriza abantu mw'ibarabara kugira ngo baduhe udufaranga, eka mbere twaranavugiriza n'indya kugira ngo dushobore kubaho". Avuga ko babaye muri ubwo buzima mu kiringo kitari gito, gushika aho buke buke batangura kuza baraja kuvugiriza mu bunywero mu bibanza bikomakomeye vy'i Bujumbura cane cane biri ku nkengera y'ikiyaga Tanganyika, nka za Saga Plage, Petit Bassam n'ahandi. Ati: "Aho hose twavugiriza mu bubare tuvugiriza ingenzi, abantu bari mu karuhuko bakaduha udufaranga duke duke, maze tugashobora kuronka ico dutanga mu miryango yacu kuko twari tukiri abana". "Twatanguye turi nk'abantu bita aba 'mendiants', ba ntahonikora". Alfred avuga ko batanguye kwinjira muri Studio mu 2006, babifashijwemwo na Tanganyika Studio, baca bategura urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwabaye rurangiranwa biciye cane cane mu maradiyo. Urwo rukurikirane rwiswe NKUNDABANTU  rwabatumye bamenyekana cane, runabashikana mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo za DR Congo, Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, Uganda, Kenya, Cameroun, Benin, Tchad,  Chine na  Brésil. Bernard apfuye be na mugenziwe Alfred bariko bategura gusohora urukurikirane rwabo rwa kabiri bari barahejeje gutunganya, bise BIRATANGAJE, bakaba bategura kurusohora muri uno mwaka wa 2020. Nta wuramenya icamwishe ariko Alfred avuga ko yari amaze ikiringo c'amezi umunani agendana indwara, akaba yapfuye ejo ku wa gatandatu bamutwaye kwa muganga.

headline: C﻿rimea: Ivyishimo n'ubwoba muri Ukraine inyuma y'iturika ry'ikiraro
text: U﻿kraine iri mu munezero kubera ivyo vyabaye kuri ico kiraro. A﻿mavideo y'ico kiraro co muri Crimee cononekaye yarakwiragiye nk'umuriro wa Nyakanga ku mbuga hwaniro; ubu bikaba bigereranywa nk'iyibira ry'ubwato bw'intambara bw'Uburusiya bwa Moskva mu kwezi kwa kane. U﻿mushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe kwivuna abansi yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter ati:"Ubwato butera misile Moskva n'ikiraro ca Kertch - ibimenyetso bibiri vy'ubuhangange bw'Uburusiya mu ntara ya Crimee muri Ukraine - vyasenyutse." Yabandanije agira ati"﻿N'uwuhe murongo ukurikira, Russkies? I﻿mpirimbanyi zo ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi zo muri Ukraine, mu kamwemwe kenshi ziriko zirashirakwiragiza ibishushanyo vyo kwigina ivyo vyabaye. H﻿anyuma banke igira kabiri mu bunini muri Ukraine, Monobank, ivuga ko yasohoye ikarata nshasha yo kubikuza amahera iriko ico kiraro cakorotse. Oleksii Danilov, umunyamabanga w'akanama kajejwe umutekano muri Ukraine, si we wenyene yabonye ko ico gitero cabaye inyuma y'umus umwe gusa  Vladimir Putin ashikanye imyaka 70, aho yashize kuri tweetter video y'ico kiraro cononekaye iruhande y'indirimbo ya Marilyn Monroe yipfuriza isabukuru nziza prezida. U﻿munezero uragaragara. I﻿nyuma y'indwi zitari nke z'inkuru nziza ziva ku rubuga rw'intambara, aho ingabo za Ukraine zibandanya kwisubiza uturere twari twigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu kwezi kwa kabiri n'ukwa gatatu, kubona ico kiraro  kitariko kirakora kiriko kiranasha vyongereza icizere. I﻿vyo vyashitse gute? Hari ibivugwa vyinshi - igikorwa c'ingabo zidasanzwe za Ukraine muri Crimee, igitero ca misile canke ikibombe c'umwiyahuzi. U﻿wahoze ari umuhinga ku bintu biturika mu gisirikare c'Ubwongereza yagize ati:"N'igikorwa c'ubwononyi cinyegeje." A﻿ti:"Bishobora kuba ari igitero giteguwe neza co musi y'ico kiraro." A﻿bategetsi ba Ukraine nta vyinshi babivugako, mu kamwemwe ko gutuma haba amadidane nk'ayakurikiye igitero cakozwe ku kibuga c'indege c'Uburusiya muri Crimee mu kwezi kw'umunani. A﻿riko ibitero ku kibuga ca Saky no kuri ico kiraro bifise intumbero imwe: Kubuza Uburusiya gukoresha Crimee mu gutera ubumanuko bwa Ukraine.

headline: Igisagara ca Lyman kiri mu minwe y’Uburusiya kiragoswe cose, niko Ukraine ivuga
text: Serhiy Cherevatyi, umuvugizi w’ingabo za Ukraine mu buseruko, avuga ko umurwi munini w’ingabo z’Uburusiya i Lyman "wagoswe" kandi n’uturere turi mu micungararo  y’iki gisagara ko twabohojwe. Yabwiye imboneshakure yo muri Ukraine ati “ibiharuro dufise bitwereka ko ingabo z’Uburusiya ziri hagati ya 5000 na 5500 zari i Lyman”, ariko ko iki gitigiri ubu cagabanutse kubera “intambara ziheruka” aho abasirikare b’Uburusiya “benshi” bishwe canke barakomereka. Cherevatyi avuga ko amayeri yose ingabo z’Uburusiya zakoresheje kugira zirabe ingene zokwigobotora “yanse”. Avuga kandi ko mu gihe Lyman yoramuka ibohojwe n’ingabo za Ukraine yozifasha gutera zisatira Kreminna na Severodonetsk, vyompi bikaba ari ibirindiro kirumara ku ngabo z’abarusiya. "Ni ikintu kandi gikomeye cane mu bikorwa vyacu kuko  - nk’uko Perezida Zelensky yabivuze ejo – ingabo za Ukraine ziratanguye gutegeko uko zishaka ko ibintu bimera – ntabwo ari ukwivuna gusa”. Aheraheza avuga ko igikorwa ca gisirikare kitararangira. Ibintu bigenda bihinduka ku muvuduko udasanzwe mu micungararo ya Lyman mu ntara ya Donetsk iri mu buseruko. Hasohotse videwo isa n’iyerekana abasirikare ba Ukraine baduza ibendera rya Ukraine kw’irembo ry’iki gisagara, aho ibihumbi vy’ingabo z’Uburusiya zivugwa ko zugaraniwe. Muri iyi videwo – yerekanywe n’umukuru w’ibiro vya Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky, Andriy Yermak – abasirikare babiri bumvikana bavuga mu rurimi rw’ikinya-Ukraine ngo: "[Uno musi] igenekerezo rya 1 Gitugutu. Turazinguruye ibendera ry’igihugu cacu turishize ku butaka bwacu. "Lyman. Yose izoba iya Ukraine", niko bavuga, bashimira imirwi y’abarwanyi ba Ukraine. Ingabo z’Uburusiya muri aka karere zasavye abazirongoye ko zova muri ico gisagara – ariko aka kamo kamiriwe kure, nk’uko umutegetsi wo hejuru wa Ukraine abivuga. Umukuru w’intara ya Luhansk Serhiy Haidai avuga ko ubu ingabo z’Uburusiya zisigaranye inzira zibiri gusa: Kugerageza kwicira inzira canke kwishikana. Haidai yongerako y’uko amayira hafi yose yo guhunga canke kubashikanira vya nkenerwa nk’amasasu i Lyman ubu adahita. Hagati aho, ibi avuga ntibirashobora guhinyuzwa. Ejo ku wa gatanu Denis Pushilin, umukuru w’intara ya Donetsk  yashizweho n’Uburusiya, yavuze ko  Lyman yari "yakikujwe igice " kandi ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zariko zirwanako “n’inguvu zazo zose zisigaranye”. Kuva bwigaruriye Lyman mu mpera z’ukwa gatanu, ingabo z’Uburusiya zahinduye iki gisagara kiri mu ntara ya Donetsk nk’ikirindiro gikomeye kizoshikiramwo ingabo zirungikwa ku rugamba hamwe n’ibikoresho vya gisirikare. Iki gisagara kandi ni igituro gikomeye c’ibarabara ry’indarayi, rifatanya intara za Donetsk, Luhansk na Kharkiv mu buseruko no mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine. Ingabo z’Uburusiya zababa 5000 zishobora kuba muri uno mwanya zugaraniwe i Lyman,  kandi mu gihe Ukraine yoyibohoza rwoba ari urundi ruhombo rukomeye rwa gisirikare ku Burusiya kuva iyi ntambara itanguye ku wa 24 z’ukwa kabiri. Vyofasha kandi ingabo za Ukraine gukubura burundu igice c’uburaruko bw’intara ya Donetsk no gutera zisugereza intara ya Luhansk bihana urubibe. Ukraine ivuga ko ingabo zayo zamaze kwigarurira ibigwati bibiri biri mu micungararo ya Lyman. Mu cegeranyo c’igendereza bwama butanga ku bijanye n’ingene ibintu bimeze muri Ukraine, ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza buvuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya “ata gukekeranya cane” zateye imodoka z’ubutabazi ejo – mu gitero Ukraine ivuga ko ciciwemwo abantu n’imiburiburi 30 bari mu modoka za gisivire. Igisasu cakoreshejwe muri ico gitero cari “igisasu ca misire co gukingira ikirere kandi kirasa kure, kikaba cakoreshejwe mu bitero vyo hasi”, nk’uko itangazo ry’ubu bushikiranganji ribivuga. Ryongerako y’uko ububiko bw’Uburusiya bw’ibisasu vyo muri ubu bwoko ari buto, ko rero ari ukubikoresha iyo bikenewe, mu gukorora indege canke za misire, hako bikoreshwa mu ntambara yo hasi. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ikoreshwa ry’ibi bisasu ku mu ntambara yo hasi vyerekana ko amasasu ariko arahera, cane cane za misire zidahusha zirasa kure. Iki gitero cabaye mu ntara ya Zaporizhzhia iherutse gutangazwa na Vladimir Putin ko ari igice c’ubutaka bw’Uburusiya, aho hri ejo.

headline: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
text: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

headline: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 24-30 Ukwezi kw'icenda 2021
