text: Amwe mu mafoto ya mbere meza yo muri Africa n'ahandi. Amasanamu yose ategerezwa kwitirirwa nyeneyo.

headline: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Gusangira icumba n'abapfuye – amahano mu micungararo ya Chernihiv
text: Ku ruhome rutose rw'icumba co munsi c'ishure rya Yahidne hari ikirangaminsi, gicafye n'ingwa itukura. Cerekana  ikiringo c'ihahamuka risiga ubwenge - kuva itariki 5 Ntwarante (ukwezi kwa gatatu) gushika itariki  2 Ndamukiza (ukwa kane) - ku bantu bo muri iki kigwati. Yahidne, ku birometero 140 mu buraruko bwa Kyiv mu nkengera z'igisagara ca Chernihiv cegereye ku rubibe rwa Belarus n'Ubusuriya, carifatiwe n'Abarusiya mu kiringo gishika hafi ukwezi. Igihe binjira, bafashe abagabo, abagore n'abana babakura mu ngo zabo bafatiye inkoho ku gakanu babajana mu cumba co munsi kw'ishure ryo ngaho babamazayo amayinga ane -bashika abantu 130 barundanye mu cumba kingana na metero kwadarato 65 mu bunini (hafi y'imetero 7 kuri 9). Mykola Klymchuk, w'imyaka 60, yari umwe muri bo. Yemeye kuja kutwereka ico cumba co munsi barimwo. Igihe twariko turururuka ingazi nkeya zijayo, twatanguye kwumva umunuko w'indwara n'ukubora. Ico cumba cari gicafuye - imatera, impuzu, ibirato, n'ibitabo vyari vyandagaye hasi, hagati na hagati hari udutanda tune bazinga n'akantu ko kubikamwo ibikoresho vyo mu gikoni mu mfuruka. Mykola yadushikanye hirya ku mpera y'ico cumba. Avuga ati: "Aha hangana na metero imwe nico cari ikibanza canje. Naryama mpagaze." Ijwi ryaranizwe aca atangura kurira. "Nibohera ku mitambikwa nkoresheje igisikafu kugirango simpave ngwa. Namaze amajoro 25 gutyo." Mykola avuga ko atikoma na gato kubera yatinya guhonyora ku bandi. Hari abana bari hagati ya 40 na 50 muri abo bantu bari bagizwe imbohe, harimwo n'inzoya. Uwukiri muto cane yari afise amezi abiri. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zaranyarutse cane mu gukwira ibigwati nka Yahidne igihe zariko ziragaba igitero kuri Chernihiv. Mu kiringo c'amayinga ane, ico gisagara c'abantu 300.000 cari cugaranywe mu gihe ingabo z'Uburisiya zari zagikikuje zigisukako amabombe, ingabo za Ukraine nazo zihagararako. Zaranasambuye ikiraro kw'ibarabara  rija ku murwa mukuru Kyiv, bituma abahaba batagira iyo bashobora guhungira. Ubu abarusiya barahavuye kuko batashoboye gufata Kyiv, BBC yabaye mu binyamakuru vya mbere vyashitse muri ako karere aho agahomerabubnwa k'ivyabaye mu gihe co kuhifatira no gutera amabombe ubu gashobora kwerekanwa. Hafi y'urubibe, abantu bafise umutima uhagaze ko abarusiya  bashobora kugaruka vuba. Anastasiia, w'imyaka 15, yari mu cumba co munsi (basement/sous-sol) muri Yahidne ari kumwe na se na inakuru. Avuga ati: "Nta saganirizo twari dufise. Twabaho duhagaze. Twaryama duhagaze. Ntitwaryama namba. Ntivyashoboka. Iruhande y'aha hose haguma hagwa ibisasu. Kari akaga." Muri ico cumba nta kayaga kahita. Amadirisha abiri yaco yari yazibijwe ibibaho. Mykola ati: "Mu minsi  namaze ngaha, hapfuye abantu 12." Benshi muri bo bari abageze mu zabukuru. Ntibizwi neza icabishe, ariko Mykola yibaza ko vyanse ko bahema gushika aho baruha bagapfa. Iyo hagize abapfa, ibiziga vyabo ntivyaca bivanwa ngaho ubwo nyene. Abasirikare b'Uburusiya ntibavyemera iminsi yose. Kandi kubera intambara yari urutavanako hanze - ibisasu vya muzinga, ibiturika hamwe n'amasasu - kuja hanze kwaba ari ukwiheba. Ivyo bisigura ko abantu, barimwo n'abana, baguma hagati y'ibiziga mu kiringo c'amasaha rimwe na rimwe mbere n'iminsi, gushika bishoboye kujanwa hanze. Anastasiia avuga ati: "Vyari biteye ubwoba cane. Abantu bapfuye nari ndabazi. Badufata neza cane. Narababaye cane. Barapfuye kandi ata mpamvu." "Mu bihe bisanzwe, ntibari kuba bapfuye. Putin akora ivyaha vyo mu ntambara", ivyo navyo bivugwa na Mykola. "Ibirenge vyanje vyari vyatanguye kuvyimba. Ariko naguma nibaza nti, ntegerezwa kumara kabiri. Ntegerezwa, ku neza y'umukobwa wanje n'abazukuru b'abakobwa babiri." Ahanini abantu ntibemererwa kuja ahabona, n'aho hoba kuja ku kazu ka surwumwe (ku musarani). Ahubwo bari basigaye bituma mu ndobo. Mykola ati: "Rimwe na rimwe abasirikare barajana abantu hanze kugira babakoreshe nk'inkinzo." Baremererwa guteka ku mashiga hanze kabiri ku munsi. Ikigwati cari gifise indya zikwiye mu bubiko hamwe n'ikinogo co kuvomamwo amazi. Umwe mu basirikare b'Uburusiya yabwiye Mykola ko bari babwiwe ko muri Ukraine bari kuhamara iminsi itarenga ine, kuko iyo ngo yari kuba ikwiye kugira babe bafashe Kyiv. Itariki 3 Ndamukiza (ukwa 4) abarusiya baravuye muri Yahidne. Abasirikare ba Ukraine ubu bari muri ico kigwati,  ubu benshi mu bari baragizwe imbohe bimuriwe mu tundi turere hafi y'aho. Anastasiia ati: "Mw'ijoro nikangura kenshi cane. Numva umenga ndiko ndumva urwamo rwo kurasa. Nca niruka iyo abavyeyi bari, ubwoba bunyishe." Abarusiya bifatiye ibigwati nka Yahidne bikikuje Chernihiv kugira bugarane ico gisagara hanyuma amaherezo bagifate. Ntibashoboye kwinjira ico gisagara, ariko hasambuwe vyinshi cane mu bice vyinshi vyaco, kandi abategetsi bavuga ko abantu b'abasivire bashika 350 bishwe. Kuva abarusiya bavuye mu micungararo ya Chernihiv, abakorerabushake bariko barahamba abapfuye. Uruhande rumwe rw'akaburi (irimbi) ko ngaho ubu rwuzuye imva nshasha, imwe imwe yose ugasanga ishinzeko ikimenyetso, kugira hamenyekane uwahahambwe. Imiryango yari yaratatanye ija iraza kuraba ko yobona imva z'abayo. Ikibuga c'umupira w'amaguru c'aho caratewe bombe. Ubu hagati mu kibuga hari ikinogo kinini aho iyo bombe yaguye. Iyindi yaguye ku gice kimwe c'aho abantu bicara, ubu hari urusobekerane rw'ibivunji vy'intebe za plastic n'ivyuma vy'uruzitiro. Uvuye kw'ico kibuga, hakurikira icumba c'ibitabo vy'abana cari mu nyubakwa ya kahise nayo yononekaye cane. Igihe twariko turaca muri ico gisagara n'imodoka, twarenganye uduce twinshi tw'aho abantu bahora baba ubu hafi amazu yose asigaye ari hasi. Ahitwa Novoselivka mu buraruko bwa Chernihiv, amaso arakwereka ingene ibintu vyasambuwe. Ibirundo vy'amabuye n'amatafari nivyo biri ahategerezwa kuba hahora amazu. Twabonye agakoti k'imbeho k'umwana gasa na rose, igipupe, inzovu ikozwe mu mpuzu, n'ibivunji vy'ibikinisho vya Lego ku nzira twariko turacamwo tugana aho abantu baba. Kuri iyo nzira twahabonye ibindi binogo vyinshi vyimburuwe n'amabombe. Umugore umwe n'umwana bari ku makinga batugiriye ikimenyetso c'uko twobakurikira. Nina Vynnyk, w'imyaka 62, na Danylo, umwuzukuru wiwe w'umuhungu w'imyaka 10, bashaka kutwereka inzu yabo - ubu isigaye ari igisambasaka, ibintu vyose muri yo n'iruhande yayo vyarasambuwe. Umukobwa wa Nina ari we nyina wa Danylo, Ludmyla w'imyaka 39, yaracitse ukuguru ubu akaba ari mu bitaro. Igihe inzu ya Nina yatangura guterwa amabombe, baciye biruka bahungira ku nzu y'umubanyi bizeye kwiyinyegeza mu cumba co hasi cayo. Ariko nayo yaratewe bombe. Avuga ati: "Twahwikiwe n'ikibombe gituritse. "Umwe yagize igipfupfuri mu mutwe, uwundi arakomereka. Tumaze  gutora ubwenge, naciye mbona umukobwa wanje ariko araboroga, 'Mama, mama nta kuguru mfise'. Vyari biteye ubwoba." Ludmyla yaciye yavura arashika aho ashobora kwikinga hanyuma ajanwa mu bitaro. Nina avuga ati: "Numva  ko ari nko kurazirana ibintu bibi cane. Ntibishobora kuba ari vyo. Kubera iki reta yacu itatugabishije? Kuki bataduhungishije?" Iyo nzu yari igeze ku runganwe rwa kane ibamwo abantu. Ati: "None mu kanya gato, nta na kimwe gisigaye. Sinzi iyo nzoja kuba mu gihe c'ubukonje." Nta buryo afise bwo kurihira umukobwa wiwe ukuguru kw'uguterano. Ku bivugwa n'Ubususiya ko batigeze barondera kugirira nabi abanyagihugu basanzwe, avuga ati: "[Putin] Yuzuye ikinyoma. Hari umugore yacitse ukuguru ubu ari mu bitaro. Ivyo ni ukuri. "Putin ni aze arihe amafaranga yo kumuvuza. Putin naze atwubakire iyi nzu. Yarayishaka cane, si vyo? Ni aze rero ayirihe yose." Andi makuru kuri iyi nkuru yatererewe n'abamenyeshamakuru Imogen Anderson, Anastasiia Levchenko na Daria Sipigina.

headline: China igabisha UK ku gico cayo c'ubwato bw'intambara ivuga ko buriko buravogera ico gihugu ca Asia
text: Ubushinwa buragabisha umurwi w'amato w'intambara y'Ubwongereza (Carrier Strike Group), aherekejwe n'ubwato bw'intambara  HMS Queen Elizabeth, ko atohirahira ngo akore "ibikorwa bitabereye" mu gihe yinjiye mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa (Mer de Chine méridionale/ South China Sea) isanzwe iri mu mpari. "Igisirikare c'Ubushinwa kirwanira mu mazi, People's Liberation Army Navy kirameze magabo", nk'uko bivugwa na Global Times, ikinyamakuru  co mu Bushinwa cegamiye reta, gisanzwe gifatwa nk'umuvugizi w'umugambwe  Chinese Communist Party (CCP) urongoye ico gihugu. Ubushinwa bubandanya bukurikiranira hagufi aya mato y'intambara Carrier Strike Group, ubu ariko arajabuka inyanja y'Ubushinwa atera aja mu Buyapani, bukagiriza Ubwongereza ko "bucitwara nk'uko bukiri mu gihe c'ubukoloni". Igisirikare c'Ubwongereza kirwanira mu mazi, Royal Navy, kimaze igihe gikora imyimenyerezo kiri kumwe n'igisirikare kirwanira mu mazi ca Singapour, umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe kwivuna abansi akaba adahisha umugambi wo gukorera imyimenyerezo yise "Freedom of Navigation" muri iyi nyanja y'Ubushinwa. Ubushinwa bubandanya buvuga ko iki gice c'inyanja ari igice cabwo, ibiteye kubiri n'ingingo ya sentare mpuzamakungu yo mu 2016, bukaba bubandanya bwubakamwo ibigwa n'amabarabara, bimwe bikubakwa hafi y'uturere tw'inyanja twegukira ibihugu bibanyi. Amato y'intambara ya Amerika n'ayo Ubwongereza aherutse gusotora Ubushinwa kubera ivyo buvuga ko iyi nyanja ibwegukira, mu kuyicamwo n'ibigirankana. Rero ikibazo kihari ni iki: hazohava haba ibisa n'ugukozanyako bisa n'ivyabaye mu Nyanja yirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) mu kwa gatandatu igihe ubwato bw'Ubwongereza HMS Defender bwavyongwa n'indege z'intambara z'Uburusiya igihe bwaca hafi y'ikigwa giteye ibibazo ca Crimée/Crimea? Veerle Nouwens, umwe mu bashakashatsi bakuru mu kigo c'ubushakashatsi mu Bwongereza, Royal United Services Insitute (Rusi), agira ati: "Ubushinwa ntibushaka guhangana mu buryo bweruye n'incuti ikomeye ya Amerika mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa. Ariko uko vyogenda kwose, buzotegerezwa kwerekana imigambi yabwo". Mu gihe Ubwongereza bwokora imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri iyo nyanja, umupfasoni Nouwens abona ko dushobora kubona ivyabaye mu 2018 bisubira, igihe ubwato HMS Albion bwaca muri iyo nyanja. Bwarasugerejwe cane n'ubwato bw'intambara bw'Ubushinwa gushika ku metero 200, bubugabisha ko bwohava, mu gihe indege y'intambara y'Ubushinwa yariko igendera hafi cane hejuru y'ubu bwato bw'Ubwongereza. Ubushinwa buriko bukorera imyimenyerezo ikomeye muri ako karere muri ino ndwi, bwimenyereza kurwanira ku mweha, ivyateye ubwoba bamwe mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko buriko bwitegurira gutera Taiwan. Igisirikare c'Ubushinwa kirwanira mu mazi kizofatira kuri ubu bwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza mu mazi y'inyanja y'Ubushinwa "nk'akaryo ko kwimenyereza no kwiga neza ibijanye n'ubu bwato bw'intambara bwa none bw'Ubwongereza ", nk'uko ikinyamakuru Global Times kibivuga. Ariko, n'aho umuzo w'ubu bwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza watumye Pekin/Beijing ishikiriza amajambo y'uburakari, umushakashatsi akorana na Rusi idharth Kaushal, avuga ko iyo bishitse hakaba icuka kibi mu bijanye n'ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu nyanja, "Ubushinwa bwibanda ku bikorwa bisanzwe bidashobora gutuma ibintu biyangara ngo habe ukurasana". Irungikwa ry'ubwato HMS Queen Elizabeth hamwe n'ubundi bubuherekeje mu buseruko bwa Aziya rifatwa nk'igikorwa ca reta y'Ubwongereza co kwongereza uruhara rwabwo mu bijanye n'umutekano kw'isi, nk'uko biri mu nteguro nshasha ya reta y'Ubwongereza mu bijanye na poritike mpuzamakungu, y'umutekano, kwivuna abansi n'iterambere. Ubufaransa, co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu vy'Ubulayi, bimaze imisi bihanze amaso iyi nyanja y'Ubushinwa mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bwongereza inguvu za gisirikare n'ubutunzi ku muvuduko udashobora guhagarikwa. Ubushinwa buherutse gutangura umugambi wo kwongereza ibisasu vy'ubumara, mu kwubaka ikigo gishasha kizokwubakwamwo ibigega (silos) vy'ibisasu vy'ubumara mu karere ka Xinjiang kari mu misozi. Bumaze kandi igihe bukora misire zinyaruka cane zishobora gusumba umuvuduko w'ijwi kugera ku ncuro umunani , ziwe "ruhonyanganda".

headline: ‘Buri mukobwa aho ari hose akwiye gukoresha impano Imana yamuhaye’ – Emmanuella
text: Emmanuella Rukundo, umwigeme w'umunyeshure w'umurundikazi yabaye rurangiranwa mu guhiganwa kw'ikinga, atera akamo abandi bigeme kumenya impano bafise bakazikoresha. Ku myaka 18 gusa, Emmanuella yihaye ikibanza mu bagore/abakobwa bahiganwa ku makinga ahereye mu gihugu ciwe, Uburundi. Ubu mu mahiganwa, yaba ayo hagati canke mpuzamakungu, aramaze kwandika izina muri Afrika. Ati: "Nta muntu aba azi ikizomushikana aho ashaka gushika canke ikizomubeshaho, rero umwana w'umwigeme afise impano iyo ari yo yose n'ayikoreshe uko Imana yayimuhaye, izogira aho imushinaye". Emmanuella Rukundo avuka ku mutumba wa Murima mu ntara ya Kayanza. Yatanguye kuja mu mahiganwa yo kunyonga ikinga mu 2018 afise imyaka 14 yonyene. Kuva ico gihe, amaze gushika mu mahiganwa atandukanye hagati mu gihugu, atabaye uwa mbere aba uwa kabiri. Avuga ko yigiye kunyonga ikinga kuri se wiwe, arabimenyera gushika aho ashika ku rwego rwo guhiganwa. Yatanguye kuja mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu mu gihugu ca Misiri mu kwa gatatu 2021, aho yahejeje ari mu kibanza ca gatandatu. Ati: "Bwari ubwa mbere, naratinye, ntivyari vyorose. Bwari n'ubwa mbere ndiko mpiganwa n'abandi tudasangiye urukoba, tudasangiye  ururimi, imico, inguvu n'uburambe. Vyaranteye ubwoba ariko ubu narabimenyereye kuko narabonye ko ari abantu nkatwe". Ryari ihiganwa ryahuje abantu bava mu bihugu 40, Rukundo akavuga ko ryamubereye akaryo kadasanzwe kuko yahigiye vyinshi. "Narabigiyeko cane kuko hariho ubuhinga usanga bafise twebwe tudafise. Narabonye aho nkeneye gukosora kuko nahuye n'abana batoya cane bansize cane rwose, nca mbona ko ico bansumvya ari ukwitanga, imyimenyerezo no gukunda ikinga. "Rero nanje ubu ndakora uko nshoboye, nkitanga, kandi ngakunda ikinga ryanje". Mu Misiri gusa, Emmanuella amaze kwitabira amahiganwa mpuzamakungu ashika ane. Rukundo ni we munyonzi w'ikinga wenyene amaze kuronka imfashanyo yo kuja kwiga hanze, imfashanyo y'ishirahamwe rijejwe inkino za olempike ku rwego rw'igihugu mu Burundi. "Si twebwe twamuhisemwo, niwe yihaye ikibanza kuko ari we ari imbere y'abandi muri ubwo bunonotsi. Noneho si mu bahiganwa ku makinga gusa, kuko no mu zindi nkino, abarusha abandi bararonse iyo mfashanyo iganisha gukomeza ubumenyi", nk'uko Lydia Nsekera arongoye ishirahamwe Olempike ryo mu Burundi,  CNO, yabibwiye BBC. Emmanuella abona ko bizomubera akaryo keza ko gutera imbere muri uru rwego, na rirya yiteze ko azohura n'abandi banonotsi bakomeye, akabigirako. Ati: "Ibi vyampaye inguvu kuko mbona ko bizomfasha kugira aho nshobora gushika, kuko ushigikiwe urashika kure". Hampande y'ishirahamwe olempike mu Burundi, Emmanuella arashimira abavyeyi biwe uko bamufata mu mugongo, mbere akemeza ko ari bo batumye agera aho ageze.

headline: Hari ibifungurwa bishobora kugabanya imyaka yawe yo kubaho n'ukukwononera amagara
text: Urashobora kuvuga ubudasa buri hagati y'ibifungurwa bihingurwa buke buke n'ibindi vyaciye mu mahinguriro cane? Burya birateye ikibazo? Ijambo 'guhingura ibifungurwa'  rifise insiguro mbi muri iki gihe ca vuba, hari ivyigwa vyakozwe mu Bufaransa no muri Espagne vyerekana ko izo mfungurwa ataco zongera mu mubiri kandi zituma umuntu agabanya igihe co kubaho. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko abantu barya ibifungurwa bitegurigwa  mu mahinguriro incuro zine ku musi mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi bafise impungenge zo gupha zigera  kuri  mirongo itandatu na kabiri kw'ijana ugereranije n'abandi bafungura agace kamwe canke dukeyi ku musi. Izindi ngaruka mbi z'ibifungurwa bitekeye bikorerwa mu mahinguriro ni urugero runini rwo kugwara umutima canke uguhagara kw'umutima canke isanganya ry'udutsi dusoza ubwenge  bivuye ku ngwara y'umurindi w'amaraso urenze. Naho biruko, mu bihugu bimwe nk'Ubwongereza, abanyagihugu baronka ivyunyunyu birenga mirongo itanu kw'ijana biva ku bifungurwa bikorerwa mu mahinguriro. None twomenya gute ibifungurwa biteye ubwoba tugaheza tukamenya gafungura neza? Biragoye kumenya ibibigize rimwe na rimwe: Ibifungurwa nk'umukate n'iforomaje vyose bifatwa ko bitegurigwa mu mahinguriro ariko ntibitanga impanuka zimwe ku buzima. Igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kaminuza ya Sao Paulo muri Bresile gishira ibifungurwa mu migwi ine. Iyi migwi iva ku bifungurwa bidahingurwa gushika ku bihingurwa cane. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ibifungurwa bidahingurwa na gato canke bihingurwa buke buke imbere yo gufungurwa, bigizwe n'ingaburo nk'amavitamine, ivyorosha mu nda n'ivyunyunyu. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ivyamwa bihiye, ibibogaboga, ibiyoba, intete, ibiharage, n'ibindi bifungurwa biva mu bikoko nk'amagi, amafi n'amata. Ibifungurwa vyahinduwe gatoyi bishobora kuba vyumye, vyoroshe cane , bishuhije buke buke ,  bikanye canke   ariko bitarimwo ibirungo. Murivyo harimwo kandi ivyamwa n'ibibogaboga bibisi, ifi mbisi  n'amata akanye  bizwi neza ko bitagiramwo isukari, amata, ipiripiri hamwe n'ibiboga vyumye. Ibifungurwa bitekeshejwe ibirungo harimwo amavuta, ayavyibusha nk'ayinka, vinegeri, isukari n'umunyu. Ntibivuga ko ibifungurwa nk'ivyo biribwa ukwavyo canke ari vyinshi cane, ariko kenshi biriribwa mu mugwi w'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa bigizwe kenshi n'umugwi wongerwamwo ikirungo kimwe canke bibiri. Murivyo harimwo ibibabugwa nk'inyama y'impene, ingurube, umukate, ibiyoba birimwo umunyu canke isukari, ivyamwa birimwo inzoga cankeumuvinyu. Intumbero nyamukuru yo guhingura ibifungurwa ni kwongereza ikiringo bishobora kumara canke gukomeza akanovera cavyo. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa cane kenshi na kenshi birimwo ibirungo utoshobora kwongeramwo uri muhira uriko urabitegura. Ntushobora kubimenya amazina yavyo kubera birimwo ubumara, biriko amabara, ubusose canke ibindi bibikingira. Vyinshi mu bifungurwa bihingurwa cane biribwa n'abantu baba mu mu bihugu bitunze cane kw'isi ni: Igihe cose raba inyandiko ziri  ku gifungurwa: ibirungo bitandukanye na cane cane mugihe ibintu bikoreshwa mu mahinguriro akora ibifungurwa ategerezwa kwandika ko ibifungurwa vyahinguwe cane. Urwo rwandiko rushobora kubako ibirungo vyakoreshejwe birenga nka bitanu, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwigisha wa Kaminuza Maira Bes-Rastrollo, ari mu bakoze ico cigwa. Ibirungo bitaboneka bishobora kuba bihindura akanovera k'ico  gifungurwa. Vyinshi murivyo nta ngorane bitera ariko biravugwa ko bifise ingaruka mbi. Ni ukuraba neza ivyanditseko  ko vyerekana urugero rw'ivyunyunyu bivyibusha, isukari, ko umunyu ari  mwinshi, ugereranye canke ari mukeyi. Iyi nkuru yateguwe n'igisata ca BBC kijejwe ivy'ibifungurwa.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa Mungu: Zidane, Ancelotti, Messi, Pogba, Holgate, Koulibaly
text: Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Zinedine Zidane yabwiye abakinyi biwe ko azova muri uyu murwi mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uwu mwaka. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Everton Carlo Ancelotti n'uwahoze amenyereza Juventus Massimiliano Allegri ni bamwe mu bariko barihwezwa ko bosubirira Zidane mu gihe yova muri uyu murwi. (Sunday Mirror) Manchester City yabwiwe ko ishobora kugura umusatirizi wa Barcelona  umunya Argentina Lionel Messi w'imyaa 33, mu gihe yokwemera kumuhemba ibihumbi 500 vy'ama pawundi ku ndwi ata makori arimwo, ni ukuvuga ibihumbi birenga 700 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun on Sunday) Manchester United irashaka ko umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28 asinya ayandi masezerano ariko ikagira ubwoba ku mushahara umuserukizi wiwe Mino Raiola, ariko aramuronderera. (Sunday Mirror) Everton iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Mason Holgate w'imyaka 24 kugira ngo ishobore kwegeranya amafaranga yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w'imyaka  29 asanzwe akina muri Napoli. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Lyon umunya Hollande Memphis Depay w'imyaka 27 ari hafi yo kwinjira muri  Barcelona. (L'Equipe - in French) Umusatirizi wa Pologne Robert Lewandowski w'imyaka 32 ariko akurikiranirwa hafi na Paris St-Germain kugira ngo imucakire mu gihe yofata ingingo yo kuva muri  Bayern Munich. (L'Equipe - in French) Liverpool nta mugambi ifise wo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Turukiya Ozan Kabak ngo imugumane burundu mu ci riza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 21 yagiye muri uyu murwi mu kwa kabiri uno mwaka ku ntizo avuye muri  Schalke. (Sun on Sunday) Arsenal ifise icizere ko ishobora gutsinda  Manchester City, mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza akina ku ruhande rw'inyuma i bubamfu, Ryan Bertrand w'imyaka 31, yiteze kuva muri Southampton mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo azoba arangiye mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uwu mwaka. (Mail on Sunday) Newcastle iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'imbere wa Leeds na Pays de Galles (Wales) Tyler Roberts w'imyaka 22. (Football Insider) West Ham niyo ifise amahirwe menshi yo kuronka umunyegori wa West Brom umwongereza  Sam Johnstone w'imyaka 28 asanzwe kandi ariko aronderwa na Tottenham. (Football Insider) Mu gihe atorohewe na gato, umumenyereza wa Barcelona Ronald Koeman yabonanye n'umukuru w'uyu murwi Joan Laporta, akavuga ko bazosubira kubonana mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uwu mwaka.  (Goal) Villarreal irafise amahirwe yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona umunya Bresil Emerson w'imyaka 22 asanzwe yaratijijwe muri Real Betis. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Real Madrid iripfuza kugura umuminyi wo hagati w'umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga asanzwe akina muri Rennes, ariko Arsenal na yo nyene ikaba yipfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 18. (Marca) Bayern Munich na Borussia Dortmund iriko irakurikirana umuminyi w'imbere wa  Sheffield United umwongereza yamuka muri Canada Daniel Jebbison w'imyaka 17 asanzwe akina mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 18.  (90 Min) Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatandatu

headline: USA: Prezida Donald Trump na NFL ntibumvikana mu kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru wa Amerika, National Football League, NFL,  rivuga ko abakinyi bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bwo kwerekana akababaro kabo mu gihe c'ururirimbo rw'igihugu, ni mu gihe imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko ibandanya. Roger Goodell arongoye iryo shirahamwe, avuga ati: "Kumbe twarihenze kubona twararwanije abakinyi ba NFL ntitunahimirize abantu kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko". Imbere y'aha, iryo shirahamwe NFL ryarihanije abakinyi gusubira gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko rurasamirana, umugirwa wari watangujwe n'umukinyi Colin Kaepernick mu 2016. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hitezwe imyiyerekano rukokoma mu gisagara ca Washington DC. Iyo myiyerekano iri mu rukurikirane rw'iyindi imaze iminsi mu gihugu cose yo kwiyamiriza igikenye n'amacakubiri vy'igipolisi, inyuma y'urupfu rwa George Floyd mu gisagara ca Minneapolis ku wa 25 z'ukwa gatanu guheze. Floyd, umwirabure yari yatewe amapingu, ata kirwanisho anafise, yarapfuye bivuye ku mupolisi yamusinzikarije ubuzima, aho yamupfukamye kw'izosi mu kiringo c'iminota hafi icenda. Uyo mupolisi yaragirijwe ubwicanyi mu gihe abandi bagenziwe batatu bagirijwe kumufasha icaha no gukokeza. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abategetsi ba Minneapolis bamenyesheje ko igipolisi kigiye kwihanizwa gusubira gufata umuntu mu kanigo, eka n'intara ya California nayo nyene ivuga ko igiye gufata iyo ngingo. Mw'ireresi yasohoye, Bwana Goodell yariyamirije ivanguramoko muri Amerika, inyuma y'aho abakinyi batari bake basabiye ishirahamwe NFL gufata ingingo ruhasha zo kwiyamiriza amacakubiri n'igikenye c'igipolisi mu gihugu. Ati: "Twebwe, Ishirahamwe ry'Umupira w'Amaguru, turemera ko ubuzima bw'umwirabure butegerezwa kwuhabihirwa. "Imyiyerekano iri mu gihugu yerekana imyaka ibinjana abakinyi, abafasha, abakunzi hamwe n'abakozi b'abirabure bamaze bahohoterwa kandi barenganywa kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma". "Ngiye kwama mbonana n'abakinyi biyamirije iyo ngendo hamwe n'abandi kugira ngo turabe ingene ibintu vyogenda neza". Perezida Donald Trump wewe siko avyumva, aho yiyamiriza bikomeye umugenzo wo gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa, mbere n'ejo ku wa gatanu akaba yarasubiye kwiyamiriza imyiyerekano nk'iyo. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, yanditse ati: "Ni ngombwa ko duhagarara neza kandi tukagororoka, bibaye ngombwa tukaramutsa canke tukifata ku mutima.  Hariho ivyo dushobora kwiyamiriza, ariko atari ibendera rikomeye rya Amerika". Yarananeguye n'umufasha w'umurwi New Orleans Saints mu vyo ubuhinga, Drew Brees, yirengagije akamo kiwe ko kubuza ivyo gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko rurasamirana. Uyu nawe ntiyavyihanganiye, aho yamwishuye ati: "Ni tureke kuba tuvuga ivy'ibendera twiyibagiza ibibazo nyavyo vy'akarenganyo n'ihohotera bishingiye ku rukoba, ubugome bw'igipolisi hamwe no gutunganya gushasha ibijanye n'ubutungane be n'amabohero". Ejo ku wa gatanu, ubutegetsi bwa Minneapolis hamwe n'igisata kijejwe kwubahiriza agateka ka muntu mu ntara ya Minnesota, barumvikanye kwihaniza igipolisi gusubira gufata mu kanigo abantu". Iyo ngingo nshasha, itegeka umupolisi uwo ari we wese, ata kuraba ipete afise, gutabariza mbere no gutabara, mu gihe azoba abonye mugenziwe asubiriye gukora ikintu nk'ico. Nayo umu democrate Gavin Newsom, buramatari  w'intara ya California, avuga ko agiye kubuza imyimenyerezo y'igipolisi yo gufata umuntu mu kanigo. Ibintu ntivyoroshe rero muri Amerika inyuma y'urupfu rw'umwirabure George Floyd rwatumye igihugu cose kirangwamwo imyiyerekano. Umucamanza w'igihugu mu gisagara ca Denver yategetse igipolisi kudasubira gutera abari mu myiyerekano vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi, amasasu ya plastiki eka n'ibindi birwanisho bitica ariko bibabaza. Iryo tegeko ryaje inyuma y'aho bane mu bari muri iyo myiyerekano bitwariye igipolisi ku gukoresha igikenye.

headline: Coronavirus: Abandura mu Bubirigi bashobora kuba nka 'tsunami'
text: Umwanya n'umwanya Ububirigi bushobora kurengerwa n'ibitigiri vy'abantu bashasha bandura coronavirus, nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu agabisha, mu gihe ibitigiri mu gihugu bigenda vyiyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba. Frank Vandenbroucke avuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura biri hafi y'ukuba "tsunami" mu gihe abategetsi "batagishoboye gukontorora ibiba mu gihugu". Ingingo nshasha zo kugerageza kuzitira ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera zatanguye kuja mu ngiro kuri uyu wa mbere. Ububare n'amazu y'uburiro birugaye mu kiringo c'indwi zine. Ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus ku mugabane wose w'Ubulayi biriko biraduga cane, ibi bikaba vyatumye ibihugu vyose vyo kuri uyu mugabane bisubira gufata ingingo zo kuzitira. Ejo ku wa Mungu, Ubutaliyano bwaraye bufashe ingingo ruhasha inyuma y'aho hibonekeje ibitigiri bitari bwaboneke vy'abandura ku munsi umwe, mu gihe ibisagara icenda bikuru bikuru mu Bufaransa navyo vyafatiwe ingingo zo kudasohoka mw'ijoro. Igihugu ca Repubulika y'aba Tcheques - igihugu gifise ibitigiri binini gusumba ibindi ku mugabane wose - kiriko kirihweza ingene cofata ingingo za guma mu rugo ku gihugu cose. Ububirigi kiri mu bihugu vyabangamiwe cane mu kiringo ca mbere ca coronavirus ku mugabane w'Ubulayi mu ntango z'uno mwaka. Muri rusangi, urugero rw'abahitanwa na covid muri ico gihugu rugira gatatu kw'isi ufatiye ku bantu 100.000, inyuma y'ibihugu vya Peru na San Marino, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vya kaminuza Johns Hopkins isanzwe ikurikiranira hagufi iyi ndwara. Kuva kuri uyu wa mbere, mu ngingo nshasha zafashwe na leta mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'iki kiza karanda kigarutse gushasha, abantu bazoba bemerewe kubonana n'umuntu umwe gusa hanze y'umuhana wabo kandi abo bishobokera bagakorera muhira. Kirazira ko hagira abasubira kwitembereza kuva isaha zitandatu z'ijoro gushika isaha cumi n'imwe z'igitondo mu kiringo c'ukwezi kuri imbere kandi urudandaza rw'inzoga rukaba ruhagaritswe kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro. Bwana Vandenbroucke avuga ko ingene ibintu bimeze ku mugwa mukuru Bruxelles hamwe no mu bumanuko bw'igihugu "ari akaga gakomeye ku mugabane wose w'Ubulayi". Yambwiye imboneshakure RTL ko Leta "ifise ubutumwa bumwe gusa ku banyagihugu: ikingire, ukingire n'abakunzi bawe, kugira ngo ntiwandure". Nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo c'Ububirigi kijejwe amagara y'abantu, Sciensano, mu minsi indwi iheze, hibonekeje abantu bangana na 7.876 bandura buri munsi mu Bubirigi, ibi bitigiri bikaba vyaduze ku rugero rungana n'ibice 79% ugereranije n'indwi y'imbere y'aho. Ku wa kabiri, leta yatangaje abantu 12.051 banduye mu masaha 24 yonyene, igitigiri kitari bwigere kibaho muri ico gihugu kuva iki kiza karanda cadutse. Abinjijwe ibitaro kubera covid-19 nabo nyene bariyongereye cane, aho ku wa mbere igitigiri cagera ku 2485. Abategetsi bagabisha ko mu gihe ibitigiri vyobandanya vyiyongera ku rugero biriko, ibitanda 2000 Ububirigi busanzwe bufise vyo kwakira indembe bishobora kuba vyuzuye gushika hagati mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Alexander De Croo yabwiye RTL ati: "Ibintu ni bibi cane gusumba kure cane ingene vyari bimeze ku wa 18 z'ukwa gatatu igihe hatangura gufatwa ingingo za guma mu rugo".

headline: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
text: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

headline: Denmark: Intwari zashoboye kurokora Christian Eriksen inyuma y'aho agwiriye mu kibuga nijoro
text: Ikinyamakuru kimwe co muri Denmark/Danemark candika kiti: "Danemark yaraye itsinzwe. Ariko ubuzima bw'umuntu bwaratsinze." Inyuma y'amaganya n'amarira vyaranze ijoro ryakeye, haje ihumure. Ihumure kubera Christian Eriksen - yaguye mu kibuga hasigaye akanya gato ngo igice ca mbere c'urukino rwahuza Danemark na Finlande mu mahiganwa ya euro 2020 - yahavuye ahembuka kandi akaba "ameze neza" aho ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro. Ihumure kandi, kuri bagenzibe bose babangutse kumutabara ku muvuduko udasanzwe. Umuvuduko ushobora kuba ari wo warokoye ubuzima bw'uyu yahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham. Turabire hamwe ingene ibintu vyagenze, n'ingene abakinyi bavyifashemwo mu gufasha Eriksen. Eriksen yaguye mu kibuga igihe yari agiye kwakira umupira wari usubijwe mu kibuga n'amaboko, isanganya ryateye ubwoba budasanzwe mu kibuga Parken Stadium i Copenhagen (umugwa mukuru wa Danemark). Kizigenza wa Denmark Simon Kjaer ari mu ba mbere baciye bamwegera basa n'abamuha akayaga. Ubwo nyene baciye babona ko ibintu ari bibi cane baca bihutira guhamagara abaganga. Amaze kugarura akenge, abakinyi bagenziwe baciye bakora umuzingi kugira bamunyegeze kugira ngo abarorerezi baharurwa mu 15.200 hamwe n'imiriyoni z'abariko bawurabira ku mboneshakure ntibagume babona ivyariko biraba. Benshi muri abo bakinyi - abenshi muri bo baraba hanze - bariko bakorora amosozi. Hari bamwe baboneka ko bariko barasenga. Henry Winter, umukuru w'igisata c'inkino mu kinyamakuru The Times, yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Nimba uzi abakinyi ba Danemark, aba si abagenzi gusa bakinana nawe, abantu nka ba Simon Kjaer na Kasper Schmeichel". "Ni incuti pfa mpfe kandi baciye banyaruka gutabara Christian Eriksen. Kubera ubugabo bwabo, baciye baja guhoza umukunzi wa Christian aho yari ari ku ruhande rw'ikibuga ababaye cane". Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 ubu akina muri Inter Milan yagiye kuvanwa mu kibuga ari ku nderuzo aca anyarukanwa kwa muganga. Bamaze kuronka inkuru ko Eriksen yari yahembutse, urukino rwarasubiye rurabandanya, Finland ikaba yatsinze 1-0. Umuhinga mu kuvura indwara z'imitima mu gisata co kwinonora imitsi, Sanjay Sharma, akaba ari na we arongoye umurwi w'abahinga mu kuvura indwara z'imitima mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru, yabwiye BBC ko "icarokoye ubuzima bwiwe ari uko abaganga bakoze mu bubangutsi budasanzwe". Uwujejwe ubuvuzi mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Danemark, Muganga Martin Boesen, yarafashe ijambo mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru aho yavuze ingene ibintu vyagenze. Ati: "Vyari ibintu bigaragara ko yari yataye ubwenge". "Igihe ndamushikira, yari aryamiye ku ruhande, yari agihema. Narumva ko umutima wari ugitera, ariko ubwo nyene ibintu vyaciye bihinduka duca dutangura kumukorera CPR (impfunyapfunyo ya Cardiopulmonary resuscitation, canke réanimation cardio-pulmonaire [RCR} mu gifaransa, uburyo bwo gupompa ku gikiriza umuntu agize ibibazo vy'umutima uhagaze no kumupepeya kugira bamuhembure). "Ibi vyakozwe mu buryo bwihuse cane, kandi twakoze uko dushoboye kwose turashobora guhembura Christian. Yarashoboye kumvugisha imbere yo kumushikana mu bitaro". Fabrice Muamba nawe yaragize ibibazo vy'umutima wahagaze mu 2012 igihe yariko akina mu murwi Bolton Wanderers. Yarakize, akaba yagiye guhembuka haciye amasaha 72, ariko ntiyigeze asubira gukina. Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Vyangarukaniye ibintu bikiri muri jewe, uwu mubabaro uba uhari.  Ukabirabira kure ariko ntumenye ikigiye gukurikira". "Vyari ibintu biteye ubwoba, ariko ni ugushimira abaganga. Bakoze igikorwa gihambaye cane kuri Christian. Nakunze ingene abakinyi bagenzibe baciye bamwegera baramukingira. Vyibutsa umubabaro mu bisanzwe utifuza kubona. Ndizeye ko ibintu bizogenda neza. Ndizeye ko azokira". Umukinyi wo muri Korea y'Epfo Son Heung-min bigeze kuba bakinana muri Tottenham na we nyene yarungitse ubutumwa bwo gufata mu mugongo mugenziwe, ni inyuma y'aho yari yijije igitsindo cahaye Korea y'Epfo uburenganzira bwo kuzoja gukinira igikombe c'isi yose mu 2022. Ahajeje kwinjiza ico gitsindo kuri penalty, Son yaciye aja kuri camera ati: "Christian Eriksen, ndagukunda". Abakinyi ba Danemark basabwe guhitamwo kimwe muri bibiri - kubandanya urukino muri iryo joro canke bukeye ku mutaga. Bamaze kwumva ko Eriksen ameze neza, bafashe ingingo yo kurangiza urukino. Umumenyereza wa Danemark Kasper Hjulmand avuga ati: "Abakinyi ntibabona ko borara badasinziriye hanyuma ngo buce burire imodoka basubire mu kibuga. Babonye ko vyoba vyiza bavuyeho biheze". "Ni ijoro ritoroshe. Sinoreka gukengurukira ingene aba bantu bamwitayeho neza. Ni umwe mu bagenzi banje pfa mpfe. Ndashima ingene abakinyi bavuganye ko badashobora gufata ingingo y'ugukora ikintu ico ari co cose gushika bumvise ko Christian yahembutse". "Ntushobora gukina umerewe gutyo. Twagerageje kurondera intsinzi. N'aho bitari vyoroshe, abakinyi bemeye barasubira mu kibuga barakina igice ca kabiri". "Mvugishije ukuri, hari abakinyi vyanse rwose. Bababaye cane kandi bacise ivutu. Vyari ibintu biteye ubwoba cane". "Hari bamwe vyankiye ko bashobora gukina, hari n'abandi bariye umutima amenyo barakina. Twaragerageke uko dushoboye, ariko ntushobora gukina neza mu gihe uzi ko mugenzawe yagize ibibazo vy'umutima. Jewe ku bwanje sinumva ko noshobora gukina. Tuzogerageza kubaba hafi, kandi ndizeye ko hari abantu bazodufata mu mugongo". Urukino rusubiriye gutangura, umunyegori Schmeichel yakoze ikosa ridakunze kumubako arinjizwa igitsindo, hanyuma Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg nawe aronka penalty yari gutuma ikigombora, ariko arayihusha. Mu bisanzwe Eriksen asanzwe azwi ko ari umuhinga mu gutera amapenalty, iyo ahaba niwe yari kuyitera. Abarongoye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Danemark bamenyesha ko Christian Eriksen ameze neza aho arwariye mu bitaro kandi ko yarungitse n'ubutumwa bwo kuramutsa abakinyi bagenzibe bakinana mu murwi nserukiragihugu. Itangazo basohoye rivuga riti: "Ameze neza kandi abandanya ari mu bitaro aho ariko akorerwa ibindi bipimo". "Mu gitondo c'uno musi twavuganye na Christian, aca aboneraho no kuramutsa abakinyi bagenzibe". "Abakinyi n'abakozi b'umurwi nserukiragihugu bahawe ubufasha bwo mu bihe bidasanzwe kandi bazobandanya ari yo bari kugira bafashanye inyuma y'isanganya rya nijoro". "Twashaka kubashimira mwese ku butumwa bwo guhoza". N'aho ata tangazo rirasohoka rivuga icatumye Eriksen agwa mu kibuga, umumenyereza wa Danemark Kasper Hjulmand abona ko ari "ikibazo c'umutima".

headline: Amahasa yavutse mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje imyaka 30
text: N﻿a  Sam Cabral BBC News Amahasa yavutse mu ntara ya Tennessee yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuye mu nsoro (urusoro: umwana akiri mu nda) zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 iheze. Bifatwa ko ari insoro za mbere zimaze igihe kirekire zikavamwo ikiremwamuntu. Zabitswe mu bukonje bungana na -128C (ni ukuvuga ubushuhe bungana na 128C musi y’ubusa) mu mazi ya nitrogen (azote) ku wa 22 Ndamukiza (4) 1992. Rachel Ridgeway, nyina w’abana bane ava i Oregon, yibarutse aya mahasa ku wa 31 Gitugutu (10) uno mwaka. Se wabo, Philip Ridgeway, avuga ko ari ibisigabwenge. Lydia Ann na Timothy Ronald Ridgeway basa n’uko ari bo baciye umuhigo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo National Embryo Donation Center (NEDC), ikigo cegamiye idini kivuga ko kimaze gufasha kuvyara impinja zirenga 1.200 zivuye mu nsoro zatanzwe n’abandi. Uwari amaze guca umuhigo afashijwe n’iki kigo NEDC, Molly Gibson, yavutse mu 2020 mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka hafi 27. Muganga John David Gordon yabitse izi nsoro avuga ati: "Iyi ngingo…yo kubika izi nsoro yohumuriza abibaza nimba hariho umuntu uwo ari we wese yoba yipfuza kwakira insoro bakoze inyuma y’imyaka 5, 10, 20 iheze”. "Inyishu ikomeye cane ni ego!" Izi nsoro z’amahasa zavuye mu mbuto zatanzwe n’umugabo n’umugore batazwi bari bubakanye, bakaba bategerezwa kuvyara hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF (Fécondation in vitro/In vitro fertilization), ubuhinga bwo kuvyara bukorerwa hanze y’igitereko c’umugore. Umugabo yari mu myaka 50 akaba avugwa ko yahawe irigi n’umugore w’imyaka 34. Izi nsoro zabitswe mu bubiko bwa laboratoire ijejwe irondoka muri Amerika gushika mu 2007, igihe uyu muryango waziha ikigo NEDC muri Knoxville, Tennessee kugira ngo uwundi muryango uzikoreshe. Umuhinga mu bijanye n’insoro kw’ivuriro Southeastern Fertility ry’abubakanye ry’ikigo NEDC yaciye ayeyusha izi nsoro hanyuma azishira mu gitereko muri uno mwaka. Mw’itangazo, NEDC ivuga ko yizeye ko iyi nkuru ishobora “gutera intege abandi kugira ngo baronke aya mahirwe yo kwakira izi nsoro kugira ngo bashobore kuvyara”. Ni we mwana wa mbere umuryango wa Ridgeway - usanzwe ufise abandi bana bane bari hagati y’umwaka umwe n’imyaka umunani – baronse hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF canke ku mbuto zitanzwe n’abagiraneza. Ari muhira mu muryango, Philip Ridgeway yabwiye imboneshakure CNN ati: "Nari mfise imyaka itanu igihe Imana iha ubuzima Lydia na Timothy, kandi yabandanije kuzigama ubwo buzima kuva ico gihe”. "Aha rero twovuga ko ari bo bana bacu bakuru, n’aho ari bo bana bacu bato”. Yongerako ati: "Muri ibi bintu harimwo igisigabwenge”.

headline: Lausane: Francine Niyonsaba uwa mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ku metero 3000
text: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yatahukanye ikibanza ca mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ryariko rirabera i Lausane mu Buswisse ku metero 3000. Uwo  murundikazi aherutse guhabwa icubahiro co kwitwa ambasaderi yasize isegunda imwe gusa umunye Amerika Alicia Monson. Francine Niyonsaba yagize iminoto 8:26:80 na we Monson agira iminota 8:26:81. Aganira na radio BBC Gahuza, inyuma yo gutahukana iyo ntsinzi, Francine Niyonsaba yagize ati:" N'ukuri simfise ingene nobivuga, naryohewe cane gutsinda rino higanwa. "Ryari ihiganwa ritoroshe na gato, kuko abo twari kumwe bose bashobora gutsinda, ariko mba inshirwarimenetse. "Natsindishije ubwenge bwinshi cane kuko urabona ko twatandukanijwe n'amafoto yo kuri "ligne d'arrivee" (ku murongo wa nyuma dushikirako). Ihiganwa rya nyuma rya Diamnond League ritegekanijwe itariki 6 z'ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2022. Mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 2021, Francine Niyonsaba yabaye umugore wa mbere anyaruka gusumba abandi kw'isi ku metero 2000. I Zagreb muri Croatia, yanditse amateka mu guca umuhigo kw'isi ahejeje izo metero ku minota 5:21:56. Francine Niyonsaba w'imyaka 28 ari mu banonotsi benshi babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1.500 kubera baremanywe imisemburo (testosterone) myinshi.

headline: Umukenguzamateka wa Amerika avuga ko ubucakara ari ‘akabi kari gakenewe’
text: Umukenguzamateka wo mu ntara ya Arkansas avuga ko ubucakara ari "ikibi cari gikenewe" catumye igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kiba igihugu. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'ikinyamakuru co muri iyo ntara, uyo mukenguzamateka wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika, Tom Cotton, arahakana ibivugwa ko Amerika ari igihugu gishingiye kw'ivanguramoko. Ariko ashiraho integuro y'itegeko ribuza ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga y'igihugu mu mugambi watangujwe n'umunyamakuru w'ikinyamakuru New York Times ufise intumbero yo guhindura amateka y'ubucakara. Uwatanguje uyu mugambi yarakajwe bikomeye n'aya majambo. Ivyo bibaye mu gihe isekeza ryiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'Abirabure bufise agaciro) ribandanya ritera intambwe. Urupfu rw'umwirabure George Floyd, mu kwa gatanu uno mwaka, rwatumye haduka imyiyerekano ikomeye mu gihugu cose yo kwiyamiriza ubugome bw'igipolisi n'ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Haraciye iminsi abari mu myiyerekano mu gisagara ca Portland mu ntara ya Oregon batana mu mitwe n'igipolisi. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka igihe Perezida Donald Trump afatiye ingingo yateye impari yo kurungika abajejwe umutekano ku rwego rw'igihugu muri ico gisagara. Ibwirizwashingiro rya Amerika rivuga ko ibijanye n'ibikorwa vy'igipolisi vyo kubungabunga umutekano vyega intara imwe imwe ukwayo, ariko bitaraba leta y'igihugu cose. Uyo mukenguzamateka Cotton ni umwe mu biyamiriza bikomeye iyo myiyerekano yakwiragiye mu gihugu cose, aho mu kiganiro yahaye New York Times avuga ko ari "imigumuko ijanye n'ubukozi bw'ikibi", anashigikira Perezida Donald Trump ku ngingo yiwe yo kurungika ingabo z'igihugu guhagarika akaguma. Amajambo yashikirije muri ico kinyamakuru yariyamirijwe bikomeye, mbere n'abakozi barenga 800 b'ikinyamakuru New York Times baratera igikumu ku rwandiko rwiyamiriza ko iyo nkuru irimwo ayo majambo isohoka, bavuga ko harimwo amakuru atari yo. Ico kinyamakuru caje gusaba imbabazi kubona cararetse iyo nkuru ikarengana, kimenyesha ko yahonyanze amategeko ngenderwako yaco. Vyatumye umunyamakuru James Bennet ajejwe kwihweza amakuru ajanye n'ivyiyumviro bishikirizwa n'abantu atanga imihoho. Umukenguzamateka Cotton yabwiye ikinyamakuru Arkansas Democrat-Gazette c'intara ya Arkansas ati: "Dutegerezwa kwiga neza kahise k'ubucakara, ingaruka n'akamaro bwagize kw'iterambere ry'igihugu cacu ahandi hoho ntituzoshobora kumenya igihugu cacu". "Nk'uko abatuboneye izuba babivuze, ico cari ikibi gikenewe catumye igihugu cacu kibaho, ariko igihugu kikaba cubatswe ku buryo, nk'uko [Abraham] Lincoln yabivuze, ubucakara bwategerezwa gushika ahantu bugahagarara burundu". Ku wa kane w'indwi iheze, umukenguzamateka cotton yatanguje integuro y'itegeko yise Saving American History Act (Integuro y'itegeko ryo kugarukira kahise ka Amerika), rifise intumbero yo guhagarika umugambi wa 1619, ushingiye ku mateka ya Amerika afatira ku muzo w'amato ya mbere y'abacakara muri Amerika mu kwezi kw'umunani uyo mwaka. Uwo mugambi wanaronse n'agashimwe Pulitzer kitiriwe uwawutanguje, umunyamakuru wa New York Times, Nicole Hannah-Jones, ariko abanyamerika batari bake badashaka impinduka (Conservateurs) bakaba bawiyamiriza, maze umukenguzamateka Cotton akawufata nk'umugambi w'intagondwa. Umukenguzamateka cotton ati: "Integuro y'uwo mugambi mubi 1619 wa New York Times..yerekana ko Amerika yubatswe ku mushinge w'ivanguramoko ryashinze imizi". "Jewe rero ndiyamirije imbono nk'iyo. Amerika ni igihugu gikomeye kandi ciyubashe cubakiye ku vyiyumviro vy'uko abantu bose bangana. Igihe cose twamye tubungabunga iyo ntumbero, ariko nta gihugu na kimwe gushika ubu kirashobora gukora ibikenewe vyose kugira ngo kiyishikeko". Avuga kuri iyo nteguro y'umukenguzamateka Cotton, Hannah-Jones yanditse ubutumwa  ku rubuga rwa Twitter avuga ko nimba ubucakara ari ikintu kibi catanze umwimbu mwiza, n'ibindi vyose bishobora kuba nkaco. Uyo mukenguzamateka Cotton yisiguye avuga ko atari afise intumbero yo gushigikira ubucakara avuga ko ivyo Hannah-Jones yavuze ari "ibinyoma".

headline: Inzara ku rugi rwa Somalia, ku bwa ONU
text: Inzara iri ku rugi rw'ibice bimwe bimwe vya Somalia, nk'uko vyagabishijwe  kuri uyu wa mbere n'uwujejwe ibibazo vy'abari mu kaga, Martin Griffiths. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku murwa mukuru Mogadishu, yavuze ko afise ibimenyetso bifadika ko inzara ishobora gushika mu bice vyo mu bumanuko bwo hagati muri Somalia hagati y'amezi ya  Gitugutu (10) na Kigarama(12). Ivyo abivuze inyuma y'urugendo yagize i Baidoa mu ntara ya South-West muri Somalia- akarere k'ico gihugu kugarijwe kurusha izindi n'uruzuba rugeramiye Afrika y'ubuseruko. Inyuma y'ibiringo bine vy'imvura itagwa, ico gisagara kiguma cakira abantu ata kintu na kimwe bagisigaranye kubera urwo ruzuba   amashirahamwe agereranya ko rwatumye abantu barenga miriyoni imwe bata izabo. Ayo mashirahamwe avuga  kandi ko urwo ruzuba ari rwo  mbere rukaze muri ako karere k'ihembe rya Afrika mu myaka 40. Abantu muri Kenya, Ethiopia na Somalia birabagora kuronka ico bashira  ku munwa , mu gihe abantu baharurwa muri miriyoni 22 muri ako karere bashobora kwugarizwa n'inzara ikomeye. Kuba ibintu bimeze gutyo biva ku rufatangane rw'imvo zitandukanye, kandi nta  kimenyetso c'uko ibintu bitera bimera neza. Ihindagurika ry'ibihe ni imwe mu mvo zikomeye, mu gihe intambara muri  Ethiopia na Sonalia, hamwe n'iduga ry'ibiciro kubera intambara muri Ukraine vyaje gutuma ikibazo gikomera kuruta.

headline: Kim Kardashian vyatangajwe ko ata mugabo agira inyuma yo kwahukana na Ye
text: Kim Kardashian ubu yongeye kuba umugore atagira umugabo inyuma y'imyaka hafi umunani yubakanye na Ye, kare yahora  azwi  ku mazina ya Kanye West. Mu ntahe yabaye ku wa gatatu ku buhinga bwa none (Virtual), uwo rurangiranwa muri reality (ibiganiro vyo kuri television  aho abantu bazwi cane berekanwa bari mu buzima bwa minsi yose canke mu mirimo runaka) yanatangaje icese kandi biciye mu mategeko ko ahevye izina  "West" nka rimwe mu mazina yiwe. Kardashian, yari yarasavye ko yahukana/avana n'uwo mu rapper mu mwaka uheze kugira yongere kuba uwutagira umugabo biciye mu mategeko. Ariko bompi baracafise igikorwa co kugabura ivyo batunze bongere bumvikane uwuzogumana abana. Urwo rubanza rwaciwe ku wagatatu -ruha Kardashian icitwa "bifurcated divorce"- rusigura ko ibijanje no kuvana/kwahukana kwabo bizoba mu bice bibiri: ica  mbere co kwivanako izina rya West no kuba atagifise umugabo mu mategeko catunganye, ikigira kabiri cerekeye uwugumana abana hamwe n'ukugabura ivyo batunze. Mu nyandiko nyinshi yashizeko n'indahiro yashikirije mu kwezi kwa 12, uwo mugore  yatungiye cane mu bikoresho vyo gushariza umubiri no mu biganiro vyo ku mboneshakure yavuze ko yari "yifuje cane" ko ukwubakana kwiwe na Kanye West kurangira. Mu kwezi guheze yari yanditse ati: "Nizeye ko ingingo ya sentare yo kurangiza ukwubakana kwacu izofasha Kanye kwemera ko kuba turi umugore n'umugabo bubakanye birangiye." Ye, w'imyaka 44, atari muri iyo ntahe, yari yagwanije ku mugaragaro ukuvana na Kim aranamusaba ko yogaruka bakabandanya babana. Mu ntahe yo ku wa  gatatu, umushingwamanza wa Ye yararondeye ko Kardashian yokwemera amasezerano y'uko hagize uwundi bubakana Kim atoronka uburenganzira bwo kutamenerwa imbere ya sentare amabanga baba barayaze nk'abubakanye (marital peivilege canke privilège conjugal). Kardashian  n'umushingwamanza wiwe bavuze ko ivyo "ataho vyari bwigere biba" hanyuma bica birarankwa n'umucamanza. Kim na Kanye batanguye kugendana mu 2012 baca basezerana kwubakana  haheze imyaka ibiri. Ye  n'umwe muri ba rurangiranwa mu muziki mu  mudiho wa rap, zimwe mu ndirimbi ziwe zizwi cane akaba ari nka Stronger, Jesus Walks na Gold Digger. Yaranakundiwe kandi n'imideri. Kardashian  yatanguye kumenyekana mu 2007 mu kiganiro ca reality kuri television ku muryango wiwe, Keeping Up with The Kardashians, kuva ico gihe nawe aca aratanguze imideri hamwe n'ibintu bitandukanye vyo kwishariza ku mubiri.

headline: Kurungika impunzi mu Rwanda: Sentare y’Ubwongereza yemeje urugendo rw’indege ku wa kabiri
text: Sentare nkuru yafashe ingingo ko urugendo rw’indege itegekanijwe gukura abasaba ubuhungiro mu Bwongereza ibatwara mu Rwanda ku wa kabiri rubandanya ukuri kwaye. Abarwanya uwu mugambi bananiwe mu rugamba rwa mbere rwo guhagarika uwu mugambi wo kurungika abantu mu Rwanda, ariko bemeza ko bazokwungururiza urubanza muri sentare y’iyungururizo ku wa mbere. Muri uwu mugambi, bamwe mu binjira mu Bwogereza badakurikije amategeko bazokwungururirzwa mu Rwanda kugira ngo basabeyo ubuhungiro. Abashika 31 niba bamaze kubwirwa ko bazokwurizwa iyi ndege ya mbere. Hazoba umwihwezo wimbitse aho sentare nkuru y’igihugu izokwumviriza ibishikirizwa n’abarwanya uwu mugambi muri rusangi imbere y’impera za Mukakaro (7). Mu ngingo yiwe, umucamanza Swift  yemeye ko harimwo “inyungu z’abanyagihugu” mu gihe umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati Priti Patel  yoshobora gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji Patel arashimagiza ingingo y’uyu mucamanza, akavuga ko reta izobandanya n’uwu mugambi, mu gihe umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson avuga ko iyi ngingo ari “inkuru nziza”. Hagati aho, abarwanya uwu mugambi buguruje uru rubanza bavuga ko bafise amakenga ku mutekano w’abantu bitezwe “kurungikwa ku nguvu”. Iyi ngingo ije mu gihe ikinyamakuru Times kivuga ko Umuganwa wa Wales ku giti ciwe anegura iyi ngingo ya reta – kigasubiramwo amajambo yiwe aho avuga ko iyi nzira “iteye ubwoba”. Umuganwa Charles niwe yiteze guserukira Umwamikazi mw’ikoraniro ry’ishirahamwe Commonwealth ryitezwe kubera ku mugwa mukuru w’Urwanda, Kigali, muri kuno kwezi. Ibiro vyiwe bishimangira ko abandanya “kutagira aho ahagaze muri poritike”. Reta yizeye ko uwu mugambi uzohagarika abarondera ubuhungiro kujabuka umuhora w’Ubwongereza, mu kwerekana neza ko ibibazo vyinshi bizokwigwa n’Urwanda. Abarenga 10.000 nibo bafashe uru rugendo rwo mu mazi ruteye ubwoba muri uno mwaka gushika ubu. Abarwanya uwu mugambi bari barondeye guhagarika urugendo rw’iyi ndege izokwunguruza aba bantu. Urubanza rwashinzwe n’abashingwamanza baserukira aba basaba ubuhungiro bitezwe kurungikwa mu Rwanda, hamwe na sendika  Public and Commercial Services union (PCS) – iserukira abarenga 80% y’abakozi bose b’igisata c’Ubwongereza kijejwe imbibe – hamwe n’amashirahamwe yitaho abimukira Care4Calais na Detention Action.  Abanyamategeko bayo berekana impungenge bafise ku bijanye n’utunenge turi mu ntunganyo y’igisata kijejwe impunzi mu Rwanda be n’uko bishoboka ko abantu bashobora kurungikwa mu bihugu bashobora gutoterezwamo – ico bita kwirukana (refoulement). Abanyamategeko b’Ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati mu Bwongereza babwiye sentare ko umugambi udashobora guhagarikwa n’abawurwanya baciye muri sentare kubera ari ku nyungu z‘igihugu, baca basaba kandi umucamanza gutesha agaciro ibirego bishikirizwa kw’izina ry’abasaba ubuhungiro ku giti cabo. Muri urwo rubanza, ishami rya ONU ryitaho impunzi, UNHCR, naryo nyene ryamenyesheje ko ryitandukanije n’uwu mugambi. Abashingwamanza ba UNHCR bavuga kandi ko bagabishije ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati ko iyi nteguro n’Urwanda iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Mu ngingo yiwe, umucamanza Swift yatesheje agaciro ibirego vy’abashaka guhagarika vy’agateganyo indege zizokwunguruza aba bantu imbere y’uko uru rubanza rwihwezwa neza muri Mukakaro. Avuga ko atigeze abona ko hari ibimenyetso vyerekana ko hashobora kuba "ihohotera, ukwirukanwa” canke ikindi kintu cose kibangamira uburenganzira bwabo nk'uko biri mu ngingo ya gatatu y'itegeko ryerekeye uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Bwongereza. Ingingo ya gatatu ikingira abantu iyicarubozo, gufatwa nabi nk’ikiremwamuntu, no kwirukanwa canke kurungikwa mu gihugu aho bishobora gushika umuntu akaborezwa igufa canke agafatwa nabi. Umucamanza Swift avuga ko bimwe mu birego bitangwa n’abashaka kuzibira izi ndege za mbere bivuga cane cane ko ingingo ya Patel “yo gufata Urwanda nk’igihugu gitekanye idafise ishingiro kandi ko ishingiye ku matohoza adakwiye”. Avuga ko iki kirego, co kimwe n’ibindi biri muri uru rubanza, bishobora kwigirwa hamwe n’ivyemezo mu gihe iyi ngingo izokwihwezwa mu buryo bwimbitse  - mu kiringo c’imisi ibiri imbere y’uko ukw’indwi kurangira. Ariko, umucamanza Swift asigura ko, n’aho abarwanya uwu mugambi bari bafise ivyemezo bihagije vy’uko uwu mugambi wokwihwezwa neza, ivyo bavuga “si ibintu bikomeye cane”. Inyuma y’iyi ngingo ya sentare, umushikiranganji Patel yavuze ko reta “izobandanya” n’uwu mugambi. Avuga ati: “Abantu bazoguma bagerageza kurondera no guhagarika irungikwa ryabo bifashishije amasentare n’ibibazo baserura ku munota wa nyuma, ariko ntiturora dutezura mu guhagarika iyi magendo y’abantu ihitana abatari bake no mu kurokora ubuzima. “U Rwanda ni igihugu gitekanye kandi giherutse no kwizerwa ko gitanga ubuhungiro bwiza – tuzobandanya twitegurira urugendo rwa mbere rugana mu Rwanda, hamwe n’izindi ngingo zose zitari nke zifise intumbero yo kugabanya amato mato mato yinjira”. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Jonhson yacishije ubutumwa bwiwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter avuga ati: “Ntidushobora kwemera ko abakora magendo y’abantu bata mu kaga ubuzima kandi incuti zacu kw’isi zizofasha mu guhagarika uru rudandaza rw’izi nkozi z’ikibi ruburakigongwe”. James Wilson, icegera c’ishirahamwe Detention Action rirwanya uwu mugambi, avuga ko yababajwe n’iyi ngingo. Clare Moseley, yatanguje Care4Calais avuga ko ishirahamwe ryiwe “rifise impungenge nyinshi ku bijanye n’imibereho y’abantu bashobora gutwarwa ku nguvu mu Rwanda, ingingo ishobora kubangamira cane ubuzima bwabo bwo mu mutwe na kazoza”. Inyuma y’iyi ngingo ya sentare, sendika PCS isaba ko hoba ibiganiro vyihuta n’umushikiranganji Patel kugira ngo bihweze uwu mugambi wo kwimura abantu.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa 14.07.2019: Coutinho, Hudson-Odoi, Pogba, Maguire, Neymar, Sane
text: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona, Philippe Coutinho, yanse kwinjira muri Manchester United, aho ni mu gihe bivugwa ko bishoboka ko asubira muri Liverpool, ariko hakaba hari amahirwe menshi y'uko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 ashobora  kugurwa na Paris St-Germain. (Express) Barcelona yijeje umufasha wa Coutinho ko ata mugambi ifise yo kugurisha uyo mukinyi, ariko akavuga ko umukiriya wiwe yoba ariko ashaka kugurishwa ku yindi mirwi ya Espanye. (Sky Sports) Bayern Munich ntirota iheba kurondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea, Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 18, bikaba vyitezwe ko itanga ayandi mahera agera ku miliyoni 45 z'amapawundi muri iyi ndwi. (Mail) Manchester United ntizoshobora kugurisha muri Real Madrid umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26, mu gihe uyo murwi wa Espanye womurondera igihe cagenewe kugura abakinyi kirangiye ku wa 8 z'ukwezi kw'umunani. (Mirror) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Leicester, umwongereza Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26 - asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United ku giciro c'imiliyoni 75 z'amapawundi  - yabwiye uwo murwi ko yipfuza kugenda. (Mail) Maguire yagiriza Leicester ko iriko isaba amafaranga arenze urugero, ni mu gihe imiliyoni 70 z'ama pawundi zimaze kumutangwako na Manchester United hamwe na Manchester City ariko iramwimana. (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunyabrezili Neymar w'imyaka  27, abandanya asaba ko yokwisubirira muri Barcelona, akavuga ko ico aguma yibuka gusumba ibindi vyose ari intsinzi ya Barca y'ibitsindo 6 kuri 1 ca  Paris St-Germain mu 2017. (Mail) Uyo mukinyi wa PSG, uwa mbere yaguzwe amahera menshi kw'isi, yagiye kwunyura ibintu mu gukwiragiza ireresi irimwo isanamu yiwe yambaye impuzi ya Barcelona, yakurikijeko ubutumwa bwo mw'isezerano rya kera muri Bibiliya. (Goal.com) Umukinyi wa Tottenham akina hagati, Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 asanzwe kandi akinira  Danemark, ashobora kubandanya akinira uyo murwi kubera habuze uwundi murwi ufise uburyo bukwiye kugira ngo ushobore kumugura. (Guardian) Liverpool yinjiye mu gitigiri c'imirwi iriko irondera umusatirizi wa CSKA Moscow, Fedor Chalov  ku miliyoni 20 z'amapawundi. Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, Chelsea na Manchester United nazo nyene zikaba zishinze ijisho uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 21. (Mirror) Tottenham ibandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati  wa Real Betis Giovani lo Celso w'imyaka 23 asanzwe kandi akinira n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina.  Ku ruhande rwayo, Betis ishinze ijisho ku mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa, Nabil Fekir afise imyaka 25, akaba asanzwe akinira Lyon. (Football.London) Arsenal yatanze ayandi mafaranga angana n'imiliyoni 25 z'amapawundi ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Celtic, Kieran Tierney w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wo muri Ecosse wankiye igiciro c'imiliyoni 15 z'amapawundi zari zatanzwe na Arsenal mu kwa gatandatu. (Mail) Daniel Sturridge yahawe akaryo ko kunagura umwuga wiwe mu murwi Bologna wo mu Butaliyano, inyuma y'aho uyo musatirizi w'umwongereza w'imyaka 29 aviriye muri Liverpool. (Express) Arsenal iriteguye guhangana na Tottenham hamwe na Juventus mu kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa AS Roma, Nicolo Zaniolo w'imyaka 20. (Calciomercato) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Manchester City, Leroy Sane, ntariko arwanirwa na Bayern Munich yonyene - uyo mudagi w'imyaka 23 ariko arwanirwa n'amahinguriro atatu ahingura ibirato vy'abakinyi. (Sun) Liverpool ivuga ko ata na kimwe iravugana na Real Madrid ku musatirizi w'umunyasenegali, Sadio Mane w'imyaka 27, n'aho umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Senegali, Saer Seck, avuga ko uyo murwi wo mu gihugu ca Espanye woba umaze kumutangako igiciro. (Liverpool Echo) Ibiganiro bigeze kure hagati ya Atletico Madrid na Napoli  kugira ngo igure umukinyi w'inyuma akomoka muri Albania, Elseid Hysaj w'imyaka 25, asanzwe kandi ariko aronderwa na Manchester United. (Football Italia) Dinamo Zagreb ivuga ko ishobora kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, Dani Olmo w'imyaka 21 akomoka muri Espanye, abandanya aronderwa na Manchester United.  (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Everton, umunyasenegali Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 29, avuga ko amaze kwumva ibihuha bivuga ko ashobora kwimukira muri Paris St-Germain, ariko ko ikimuraje ishinga ubu ari ihiganwa ry'igikombe rihuza imirwi ya Afrika. (Sport Witness)

headline: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
text: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

headline: Urukino rwa Arsenal-Manchester City ntirwerekanwa kuri TV y'Ubushinwa kubera Mesut Ozil
text: Televiziyo y'Ubushinwa CCTV yafashe ingingo y'ukutekerana urukino rwa Arsenal na Manchester City inyuma y'amajambo yashikirijwe n'umukinyi wa Arsenal Mesut Ozil, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ikinyamakuru ca leta. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga hwaniro, Ozil yariyamirije ugufatwa nabi kw'aba Isilamu bo mu karere ka Uighur mu Bushinwa. Umurwi wa Arsenal wasohoye itangazo aho witandukanya n'amajambo yavuzwe n'uyo mukinyi akomoka mu Budagi, uvuga ko "ari ishirahamwe ridaharanira inyungu za politike". Ikinyamakuru c'u Bushinwa The Global Times  cavuze ko ayo majambo ya Ozil ari "ibinyoma" kandi ko "yahemukiye" abajejwe urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bushinwa ryamenyesheje ko ivyavuzwe na Ozil "bidashobora kwihanganirwa" kandi ko yababaje "abakunzi ba Arsenal" mu Bushinwa. CCTV yaciye ifata ingongo yo kwerekana urukino rwa Tottenham na Wolves, aho kwerekana urukino rwa Arsenal iza kwakira Man City isanzwe ifise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'u Bwongereza. Muri ayo majambo yacishije ku rubuga hwaniro, Ozil, asanzwe ari umunywanyi w'idini rya Isilamu, yavuze ko aba isilamu ba Uighur ari "abarwanyi bariko barwanya ihohotera bakorerwa". Aranegura kandi Ubushinwa n'abandi ba Isilamu avuga ko bigira sindabibazwa ku ngorane abo ba Isilamu barimwo. Ubushinwa bubandanya buhakana ko butariko burahohotera aba Isilamu ba Uighur. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka muntu avuga ko abantu bababa umuliyoni - hafi bose bagizwe n'aba Isilamu ba Uighur - bapfungiwe mu mabohero acungerewe cane kandi ata rubanza baciriwe. Ubushinwa buvuga ko ahubwo bari mu bigo aho bariko bahabwa inyigisho ngo bashobore  kurwanya indyane zishingiye ku madini. Mu kwezi kw'icumi, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko rya Amerika, NBA, ryarahuye n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi inyuma y'aho umwe mu barongoye imirwi ya NBA yandikiye amajambo ku rubuga ntangamakuru yatosekaje imigenderanire n'Ubushinwa. Daryl Morey, umukuru w'umurwi Houston Rockets, yanditse kuri Twitter avuga ko ashigikiye imyiyerekano y'ukurondera ubwigenge muri Hong Kong. Ayo majambo yatumye amakompanyi y'Ubushinwa ahagarika imfashanyo zayo  be n'amasezerano yerekeye kwerekana inkino z'umupira w'amaboko ku ma televiziyo.

headline: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Russia iriyamiriza US iyagiriza ubumenja
text: Uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Anatoly Antonov ariyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe n'umuvugizi wa Pentagone John Kirby aho yagirije Perezida Vladimir Putin ko akora ibikorwa vy'ubumenja mu gitero kuri Ukraine. Ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, Kirby yahatswe gukorora amosozi igihe yabaza ingene umuntu wese "akomeye mu mutwe" yoshobora gusigura amabi akorwa n'Uburusiya. Yongeyeko ati: "Sinibaza ko hari umuntu yokwishimira na gato urugero rw'ubukozi bw'ibiki n'ubugome [vya Putin]". Mu butumwa bwiwe yacishije ku mbuga hwaniro, Antonov avuga ko amajambo ya Kirby ari "igitutsi kandi ko adashobora kwihanganirwa". Ati: "Bimaze kuba umugenzo hano ko abategetsi bashikiriza amajambo ashingiye ku binyoma bitangwa n'abategetsi ba Ukraine". Uyu muserukizi w'Uburusiya avuga kandi y'uko Amerika idashaka ko intambara yo muri Ukraine irangira. "Ikiraje ishinga John Kirby na bagenziwe ni uko inganda za gisirikare za Amerika ziyegeraniriza amafaranga mu kwikurako ibirwanisho vyazo bishaje". Arangiza avuga ko Kirby "yatakaje icizere nk'umutegetsi wa Amerika, mu gukoresha ibitutsi vyo mw'ibarabara".

headline: Bazamuganga: Uburwayi bwa Fibromes Uterins bumeze gute?
text: Abagore n'abigeme bageze mu myaka yo kwibaruka barashobora  kugira ikibazo c'ibivyimba mu bice vy'igitereko/ Fibromes Uterins Ibi bivyimba bikunda kuboneka ku birabure gusumba ayandi moko (mu bazungukazi bifata abagera ku bice 20% nayo mu birabure barenga 50%). Ni ingwara kuri bamwe itera ububabare bukomeye cane, n'aho ata vyinshi bivugwa ku bushakashatsi bwo kumenya impamvu zavyo n'ingene vyokwirindwa. Forentine Kwizera avugana na Muganga Thierry Mako, yanonosoye gukwirikirana abavyeyi (Gyneco-obstetricien), atangura amubaza uburyo ivyo bivyimba bimenyekana ku wubifise (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru).

headline: Ukraine-Russia: ‘Intumbero yanje ntiyari iyo gusambura Ukraine’- Putin
text: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya avuga ko ata bindi bitero bikomeye bikenewe muri Ukraine, imisi mike inyuma y’ibibombe bikomeye bitari bike vyatewe kuri iki gihugu kuva intambara itangura. Avuga ko ibibanza hafi  vyose vyari vyateguwe guterwa vyarashwe, kandi ko intumbero yiwe itari ugusambura Ukraine. Avuga kandi ko intumbero ya Moscou yo kwinjiza abantu 300.000 mu gisirikare izoba yashitsweko mu ndwi zibiri. Avuze ibi mu gihe ingabo z’Uburusiya ahenshi ziriko zisubira inyuma, Ukraine nayo igenda itera intambwe, inyuma y’amezi amezi hafi umunani kuva iyi ntambara itanguye. Avugana n’abanyamakuru inyuma y’ikoraniro ryahuje abategetsi b’akarere ku mugwa mukuru  wa Kazakhstan, Astana, umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya yavuze ko ibibanza 22 kuri 29 vyari vyateguwe guterwa muri Ukraine vyarashwe kandi ko igisirikare “kiriko kirashikira indwi bindi bisigaye”. Ati: "Nta bitero bikomeye bigikenewe. Ubu dufise ibindi bikorwa”. Kuva ku wa mbere, Uburusiya bwatanguje igihuhusi c’ibitero vya misire ku bisagara bitari bike vya Ukraine, mu co Putin avuga ko kwari ukwihora igitero cakozwe ku kiraro gikomeye gifatanya Uburusiya n’akarere ka Crimée/Crimea bwigaruriye. Abantu batari bake barasize ubuzima muri ibi bitero abandi barakomereka, inyubakwa nazo zirononekara. Uturere two hagati tw’umugwa mukuru Kyiv natwo nyene twarashikiriwe ku ncuro ya mbere kuva intambara yaduka. Ariko Putin avuga ko intumbero y’Uburusiya itari gusambura Ukraine, ariko ntiyicuza kuri iki gitero. Ati: "Muri make ibiriko biraba ntibiryoshe. Ariko aho nyene, [n’iyo Uburusiya budatera], ibintu biba bimeze uko bimeze, ariko gusa ibintu biba ari bibi cane kuri twebwe. Rero turiko dukora ibintu vyose neza kandi mu gihe nyaco”. Perezida Putin avuga ko abantu 200.000 bamaze kwinjizwa mu gisirikare, kandi ko muri bo 16.000 bamaze gushika ku rugamba. Yongerako y’uko abona ko bidakenewe ko abandanya atera akamo ngo abantu biyandikishe. Hagati aho, akamo yateye kateje uburakari burenze urugero mu Burusiya, bituma abagabo ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. BBC kandi yabonye ko abaherutse kwinjizwa ata nyigisho zikwiye bahawe imbere y’uko barungikwa ku rugamba. Ni mu gihe igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya kivuga ko camenye abasirikare b’Uburusiya barenga 7500 bamaze gupfira mu ntambara ya Ukraine. Igitigiri c’abamaze kuhapfira kizwi ko ari kinini cane, mbere hari n’amakuru avuga ko bamwe mu baherutse kwinjizwa  bishwe. Avuga ku migenderanire n’ivyahoze bigize Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti, Perezida Putin ashimangira ko ata ngorane intambara yateye kuri vyo. Avuga ko ari ibisanzwe ko ibihugu bimwe bimwe bigira impungenge ariko ko abandanya abibwira uko ibintu bimeze igihe cose. Hagati aho, abihweza ibintu n’ibindi bavuga ko ikibanza Uburusiya bufise mu karere kiriko kiragabanuka, mu gihe abakuru b’ibihugu nka Kassym-Jomart wa Kazakhstan  bariko bitandukanya na Putin kuri ino ntambara.

headline: Johnson & Johnson yahagaritse igeragezwa ry'urucanco rwa Covid kubera hari uwarwaye
text: Ikompanyi Johnson & Johnson ikora imiti yo muri Amerika yahagaritse vy'agateganyo igerageza ry'urucanco rwa Covid kugira ngo habanze hakorwe amatohoza ku catumye umwe mu bariko barugeragerezwako arwara. Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko umurwi wigenga uzokwihweza nimba hari isano hagati y'iyi ndwara y'uyu muntu itasiguwe n'imiti bamuteye. Yahagaritse ibikorwa vyo kurondera abandi bakorerwako igerageza ryo ku rwego rugira gatatu mu ntumbero yo kwicungera. Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko iyo hari abantu benshi bariko bageragerezwako, aho usanga baharurwa mu bihumbi mirongo, ni ukwama umuntu yiteze ko hagira abo bigirako ingaruka atari nziza. Iyi kompanyi kandi ivuga ko idashobora gushikiriza vyinshi ku mwidondoro w'uyu muntu mu ntumbero yo kumubikira ibanga. Mw'itangazo yasohoye dusoma tuti: "Turiko turigira vyinshi kandi kuri ino ndwara y'uyu muntu, ni nkenerwa ko tumenya vyose kuri we kugira ngo bishobore gufasha n'abandi". Si rwo rucanco rwa mbere ruhagaritswe vy'agateganyo rwariko rurageragezwa. Mw'igeragezwa ririko rirakorwa n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford, hari uwariko arageragerezwako nawe nyene yanduye indwara itasiguwe neza biba ngombwa ko babanza guhagarika urucanco rwariko rurakorwa. Ariko mu nyuma rwaje kwemezwa ko ata ngorane rufise, ko rero rushobora gusubira kugeragezwa, kiretse muri Amerika aho abagenduzi bakiganira n'ikompanyi Astra Zeneca. Hafi incanco 180 nizo ziriko zirageragezwa kw'isi yose, ariko nta na rumwe rurashobora guheza kugeragezwa. Urucanco rw'ikompanyi Johnson & Johnson, co kimwe n'uru rwa kaminuza ya Oxford ikorana na Astra Zeneca, rugeze ku ntambwe ishimishije. Johnson & Johnson yatanguye kurondera abantu yogeragerezako mu mpera z'ukw'icenda, ifise intumbero yo kurondera abashika 60.000 ku bigo birenga 200 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika co kimwe no muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko no muri Afrika y'Epfo.

headline: Covid-19: urucanco Pfizer/BioNTech rwemejwe, rugiye gutangura gutangwa mu ndwi iza mu Bwongereza
text: Ubwongereza ni co gihugu ca mbere kw'isi cemeje urucanco rw'ikigo Pfizer, BioNTech, mu ntambara yo kurwanya coronavirus, rukaba rugiye gutangura gutangwa ku bantu benshi. Ikigo c'Ubwongereza kijejwe kugenzura imiti MHRA, kivuga ko uru rucanco rukingira Covid-19 ku bice 95% ata ngorane ruteye. Igikorwa co gucandaga gishobora gutangura mu misi mike ku bantu barukeneye cane gusumba abandi, harimwo abatama n'abatamakazi hamwe n'ababangamiwe gusumba. Ubwongereza bumaze gutumako imiliyoni 40 z'uru rucanco kugira bashobore gucandaga abantu imiliyoni 20. Uru rucanco Pfizer/BioNTech ni rwo rwa mbere runyarutse kwemezwa, inyuma y'amezi cumi gusa mu gihe izindi zishobora gufata imyaka cumi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter ati: "Incanco ni zo zizoshobora kudufasha gusubirana ubuzima maze tugasubira mu bikorwa vy'iterambere". Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubwongereza, Matt Hancock, yabwiye BBC ko abanyagihugu bazohamagarwa n'ikigo NHS umwanya wabo wo gucandagwa ugeze. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu, NHS, Sir Simon Stevens, avuga ko igisata kijejwe ubuvuzi kiriko kiritegurira "isekeza rikomeye ryo gucandaga mu mateka y'igihugu cacu". Hafi ibitaro 50 biragabirije, mu gihe hari ibindi bigo vy'ugucandaga biriko birategurwa. Hagati aho, abahinga bavuga ko n'aho izi ncanco zishobora gutangura, abanyagihugu bategerezwa kuba magabo, bakama bakurikiza amabwirizwa ajanye no guhagarika coronavirus. Ni ukuvuga kwirinda kwegerana, kwambara udupfukamunwa, kandi abafise ibimenyetso vy'uwu mugera bagapimwa mbere bagasabwa kwitandukanya n'abandi. Prof Danny Altman, umwigisha kuri kaminuza Imperial College London, avuga ko aya makuru y'iyemezwa ry'uru rucanco "akomeye cane". Ihinguriro Pfizer ryakoze uru rucanco rivuga ko iyi ari itsinzi ikomeye. Abahinga bakoze urutonde mfatakibanza rw'abantu babangamiwe gusumba abandi. Imbere y'abandi haza abasanzwe baba mu bigo vy'irerero n'ababikoramwo, abantu barenza imyaka 80 hamwe n'abandi bakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu. Ni bo bazotangura guhabwa uru rucanco - bamwe mbere mu ndwi itangura. Mu nyuma uko imiti izogenda iboneka mu 2021, hazogenda haba isekeza ryo gucandaga abantu bose barengeje imyaka 50, hamwe n'abakiri bato basanzwe bafise izindi ndwara. Umuntu aterwa inshinge zibiri, hagati ya rumwe n'urundi hagategerezwa guca iminsi 21, uru rwa kabiri rukaba ari urwo kwongera inguvu. Haraca indwi nkeya kugira ngo urucanco rukore neza mu mubiri. Izindi ncanco za Covid ziteye he? Hari izindi ncanco zishobora kwemezwa mu minsi ya vuba. Hariho rumwe rwakozwe n'ikigo co muri Amerika Moderna rukora nk'urwa Pfizer. Ubwongereza bwaramaze kugura izishika imiliyoni indwi zishobora gushika  inyuma ya Pasika. Hari urundi rwahinguwe n'ikigo ca kaminuza ya Oxford gifadikanije na AstraZeneca, ikigo co mu Bwongereza nyene gihingura imiti, Ubwongereza bukaba bwaramaze gusaba izishika imiliyoni 100 zarwo. Uburusiya na bwo busanzwe buriko burakoresha urundi rwitwa Sputnik, mu gihe igisirikare c'Ubushinwa na co nyene camaze kwemeza urundi rwahinguwe n'ikigo CanSino Biologics. Izi zompi zikora co kimwe n'uru rucanco rwa Oxford.

headline: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
text: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

headline: Australia: 'Abanyamahanga batubahiriza amategeko ya Covid bazirukanwa'
text: Umushikiranganji ajejwe abimukira muri Australia yavuze ko abanyamahanga bazofatwa bariko bararenga ku mategeko ajanye n'amagara y'abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo. Alex Hawke yavuze ko yababajwe cane n'ivyo yabonye kuri 'beach' ya Bronte i Sydney ku musi wa Noheli. Video y'abantu benshi yashizwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi yerekana urwaruka ruririmba rwongera rutamba, rurenze ku mategeko yo kugwanya coronavirus. Bamwe mu babiboneye bavuze ko benshi bari abongereza. Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani Uko inyoni ya gasuku yarokoye nyirayo wari ugiye guhira mu nzu Virusi ya Covid imara 'iminsi 28 itarapfa' muri 'laboratoire' Australia iri mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ico kiza giherutse kwongerekana inyuma y'amezi atari make ata muntu abonetse yanduriye mu gihugu hagati. Iyaduka bushasha bw'uwo mugera indwi imwe imbere ya Noheli ryatumye hasubira gushirwaho ayandi mategeko yo kwikingira muri ico gisagara, harimwo kubuza amakoraniro menshi mu biruhuko no kwiyugarana mu karere kamerewe nabi ka Northern Beaches. Ubu abamaze gufatwa muri iryo yongerekana ry'ico kiza bashika 129. Hawke yabwiye radio Sydney ati:"Mu gihe umuntu ageramiye umutekano w'abantu c'anke amagara, viza yiwe ishobora gufutwa ." Yavuze ko yasavye ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu gukorana n'abategetsi ba New South Wales (NSW) muri iyi misi himirije umwaka mushasha kugira ngo umuntu wese azofatwa "akora ibintu bidakurikije amategeko", viza yiwe izoce isubira kwihwezwa na reta. Yavuze ko benshi mu bafise viza z'akanya gato bubahiriza amategeko y'amagara y'abantu. Igipolisi kivuga ko ata n'umwe mu bari mu musi mukuru i Bronte yaciwe amande canke ngo ahanwe. Australia yarugaye imbibe ku bantu nka bose kiretse ku benegihugu batashe canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba muri ico gihugu n'imiryango yabo mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Mu kwezi kwa kane, reta yavuze ko hariyo abantu barenga imiliyoni zibiri bafise viza y'umwanya muto muri ico gihe.

headline: Coronavirus: OMS ihanura abantu kwambara udupfukamunwa
text: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ryahinduye imvugo, aho rihanura abantu kwambara twa dupfukamunwa mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Iryo shirahamwe mpuzamakungu rimenyesha ko hari amakuru mashasha ryaronse yerekana ko utwo dutambara "dushobora kuzibira impwemu zirimwo umugera ". Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi bitegeka canke bisaba abanyagihugu kwambara utwo dutambara iyo baramutse basohoka. OMS yahora ivuga ko ata vyemezo vyari bihari vyari gutuma isaba abantu batarwaye kwambara  udupfukamunwa. Muganga Maria Van Kerkhove, arongoye umurwi w'abahinga ba OMS ku biraba Covid-19, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko abanyagihugu basabwa kwambara udupfukamunwa "dukozwe mu dutambara dusanzwe - bivuga ko atari twa dutambara twambarwa n'abaganga", mu gihe bagiye ahantu bikeka ko bashobora kwandurira. OMS yagumye ivuga ko udupfukamunwa twambarwa n'abaganga dukwiye kwambarwa n'abantu barwaye canke abariko barabafasha. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ubushakashatsi buherutse gukora. Muganga Van Kerkhove ati: "Dusaba ko ibihugu vyohimiriza abanyagihugu bavyo kwambara udupfukamunwa". Aho nyene, OMS ishimangira ko udupfukamunwa ko ari kimwe mu bishobora gutuma ikwirakwira rigabanuka - ariko y'uko abantu batohava bijajara bakadufata nk'urukingo. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS ati: "Udupfukamunwa twonyene ukwatwo sitwo tuzogukingira Covid-19". Gushika ubu, abashika imiliyoni 6.7 kw'isi baramaze kwandura coronavirus, nayo hafi 400.000 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa n'ico kiza kuva cadutse mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ishure kaminuza John Hopkins.

headline: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
text: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

headline: Félix Tshisekedi wa Kongo na Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi bumvikanye ko bagiye gukomeza ubucuti
text: Uburundi na Repubulika Iharanira Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo vyiyemeje gukorera hamwe mu kurwanya imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho muri Kongo igahungabanya umutekano . Ivyo ni ivyavuye mu mubonano Perezida  Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi yagiranye na mugenziwe Félix Antoine Tshisekedi Tshilombo wa Kongo ejo ku wa gatanu mu rugendo rwiwe i Bujumbura. Itangazo ryasohowe n'abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderanire  b'ivyo bihugu vyompi inyuma y'urwo rugendo rivuga ko abo bategetsi bumvikanye ko ari nkenerwa y'uko bakomeza amashirahamwe ahuza ibihugu vy'akarere kugira ngo bashobore "gukomeza amahoro, umutekano n'iterambere rirama". "Kuri ivyo, abo bakuru b'ibihugu bumvikanye gushira mu ngiro imigambi ivyo bihugu bihuriyeko mu ntumbero yo kurwanya imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho ikorera ku butaka bwa Kongo  kandi bakama bakurikiranira hagufi ibibazo bijanye n'umutekano w'ivyo bihugu vyompi". Iryo tangazo ariko ntirivuga iyo migambi iyo ari yo. Rivuga kandi ko abo bategetsi bihweje urugero rw'ugufashanya ivyo bihugu bigezeko, bakaba basanze amasezerano asanzwe ahari abihuza adashirwa mu ngiro bikwiye.
