Bumvikanye ko batanguza umugambi mushasha w'ukunagura uko gufashanya uzoshigikirwa n'ibikorwa biboneka, kandi ko bagiye kwama bavugana gusumba. Urwo rugendo rwa Perezida Tshisekedi  mu Burundi ruje inyuma y'urundi yari amazemwo iminsi ibiri mu gihugu ca Tanzania. Bwana Tshisekedi ariko agerageza gukomeza ubucuti hagati y'igihugu ciwe n'ibihugu bibanyi, cane cane ibihugu vyo mu muryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Kw'igenekerezo rya 8 z'uku kwezi, Bwana Tshisekedi yarandikiye Perezida Paul Kagame asanzwe arongoye uwo muryango muri kino gihe amusaba ko igihugu ca Kongo cokwakirwa muri uwo muryango uhurikiyemwo ibihugu vya Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda, u Rwanda, Uburundi hamwe na Sudani y'Epfo.

headline: Amagorwa yo kubaho ufise indwara idasanzwe ituma "ashobora gutabwa nk'akanuka"
text: Fide Mirón yari afise imyaka 18 igihe atangura kubona ko ariko arahohoterwa n'urunganwe mu gisagara ca Barcelona. Baramwirukanye, bamufata nk'igikinisho, nk'uko we nyene abivuga. Bamuraba nk'agahabwa baravye isura yiwe ingene yari imeze, isura yiwe yahindutse kubera indwara izwi kw'izina rya porphyrie érythropoïétique congénitale. Iyo ni indwara idasanzwe idakunze kwibonekeza ariko mbi cane, yanduye kuva akiri uruhinja. Haciye imyaka 15, Fide yahawe ubutumwa budasanzwe. Bwari buvuye kuri umwe mu bahora bamutyekeza, ariko asaba imbabazi ku nyifato y'ubwana - nk'uko wenyene abivuga ubu - yerekanye kuri we igihe yari mu myaka y'ubuyabaga. Uyu nyene kwigaya yaributse Fide igihe yariko atanga ikiganiro ku banyamakuru aho yavuze ko yarwanije uyu muntu yari fafashwe n'indwara ico gihe yitwa Günther. Ariko rero ntakunda kuvuga "ivyamubayeko muri kahise". Ntaco bikivuze kuri we. Ikimuha ingoga ni uko ubuzima bwiwe bwitaweho cane mbere n'utwigoro tukaba turiko turakorwa kugira ngo haboneke inyishu canke umuti wo gushobora kugabanya ingaruka z'indwara yiwe. Ni indwara mbi cane. Yonona igitigu (umwijima mu Kinyarwanda), igatuma umuntu akama amaraso, akagira ibisebe ku ruhu. Ibihimba vy'umubiri birabora gushika aho bikoroka, arico gituma bayita 'porphyria mutilante'. Mirón ubu afise imyaka 46, uku niko asigura ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Iyi ndwara irababaza cane. Ibisebe vyatanguye kwibonekeza afise amezi atandatu gusa, akiri uruhinja. Abavyeyi banje barantwaye kwa muganga, ariko ico gihe nta bintu vyinshi vyari bizwi kuri ino ndwara. Ico bambwiye conyene ni izina ryayo. Nta muti wari ho - mbere gushika n'ubu ntawubaho - kandi gushika ubu nta wuzi nimba uzoteba uboneka. Ati: "Ikintu conyene cari kizwi ni uko yari indwara ikomeye cane, vyumvikana ko ntari gushobora kubaho mu buzima busanzwe nk'ubw'abandi. "Vyari ngombwa ko ngerageza kwirinda ico cose cotuma nsinzikara, nategerezwa kwirinda kuja ku zuba. "Kubera ko iyi ndwara yanteye gukama amaraso, nakenera guhabwa amaraso buri minsi 15. Mu bwana bwanje bwose namye mpabwa aya maraso. "Iyi ndwara yaza nk'ikiza, uko bukeye uko bwije. Uko navyuka mu gitondo niko nasanga haje igikomere gishasha. Kubera ibikomere naracitse ibikonjo, isura yanje irasibangana. Bwari ububabare budahera, burenze urugero, bubabaza umutima." Ku myaka 14, niho umubiri wiwe wahagarika ivyo kwama aterwa amaraso. Indwara yarahagaze. Ariko ntaho yagiye, ni nk'uko yabaye imuhaye akaruhuko. "Ububabare burabandanya, ariko ntabwo bikomeye nko mu bwana bwanje. Iriyadukiza." Isura yisa "Si nsa n'abandi kubera ingaruka z'iyi ndwara. Ziribonekeza. Ndazi neza ko zishobora kuntuma ntabwa nk'akanuka. "Ariko ibi ntaco bimbwiye. "Umuntu wese yashatse kumenya uwo ndi we aranzi ingene meze n'ico nshoboye. "Umuntu wese yagumanye n'umurwayi Fide yarabonye ko ubu buzima n'ububabare nagize vyampaye inguvu. "Nivyo koko narababaye cane igihe iyo miyabaga i Barcelona bariko barantyekeza. "Umuntu arigira uw'ejo agafata ko ata n'umwe ariko aramuraba. Ku muhingamo w'uyo munsi narabaye igikinisho ciwe. "Ariko ivyo ni ibisanzwe, ni ikintu gito cane c'ubwana, ariko kubona inyuma y'imyaka myinshi yubahutse kunsaba imbabazi biranezereye cane. Nta nyishu Akomeza ati: "Ikintu kibi cane ntabwo ari ububabare umuntu yumva, ni irungu. Ntabwo nshaka kuvuga irungu ry'ukuba uri ukwawe, oya, ahubwo ni irungu ryo kubura inyishu, ukabura n'abakwereka inzira wofata. "Mfise abaganga banshigikira, ariko ntabwo higeze haboneka umuti nyawo. "Ni ibihe biremereye cane rwose kandi bibabaza, iyo wumva ko inzira zose zugaye kandi utagira iyo uja. "Iyo mbajije inyishu, numva umengo ndiko ntera ingorane. Ikibazo canje kiragoye cane kandi kubera ko twese tugenda twihuta, rimwe na rimwe twitaho gusa ibintu twibaza ko dushobora gutorera umuti. "Si benshi bameze nkanje." Yongera ati: "Kuva nkiri muto natanguye kurondera abandi bantu boba bameze nkanje kugira ngo duhimirize ubushakashatsi mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti. "Hari umwe nashoboye gutora muri Cuba, uwundi muri Brezili, uwundi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. "Ndafise abantu umunani bari muri Espanye. Nka bose bameze neza, ariko mu ci riheze hari umugenzi yapfuye. "Indwara yiwe yahavuye imera nabi. Ntushobora kumenya uko ibintu bizogenda. "Nico gituma ubu nitayeho cane kuyerekana no kurondera inyishu. "Kimwe mu vyo nashoboye gushikako mu bushakashatsi nakoze, ni uko nashoboye guhura na muganga Millet maze dutangura urugendo rwo kurondera umuti. "Iyi nzira iriko iratanga umwimbu kuko mu myaka ibiri iheze hashoboye kuboneka umuti ukora kuri ino ndwara. "Waramaze kwemzwa n'ikigo c'ubuvuzi c'i Burayi (European Medicines Agency) ubu turindiriye ko bawukorera igerageza mu buvuzi kugira ngo turabe ingaruka zawo ku barwayi." Ni inzira itanga umwizero. "Umuryango wanje wambereye ubuzima bwanje. Papa yampaye amaraso nari nkeneye kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho, ariko maze kugera ku myaka icenda yarapfuye ahitanywe n'isanganya ry'umuduga. Urupfu rwiwe rwaradukozeko twese, ariko cane cane jewe. "Inkingi y'amagara yanje yari isenyutse ni umuntu yampaye amaraso yiwe. "Ubuzima ni amazi. Uno munsi uriho ariko ejo nturiho. Nategerezwa kurwana kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho. "Ku rundi ruhande, mama yamye anshigikira kandi yikoreye umuzigo munini w'indwara yanje. Ni umuntu akomeye cane kandi ntiyigeze ahengeshanya kunyitaho. "Ubu ntegerezwa kwitaho ubuzima bwanje gusumba, ariko iyo ndonse akanya ndakunda gutembera, nkabonana n'abantu kugira ngo nsangire ivyiyumviro nabo. "Ubu ubuzima bwanje bwarahindutse. Nk'umugore akiri muto, sinashoboye kwiga kubera uburakari bw'iyi ndwara n'imiti yayo ibabaza cane, ariko natanguye igikorwa co kwigisha abantu. "Ikinti ico ari co cose kiba mu buzima gitanga icigwa kanaka. "Numva umengo nshobora kuguruka".

headline: CECAFA: Tanzania 4 - 0 Burundi, umumenyereza ati 'badusumvya ubuhinga'
text: Mu rukino rwa kabiri rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'abagore mw'ihiganwa rya CECAFA, umurwi w'u Burundi ntiworohewe, kuko urukino rwarangiye utsinzwe na Tanzania ibitsindo 4-0. Umumenyereza w'uyo murwi aremera ko barushijwe, ariko akavuga ko bagiye kwikosora mu zindi nkino zimirije. Uburundi buri mu murwi B kumwe na Tanzania, Sudani y'Epfo, na Zanzibar, u Burundi buri mu kibanza ca kabiri n'amanota atatu, inyuma yo gutsinda Zanzibar ibitsindo 5-0 mu rukino rwa mbere rwabaye ku wa gatanu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'aho u Burundi butsindiwe na Tanzania, Daniella Nibimenya, umumenyereza w'umurwi w'u Burundi, avuga ko ataco batagize. Ati: "Bakinye neza kandi bakurikije impanuro twabahaye, n'aho twatsinzwe twakinye neza". Avuga ko Tanzania yabatsinze kubera abakinyi bayo bazinanye kuko basanzwe bakinana kuva kera kandi ko babasumvya n'ubuhinga. Urwo rukino rwari rurindiriwe n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru benshi, na rirya abenshi mu bagize umurwi w'u Burundi harimwo abasanzwe bakina mw'ihiganwa rya Tanzania. "Twakinye aho tugeza, kandi haburana babiri hagatsinda umwe, ni ibisanzwe. Twatsinzwe uno munsi, ariko ihiganwa rirabandanya, tuzorurwana gushika ku kanyuma". Nibimenya avuga ko bagiye kwikosora kugira ngo baze bavyifatemwo neza mu nkino ziri imbere. Uburundi bwiteze guhura na Sudani y'Epfo mu rukino rutegekanijwe ejo ku wa gatatu isaha umunani mu masaha y'i Dar es Salaam. Iryo higanwa rya CECAFA ririko ribera i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania ryatatanguye ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi rihuza imirwi umunani iva muri Uganda, Kenya, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Burundi, Djibuti Zanzibar na Sudani y'Epfo.

headline: Qasem Soleimani: Abantu baje ari benshi i Baghdad mu muhango wo kumwunamira
text: Isinzi ry'abantu ku murwa mukuru wa Irake, Baghdad, bitabiriye umuhango wo guherekeza umugaba w'ingabo wo muri Irani, Qasem Soleimani, yiciwe mu gitero c'indege za Amerika ku wa kane. Soelimani niwe yari kw'isonga mu gutegura ibikorwa vya gisirikare vya Irani mu karere k'uburasirazuba bwo hagati, kandi Irani yararahiye ko itegerezwa guhorera urupfu rwiwe. Ikiziga ciwe vyitezwe ko gisubizwa muri Irani kugira ashingurwe mu muji yavukiyemwo. Iryo sinzi ry'abantu i Baghadad ryari ryaje kandi kwunamira Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, umugaba w'ingabo w'umunye Irake yatwara umugwi ushigikiwe na Irani wa Kataib Hezbollah. Uwo mugwi niwo wavuyemwo utugwi tuzwi nka Popular Mobilisation units, dufashe mu mugongo imigwi y'abarwanyi muri Iraki yiganjemwo iyishigikiwe na Irani. Abaje kwunamira abo bishwe, imbere y'uko umuhango utangura, baza barazungagiza amabendera ya Irake n'ay'imigwi y'abarwanyi baririmba bati "urupfu kuri Amerika". Bakoze urugendo rwakwiragiye mu mabarabara, bamwe bitwaje amasanamu ya Soleimani abandi bitwaje ay'umukuri w'ikirenga wa Irani, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. Amakuru avuga ko ibiziga vy'abanye Irani bishwe bica bijanwa muri Irani ku mugoroba, ico gihugu kikaba cashizeko iminsi itatu yo kugandarira uwo mu jenerale yagandaguwe. Ipfubwa ryiwe rizoba kuwa kabiri mu muji yavukiyemwo wa Kerman mu ntara yo hagati muri Irani. Ariko hari abanye Irake bo banezerewe barigina mu mabarabara ya Baghdad bumvise amakuru y'urupfu rwa Soleimani. Yagirizwa kuba yarateguye ibikorwa vyo guhasha abantu bari mu myiyerekano mu mutekano yo gusaba umuzo wa demokrasi mu mezi aheze. Televiziyo ya leta ya Irake ku wa gatanu yavuze ko habaye ikindi gitero c'indege mu gihugu, amasaha 24 nyuma y'iyicwa rya Soleimani. Umwe mu basirikare ba Irake yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru Reuters ko abantu batandatu biciwe muri ico gitero kindi, cagabwe ku rukurikirane rw'imiduga y'abarwanyi bo muri Irake mu masaha ya kare mu gindo co kuwa gatandatu. Umuvugizi w'isigirikare ca Amerika yahakanye ivy'uko boba ari bo bagize uruhara muri ico gitero kindi. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuze ko zarungitse abandi basirikare ibihumbi bitatatu mu burasira zuba bwo hagati gufasha mu gihe hogira ikiba kubera igitero c'indege cagabwe.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lewandowski, Ramsdale, Abraham, Werner, Bowen, Pogba, Neves
text: Chelsea yamaze kuvugana n'umuserukizi w'umusatirizi wa Bayern Munich umunya Pologne Robert Lewandowski w'imyaka 32 mu ntumbero yo kurondera ko yokwimukira i Stamford Bridge. (Bild, via Sun) Arsenal iriko iregeranya imiriyoni zirenga 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umunyegori wa  Sheffield United umwongereza Aaron Ramsdale w'imyaka 23. (Talksport) Ariko, aba Gunners basabwa gushikana imiriyoni 44 z'amadorari kugira ngo bashobore kuronka Ramsdale, ku ncuro zibiri zose bamaze kumurondera bakaba babwiwe ko amafaranga bashaka kumutangako ari make.  (Times) Chelsea iripfuza kurekura umusatirizi w'umwongereza Tammy Abraham ngo yinjire mu bakeba bayo Arsenal ku masezerano y'intizo. Tottenham na West Ham nayo nyene iripfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 23.  (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Chelsea umudagi Timo Werner w'imyaka 25 aremera ko ashobora kuva muri Chelsea muri rino ci, akavugwa ko yipfuza gusubira muri Bundesliga, ihiganwa ryo mu Budagi. (90min) Liverpool irashobora kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma, umwongereza Nat Phillips w'imyaka 24, umukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya Pays de Galles Harry Wilson w'imyaka 24, umusatirizi w'umubirigi Divock Origi w'imyaka  26, umunya Pays de Galles akina inyuma Neco Williams w'imyaka 20 hamwe n'umuswisi akina hagati Xherdan Shaqiri w'imyaka 29, ikaba yipfuza kwegeranya imiriyoni ziri hagati ya 82 na 96 z'amadorari.  (Liverpool Echo) Liverpool yamaze kubona umusatirizi ishobora kurondera, uyu nawe akaba ari umwongereza Jarrod Bowen w'imyaka 24  wa West Ham. (Athletic, subscription required) Paris St-Germain iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa  Manchester United, umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28, ariko ni ngombwa ko ibanza kugurisha abakinyi kugira ngo ishobore kumuronka. (Sky Sports) Manchester United iri imbere ya Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Wolves umunya Portugal Ruben Neves w'imyaka 24 muri rino ci ku miriyoni zirenga 48 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Talksport) Manchester United irabandanya ibiganiro n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28. (Daily Express) Hagati aho, Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wo hagati w'umudagi Leon Goretzka w'imyaka 26 umushahara ungana hafi na 275.000 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe Bayern Munich azoba arangiye mu ci riza.  (Mail) Ariko Real Madrid nayo nyene yatanguye kuvugana na Gortezka kugira irabe ko yomuronka. (Bild, via Marca) Aston Villa iri mu biganiro kugira ngo irabe ingene yogura umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich City umwongereza Todd Cantwell w'imyaka 23. (Football Insider) Villa iriteguye kandi kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Bayer Leverkusen umunya Jamaica Leon Bailey w'imyaka 23 ku giciro kiri hagati y'imiriyoni 34 na 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Mail) Crystal Palace iri mu biganiro na  Schalke kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umunya Turukiya akina inyuma Ozan Kabak w'imyaka  21 ku giciro kiri hagati y'imiriyoni 13 na 16 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Guardian) Everton yinjiye mu rutonde rw'imirwi iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu bimeze muri Manchester United ku musatirizi w'umwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa West Ham David Moyes ashobora kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umwongereza Ross Barkley w'imyaka 27 mu gihe uyo murwi wonanirwa no kugura Lingard. (90min) Newcastle yasubiye kuvyura ibiganiro kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Southampton umunya Gabon Mario Lemina w'imyaka 27 ku giciro c'imiriyoni zababa zitanu z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, ikaba yiteze ko ishobora gushika ku masezerano muri ino ndwi. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati wa West Brom umunya Brésil Matheus Pereira w'imyaka 25 yasubiye gutera amero imirwi itari mike ya  Premier League na Bundesliga. (Express and Star) Leeds United airi hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umwongereza Lewis Bate w'imyaka 18.  (Leeds Live) Umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Hollande Donny van de Beek w'imyaka 24 avuga ko vyanka vyakunda azoguma muri Manchester United muri rino ci n'aho imirwi itari mike yo mu Butaliyano, muri Espagne no mu Budagi imurondera.  (Manchester Evening News) Juventus iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano na Sassuolo ku mukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 23. (Corriere dello Sport, in Italian) Barcelona ihannzwe n'ingorane z'imishahara bigashobora kuba ngombwa ko iyigabanya igakurako imiriyoni 606 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ishobore gukurikiza urugero rw'imishahara muri La Liga.  (Star)

headline: Hugo Santillan: Uyu munye Argentine yasandavye azize ibikomere vy'ingumu
text: Umuterangumu wo muri Argentine, Hugo Santillan, yishwe n'ibikomere yagize mu mukino wo guterana ingumu, nyuma y'iminsi uwundi muterangumu wo mu Burusiya, Maxim Dadashev, nawe apfuye. Uwo musore w'imyaka 23 yaguye hasi mu rubuga kuwa gatandatu nyuma gatoyi y'urukino rw'urwego WBC Latino Silve rw'abafise ibiro biri hagati. Urwo rukino rwamuhuza na Eduardo Javier Abreu muri Argentine, rwarangiye abo baterangumu babiri banganije. Yajanywe kwa muganga aca arabagwa ku buryo bwihuse ariko aca acikana kuwa kane. Urwego rujejwe umukino wo guterana ingumu kw'isi, World Boxing Council, rwasohoye ubutumwa ku rubuga hwaniro twitter bugira buti "Rest in Peace, Hugo Santillan", canke "Ruhuka amahoro, Hugo Santillan". Santillan ni umuterangumu agira kabiri apfuye ahitanywe n'ibikomere yakuye mu mukino muri ino indwi, nyuma y'urupfu rwa Dadashev rwemejwe kuwa kabiri. Uwo musore w'imyaka 28 yari yashizwe mu bitaro kubera kuvirirana mu bwonko, nyuma y'urukino rw'abafise ibiro vyinshi yakinye na Subreil Matias, rwahagaritswe mu mpera ku ngunga ya 11 ku wa gatanu uheze. Yarabazwe kwa muganga ariko birananirana ko atora mitende. Uwutegura inkino zo guterana ingumu, Kalle Saueland, yanditse kuri twitter kuwa kane agira ati: "Ni indwi ibabaje cane ku mukino wo guterana ingumu".

headline: Italy: Amazi atwara imicafu yabonetsemwo umugera wa coronavirus imbere y'uko imenyekana
text: Abahinga b'Abataliyano bavuga ko umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kwibonekeza mu kwa 12 mu mazi atwara imicafu yava mu bisagara bibiri, imbere y'uko ico kiza gitangazwa muri ico gihugu. Ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe amagara y'abantu (ISS) kivuga ko amazi atwara imicafu yava mu bisagara vya Milan na Turin yatanguye kubonekanamwo uwo mugera ku wa 18/12/2019, ico gihe ntiwari bwanatangazwe mu Bushinwa aho bizwi ko ari ho watanguriye. Ico kigo congerako y'uko hari ivyemezo biva mu bindi bihugu vyerekana ko uwo mugera wari watanguye gukwirakwira hanasigaye n'igihe kinini imbere y'uko umenyekana. Uwo mugera watanguye gutangazwa ubwa mbere mu Bushinwa mu mpera z'ukwa 12, mu gihe mu Butaliyano hoho umuntu wa mbere yanduye iyo ndwara yatangajwe hagati mu kwa kabiri. Mu kwa gatanu guheze, abahinga b'Abafaransa bavuze ko ibipomo vyafashwe ku murwayi yikekwa ko yari arwaye umusonga ku wa 27/12 hafi y'umugwa mukuru Paris vyerekana ko yari yamaze kwandura uwo mugera. Muri ico gihe nyene mu gihugu ca Espanye, ibipimo vy'amazi atwara imicafu vyakozwe hagati mu kwa mbere mu gisagara ca Barcelona, iminsi 40 imbere y'uko ico kiza kimenyekana muri ico gihugu, vyerekana ko ayo mazi yarimwo uwo mugera. Muri ico cigwa c'ikigo ISS mu Butaliyano, abahinga bakoze ubushakashatsi ku bipimo 40 bafatiye ku bigo bishikizwamwo amazi atwara imicafu mu buraruko bw'Ubutaliyano hagati y'ukwezi kwa cumi 2019 n'ukwa kabiri 2020. Ibipimo bafashe mu kwa cumi n'ukwa cumi na rimwe nta migera vyarimwo, ivyo bikerenaka ko uwo mugera utari bwahashike, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuhinga wo mu kigo ISS Giuseppina La Rosa. Umupfasoni La Rosa  avuga ko ubwo bushakashatsi bushobora gufasha abahinga gutahura ingene uwo mugera watanguye gukwirakwira muri ico gihugu. Umuntu wa mbere yatanguye gutorwamwo uwo mugera atavuye hanze yari umurwayi wo mu gisagara ca Codogno mu ntara ya Lombardy. Ico gisagara caciye cugarwa ku wa 21 z'ukwa kabiri. Ibindi bisagara icenda vyo muri iyo ntara vyahavuye navyo vyugarwa, mu nyuma mbere n'igihugu cose kirugarwa mu ntango z'ukwa gatatu. Ikigo ISS kimenyesha ko ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana "akamaro ntangere" ko gupima amazi atwara imicafu mu nzira yo gutora uwo mugera imbere y'uko amavuriro avyemeza. Ibihugu bitari bike biriko birakoresha ubwo buhinga. Mu gihugu c'u Butaliyano, hafi abantu 35.000 nibo bamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 nk'uko bitangwa n'ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rikurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'uwo mugera.

headline: Ferdinand Omanyala: Uwambere mu kunyaruka muri Africa yamara agwana n'igitutu ca kahise
text: Ferdinand Omurwa Omanyala  ashobora kuba ariwe mugabo anyaruka cane muri Afrika inyuma yo guca umuhigo  kuri uwo mugabane ku metero 100 ariko uwo munya-Kenya aremera ko igihano  yafatiwe mu 2017 kubera ugufata imiti itemewe ku bakinyi kigumiza icijiji ku vyo ashikako. Yirutse amasekunda  9,77 mw'ihiganwa rya Kip   Keino Classic ryabaye ku wa gatandatu i  Nairobi  aca avanaho umwanya wari hejuru w'ama sekunda 9.85 wari wagizwe n'umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Akani Simbine mu kwezi kw'indwi. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 25 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Iyo nirutse nkagira umwanya mwiza cane, abantu baramvuga ariko jewe ndiraba - nta wundi n'umwe nirukira." Umwanya yagize umutuma aba umugabo agira umunani ku rutonde rw'abanyaruka cane kw'isi mu bihe vyose, n'ubwo yarangije ubwa kabiri inyuma y'umunya-Amerika Trayvon Bromell nawe yarushije aho wenyene yari ageze ku masekunda 9,76. Inyuma yo gutangura umwuga wiwe w'ubunonotsi mu 2016, Omanyala  yamaze amezi 14 ari mu bihano inyuma yo gupimwa bigatorwa ko yafashe imiti itemewe, avuga ko wari umuti w'ububabare yafashe. Asigura ko "yagize ivyago vy'ivyashitse. Wari umuti w'ububabare hanyuma bija kugaragara ko warimwo steroid , ivyo nivyo vyatumye mba uwo ndi uyu munsi." "Vyantumye kugira inguvu zo kwivyukiranya, gukomera gusumba - kuko n'ibihe ata munonotsi n'umwe yokwifuza gucamwo - kandi n'icigwa c'uko utofata icarico cose kandi ko utokwizera umuntu n'umwe mu nkino z'ubunonotsi." "Vyarabaye ibihe bigoye cane kuri jewe ariko reka dushire kahise muri kahise. Dutange imbabazi, twibagire hanyuma dukomeze. Jewe ndi umuntu mbaho nkurikije aho ibintu bigeze. Rwabaye urugendo rutoroshe inyuma yo gutangura mu 2016 -imvune, hanyuma gufatirwa ibihano - ariko ivyo biri muri kahise. Ubu turiko turubaka kazoza." Omanyala yemeza ko ashobora kunyaruka kurusha akaba avuga ko yihaye kuzoja munsi y'ama sekunda 9,70 - ikintu kimaze gushikwako gusa na rurangiranwa Usain Bolt wo muri Jamaica, mugenziwe Yohan Blake n'umunya-Amerika Tyson Gay. Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi wa rugby hanyuma agahinduka umwirutsi yumva ko ashobora kwiruka cane kuruta aho mbere akegereza umuhigo w'isi wa Usain Bolt w'amasekunda 9,58. Yavuze atwenga ati : "Ntaho kugarukira hariho". Uwu mwaka wamuziye neza kuko yashitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu nkino za Olympic ziwe za mbere, hanyuma agaca umuhigo wo muri Kenya ku masekunda 10,00 wanabaye umwe mu myanya itanu yiwe myiza mu mezi indwi aheze. Avuga ati: "Nagumye ntera imbere mw'isiganwa ryose nagize kuko nagize amahiganwa menshi uyu mwaka." "Ivyo nivyo ngiye gukomeza mu mwaka kandi nzotangura hakiri kare nko mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Bisigura ko mu kwezi kwa gatandatu nzoba ngeze ku myanya myiza cane." Yizigiye kuba icitegererezo ku bandi Mu gihugu kizwi cane ku banonotsi biruka ku birere biri hagati na hagati na birebire, Omanyala ubu yifuza guha intege urunganwe rushasha rw'abanya-Kenya biruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters). Avuga ati: "Nsenga nsaba cane ko mu myaka itanu iri mbere twoba dufise ba Omanyala benshi, abana benshi bazi kwiruka, kuko ni je ndi uwa mbere nagwanye kugira nshike kw'isonga." "Ndazi ko hari abantu benshi bashobora kwiruka cane, mu mupira w'amaguru na  rugby, none dushoboye kuronka abirutsi 10, Kenya hari ico yoba ishitseko. "Ubu baremera ko bishoboka kuko abenshi mu babigerageje bacibwa intege n'abavyeyi babo canke abandi bantu bavuga ngo ''nta na hamwe ushobora gushika wiruka ibirere bigufi muri Kenya'. Ariko ubu abantu baremera ko bishoboka. "Ubu nshaka gutanguza umugwi w'abiruka ibirere bigufi hanyuma nshishikarize abakiri bato kwimenyereza turabe aho bazoshika." Umwe mu bemera ko Omanyala, Simbine n'abandi nk'abo nka Enoch Adegoke wo muri Nigeria, yashitse mu gice ca nyuma c'imetero 100 mu nkino za Olympic, bashobora kuba icitegererezo ku banya-Afrika ni uwahoze yitaba inkino za Olympic akagira n'umuhigo w'isi Justin Gatlin. Uwo munya-Amerika, yahejeje inyuma ya Omanyala ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Abanya-Afrika barafise impano zo gushobora kwiruka. "Isi izi abanya-Afrika nk'abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa ariko ubu hariho abazi gutera umuhunda  (javelot), abasimba, abiruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters), nibaza ko Afrika ubu yeretse isi ko idafise abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa." "Ivyo ni ibintu bikomeye kuba Afrika ifise abo bose. Jewe kuva kera nemera ko Afrika ifise ico iha isi kuruta ivyo imaze gutanga gushika ubu." Abagabo 10 ba mbere banyaruka kw'isi gushika ubu

headline: Kenya-Ruto: Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu aravuga ku kubuzwa urugendo
text: Icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya William Ruto avuga ko ingingo  y'abategetsi yo kumubuza   gufata urugendo rwo kuja mu  gihugu kibanyi ca Uganda ari integuro yo kumutera umutima mubi nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu no kubangamira ivyo yifuza gushikako muri poritike. Mu kiganiro n'iradiyo yo muri Kenya (Inooro FM) mu gitondo co kuri uyu wa gatatu, William Ruto yavuze ko muri kahise yari amaze gufata ingendo z'akazi canke ziwe bwite ata ntambamyi. Yasiguye ko urugendo rwiwe rwari rugamije kwigira ku kigega c'ubutunzi muri  Uganda mu ntumbero y'umugambi w'ubutunzi  aherutse gutanguza wa 'Bottoms Up' - ugamije guteza imbere ubuzima bw'abantu baronka amikoro make nk'inzira yo kuzamura ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Abajijwe igituma umukuru w'igihugu ata na kimwe yari azi kuri urwo rugendo, Ruto yaciye yigovyora mu kubaza ngo: ''Urazi neza ko umukuru w'igihugu atarwo yari azi?' Harun Aydin ajemwo gute? Ruto yabandanije avuga ko mu myaka icenda amaze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu atari bwigere asabwa kubanza gusaba uruhusha ku ngendo ziwe zo hanze  y'igihugu, aca anibaza igituma ivyo bishitse ubu. Ruto  yanatanze umuco ku muntu aturuka muri Turkiya, Harun Aydin yari  ku rutonde rw'abo bari kujana muri urwo  rugendo. Yavuze ko Aydin ari umugwizatunga afise imitahe muri Kenya, akaba anashaka kwagurira ibikorwa vyiwe muri Uganda na Tanzania. Umwidondoro n'ubutumwa bw'uwo mugwizatunga vyatumye hari ibibazo vyibazwa biranavugwa cane mu binyamakuru bitandukanye mu gihugu. Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ari ''ugusara hamwe na poritike itagira agaciro'' gufata uwo munyamahanga nk'uwokekwa kuba uwukora iterabwoba  ata kindi kibitumye atari uko yari amuherekeje. Ku wa mbere, inyuma yo kurindira amasaha   atatu kugira yemerewe gufata urugendo, icegera c'umukutu w'igihugu yahavuye abuzwa kwurira indege yo kuja muri Uganda. Amategeko ya reta ya Kenya asaba abakozi  bakuru  ba reta gusaba uruhusha umukuru w'akazi ka reta imbere yo  gufata ingendo zo  mu bindi bihugu - ariko kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu gufata urugendo ntaho  vyari bwigere  biba. Umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta n'icegera ciwe ntibagifitaniye ubucuti bari bafitaniye bagitangura amabanga yo kurongora igihugu mu 2013. Ubwo bucuti bwabo bwatosekaye kuva umunsi Prezida Uhuru Kenyatta akorana mu minwe n'uwutavuga  rumwe na reta Raila Odinga mu 2018. Kuva ico gihe icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yaciye aba nk'uwushizwe ku ruhande mu bikorwa vy'icese vya reta. Umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda Duncan Abigaba, yari asanzwe ariwe ahuza ibikorwa vy'urugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu,  yemereye BBC ko  vy'ukuri Ruto yari yitezwe muri Uganda mu butumwa bwiwe bwite. Yasiguye ko Ruto hari inyungu arondera mu gisata c'uburimyi bw'urudandazwa no gukorera ku mugambi wiwe wo  kuri kaminuza ya Makerere wo gushinga igisata c'ivyigwa vy'uburongozi, the Dr.William Samoei Ruto Centre for Leadership. Mu kwezi guheze icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yahagarariye itanguza rw'uruganda rw'urucanco muri Uganda ku butumire bwa prezida Yoweri Museveni. Ariko ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire bwavuze ko ata rugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya bwari buzi. Ministre wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire, Oryem Okello yasiguye ko urwo rugendo rutamenyeshejwe ubushikiranganji bwiwe kandi ko n'abakira abashitsi batari biteguriye umuzo wiwe.

headline: UN iragiriza u Burundi na Tanzania gutoteza impunzi z'abarundi
text: Abahinga ba ONU bajejwe agateka ka zina muntu baratera akamo amareta y'Uburundi na Tanzania kwubahiriza uburenganzira bw'abasavye indaro muri ico gihugu. Bananebagura inkuru zivuga ko hariho impunzi zinyuruzwa, zisinzikarizwa ubuzima, zisubizwa mu Burundi ku nguvu zikongera zigaterwa n'ubwoba. ONU ivuga ko ivyo vyoba bikorwa n'inzego z'igipolisi n'iperereza vya Tanzania bafashanije n'iperereza ry'Uburundi. Bavuga bati : "Uretse amategeko akaze yo kubuza impunzi gucaruka, yashizweho na reta ya Tanzania, impunzi z'abarundi ubu zibayeho mu bwoba bwo kunyuruzwa mw'ijoro n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Tanzania, zikajanwa mu bibanza batazi canke bagasubizwa mu Burundi. "Abayoboke b'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na reta bahungiye muri Tanzania boba babandanya gukurikiranwa iyo bahungiye." Abo bahinga bavuga kandi ko uko umutekano wifashe mu makambi bidahumuriza, uravye inkuru zivuga ko abajejwe iperereza mu Burundi, bihinduye impunzi, batunga urutoke abantu baba baronderwa, mu nyuma bagaca bahagarikwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Tanzania. Basaba reta y'Uburundi guhagarika gutoteza abanyagihugu harimwo n'abo bariko bararondera gukingirwa n'amakungu mu gihugu ca Tanzania. Abo bahinga ba ONU bavuga bati : "Hari impunzi zemeje ko hari abatwarwa n'igipolisi ca Tanzania, bakanyuruzwa hanyuma bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima imbere y'uko birukanwa muri ico gihugu canke bategekwa gushira umukono ku rupapuro rwemeza ko bashaka gutahuka ku gushaka. "Bamwe babazwa kuvyerekeye kuba mu migwi igwana,  gutunga ibigwanisho, ibikorwa bakora mw'ikambi, rimwe na rimwe bakakwa amahera kugira barekurwe." Muri urwo rwandiko bavuga kandi ko bamwe mu mpunzi bishwe inyuma yo kunyuruzwa n'abajejwe umutekano ba Tanzania. Amakenga ku mutekano wabo, watumye bamwe mu mpunzi bemera gutaha, atari kugushaka ahubwo kubera ubwoba. Abo bahinga barangiza icegeranyo cabo bavuga ko bibabaje kubona kuva mu 2020 reta yavuze ko hari amatohoza ariko arakorwa ku bantu banyuruzwa, ariko gushika ubu akaba ata co arashikako. Reta ya Tanzania ngo irazi neza uko ivyo bintu vyifashe, ikaba isabwa kugira ico ikoze kugira bihagarare. Nta co reta y'Uburundi n'iya Tanzania bari bashikiriza ku mugaragaro kuri ibi vyashikirijwe n'abahinga ba ONU.

headline: Covid-19: Prezida wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni yitwariye ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor
text: Prezida Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda yashengeje mu butungane ikinyamakuru cigenga Daily Monitor, akiziza kwandika inkuru ko we n'abamwegereye bahawe urucanco rwa Covid-19 mu mpisho. Daily Monitor casubiyemwo inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru Wall Street ko prezida Museveni n'abamwegereye bicandagishije mu mpisho Covid-19, imbere y'uko abandi banyagihugu baronka urwo rucanco. Ico kirego ca prezida yatanze muri sentare nkuru kivuga ko iyo nkuru y'ico kimenyeshamakuru yanditswe mu ntumbero yo kumukorera ikibi n'ibigirankana. Ico kirego kiravuga kandi ko iyo nkuru, yanditswe itariki 23 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri, cerekana prezida nk'umuntu atisonera yiha uburenganzira hamwe n'akagwi gafise amahigwe yo kuba kamwegereye, gucandagwa imbere y'abakozi bo muvyo amagara y'abantu bari imbere mu kugwanya ico kiza hamwe n'imigwi igeramiwe gusumba iyindi. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihugu incuro zibiri zitandukanye mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, prezida Museveni yasavye ico kinyamakuru gusaba ikigongwe ku rupapuro rwa mbere rwaco. Ico kinyamakuru carisiguye kuri iyo nkuru mu ntango z'iyi ndwi. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku mboneshakure ku musi w'Imana, prezida yavuze ko acihweza urucanco bokoresha muri nyinshi zimaze kwemezwa. Museveni yongeyeko ko ashaka ko ikirangamisi co gutanga incanco gitangurira ku bantu bageramiwe kurusha abandi, nk'abakozi bo muvyo amagara y'abantu. Uganda iramaze kuronka incanco 860.000 za AstraZeneca, kandi abantu barenga 4.000, benshi muri bo bari mbere mu kugwanya coronavirus, baramaze gucandagwa.

headline: US: FBI yatesheje umugambi w'iterabwoba wo kwica George W Bush
text: Umunywanyi wa wa muhari wiyita Reta ya ki-Islam (Etat Islamique/Islamic State) yari yateguye kugandagura uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika George W Bush ariko uwu mugambi ukaba wahinyuwe na FBI, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi ba Amerika. Uwikekwa, akaba aba muri Ohio, yagirizwa ko yarondeye kwinjiza abarwanyi muri Amerika abavanye muri Mexique kugira bakore iki gitero. Ubu arapfunzwe, ejo ku wa kabiri akaba yararengukishijwe muri sentare y'igihugu i Ohio. FBI yakoresheje inderetsi hamwe n'ubuhinga bwo gucungera bwa elektroniki mu gutesha uwu mugambi. Nk'uko vyerekanwa n'inzandiko zo muri sentare, uyu muntu yikekwa - azwi kw'izina rya Shihab Ahmed Shihab w'imyaka 52 - ni umunyagihugu wa Irak abaye muri Amerika kuva mu 2020 akaba yari akirindiriye ubuhungiro yasavye. FBI ivuga ko Shihab yabwiye umwizigirwa wiwe, yigize uwinjiza abantu mu buryo bwa magendo, ko yari mu murwi uzwi nka Al-Raed - ijambo ry'icarabu risigura umuturagaro - ufise icicaro muri Qatar. Mu biganiro yagiranye n'isoko rya FBI,  Shihab avuga ko yashaka kwica George Bush kubera "yishe abanya-Irak benshi" yongera "asambura" Irak. Avuga kandi ko na we nyene yari kuba muri ico gitero "kandi ntiyaraba ko yari gupfa, kuko yari kuba yishimiye kuba mu bakora ico gitero". Shihab avugwa ko yariko arondera ibiranga abapolisi vy'amanyanga kandi ko yariko aratohoza kugira amenye ko abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam bashobora kwinjizwa muri Amerika mu kinyegero baciye ku rubibe rwa Mexique kugira ngo bakore iki gitero, hanyuma bagashobora gusubizwa inyuma mu kubahungisha. Abantu babiri yari yizeye kwinjiza muri Amerika bavugwa ko bahoze bakora mu gisata c'igendereza ca Irak kandi ko bamenyereye ibitero vyo kugandagura. Shihab avugwa kandi ko yavuganye n'irindi soko rya FBI yigize umukiriya mu vyo kwinjiza abantu mu kinyegero. Aba bareretsi bompi bafashe amajwi y'ibiganiro bagiriraniye nawe. Shihab avugwa ko yabwiye aya masoko ko yari yizeye gukoresha aba bantu mu kwinjiza abanywanyi ba Reta ya ki-Islam muri Amerika, n'aho atagirizwa kuba umunywanyi w'uyu muhari w'iterabwoba. Igihe kimwe, Shihab n'umwe muri aya masoko barajanye i  Dallas muri Texas gufata amashusho y'umuhana wa Bush hamwe n'ay'ikigo George W. Bush Institute. Muri Ntwarante (3) 2022, avugwa ko yakoresheje inama  mw'ihoteri y'i Columbus muri Ohio yo kurondera ibirwanisho n'imyambaro y'amanyanga y'abajejwe umutekano. Ashobora gucirirwa umunyororo w'imyaka 10 ku caha co kugerageza kwinjiza umuntu muri Amerika bidaciye mu mategeko, hamwe n'iyindi 20 ku caha co gufasha no gukokeza abashaka kugandagura uwahoze ari umutegetsi wa Amerika. Umuvugizi wa Bush avuga ko uyu yahoze arongoye iki gihugu "yizeye cane amakungu n'igisata ca Amerika kijejwe igendereza, hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano n'ibindi bisata bijejwe igendereza". BBC irarindiriye ico FBI ibivugako.

headline: Lionel Messi afise indoto yo gutsindira Ligue des Champions muri Paris St-Germain
text: Lionel Messi avuga ko afise indoto yo gusubira gutsindira Ligue des Champions/Champions League inyuma y'aho ashikiye muri Paris St-Germain, akongerako ati: "Nibaza ko hano dufise umurwi ushobora kubishikako". Uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 34 ari na we kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, yatsindiye Ligue des Champions incuro zine muri Barcelona, iyo aheruka ikaba ari iyo mu 2015. PSG iracarwana ngo itahukane ku ncuro ya mbere iri higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya, mw'ihiganwa rya 2020 ikaba yatsinzwe na Bayern Munich mu rukino rwa nyuma. Igihe yerekanwa nk'umukinyi wa PSG, Messi yavuze ati: "Intumbero n'indoto vyanje ni uko nosubira gutahukana Ligue des Champions". Messi yavuye muri Barcelona yari yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13 inyuma y'aho uwu murwi wa La Liga unaniriwe no guha ayandi masezerano uyu mukinyi kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mategeko ajanye n'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga muri iryo higanwa. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange baranze amateka y'umupira w'amaguru, Messi yinjije ibitsindo 672 mu nkino 778 yakiniye uwu murwi rurangiranwa w'i Catalan. Yaraciye umuhigo mu gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) incuro zitandatu, aterura n'ibikombe 35 mu gihe cose yari amaze i Nou Camp, ariko avuga ko ubu aryohewe no gutangura ibihe bishasha mu buzima bwiwe, inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Barcelona "bigoranye". Ari i Parc des Princes (ikibuga ca PSG), yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Yari impinduka igoye cane inyuma y'igihe kirekire cane".  "Ariko maze gushika hano, numvise mfise umunezero mwinshi cane kandi ndipfuza gutangura imyimenyerezo vuba bwango. Nshaka kwihuta". "Ikintu conyene nshaka ubu ni ugutangura imyimenyerezo. Ndashaka gukorana n'abakinyi bagenzanje hamwe n'abakozi, kugira ngo ntangure iki gihe gishasha mu buzima bwanje". "Ndafise iri shaka ryo gukina. Numva ndiko ndaribwaribwa. Numva ngishaka gutsinda nk'uko nabikoze mu gihe ca mbere c'umwuga wanje". "Ndumva ko uwu murwi witeguriye kurwanira ibikombe vyose. Ni ryo hangiro ryanje, nshaka kubandanya ntera imbere ngatsindira ibikombe, iki nico catumye nza muri uno murwi". Kuzana Messi muri uno murwi usanzwe urimwo ibihangange ni intambwe ikomeye kuri PSG mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuba kw'isonga mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya. Inyuma yo gutsindwa na Manchester City mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, mu nyuma igatakaza Ligue 1 yo mu Bufaransa yatsindiwe na Lille, PSG yaronse abakinyi bamaze gutahukana Ligue des Champions, nka Sergio Ramos, Georginio Wijnaldum na Messi. Ariko, Messi arazi neza ko, kugira ngo aterure igikombe ca Ligue des Champions ku ncuro igira gatanu, bishobora gushika agahura na Barcelona, kandi aremera ko gukina i Nou Camp yambaye umwambaro wa PSG vyoba ari ibintu "bigoye cane  kwumva". Yongerako ati: "Barcelona ni muhira kuri jewe - nabayeyo kuva ndi umwana muto kandi nahakoreye ibintu vyinshi cane. "Sinzi ko tuzohura nabo - ariko vyoba biryoshe cane gusubira i Barcelona. "Vyoba ari ibintu bigoye kwumva gukina muhira i Barcelona ndi mu wundi mwambaro ariko birashoboka, reka tuzoraba". Umuzo wa Messi ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa utumye PSG iba umwe mu mirwi ifise umurongo ukomeye cane w'abasatirizi kw'isi mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Uyu mukinyi agiye gukina ku ruhande rw'abasatirizi muri PSG ari kumwe n'abakinyi babiri bazimvye kurusha abandi mu bihe vyose vyabayeho, aba nabo bakaba ari Neymar bahoze bakinana muri Barcelona, hamwe na Kylian Mbappe. Umukuru wa PSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi aremeza ko kugura Messi bizotuma uwu murwi ushobora kugumana Mbappe, mu gihe amasezerano asanzwe afitaniye nawo azorangira mu 2022. Al-Khelaifi ati: "Yahora yipfuza umurwi ushobora guhiganwa, ubu ndibaza ko dufise umurwi wa mbere ukomeye cane kw'isi, rero nta citwazo ubu afise - nta kindi yokora atari kuguma hano". Avuga ku bijanye n'uko umurwi ukoresha amafaranga y'umurengera, Al-Khelaifi yongeyeko ati: "Ico mwebwe nk'abanyamakuru mukwiye kwibandako gusumba ibindi ni ukuraba iciza azaniye uno murwi hakwibanda ku bintu bibi". "Twabanje kuvugana n'abaduha amafaranga kandi twari tuzi ko dushobora kumuzana. Muri ivyo vyose, twabanje kuraba ko tutorenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amahera, kandi tuzokurikiza amategeko ngenderwako mw'ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga".

headline: Ronaldo ntazokurikiranwa ku caha co "gufata ku nguvu"
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, Cristiano Ronaldo, ntazokurikiranwa nyuma yo kwagirizwa guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, nk'uko bitangazwa n'abashinjacaha muri Amerika. Kathryn Mayorga w'imyaka 34, yari yavuze ko uwo mukinyi wa Juventus yamusambanije ku nguvu mw'ihoteri i Las Vegas mu 2009. Bivugwa ko yashitse ku mwumvikano udaciye muri sentare n'uwo rurangiranwa wo muri Portugal mu 2010, ariko asaba ko urubanza rwosubira kwugururwa mu 2018. Ronaldo ahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe kuwa mbere, abashinjacaha b'i Las Vegas bavuze ko ivyo uwo mugore avuga "bidashobora kwemezwa ata gukekeranya." Umwanditsi wa sentare yavuze ko uwo arega yavuze ko yahotewe mu 2009, ariko yanka kuvuga aho vyabereye canke uwamuhohoteye uwo ari we. Ngo ku bw'izo mvo rero igipolisi nticashoboye "gukora itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose ryogira ishingiro." Mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018, igipolisi c'i Las Vegas cakoze irindi tohoza bisabwe n'uwo avuga ko yahohotewe. Igitangazamakuru co mu Budage, Der Spiegel, nico catangaje ubwa mbere iyo nkuru mu mwaka uheze. Cavuze ko mu 2010 uwo mugore yashitse ku mwumvikano bidaciye muri sentare na Ronaldo, aho yahawe amahera $375,000, yemera ko atazokwigera avuga ivyo vyagiriji ku mugaragaro. Uwunganira Madamu Mayorga mu vy'amategeko yavuze ko yahawe ingoga zo kuvyutsa uru rubanda n'isekeza rya #MeToo, rirwanya ihohoterwa ry'abagore. Ronaldo ntiyahakanye ko yahuye n'uwo mugore i Las Vegas mu 2009, ariko avuga ko ivyabaye hagati yabo vyari ku gushaka kwa bose. Ico gihe Ronaldo yari agikinira Manchester United, agomba aje muri Real Madrid, aho yamaze imyaka icenda yakurikiye.

headline: Ethiopia – Tigray: Imvo n'Imvano ku ntambara hagati y'ingabo za reta n'inyeshamba (ikiganiro gisubiwemo)
text: Mwaramukanye amahoro mwese muteze amatwi Imvo n'Imvano yo kuri uyu wa gatandatu tariki 2 z'ukwa 10 mu 2021. Uyu munsi turabasubiriramo ikiganiro twabagejejeho ku itariki 18 z'ukwezi gushize, ikiganiro cyavugaga ku ntambara ibera muri Ethiopia. Ni ikiganiro mwateguriwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo. Muri iki kiganiro c'uyu musi tuganira ku kibazo catangaje amakungu, mu gihe isi yose yarimaze guha amanota menshi umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed, akanahabwa mbere n'agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel, kubera ivyo yaramaze guhindura mu gihugu ciwe. Iyo nkuru nziza ntiyamaze kabiri, mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, ico gihugu cadutsemo intambara irabica biracika hagati ya reta ya Ethiopia n'abagwanyi bo mu ntara ya Tigray (Tigré). Biragoye kumenya ivyerekeye iyo ntambara kuko abayirimwo nta n'umwe yipfuza uwuhonyozayo ikirenge cane cane amashirahamwe yigenga canke abamenyeshamakuru. Intara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia, ihana urubibe n'ibihugu vya Sudani na Eritrea, ikaba ibamwo abantu barenga imiliyoni zitanu kuri miliyoni zirenga 118 ziri muri Ethiopia. Imigenderanire hagati ya reta ya Ethiopia n'abategetsi b'intara ya Tigray yatanguye gutituka mu 2018 umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed ashikiriye ubutegetsi. Ico gihe uwo mutegetsi ava mu bwoko bw'aba Oromo, ari bo benshi muri Ethiopia, yashatse gukoraniriza hamwe amoko akomakomeye yo muri ico gihugu mu mugambwe wiwe  no mu butegetsi, abanye Tigray bahurikiye mu mugambwe wa TPLF (Tigray People's Liberation Front) bagize ibice 6% mu gihugu baranka, bemera kuja mu batavuga rumwe na reta, bavuga y'uko batahawe ibibanza bikwiye. Umuhari w'abanye Tigray TPLF waragize uruhara runini mu ntambara yo kugwanya ubutegetsi bw'intwaro ya gisirikare mfatakibanza y'umukazo y'aba socialiste mu 1975. Mu 1991, uwo muhari waratsinze amatora uri mu runani rwa EPRDF (Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front). Kuva ico gihe wafashe ubutegetsi gushika mu 2018. Mu 2020, abo banye Tigray bahurikiye mu mugambwe wa TPLF baciye batangura gushaka kwiyonkora kuri Ethiopia igihe reta yafata ingingo yo kwungururiza ku rindi sango amatora yari ategekanijwe muri uyo mwaka, kubera ikiza ca Covid-19, amatora uwo muhari wo watunganije muri Tigray ugirako urayatsinda. Mu kubahana, reta yaciye igabanya cane amahera agenewe iyo ntara. Ibintu vyagiye kunyuka itariki 4 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe aho uwo muhari wa TPLF watera ikambi y'igisirikare ca reta i Mekelle utwara ibigwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho. Abategetsi ba Ethiopia baciye batangaza ko Tigray igengwa n'amategeko y'intambara banamenyesha ko batacemera ubutegetsi bw'iyo ntara, ari na ko bagiriyeko bagira ibitero kuri uwo muhari. Italiki 21 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, Ethiopia yategetse abagwanyi ba TPLF gushira ibigwanisho hasi kandi bahite bava i Mekelle ku mugwa mukuru w'iyo ntara, hari hazungurutswe n'ingabo za reta. Inyuma y'imisi itanu, umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yamenyesheje ko hagira habe igitero ca nyuma simusiga ku bagwanyi ba TPLF. Iyo ntambara imaze guhitana abantu bataramenyekana igitigiri, n'abandi ONU/UN ivuga ko bahunze boba bashika 200.000. Iryo shirahamwe kandi rivuga ko rikeneye imiliyoni 200 z'amadorari yo gufasha vyihuta abasinzikajwe n'iyo ntambara. Ariko n'izo mfashanyo ntizoroshe gushikana muri ako karere. Amerika n'Umuryango w'ubumwe bwa Buraya (EU/UE) barahamagariye impande zose kuja mu biganiro ariko reta ya Ethiopia iranana, ahubwo ihitamwo gushira umuhari wa TPLF ku rutonde rw'abitwaza iterabwoba. Abiy Ahmed anahamagarira amakungu kutisuka mu biraba igihugu ciwe. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika (AU/UA) ryararungitse intumwa zigizwe n'abahoze ari abakuru b'ibihugu Joaquim Chissano, Ellen Johnson Sirleaf na Kgalema Motlanthe, ariko ntaco bashitseko. Mu nyuma hagenywe Olusegun Obasanjo yahoze arongoye Nigeria ngo abe umuhuza, ariko umuhari wa TPLF uramwiyamiriza ko ahengamye. Reta yari yatangaje agahengwe ariko mu nyuma isugerejwe ihamagarira abanyagihugu bose guhaguruka ngo bagwanye uwo muhari. Umuhari wa TPLF warivyukiranije muri iyo ntambara impande zose zagirizwa ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, urigarurira umugwa mukuru Mekelle, uranigarurira n'ibice bimwe bimwe mu zindi ntara bihana urubibe za Amhara na Afar bagiriza gufasha reta ya Ethiopia muri iyo ntambara. None iyo ntambara izorangira gute? Ko Tigray ishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ethiopia, ntibizoteba bigashoboka? Hazotinda haba ibiganiro bihuza izo mpande zose zishamiranye? Amashirahamwe ya UA na ONU ariko aravyifatamwo gute? Ivyo ni bimwe mu bibazo tugiye kuronderera inyishu hamwe muri kino kiganiro. Muri kino kiganiro tugiye kuba hamwe na Padiri Désiré Yamuremye, umusesenguzi akaba ari i Bujumbura mu Burundi. Turi kumwe kandi na Kangolo Jacques asanzwe aba ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis-Abeba. Turi kumwe kandi na Ismael Buchanan, umwigisha kuri kaminuza mu Rwanda, akaba ari n'icegera c'uwurongoye ishirahamwe riharanira iterambere ry'Abanyafrika mu Rwanda.

headline: Motsepe agiye gutwara Caf ubwo asigaye ari wenyene mw'ihiganwa
text: Patrice Motsepe niwe agiye kuba umukuru w'urwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Africa (Caf)  inyuma y'aho igihano c'imyaka itanu ca Ahmad kigabanirijwe kikaja ku myaka ibiri  na sentare ijejwe amatati mu nkino (Cas) kuri uyu wa mbere. Inzira y'uwo mutunzi aharura amafaranga muri za miriyaridi Motsepe yo kuba umunya-Afrika y'Epfo wa mbere atwaye Caf ubu ni umuharuro inyuma y'aho batatu mu bo bahiganwa basokoreye mu mpera z'indwi yaraye iheze. Intambanyi ya nyuma  kugira uwo mugabo w'imyaka 59  ashikire ico kibanza ku wa gatanu yari kuba  ukugaruka kw'uwahora atwara Caf Ahmad, yari akeneye gutsinda rwose urubanza rw'ingingo yafatiwe na FIfa kugira ashobore kuja  muri ayo matora. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 61 aturuka muri Madagascar ntiyabishitseko, n'ubwo yateye intambwe mu kuba igihano ciwe cavuyeko ibirenga ica kabiri, n'amafaranga yaciriwe kuriha akava ku bihumbi birenga 200 vy'ama dolari agashirwa ku bihumbi birenga gato 50 gusa. N'ubwo yejejwe ku bijanye n'ivyo Caf yakoranye na kompanyi yo mu Bufaransa Tactical Steel, Ahmad  yagiriwe no kurenga ku zindi ngingio zitatu za Fifa. Cas yavuze mw'itangazo iti: ''Abagize Cas mu ruhande rumwe bahaye agaciro urubanza rwungurujwe bagabanya ikiringo c'igihano cari caciriwe Ahmad gishirwa ku myaka ibiri, guhera uyu munsi, havuyemwo ico amaze kumara hagati y'itariki 19 z'ukwezi kwa 11 mu 2020 n'itariki 29 ukwezi kwa mbere mu 2021, banagabanya ihadabu." Urwego rujejwe amatati rusanga Ahmad ata nyungu ku giti ciwe zaranze amasezerano hagati ya Caf na Tactical Steel, ikigo gikora ibikoresho vyo kwinonora imitsi, ariko amasezerano akaba yari yerekeye ko iyo kompanyi yogurisha kuri Caf imyambaro yo gukinana. Ariko yagiriwe no kuba yararenze ingingo z'akarangamutima zijanye no 'gutanga no kwakira  utuganuke canke utundi turusho', 'gukoresha nabi ubutegetsi' no 'gukoresha uburyo nk'uko bwoba ari rwawe'' Abantu batatu bagize Cas bemeje ata n'umwe avuyemwo ko hatagaragara neza inyandiko zerekeye amafaranga Ahmad yahawe ''kw'iherekanwa ritandukanye  ry'amafaraga, kwemera  guhabwa amafaranga abona, ayaciye muri banki n'utundi turusho tudaciye mu masezerano canke mu nzira zitegekanijwe'. Ariko ku bijanye no gufata ingingo niba gutunganya urugendo rw'idini rwa Umrah muri Arabia Saudite  Ahmad yararenze ingingo zijanye no gutanga utuganuke hongeyeko kwiyitirira uburyo, aho habonetse igitigiri gikenewe gusa kugira ingingo yemezwe.

headline: Iran 'iriko irasenyura' igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kubera imyiyerekano
text: N﻿a Siavash Ardalan & Marita Moloney BBC Persian Umushikirizamanza mukuru w’igihugu avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato, ari naco kijejwe kwubahiriza itegeko rya Islam rijejwe inyambaro muri Irani, kiriko kirasenyurwa. Amajambo ya Mohammad Jafar Montazeri, n’aho ataremezwa n’ibindi bisata, yashikirijwe mu birori vyariko biba ejo ku wa Mungu. Irani imaze amezi atari make mu myiyerekano yaturutse ku rupfu rw’umugore yari akiri muto yapfiriye mu gasho. Mahsa Amini yari yapfunzwe n’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato camwagiriza ko yahonyanze amabwirizwa ajanye no kwitwikira. Montazeri yari mw’ikoraniro ry’amadini igihe abazwa niba igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasamburwa. Yavuze ati: "Igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ntaco gisa gisana n’ubutungane kandi carugawe kuva aho catanguriye”. Iki gipolisi kigenzurwa n’ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati, ntikigenzurwa n’ubutungane. Ku wa gatandatu, Montazeri yabwiye kandi inama nshingamateka ya Irani ko ibwirizwa ritegeka abagore kwambara wa mwambaro wa hijab rigiye kwihwezwa. Ariko n’aho igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasamburwa ntibisigura ko iri tegeko rimaze imyaka mirongo rizoca rihinduka. Imyiyerekano irongowe n’abagore, yiswe “imigumuko” n’abategetsi, ikwiragiye muri Irani kuva Amini  yari afise imyaka 22 apfiriye mu gasho ku wa 16 z’ukw’icenda, inyuma y’imisi itatu ahagaritswe n’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ku mugwa mukuru Tehran. Urupfu rwiwe rwabaye intandaro y’aka kaguma ariko kandi rwaje rukurikira uburakari bwari busanzwe mu gihugu butewe n’ubukene, ubushomeri, ubusumbasumbane, akarenganyo n’igiturire. Mu gihe vyokwemezwa, isamburwa ry’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ryoba ryerekana ko ubutegetsi bwemeye impinduka ariko nta cemeza ko ico conyene coba kimaze kugira ngo imyiyerekano ihagarare, aho abari muri yo bagiye baturira ibitambara vyo kwitwikira mu mutwe. Mu kiganiro Newshour ca BBC, umugore umwe w’umunya-Irani yavuze ati: "Kubona reta yafashe ingingo yo gusenyura igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ntibisigura ko imyiyerekano ihagaze. "N’aho reta yovuga ko kwambara hijab ari ku gushaka kw’umuntu ntibihagije. Abanyagihugu barazi ko ata kazoza ka Irani igifise reta nk’iyi ku butegetsi. “Tugiye kubona ingene abanyagihugu b’ingeri zitandukanye za Irani, baba ba ntahompagaze canke abakigendera ku mico ya kera, baza gushigikira abagore bariko bararwanira uburenganzira bwabo”. Uwundi mugore nawe ati: "Twebwe, abari mu myiyerekano, ntitukirajwe ishinga na hijab. Tumaze imisi 70 dutembera tutayambaye. "Tubona impinduka. Hijab niyo yabaye intango kandi nta kindi dushaka kindi atari urupfu rw’umukuru w’igihugu atwaza umukazo n’ihinduka ry’ubutegetsi”. Ibinyamakuru vya reta ya Irani vyahakanye amakuru avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasaburwa, nk’uko bivugwa na CNN. Imboneshakure ya reta Al-Alam yoba yatangaje ko ibinyamakuru vyo mu mahanga vyerekana ko amajambo ya Montazeri avuga ko "Irani yasubije umugongo inyuma ku kibazo ca hijab n’ukwicisha bugufi, kandi ko vyavuye ku migumuko iheruka”. "Ariko nta mutegetsi n’umwe wa Irani aratangaza ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato casambuwe”. Umushikiranganji wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken avuga ko ari nka hamwe Irani yosambura igipolisi kijejwe inyifato coba ari “ikintu ciza” anashimagiza “ubutwari budasanzwe bw’urwaruka rwa Irani, cane cane abagore, bafashe iya mbere muri ino myiyerekano”. Blinken avuga ati: "Nimba ubutegetsi hari ukuntu bwishuye ibisabwa muri iyo myiyerekano, iki coba ari ikintu ciza”. Kuva habaye impinduka za ki-Islam mu 1979 muri Irani, iki gihugu cagiye kigira integuro zitandukanye z’“igipolisi kijejwe inyifato”, ariko ikiriho ubu – kizwi nka Gasht-e Ershad – nico nyamukuru muri kino gihe kijejwe guhagararira ikurikizwa ry’itegeko rya Islam rijejwe inyifato muri Irani. Catanguye gukizura mu 2006 mu ntumbero yo kwubahiriza ibwirizwa rigenga inyambaro, ritegeka abagore kwambara impuzu ndende rikabuza kwambara ikaburuta, amajinisi (jeans) atabaguye hamwe n’izindi mpuzu zifatwa ko zitiyubashe.

headline: Coup d’Etat muri Burkina Faso : Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henry Sandaogo Damiba ni nde?
text: Umuhari 'Le Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration' urongowe na Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damila. Ariko none uwo akuye ubutegetsi bwa prezida Roch Marc Kabore ni nde? Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba w'imyaka 41, n'umusirikare mukuru mu bagwanira ku butaka muri Burkina Faso. Yahora arongoye intara ya gatatu ya gisirikare irimwo na Ouagadougou, umugwa mukuru. Colonel Damiba yahoze ari mu basirikare bacungera umukuru w'igihugu, yahoze acungera ubuzima bwa Blaise Compaore, imbere y'uko bavana mu 2011 inyuma y'igumuka ry'igisirikare. Mu 2015, ari mu basirikare bakuru biyamirije itembegazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ico gisata nyene c'abasirikare bacungera umukuru w'igihugu, urwo rwego rukaba rwaciye rufutwa. Yarahamagawe nk'icabona mu rububanza kuko yari yavuganye umwanya muremure na Gen Djibril Bassole. Kuva mu 2016, ari imbere mu ntambara yo kugwanya iterabwoba. Yaragiye mu mahugurwa nka yose ahariwe ibisata vya gisirikare bidasanzwe. Yarananditse n'igitabo citwa:  Armées ouest-africaines et terrorism : réponses incertaines? Paul-Henri Damiba yararongoye ibisata vyinshi vya gisirikare harimwo  Dori na Ouahigouya, intara yiziziwe n'ibitero. Prezida wa  Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration biganye na Emmanuel Zoungrana, yahagaritswe itariki 8 z'uku kwezi kwa mbere 2022 yagirizwa gushaka kubangamira   umutekano w'igihugu.

headline: Coronavirus: WHO isaba ibihugu vya Afrika kutajugunya incanco zataye igihe
text: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, risaba ibihugu vya Afrika kudaturira incanco za Covid-19 zishobora kuba zarataye igihe. Ibi bihugu vyasabwe kubangira bikarindira iyindi nzira nyayo. Aka kamo ka OMS kaje inyuma y'aho ibihugu vya Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo bitangarije ko bitegura guturira doze hafi 70.000 z'urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca kubera zataye igihe hagati muri uku kwa kane. Ariko ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara (Africa CDC) kivuga ko cari cijejwe ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise, zishobora gukoreshwa. Incanco nyinshi zirashobora gukoreshwa gushika ku mezi 36 (umwaka n'igice) kuva zihinguwe, ariko kubera ko izi za Covid-19 ari nshasha, nta vyemezo bikwiye bihari vyerekana ko zishobora kumara igihe kirekire zigifise inguvu. Ingingo ya nyuma izofatwa n'ibisata vy'ibihugu bijejwe kugenzura imiti. Igikorwa co gucandaga abantu mu kubakingira coronavirus muri Afrika kigenda bukebuke, ahanini kubera atazihari zikwiye hamwe n'abantu benshi bazifiseko amakenga. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kane, John Nkengasong,  arongoye ikigo Africa CDC yavuze ati:  "Akamo ntera ibihugu vya Afrika ni aka: nimba uruhara rwacu ari ukurondera izi ncanco, namwe uruhara rwanyu ni uko mukoresha izi ncanco". Malawi ivuga ko itegura guturira doze zirenga 16.000 z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca rwahinguwe na kompanyi y'Ubuhindi, Serum Institute of India (SII), kubera igihe cazo ntarengwa cari gushika ku wa 13 z'uku kwa kane. Ku ruhande rwayo, Sudani y'Epfo itegura guturira doze hafi 59.000 kuri iyo mvo nyene. Izi ncanco zari zahawe ibihugu 13 vya Afrika mu mugambi wo gufashanya hagati y'Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika (UA) n'ikompanyi y'itumatumanako MTN , nk'uko bivugwa na Peter Mwai wo mu gisata Reality Check ca BBC. Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika waguze umuriyoni wa doze za  AstraZeneca zari muri Afrika y'Epfo yari yahagaritse gutanga kubera amakenga ko zitari gukinga ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwari burwiriye muri ico gihugu. Ikigo Africa CDC caciye kizirungika mu bihugu mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, hasigaye indwi nkeya ngo zite igihe. Nkengasong yavuze ko ikompanyi Serum Institute of India (SII) yahanuye Africa CDC ko "izi ncanco zishobora kubandanya zikoreshwa mu kiringo c'amezi icenda inyuma y'itariki ntarengwa". Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti , asaba ibihugu "kubika neza izi ncanco mu gihe tukibandanya twiga twongera tugerageza kurondera kumenya nimba izi ncanco zishobora gukoreshwa mu kiringo kirekire". Uretse Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo, OMS ivuga ko Ghana na Sierra Leone navyo nyene bitakoresheje incanco zose kubera zari zataye igihe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Sierra Leone avuga ko igihugu cari gisigaranye hafi ica gatatu ca doze cari cahawe. Austin Demby  yabwiye BBC ati:  "Twategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose tugakoresha izi ncanco". Ku bihugu 55 vya Afrika, 41 nivyo vyahawe incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu Covax wo guhanahana izi ncanco. Hari ibindi indwi bikirindiriye kuronswa igice ca mbere. Umugambi wa Covax ufise intumbero yo gusaranganya incanco mu bihugu vyose ku rugero rungana, vyaba ibitunze canke ibikenye. Gushika ubu, doze zingana n'imiriyoni 38 nizo zimaze guhabwa ibihugu 98. Abahinga bavuga ko kugira ngo iki kiza karanda kirwanye ari uko incanco ziatangwa ku rugero rungana ku bihugu vyose kw'isi.

headline: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
text: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

headline: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
text: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

headline: Tottenham 0-2 Chelsea: Rudiger wa Chelsea avuga ko yatyojwe kubera ari umwirabure
text: Ishirahamwe ry'abakinyi b'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza (PFA ) risaba leta y'ico gihugu gukora amahotoza kw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe umukinyi wa Chelsea mu rukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu . Vyabaye ngombwa ko umuhagarikizi w'urwo rukino Anthony Taylor ahagarika urukino umwanya muto  mu gice ca kabiri inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umwirabure Antonio Rudiger amenyeshereje ko yariko yumva abantu bamuririmbira indirimbo zamwita ko ari inguge. Tottenham ivuga ko "izofata ingingo zikomeye zishoboka" kandi ko  izokora amatohoza "amatohoza akomeye". Iyo ngendo y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yagiye kwibonekeza inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'imbere wa Tottenham Son Heung-min aherewe ikarata itukura  kw'ikosa yakoreye Rudiger  n'ibigirankana. Ibintu bikaba vyayangaye inyuma y'aho hari ibintu vyatewe umunyegori wa Chelsea Kepa Arrizabalaga. Inyuma y'aho umuhagarikizi ahagarikiye urukino, hasohowe itangazo mu kibuga ryagabisha ko "hari ingendo y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ririko rirahungabanya urukino". Iryo tangazo ryasohowe incuro zitatu zose. PFA  ivuga ko yababajwe cane n'iryo tyozwa ryisubiriza mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. PFA ivuga iti: "Biraboneka ko abakinyi bariko bahura n'ingorane zikomeye z'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ririko rifata umurindi ukomeye mu Bwongereza, n'aho atari bo bonyene". "PFA yifatanije umubabaro n'umukinyi wese ariko ahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura. Kw'izina ryabo, tuzobandanya urugamba rwo kurwanya ako kabi". "Football ni kimwe mu biranga Abongereza - hamwe n'isinzi ry'abakunzi bayo mu mpande zose z'isi, ni igikorwa cacu rero co kurwanya ako kabi ata kigongwe". PFA isaba "ibigo vyose vya leta" hamwe "n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu mupira w'amaguru" gukorera hamwe kugira ngo bahangane, barwanye kandi barandurane n'imizi ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba mu bibuga eka no mu bindi bisata vy'igihugu. PFA isaba kandi leta gukora amatohoza ku bijanye n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu mupira w'amaguru. Ku ruhande rwayo, Tottenham imenyesha ko izokorana na Chelsea n'abakinyi bayo kugira bihwereze hamwe ivyashikiye umukinyi wa Chelsea. Mw'itangazo uyo murwi wasohoye, uvuga uti: "Ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ntirishobora kwihanganirwa mu bibuga vyacu". "Ivyabaye tugiye kubikorerako n'ishaka rinini kandi tuzofatira ingingo ruhasha umuntu uwo ari we wese azoboneka ko yagize inyifato nk'iyo, harimwo n'ukumubuza gusubira kwinjira mu bibuga". Rudiger avuga ko ari ibintu bibabaje kubona hari abantu bakirangwa n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru. Ati: "Ni ibiterasoni kubona mu mwaka wa 2019 hacibonekeza ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. None ubu bujuju buzohera ryari?" Ivyashikiye Rudiger nijoro bibaye inyuma y'umwaka umukinyi wa Manchester City, Raheem Sterling na we nyene atyojwe kubera ari umwirabure kuri ico kibuga nyene ca Chelsea mu kwa 12 2018. Ivyo vyatumye umufana wa Chelsea umwe afatirwa ingingo yo kutazigera asubira kwinjira mu kibuga".

headline: Covid: Akajagari mu ngendo karabandanya muri iyi ndwi
text: Izindi ngendo nyinshi  z'indege  zafuswe irya n'ino kw'isi mu gihe indwi itanguye, ivyo bikiyongera ku gihe c'iminsi mikuru kitagendeye neza abantu baharugwa mu bihumbi. Indege zirenga 14.000 zahagaritswe kuri uyu wa mbere, izija mu Bushinwa na Amerika zikaba arizo nyinshi, nk'uko bitangazwa n'urubuga rukurikirana ivy'ingendo z'indege, FlightAware. Amakompanyi y'indege ya Amerika  avuga ko iryo hungabana riterwa n'uko hari abakozi batorwa umugera canke bishize ukwa bonyene. Hong Kong yabujije ingendo za Kompanyi ya Korera y'Epfo, Korea Air, mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri, kuko hari abatowe ko banduye mu bo yazanye. Muri rusangi, ingendo 8.000 zarafuswe mu gihe ca weekend ndende ya Noël yatanguye ku wa gatanu. N'ubwo izo atari ingendo nyinshi ufatiye kw'ijana ku ziba zitegekanijwe muri rusangi, ico gitigiri ni kinini kurusha igisanzwe kandi gishitse mu bihe vy'umwaka aho abantu benshi baba bariko barafata ingendo zo kuja gusangira iminsi mikuru n'umuryango canke n'abagenzi. Hagati aho Amerika iriko irakurikiranira hafi ivy'amato aharugwa mu mirongo arimwo abanduye Covid mu gihe ari mu ngendo mu mazi y'ico gihugu, menshi bikaba bivugwa ko yankiwe kwinjira mu bivuko vy'amazinga ya Carraibes, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP. Ibitigiri vy'abandura biguma biduga kw'isi kubera ubwoko bushasha bwa Omicron. N'ubwo ivyigwa vya mbere vyerekanye ko Omicron itababaza cane nk'ubundi bwoko, abahinga batewe impungenge n'ibitigiru vy'abandura. Nyinshi mu ndege zafuswe ku wa mbere ni iz'amakompanyi yo mu Bushinwa, nk'uko bivugwa na FlightAware. Zirimwo China Eastern, yafuse ingendo 368, na Air China, yafise 141. Ibibuga vy'indege vya  Beijing na Shanghai nivyo bisa n'ivyakozweko kuruta, ahafuswe indege 300 muri rusangi. Hagati aho kompanyi zo muri Amerika zakozweko cane ni United, yafuse 84, na JetBlue 66. United yari yagabishije mu ndwi iheze ko ukwiyongera kw'abandura Omicron "kwagize ingaruka ku bakozi bacu b'indege no ku bakora ibikorwa vyacu". Abakozi benshi bakaba basabwa kuguma ukwa bonyene kubera baba bahuye n'abanduye. Omicron ubu nibwo bwoko bwiganje muri Amerika. Ariko n'ibirere bibi birafise uruhara. Urubura rwinshi rwiyanikiye hasi rwatumye indege zicererwa ruhungabanya n'amabarabara mu ntara ya Washington yo mu burengero ku wa Mungu, biza vyiyongera ku kajagari ko mu ngendo. Mu Bwongereza , Bristish Airways yafuse ingendo 42 ku wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa na FlightAware. Ikibuga ca London ca Heathrow cafuse ingendo 47. Gushika ubu abantu bashika miriyoni 5,4 baramaze kwicwa na coronavirus kw'isi, ku bwa kamimuza ya Johns Hopkins yo muri Amerika. Abamaze kwandura nabo mi miriyoni 280.

headline: Kubera iki tutakiramba nko mu myaka iheze?
text: Mu kiringo hafi c'ibinjana bibiri, ikiringo co kubaho cariyongereye ku rugero rudasanzwe. Mu myaka ya 1840, abantu ntibarenza imyaka 40 muri rusangi. Ariko iterambere mu bijanye n'imfunguro, ubuvuzi, uburaro hamwe n'isuku mu gihe  c'ihinduka muvyo amahinguriro vyatumye gushika mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990, abantu bashobora kubaho hafi imyaka 60. Uko ikinjana ca 20 cagenda gitera kija imbere, uretse imyaka y'intambara, ibintu vyagumye bitera imbere mu vyo amagara y'abantu kuri bose n'ugukingira abana. Kuva mu myaka ya 1970,  habaye iterambere muvyo kuvura indwara z'imitima cane cane, bikaba vyabandanije bitera intambwe ku muvuduko munini. Icibonekeza ni uko kuva mu ntango y'ikinjana ca 21, imyaka y'ukubaho yiyongera gushika ku myaka 80 ku bagore, na 75 ku bagabo. Ivyo vyarabandanije uko, aho uko imyaka hafi ine iheze hiyongerako uwundi mwaka wo kubaho. Ariko rero ivyo vyarahagaze giturumbuka - canke vyaragabanuye umurindi, kuva mu mwaka wa 2011. Ni ivyo akanya gato canke bizobandanya uko biri? Mu ntango abahinga bibaza ko ari ingorane nto. Nivyo ko umwaka wa 2015 wabaye umwaka udasanzwe, aho ibitigiri vy'abapfuye vyaduze - urushana rwari rubi cane kubera akaranda k'ibicurane kabiciye bigacika. Ariko rero ubu biraboneka ko ata vyo gushikuza birimwo. Ibiharuro vya nyuma biherutse gushikirizwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ibarura, vyerekana ko n'aho hari iciyongereyeko hagati ya 2016-2018 inyuma y'urwo rushana, haracari agahaze ugereranije n'imyaka y'imbere y'aho. Ingene ibintu biboneka ubu, bizofata imyaka 12 ku bantu baba mu Bwongereza kugira ngo imyaka yo kubaho ishobore kwiyongerako uwundi mwaka. Hari abavuga ko inyuma y'imyaka itari mike y'iterambere, abantu bashitse ku rugero ntarengwa rw'ukubaho kwabo. Umuntu wa mbere yabayeho imyaka myinshi  nk'uko impapuro zivyerekana ni umufaransakazi Jeanne Calment yapfuye afise imyaka 122 - ariko haciye imyaka irenga 20. Ubushakashatsi bwasohotse mu kinyamakuru Nature bwavuze ko imyaka ntarengwa y'ukubayo - kiretse abo bakeya cane nka ba madame Calment - ari hafi imyaka 115. Ariko hari ababihakana. Aho ni nk'umuhinga w'Umunyamerika mu biraba ibigize umuntu (généticien), David Sinclair, aherutse kwandika igitabo yise Lifespan (Imyaka y'ukubaho) aho avuga ko iyo uduhimba tw'umubiri w'umuntu dutuma abaho (genes) twongerejwe inguvu, abantu bashobora kubaho igihe kirekire. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, hari vyinshi vyerekana ko abanyagihugu b'Ubwongereza batashobora gushikana iyo myaka y'ukubaho. Akarorero, imyaka y'ukubaho mu Buyapani yariyongereye muri ino myaka iheze gusumba mu Bwongereza, muri ico gihugu kizwi ko abanyagihugu baco baramba gusumba abandi. Umuhinga mu bijanye n'ubusaza, Edward Morgan, avuga ko hari ibituma vyinshi, agasaba ko haba ibikorwa vyinshi vy'ubushakashatsi kuri ico kibazo. Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza kiza carakoze makeya muri ayo. Icegeranyo casohoye mu mwaka uheze, kirashira ahabona ibituma bitari bike. Kimwe mu bituma bivugwa ni uko mu myaka iharurwa kuri mirongo n'iyindi iheze, ata kintu kinini cahindutse mu biraba ubuvuzi. Iyo abantu batishwe n'iki, harashobora kwaduka iyindi ndwara. Mu gihe igitigiri kitari gito c'abantu babandanya bikinga impfu ziva ku ndwara z'imitima na kanseri, igitigiri c'abahitanwa n'indwara zo mu mutwe catanguye kuduga. Hanyuma mu gihe isi iriko irarwana kugira ngo ishobore gupfupfahaza iyo ndwara - ivyo kuyirandurana n'imizi vyibagirwe - imyaka yo kubaho igenda igabanuka. Icibonekeza ni uko ibintu vyagiye vyunyuka mu bakene, kikavuga ko leta ibifisemwo uruhara kubera ingingo z'ugutubika umukanda zatumye uburyo bwakoreshwa mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu n'ukwitaho imibereho y'abanyagihugu bugabanuka.

headline: Burundi: Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze iki mu butumwa bw’umunsi w’Ukwikukira?
text: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko inyuma yo inyuma y'uko Uburundi buhabuje intahe y'ukwikukira bwagumye bugoyagoya bugatangira kubona agahengwe mu 2005 ariko ko mu 2015 hariho abashatse kunyaga iyo ntahe. Mu butumwa bujanye n'umunsi wo guhimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira uhimbazwa uyu munsi mu Burundi, Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye Abarundi kuzirikana uyu munsi bibuka icipfuzo ca mbere kiri mu ndirimbo y'igihugu ari co : "Shinga icumu mu mashinga…" Agira ati : "Uburundi ntibwoshinga icumu mu mashinga butubatse imigenderanire myiza n'ibindi bihugu n'amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu." Gusa avuga ko Uburundi bwakoze ibishoboka ngo bubanire neza ibindi bihugu "nk'abazimyamuriro" ariko ko hariho ababirenzeko "baratudurumbanya", bafatira Uburundi ingingo z'agahotoro, ngo "vyose bakabikora bihetse kuri benewacu bataye umurongo." Yagize ati : "Muribuka namwe ingene bagerageje gutembagaza inzego zitorewe n'abenegihugu mu mwaka w'2015 Imana igakinga. N'ejo n'ejo bundi, tubimenye kandi tubimenyere, kirazira kikaziririzwa kuvuguruza ijambo ryapfunditswe n'abenegihugu biciye mu matora." Yongeraho ati : "Turashimiye inzego zijejwe umutekano, izijejwe kwivuna abansi, hamwe n'Abarundi bose bahagaze rugabo mu gutesha inkorabara zashatse kutunyaga intahe y'ukwikukira." Mu 2015 harabaye imyiyereko yiyamiriza kwongera kwitoza kw'uwari Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza, bikurikirwa no gushaka gutembagaza ubutegetsi vyaburijwemwo. Leta y'u Burundi yaragirije iy'u Rwanda uruhara muri uwo mugambi mbere ivuga ko benshi mu bawugerageje bahungiye mu Rwanda, leta y'u Rwanda yarabihanye. Kuva ico gihe ubutegetsi bw'ibihugu vyompi burebana ay'ingwe. Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko inyuma yo guhabuza Intahe y'ukwikukira mu 1962 Uburundi bwagumye bugwa buvyuka kugera mu 2005 aho avuga ko ari bwo bwongeye "burasanasanwa". Avuga ko kuva ico gihe aribwo hashinzwe imigambi y'ivyo Abarundi bipfuza harimo uko igihugu coba kimeze mu 2025 (Vision 2025). Nubwo Uburundi bwafatiwe ingingo z'ubukungu n'abagiraneza, yavuze ko ivyo babivanyemwo amasomo, ashima ko Ikigo kijejwe gutoza amakori n'amatagisi (OBR) cakoze neza gushika aho Uburundi bushobora kwibako ku bice 90%. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, yavuze ko kugira ngo ico gisata coroherwe mu kurangura imirimo kijejwe kigiye kwubakirwa igorofa igeretse cumi na kabiri (12 niveaux) kizokoreramwo. Amajambo yiwe 'ntaremesha impunzi' Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko agomba kwubaka igihugu aho beneco babasha "gukora ku munwa aho bashakiye hose, [no] mu mifuko yabo na ho hakabarizwa amahera yo kwikenura." Igisata ca ONU kijejwe impunzi giharura (mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2020) impunzi z'Abarundi zirenga 300,000 ziganje cane cane mu bihugu vy'akarere. Mw'ijambo ryiwe Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye impunzi gutahuka iwabo. Impunzi z'Abarundi zimwe zimwe zivuga ko amajambo amaze gushikirizwa na Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye kuva ashitse ku butegetsi ataremesha impunzi. Evelyne Nuwimana amaze imyaka ine mu nkambi ya Mahama mu Rwanda yabwiye BBC ati:"Mu majambo yiwe twumva ibisa n'ivy'uwo yasubiriye. Nta cizere njewe ndamubonamwo." Mu ijambo ryiwe rigenewe uyu munsi Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati : "Amaherezo y'inzira  ni mu nzu", ni mutahe iwanyu mukiri abarundi b'ubuntu, kuko "Inkoko irara mw'ishamba bugaca yacitse inkware"! Uburundi n'u Rwanda, vyaboneye ica rimwe ukwikukira imbere y'ubutegetsi bw'Abakoroni. Gusa uyu munsi ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda bwahisemwo ko udahimabzwa mu birori ahubwo hahimabzwa umunsi wo kwibohora kw' igenekerezo 04/07 ubwo ingabo za FPR-Inkotanyi zafashe ubutegetsi.

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Perezida Ramapfoza avuga ko South Africa yasabwe gufasha mu biganiro
text: Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo avuga ko igihugu ciwe casabwe kugira uruhara mu biganiro vyo kurangiza intambara hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine. Perezida Ramaphoza ntavuga uruhande rwabimusavye, ariko avuga ko yavuganye na Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya ku wa kane aho yamusavye ko yogerageza kurondera inyishu iciye mu biganiro. Perezida Ramaphoza yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Perezida Putin arashima ingene ataho duhagaze muri iyi ntambara. Twizeye ko ibi bishobora gutuma impande zompi zirondera kwumvikana biciye mu biganiro. Dufatiye ku migenderanire dufitaniye n'Uburusiya hamwe n'uko turi mu bihugu bigize BRICS, Afrika y'Epfo yasabwe kugira uruhara mu kwumvikanisha impande zishamiranye". Afrika y'Epfo yagiye kuboneka aho ihagaze mu ndwi iheze igihe yanka kwegamira uruhande urwo ari rwo rwose mu matora yo muri ONU yo kwiyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine. Perezida Ramaphoza avuga ko igihugu ciwe canse kugira uruhande cegamiye kubera "iki cemezo kitashize imbere ivyokworohereza impande zompi", congera cagiriza Inama Nkuru ya ONU kunanirwa mu mabanga yayo yo kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano.
