Mu rwandiko Perezida Ramaphoza yandikiye abanya Afrika y'Epfo, yanditse ati: "Gusaba ibiganiro vy'amahoro bijanye n'intumbero yatumye ishirahamwe ONU rishingwa. Turafise impungenge ko Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano yananiwe no kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano. Ibi bitera intege abamaze igihe kirekire basaba ko hoba impinduka mu Nama Nkuru ijejwe umutekano kugira ngo ishobore guhangana n'ibibazo vyo mu kinjana ca 21" Yongerako y'uko kubona Afrika y'Epfo ihagaze aho ihagaze ku bijanye n'iyi ntambara biterekana ko ifata minenerwe ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka muntu.

headline: Ingaburo : hagati y'imboga n'inyama n'amata ni ikihe ciza ku muntu? Icigwa cakorewe ku mahasa
text: Haheze imyaka 10, amahasa (canke impanga mu kinyarwanda) Hugo na Ross Turner banonora imitsi mu buryo biyumviriye bo nyene. Hugo avuga ati: "Umwanya munini mu vyo dukora dutegura umubiri. Kubera turi amahasa, dushobora kugereranya inzira nyinshi n'ivyo dufungura hanyuma tukamenya ibimeze neza kuri twebwe." Ni muri iyo nzira abo bavukanyi bafashe ingingo yo kugerageza ubwoko bw'imfungurwa zobamerera neza canke nabi: gufungura ivyamuka ku bikoko ntivyozana ubudasa muvyo bakora? Ayo mahasa yaritabiriye n'ivyigwa binyuranye vyagizwe n'abahinga  bo mu gisata c'ubushakashatsi ca Gemini co muri King's College i Londres mu Bwongereza. Tim Spector, umwigisha wa kaminuza asigura ati: "Dushaka gukoresha ubwo buryo bw'amahasa, basangiye vyose, kugira turabe inkurikizi y'ingaburo no kwinonora imitsi, n'ingene abo bantu bagira ingaruka zitandukanye kuri izo mfungurwa." Mu kiringo c'indwi 12, abo bavukanyi babiri baratandukanijwe: Hugo atangura kurya imboga mu gihe Ross na we yabandanije kurya inyama anywa n'amata. Bose uko ari babiri bahawe imfungurwa zitanga inguvu zingana buri musi kandi bagira imyimenyerezo imwe y'inguvu muri ico kiringo cose. Hugo yemeza ko vyamugoye kumenyera izo mfungurwa nshasha. Yagize ati::"Mu ndwi za mbere, narashatse cane inyama, amata n'iforomaji. Ivyo narya vyari birimwo ahanini ivyamwa n'imboga." Yemera kandi ko "Ku rundi ruhande sinafungura ingaburo yikwiye, bisigura ko urugero rwa 'glycemie' rutahindutse kandi numva mpaze umusi wose." Yongeyeko ati: "Nasa kandi n'umuntu afise inguvu nyinshi." Ross we avuga ko yagumye agwa avyuka. Avuga ati:"Hari igihe nagira inguvu nyinshi n'ikindi gihe nagira uburuhe budahera." Prof Spector avuga ko ubwo bushakashatsi bushobora gutuma umuntu ategera ingene umubiri ukoresha imfungurwa n'ingene ingaruka zitandukana ku muntu n'uwundi, n'aho boba ari amahasa. Ubwo budasa mbere bwaragaraaye no ku yandi mahasa, mu vyigwa vyakozwe n'uwo mushakashatsi n'abo bakorana bo kuri King's College. Prof. Spector agira ati: "Twibaza ko hari ikintu kitajanye n'imero cagize uruhara muri ivyo batoye." Nk'uko ibiharuro vya Spector bivyerekana, amahasa afise ibintu bisa ku gitigiri kiri hagati ya 25 na 30% mu dukoko turi mu mara. Nkeka rero ari co gituma ingaruka zidasa kuri bo ku mfungurwa zitandukanye. Spector aradondagura inzira utegerezwa gufata mu kugumana uburinganire bw'udukoko duto duto mu mubiri  no gutuma mu mara habamwo udukoko dutandukanye. Ahanura ati: "Ubwa mbere n'ukurya ivyatsi 30 ku ndwi." Ivyo bingana n'imboga canke ivyamwa bike buri musi. Asigura ati: "Ubwa kabiri, ni ngombwa guhitamwo ibiterwa birimwo 'polyphénols', ibintu bitanga amarangi agaragara n'icanga (gout) ry'ibintu birura ku biribwa bimwe bimwe." Intambwe igira gatatu itangwa na Spector n'ugufungura indya zirimwo udukoko duto duto "probiotiques". N'ubwoko bw'indya zirimwo udukoko duto duto dushobora kuba mu mara tukanafasha mu buringanire bw'ibiba mu nda. Izo "Probiotiques" ubu zihari ni Yaourt isanzwe, kefir na kombucha. Uyo mwigisha wa kaminuza yongerako ko " ubwa nyuma, ni ngombwa kureka ibifungurwa bihinguwe cane." Ibihinguwe cane biri mu mugwi urimwo imfungurwa zihinguye harimwo ibintu vyo mu mahinguriro vyatakaje akanovera, irangi n'icanga kama. Kuri urwo rutonde harimwo biscuits, isosi yo mu mahinguriro hamwe n'inzoga. Ross yasanze ko kuba mwenewabo yarashoboye kurya imboga gusa mu kiringo c'indwi 12 vyamuhaye icigwa gikomeye. Avuga ati: "Narashobora kubona indya nafungura uko zingana zihinguye, ivyo vyaciye binyugurura amaso kuri ico kibazo." Prof. Spector yarerekanye ko kurya imboga bidasigura ko ari ingaburo  yikwiye. Avuga ati: "Ica ngombwa, ni akaranga k'imfungurwa, si kuba ufise canke udafise inyama mw'isahani yawe." Asigura ati:"Abantu benshi batarya inyama bashobora kurya izindi ndya nyinsi zihinguye." Inyuma y'indwi 12, ibipimo vya Hugo na Ross vyerekanye ko bidatandukanye cane, n'aho bari bafunguye ibintu bitandukanye. Basanze mbere hari n'ivyo bungutse ku bintu bimwe bimwe vy'amagara yabo, nk'urugero rwa Cholesterol, ibinure canke ubudahangarwa ku ngwara y'igisukari ku bakuze. Ariko, ivyo ntivyoca vyemezwa ku bantu bose kuko bo n'abanonotsi karuhariwe, basanzwe bagira imyimenyerezo, barya imfungurwa  zipimye neza, aho guhindura gato gusa bishobora gusigura ukwongerekana canke ukugabanuka kw'ibikorwa vyo kwinonora imitsi. Ku bandu basanzwe nkatwe, Spector avuga ko kwitaho guhindura imfungurwa no kurondera ingaburo zikwije ibisabwa, bifitiye akamaro amara yacu, bishobora gufasha kugabanya uburuhe, inzara n'ibiro. Ariko impera n'imperuka, ico ubwo bushakashatsi bwakozwe kuri ayo mahasa bwaje gushimangira, n'uko ata ngaburo  yikwiye ikora kumwe kuri bose, n'aho boba ari abantu basa muri vyose. Kandi n'ayo mahasa ubwayo baravyiboneye muri ico cigwa camaze indwi 12. Hugo ahanura ati: "Narashoboye guhindura buke buke ingaburo. Ubu, ngerageza gushira ubwoko bwinshi bw'indya kw'isahani, no kubirya ntarengeje urugero. Urufunguruzo ni kubifata ku rugero rumwe." Ross na we ati: "Umuntu niyababwira ko ingaburo  kanaka izobatuma mumera uku canke kuriya, muramwibazako ikibazo. Birakenewe kuvyigeragereza, kubikora nko gufyina hanyuma urabe ibikunda kuri wewe."

headline: Umugwi wa ONU uti 'ntitwizeye u Burundi kuri coronavirus' nabwo buti 'mushaka gutoba'
text: Uwo mugwi urashima ko leta y'u Burundi yafashe zimwe mu ngingo zijanye no gutangiriza ikwirakwira ry'ico kiza. Izo ngingo ngo ni nko guhimiriza isuku mu banyaghugu mu gukaraba intoki, guhagarika ingendo z'indege hamwe no gushira ukwabo ingenzi zinjiye mu gihugu, cane cane iziturutse mu bihugu bimaze kubonekamwo ico kiza. Ariko rero ngo ivyo ntibihagije mu gutorera umuti ico kiza cateye isibe isi yose, cane cane ku gihugu nk'u Burundi, aho inzego z'ubuvuzi zitifashe neza kandi abantu baronka ico bashira ku munwa ari uko basohoye amaboko ku munsi ku munsi. Ngo ndetse abagera ku 70 % bakaba bari munsi y'umurongo w'ubukene, n'ukuvuga batunzwe n'uburyo buri munsi ya 1.90 $ ku munsi. Uyu mugwi ushimangira ko iyubahirizwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu ariyo nkingi y'ivyo leta y'u Burundi yokora vyose mu guhangana n'iki kiza. Ku bijanye n'amasezerano mpuzamakungu yiyemeje, cane cane ayerekeye kubahiriza uburenganzira ku buzima n'amagara y'abanyagihugu, uyu mugwi wibutsa leta y'u Burundi ko ibwirizwa gukungira abanyagihugu bayo coronavirus no kuvura abarwaye. Ngo kandi ivyo bigakorwa uburenganzira bwabo burimwo gufungurirwa budahungabanijwe. Uyu mugwi wibutsa leta y'u Burundi kandi ko uburenganzira bwo kumenya amakuru ari ntangere mu gihe nk'iki c'ikiza. Ngo niyo mpamvu ubwo burenganzira butegerezwa kwuhabirizwa kandi ntibuburizwemwo mu nzira yo kuzibira amakuru ashingiye ku bimenyetso vy'ukuri avuguruza ayaba yatanzwe n'abategetsi canke gutangaza ivyiyumviro n'ayandi makuru anegura ingingo zafashwe na leta. Uyu mugwi wemeza ko ahubwo igikwiye ari uko hoba gushira ahabona amakuru yerekana uburyo ico kiza giteye impungenge, urugero kigezeko n'uburyo buhari bwo kukirwanya, no kuvura abanduye, kuko ari vyo vyoha ingoga abanyagihugu mu ruhara rwabo mu kugikumira. Uyu mugwi ubabazwa no kubona hari amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza yimwe uruhusha rwo gushika mu bibanza abantu bashizwemwo ukwa bonyene mu gukumira iki kiza ca Covd-19. Wemeza ko bari bafashwe mu buryo butabereye kiremwa muntu, ata mazi meza canke imfungurwa bahabwa, eka n'ubuvuzi. Ingingo zifatwa mu gukumira iki kiza kandi ngo ntizikwiye kubamwo ivangura, canke ngo zize gusongera isibe ku budasa bwari buhasanzwe hagati y'abakene n'abakire. Ikindi kandi ngo zikwiye guhuzwa n'ubuzima abanyagihugu babayemwo mu Burundi, aho abenshi batunzwe no kwikorera utwabo. Kuronswa uburyo bwo kwivuza ngo bikwiye guhabwa abanyagihugu bose, hatitaweho ubudasa bwabo, bwaba ubufatiye ku gitsina, imigwi ya politike, amadini, amoko, ubukire canke ubwenegihugu. Felin Gakwaya yavuganye n'umushikiranganji w'u Burundi ajejwe ivy'agategaka ka zina muntu, Martin Nivyabandi. Umushikiranganji Nivyabandi yavuze ko  u Burundi ari igihugu cikukiye, ko co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu, ata wokibwiriza ingene gikemura ibibazo vyaco. Yavuze ko uwo mugwi wa ONU ata kindi ugamije atari guhungabanya abanyagihugu mu gihe hitezwe amatora mu kwezi kuza.

headline: China: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano Li Yundi yapfunzwe yagirizwa kugura imaraya
text: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano mu Bushinwa, Li Yundi, apfunzwe azira gusambana n'imaraya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Ku rubuga hwaniro, igipolisi canditse ko umugabo w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'imaraya y'imyaka 29, bemeye ko bakoze ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko. Bafashwe inyuma y'aho abanyagihugu batangiye iyo nkuru ku bategetsi. Mu gihe igipolisi kitashize ahabona izina ryiwe, ikinyamakuru ca reta mu nyuma cemeje ko ari Li. Iyo nkuru yababaje abakunzi benshi b'uwo mugabo azwi kw'izina rya "China Piano Prince". Ku myaka 18, Li yabaye umuntu wa mbere akiri muto avuza piano - ahawe agashimwe ka mbere gakomeye mpuzamakungu ka Chopin Piano Competition mu 2000. Yabandanije avuza piano hirya no hino kw'isi, akaba n'umuntu azwi cane mu bantu bavuga ururimi rw'igishinwa. Umuntu umwe yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Weibo rumeze nka Twitter ati:"Mana yanje, biratangaje. Uyu ni Li Yundi twese dutangarira?" Abandi berekana amakenga ku kuntu yafashwe. Undi yanditse ngo:"Mfise amakenga yo kumenya ingene abantu bamenye ko ari we. Ubonye umugabo w'imyaka 39 n'umugore w'imyaka 29 binjiye mu nzu bari kumwe, bigenda gute ngo abantu bamenye ko ari imaraya, na we ari umukiriya wiwe?" Inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye, ishirahamwe ry'abanyamuziki mu Bushinwa ryavuze ko rigiye kwaka ubunywanyi Li kuko "atanga isura mbi cane mu bantu". Bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ipfungwa ryiwe rishobora gufatwa nk'igabishwa ku nyifato mbi y'abandi ba rurangiranwa mu gihe Ubushinwa bwahagurukiye abakora akazi kerekeye umuziki. Mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, abasambana canke bagurisha imaraya bashobora gupfungwa gushika ku misi 15 bakanatangisha n'amande ashobora gushika ku madolari ya amerika 782.

headline: EU: Indangamuntu ya Covid-19 yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi?
text: Indangamuntu nshasha ya Covid mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU), Digital Covid Certificate/Certificat COVID numérique - "indangamuntu" y'iri shirahamwe yerekana ko waronse urucanco - iriko iratanguzwa hose mu bihugu 27 vy'iri shirahamwe. Ni nde ayifitiye uburenganzira, yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi? Ni uburyo bw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwerekana ko abanyagihugu: Ibihugu vyose 27 vy'iri shirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya - co kimwe no mu bihugu vy'Ubuswisi, Iceland/Islande, Norvège na  Liechtenstein - birayifise kandi birayemera. Itangwa ku buntu - kandi abanyagihugu ba EU, co kimwe n'abanyamahanga baba muri ibi bihugu vya EU mu mategeko (bakaba bafise uburenganzira bwo gutembera mu bindi bihugu vyo muri iri shirahamwe) bashobora kuyivoma (download) bakayigumana kuri ngendanwa zabo, canke barakonswa urukaratasi rw'ikopi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari vyamaze gutangura kuyikoresha ku gushaka kwavyo - ariko rero ku wa 01 z'uku kw'indwi niho yatanguzwa icese, mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. Izoba ifise code QR hamwe n'urupfunguruzo nyabwonko (digital signature key/clé de signature numérique) umuntu yisangije, ibi bikazoshoboza umuntu kwinjira mu bubiko yisangije burimwo amakuru yose ajanye n'incanco yaronse - nk'akarorero ibitaro, ikigo canke urwego rwamuhaye uru rucanco. Amakuru y'umuntu yisangije azoguma kuri iyi ndangamuntu yiwe, ntazobikwa canke ngo agumanwe, nk'akarorero ku kibuga c'indege, mu gihe bazoba bahejeje guhinyuza ko ari ay'ukuri. Abantu barizeye ko iyi ndangamuntu izokworohereza ingenzi gutembera mu bihugu vy'ishiramahwe EU. Ntabwo ari igitabo c'inzira - ingenzi izotegerezwa kuba igifise canke urundi rukaratasi urwo ari rwo rwose rwerekana ibiyiranga. Gusa, umuntu uwo ari we wese azoba afise iyi ndangamuntu, mu bisanzwe azoba arekuriwe kwinjira mu gihugu ico ari co cose atarinze gupimwa canke kubanza gutaramurwa mu kiringo kanaka. Si co kimwe - ariko zompi zerekana amakuru amwe kandi zifise intumbero imwe yo kwerekana ingene umuntu ahagaze ku bijanye na Covid. Ishirahamwe EU ntiriremeza Covid Pass, ariko ibihugu ku gatwe kavyo, nk'akarorero Ubugiriki na Espagne, biramaze kuyemera. EU ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kwose kugira ngo iyi ndangamuntu ise n'izindi z'ibihugu bitari muri EU. Mu bisanzwe nta ngorane ihari. Hari incanco zine zose zemewe mu Bwongereza no mu bihugu vyo muri EU  - gusa hari zitatu mu zemewe mu Bwongereza rimwe na rimwe zizwi ku mazina atandukanye, ariko ni zimwe. Muri EU: Ariko, Oxford-AstraZeneca (AZ) yahinguwe n'ikigo Serum Institute co mu Buhindi (SII) ifise irindi zina rigira gatatu - Covishield. N'aho ari co kimwe n'iyo yahinguriwe i Bulaya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ntiriyemera. None hari ingorane kubona Covishield itemewe ku mugabane wa Bulaya? Covishield irakoreshwa cane mu bihugu bikenye biciye muri wa mugambi mpuzamakungu w'incanco uzwi nka Covax, ubu hakaba hari impungenge ko iyi ndangamuntu ya Bulaya ishobora kutemera ingenzi ziva muri ivyo bihugu. Ikigo ca Bulaya kijejwe imiti, European Medicines Agency/Agence européenne des médicaments (EMA) ntigitegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ikigo c'Ubuhindi gihingura Oxford-AstraZeneca, kubera ata ncanco ziva muri ico gihugu zinjira muri EU. Ariko ikigo Serum Institute kivugwa ko coba kibanza gusaba uruhusha muri EU kugira ngo gishobore guhingura Covishield. Ikigo AstraZeneca kandi kivuga ko kiriko kirakorana na EMA kugira ngo barabe ko "Covishield nayo yokwemerwa kuja muri izi ndangamuntu z'incanco". Gusa EMA ivuga ko gushika ubu itarigera ironka igisabo ico ari co cose kirondera ko uru rucanco rwemerwa. N'ubwo uru rucanco rutemewe gukoreshwa mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS ryaremeje ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu buryo bwihutirwa - kandi n'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rivuga ko ibihugu vyaryo ku giti cavyo bishobora kwemerera ingenzi kwinjira mu gihe bahawe urucanco rwa Covishield. Hanyuma kandi, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari bisanzwe vyemera izindi ncanco - nk'akarorero Ubugiriki buremera urucanco rw'Ubushinwa Sinovac, urucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V hamwe n'izindi zitari nke. Urwego rukuru rushinzwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika ruranegura cane ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yo gukura ku rutonde ingenzi zahawe incanco za AstraZeneca zakorewe mu Buhindi mu mugambi w'iyi ndangamuntu ya Covid. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, John Nkengasong, avuga ko ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya itisunze ubuhinga n'amakuru yerekana ingene incanco zakorewe mu Buhindi zihagaze, kandi ata cerekana ko zidakora neza uzigereranije n'iza Bulaya.

headline: Namibia: Abashingamateka bariyamiriza amasezerano ajanye n’ihonyabwoko ryakozwe na Germany
text: Abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi muri Namibia bariyamiriza reta ku mwumvikano uherutse kuba n'Ubudagi, igihugu catwaye Namibia mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Aya masezerano yatumye Ubudagi bwemera ko bwakoreye ihonyabwoko amoko y'aba Herero n'aba Nama, buca bwemera kuzoriha imiriyaridi 1.1 y'ama euro nk'indishi y'akababaro. Mw'ikoraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ry'ejo ku wa kabiri ryaranzwe n'induru nyinshi, umushingamateka wo ku ruhande rw'abatavuga rumwe yavuze ko ata mahirwe baronse yo kwerekana ingaruka mbi cane iri honyabwoko ryabateye rikabata mu bukene butagira izina. Uwundi nawe yavuze ko aba Herero n'aba Nama bakwiye kwiyamiriza aya masezerano abona ko ari ay'agasuzuguro. Umushikiranganji wa mbere, Saara Kuugongelwa-Amadhila, avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko abanya Namibia babandanya bafatanye mu nda. Mu ndwi iheze, icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ayo mafaranga Ubudagi bwemeye gutanga adakwiye, ariko ko ikibazo kizosubira kwigwa. Hagati ya 1904-1908, ingabo z'abakoloni b'Abadagi baragandaguye ibice birenga 80% vy'abanya Namibia bo mu bwoko bw'aba Herero n'aba Nama. Abahinga mu bijanye na kahise bafata aya mabi y'agahomerabunwa nk' "ihonyabwoko ryibagiwe" ryakozwe mu ntango z'ikinjana ca 20, muri ico gihugu citwa Intara y'Ubudagi mu Bumanuko bushira Uburengero bwa Afrika (German South West Africa/ Afrique allemand du Sud-Ouest). Mu kwezi guheze, Ubudagi bwasavye imbabazi kuri iri honyabwoko ryakozwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni inyuma y'ibiganiro - ikintu cari kirindiriwe imyaka n'imyaka, kandi kikaba ari co gihugu ca mbere gisavye imbabazi ku mabi nk'aya yakozwe n'iyari reta yaco ya gikoloni.

headline: Wayne Rooney: Uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa England avuga ko yatinya ko inzoga zari kumwica
text: Wayne Rooney avuga ko yari afise ubwoba ko yari gupfa canke akica umuntu kubera ibibazo yaterwa no kunywa inzoga. Uyu mumenyereza w'umurwi Derby County akaba n'umusatirizi wa mbere yinjirije ibitsindo vyinshi Manchester United be n'Ubwongereza gusumba abandi yabivugiye mu kiganiro na BBC imbere y'uko hasohoka ireresi nshasha isigura ubuzima bwiwe. Yashize ahabona ahantu inzoga be n'ibibazo vyo mu mutwe vyari bimugejeje, hanyuma abajijwe ikintu kinini yatinya gusumba ibindi muri ivyo bihe, yishuye ati: "Kumbure ni urupfu". Avuga ku "makosa" yakoze, uyu mumenyereza w'imyaka 36 yongeyeko ati: "Mfise kuba niruka inyuma y'abakobwa, mfise kuba nagendesha imodoka mborewe, ivyo narabikoze, nari gushobora kwica umuntu - aha urashobora kwiyica wewe nyene - aho rero niho uba ugeze habi". "Nari nzi ko nari nkeneye gufashwa, kugira ngo nshobore kurokoka ariko kandi nshobore kurokora umuryango wanje". Rooney avuga ko yumva y'uko yategerezwa kwigumizamwo vyinshi mu bibazo yari afise nk'umukinyi. "Imyaka cumi, cumi n'itanu iheze, sinari kuja mu cumba c'iyambariro ngo mvuge nti 'ndafise ibibazo vy'inzoga, ndafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe'. Ivyo ntavyo nari gukora". Ireresi 'Rooney'izoshirwa ahabona na  ku wa gatanu ikaba ivuga ubuzima bwa Rooney kuva akiri umwana gushika atanguye akazi kiwe nk'umumenyereza wa Derby. Muri iyi nkuru, BBC Sport yatoyemwo ibintu indwi nyamukuru yavuzeko muri iyi reresi. Hari ahantu Rooney yemeza ko yari "umwana adashoboka" akiri umuyabaga. Aravuga atarya umunwa ko ari kenshi yisanga ari mu bugizi bwa nabi. Hari ahandi avuga ati : "Twahora tuja i Southport tukarwana cane. Aho vyagiye kurangira bahatswe kunkura ijisho. Nari mfise hafi imyaka 12". Rooney aravuga kandi ko yahoza aja mu mazu y'ubutambiro akiri umuyabaga mu nyuma akisanga mu ruhagarara. "Ndibuka igihe kimwe ko bamenye umusaya i Manchester. Nari mfise hafi imyaka 13." Hari ahantu Rooney asigura ibintu biteye isoni vyamubayeko igihe yari kumwe n'abandi bigana umupira muri Everton. "Umusi umwe nariko ndajabuka ibarabara mfise icupa rya cider [inzoga ikaze cane]. Umumenyereza wanje Colin Harvey, vyabaye ngombwa ko ahagarara akanjabukana. "Umusi wakurikiye, yanjanye mu myimenyerezo ambwira ati 'umviriza, wewe ufise italanto ihanitse cane ntari bwigere mbona ku muntu uw'ari we wese angana nawe - ntuyipfushe ubusa". Ku myaka 16, Rooney yari afise ubuhinga bukomeye ku gihagararo ciwe c'umugabo akuze. Muri iyo reresi, avuga ko yari azi ko ari we yakina neza mu myimenyerezo. Ku wa 19 gitugutu (ukw'icumi) 2002, niho yimenyekanisha kw'isi yose. Hari hasigaye imisi itanu ngo Rooney ahimbaze isabukuru yiwe y'imyaka 17, ico gihe Everton ikaba yariko ikina na Arsenal - iyi nayo ikaba yari iramutse ikina urukino rwayo rugira 30 itari bwigere itsindwa na rimwe ico gihe. Uyu murwi warimwo abakinyi bakomeye nka Thierry Henry, Patrick Vieira, David Seaman na Sol Campbell. Rooney aribuka neza ingene aba bantu bose bari ibihangange. Hagati aho, uyu muyabaga yashaka kwandika izina muri urwo rukino. Ati: "Uru ni rwo rwabaye urukino rwanje rwa nyuma nari nkinye mfise imyaka 16. Nabona umengo ntaco maze, nkaguma niyumvira, mvuga nti 'ndashaka gutera igitsindo ku myaka 16'". Avuga ko igihe yinjiye mu kibuga nk'umusubirizi yari afise iciyumviro kimwe: "Nkaronka akaryo na gatoya gusa, ndatera aho nzoba ndi hose". Ku munota wa nyuma, Campbell yameze nk'uwusubira inyuma, Rooney aba aronse akanya keza maze yinjiza igitsindo mw'ishuti yasarishije abafana ku kibuga ca Goodison Park. Uyu murwi wari uwa mbere mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza ico gihe, watakaje urukino rwa mbere inyuma y'ico gihe cose wari umaze utari bwigere utsindwa gushika n'aho umunyamakuru yariko atangaza umupira Clive Tyldesley yaguma atubwira ati "mwibuke iri zina" rya Wayne Rooney. Mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Bulaya mu 2004 ryabereye muri Portugal, Rooney yari inkingi y'umurwi w'Ubwongereza imbere y'uko avunika ukuguru, kuri we - mbere n'Ubwongereza -  ihiganwa rigaca rihagararira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma batsinzwe na Portugal. Igihe yari ashikanye imyaka 18 gusa, mu rukino rwa mbere, yarateye ubwoba umurwi w'Ubufaransa wishimira ibihangange nka Henry, Zinedine Zidane na Lilian Thuram. Ati: "Abakinyi b'inyuma babo baratinya kunyegera, babona ko batari guhangana na njewe". Igihe kimwe yakubise hasi Thuram, umwe mu bakinyi b'inyuma b'ibihangange kw'isi ico gihe, mw'ikosa ryahatswe gutuma ahabwa ikarata itukura. "Naramusetse, ndamukubita ku musaya nca ndahindukira ndamuraba, nk'uko umengo nashaka kumubwira nti 'ubu rero uramenye uwo ndi we'". Ubufaransa bwaratsinze urwo rukino 2-1, ariko Henry aremera ko Ubwongereza "bwabangamiye bikomeye" umurwi wabo ku buryo vyari ngombwa ko butsinda. Kuri Rooney avuga ati: "Waramuraba ukabona ko koko yari afise ishaka ryo gutsinda". Rooney ati: "Ndibuka igihe niyumvira nti 'ivyo ari vyo vyose ni jewe mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi' . Kandi ndemeza ko ico gihe, nari we mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". Rooney n'umugore wiwe Colleen, bompi baravuga batarya umunwa ibihe Rooney yagiye ahemuka. Rooney ati: "Nagiye nishira mu bihe bibi, hanyuma rero iyo hagiyemwo inzoga hoho, usanga uriko urafata ingendo mbi kandi zikugirira ingaruka mbi. Gusa ibi ntivyigera binyaka urukundo mfitiye Colleen." Colleen aremeza ko inzoga zagiye zigira ingaruka mbi. Hari n'aho avuga ko atari vyiza ko Wayne "yigumana wenyene atawuriko aramukurikirana". Hagati aho, arasigura ingene we na Wayne bicaye kugira ngo batorere hamwe umuti w'ibibazo vyabo vyose bari hamwe. Ati: "Ndazi ko abantu bavuga ngo 'ubwo koko boba bari kumwe kugira ngo umuryango ntusambuke?' Ici cari kimwe mu vyo bavuga, ariko kandi turacakundanye. Ndizeye ko yagiye yiga mu buzima kandi ko atazosubira muri ivyo bihe bibi cane". Mu 2006, Chelsea, ico gihe yamenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho, yari itanguye guhangara bikomeye uyu murwi wari wiganje mu Bwongereza. Ku wa 29 Ndamukiza (ukwa kane) uwo mwaka, Chelsea yari yakiriye Manchester United ku kibuga cayo ca Stamford Bridge, irondera inota rimwe gusa kugira ngo itahukane ihiganwa rya Premier League ku ncuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya. Yatsinze 3-0. Rooney ntiyavyifashemwo neza na gato. Aremera ati: "Nari mfise ibirato bishasha, bifise imisumari (crampons/studs) miremire kubera nashaka gukomeretsa umuntu. Iyi misumari yari yemewe n'amategeko, ariko yari miremire gusumba iy'ibirato nari nsanzwe nambara". Yasekanye na John Terry bikomeye amuca intoboro ku kirenge haruguru y'ikirato ku buryo vyabaye ngombwa ko akenera ibitambuzo (crutches/béquilles). Haciye akanya gato, vyabaye ngombwa ko ahindura iyi misumari, ivyamugiriye ingaruka mbi kuko yahavuye akomereka, aho amagufa yo mu kirenge yononekaye, maze avanwa mu kibuga ari ku nderuzo. Rooney avuga ko vyose vyamuvuyeko akidogera kandi ibi birato vyiwe. Ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose ryo mu 2006 rizokwibukwa cane n'abafana b'Ubwongereza ku kungene bwatsinzwe na Portugal mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, urukino rwagiye kurangira Rooney ahawe ikarata itukura akomerekeje Ricardo Carvalho. Amaze gukora iri kosa, mugenziwe Cristiano Ronaldo bakinana muri Manchester United asa n'uwateye igitsure umuhagarikizi mu kumusaba ko yomwirukana. Rooney amaze kwirukanwa mu kibuga, amakamera yafashe Ronaldo akubitiye urugohe bagenzi biwe ba Portugal. Mu kwibuka ivyakurikiye, Rooney avuga ati: "Naramenaguye ibintu bimwe bimwe nshitse mu cumba c'iyambariro". "Ni bwo bwa mbere numvise ko ndi jenyene. Ndibuka niyumvira nti, 'turamutse tubandanije sinzokina igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, kandi ndashobora no kudakina finale. Tuvuyemwo naho, ni jewe bizoba bivuyeko'." Rooney avuga ko inyuma y'iri kosa yabwiye Ronaldo ko ata "mutima mubi" yari afise mu kwifata uko yifashe, kandi ko bokwibanda cane gutsindira Premier League, ivyahavuye bigenda uko. Mukw'icumi 2010, Rooney yarababaje isi yose igihe asaba gusezera Manchester United. Yakoze kandi ibintu ata muntu yari gushobora kwibaza ko vyari kuba, mu guhangara umumenyereza Sir Alex Ferguson. Mu kwibuka ingene vyagenze, Rooney avuga ati: "Twari twagurishije [Carlos] Tevez, hanyuma tugurisha Ronaldo. Nio jewe mukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru nari nsigaye". "Naragiye mu biro kwa Alex Ferguson mvuga nti 'mufise imigambi nyabaki hano?' inyishu yampaye yambwiye ati 'mvira mu biro'." Abahoze bakina inyuma muri United Gary Neville na Rio Ferdinand baravuga muri iyo reresi ingene bababajwe cane n'ingene mugenzi wabo yavyifashemwo nabi ico gihe. Hagati aho, Rooney abandanya yemeza ko bwari uburenganzira bwiwe bwo kubaza imigambi ya Ferguson ku bijanye no kugura abakinyi. "Wihweje ingene ibintu vyakurikiye imyaka itanu inyuma y'uwu mubonano, Alex Ferguson yari azi aho umurwi wariko uraja, yaciye yihutira kuvanamwo akarenge adatevye kandi gushika ubu baracarondera gusubira kwiyubaka".

headline: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
text: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

headline: Burundi-CVR: 'Nimba ukuri ari ukuje gutera indyane mu gihugu, ntaco kwoba kumaze', Ndayishimiye
text: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihe "ukuri kwoza gutuma mu gihugu haduka indyane twopfuma tuguheba", yabivugiye mu kiganiro yahaye abanyagihugu kuri uyu wa gatatu, aho yasiguye yongera yishura ku bibazo bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Asigura ibijanye n'ukumenya ukuri ku bwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko "kumenya ukuri atari ikibazo", ko ahubwo "kwodufasha kwubaka akahise kacu, abana bacu baze bamenye ikizira n'ikitazira". Ati: "Turi mu bihe vy'ukumenya ukuri, ariko rero, …ni kwaba uko kuri ari ukuje gutuma indyane ziba mu gihugu, uko kuri ntaco kwoba kumaze". Haciye imisi umurwi ujewe kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha mu Burundi,  CVR,   utangaje ko ubwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-1973 ari "ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abahutu", ivyateye impari mu Barundi bamwe bamwe, bavuga ko ico cegeranyo gifise aho gihengamiye canke ko bimwe mu bikivugwamwo ari "ikinyoma". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, iyo ukuri kumaze kuboneka haba hasigaye ingene igihugu kigukoresha. Ati: "Mugabo rero hariho abandi baca basimba, bagaca barondera ingene bagukoresha, ivyo bijejwe inzego z'igihugu, zozo zizomenya ingene zigukoresha ziravye ico abenegihugu bazovuga". Yemerera Abarundi ko indongozi zizotegerezwa gukora uko zishoboye kwose "kugira ngo uko kuri kutwubake, kwubake kazoza k'Uburundi, gukure ivyo kwihorana". Akebura ko mu gihe ukuri kutamenyekanye bishobora gutuma ubwicanyi bubandanya. "Dutegerezwa kumenya ko kwica ari icaha gikomeye cane, hanyuma tukakirwaniriza hamwe. Rero uko kuri nti kuje kudusambura, kuje ahubwo kutwubaka". Ku bijanye n'ico cegeranyo ku bwicanyi bwa 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko cashikirijwe inama nshingamateka, iyi nayo ikazogishikana mu rwego nshingwabikorwa rw'igihugu, na rwo ruheze rwiture abize amategeko kugira  bagice irya n'ino, kugira bemeze niba ari icaha mpuzamakungu n'abagikoze. Ku bafise ubwoba kuri iki cegeranyo, Perezida Evariste avuga ati: "Abarundi ni tuve mu bishobisho, nta bwoko bwagize jenoside mu Burundi, nta bwoko bwagize icaha c'ihonyabwoko mu Burundi". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, bamwe mu Barundi bafise ubwoba kuko hamye ingeso yo kujaniranya, hakaba abitirira ikibi kanaka ubwoko kanaka "nk'uko umengo cari igihugu kitagira ubutegetsi". Evariste Ndayishimiye yemeza ko ubutegetsi bw'ico gihe ari bwo bubazwa ubu bwicanyi buteye impari. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe yonsigurira ingene hoba umurwi w'abantu wogenda ukagandagura abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, ntihagire ico ubutegetsi bukora ataco buwuziko". "Ni twemere neza ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bw'ico gihe bwamenje". Avuga ko bamwe mu bari muri bwo batanze ukuri barashinga intahe y'ukuntu vyagenze. Nayo ku bavuga ko ishirahamwe ONU ari ryo ryoba rifise ububasha bwo kwemeza icaha ca jenoside, Perezida Ndayishimiye avyamirira kure kuko "nta na hamwe vyanditse". "Igitabo mpanavyaha c'Uburundi, kirahana neza ivyaha vy'ihonyabwoko, amakungu si yo mucamanza w'Uburundi, ONU si reta y'Uburundi". "Icaha ca jenoside cemezwa n'amategeko mpanavyaha y'Uburundi". Abajijwe nimba abanyaporitike bahunze bagirizwa amabi bashobora kugirirwa ikigongwe, Perezida Ndayishimiye, avuga y'uko bizovana n'ingene igihugu gishobora kuvyakira. Ati: "Igihe Papa Johani Paulo wa kabiri bamurasa, uwamurashe yaramugiriye ikigongwe, mbere araja no kumuraba aho abohewe, ariko ntiyaciye ataha, igihugu nticaciye kimugirira ikigongwe. "Burya rero ibijanye n'ikigongwe, ubanza kuraba ingene igihugu kivyakira, nimba agatima k'ubukoko karavuye muri uyo muntu, kandi nimba ashobora gusubira mu bandi agatekana neza. "Mwarabonye abantu bagiriwe ikigongwe mu baheruka, ubwo nyene baca basubira kwica abantu, basubira gufatwa baja mu gasho. None nk'abo bantu wumva tutagize amakosa kubarekura?" Abajijwe ku bivugwa vy'uko urwego rujejwe igendereza ruhohotera abantu, mbere hakaba hari n'uwuherutse kuhasiga ubuzima, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko uwabikoze yamenje kandi ko ategerezwa guhanwa. Avuga ko abakora ivyo bintu bashobora kuba bari muri ba bantu "baja gukora mu mabanga y'igihugu bafise inzigo", bafitiye akarigangamuhogo  abantu. Ati: "Muhora mwumva abapolisi bafata abantu bakabapfunga muri weekend kugira bazorekurwe ku wa mbere. Hariho Abarundi bagifise agakoko mu mitima". Mu misi iheze, hari umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yafashwe yagirijwe gutunga inkoho, arasinzikarizwa ubuzima gushika aritaba Imana. Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko yababajwe n'urupfu rwiwe, kandi ko uwabikoze yafashwe kugira ashiwe imbere y'ubutungane. "Uyo muntu yamuhohoteye yaramenje kandi ategerezwa guhanwa bimwe vy'akarorero. Ntituzokwihanganira na rimwe umuntu uwo ari we wese azohohotera uwundi, n'aho azoba yakoze ikibi, agateka kiwe kaguma kubahiriwa". Nayo ku kibazo c'abanyuruzwa, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko bikorwa n'akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kihaye kwama gatuntuza abarundi. Avuga ko bariko barahiga abagize ako karwi "kandi hari abamaze gufatwa muri bo, mbere dusanga harimwo n'umupolisi". Avuga ko abakora ubwo bubisha ari ababá bashaka kwerekana ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ari bwo bunyuruza abantu. Ati: "Nico gituma ubona baca bahindukiza, ngo ni uburongozi bw'igihugu. None Uburongozi bw'igihugu bwoba ari bwo bwabikoze bugaca buja guhiga abo bantu?"

headline: US igereranya ko hamaze gupfa canke gukomereka abasirikare 200.000 mu ntambara ya Ukraine
text: Umu jenerari mukuru kurusha abandi bose muri Amerika agereranya ko abasirikare 100.000 ba Ukraine na 100.000 b’Uburusiya bamaze  gupfa canke gukomereka mu ntambara muri Ukraine. Gen Mark Milley, umukuru w’ibiro bikuru vy’ingabo muri Amerika, yanavuze ko hafi abanyagihugu basanzwe 40.000 bamaze kwicwa bahitanywe n’iyo ntambara. Ivyo bitigiri ngereranyo nivyo vya mbere biri hejuru bitanzwe n’umutegetsi wo mu bihugu vy’iburengarazuba. Yavuze kandi  ko ibimenyetso ko Kyiv ifise ugushaka gusubira kuvugana na Moscou bitanga “akaberu” k’ibiganiro. Muri iyi minsi ya vuba, Ukraine yarerekanye ibimenyetso vyo gushaka gusubira kuvugana na  Moscou, inyuma y’aho prezida Volodymir Zelensky ahebeye ivyo kuvuga ko uwo bahanganye , Vladimir Putin, ategerezwa kuvanwa ku butegetsi imbere y’uko ibiganiro vyongera kuba. Yamara, Gen Milley, ari New York, yavuze ko kugira ibiganiro hagire ico bishikako, Ukraine n’Uburusiya vyompi bitegerezwa kwemera ko “intsinzi iciye mu ntambara  hari naho itoshoboka biciye mu buryo bwa gisirikare, ko rero mukeneye kuronderera mu bundi buryo.”  Uwo mujenerari mukuru -asanzwe ari we mujenama mukuru wa prezida Biden mu bibazo vya gisirikare – yavuze ko urugero rw’abo intambara ihitana rushobora kugondoza Kyiv na Moscou ko ari ngombwa  kuvugana muri aya mezi yimirije y’imbeho nyinshi, igihe kugwana bizogabanuka kubera ubukonje. Ukraine n6’Uburusiya vyompi bibika kure ibitigiri vy’abapfa canke abakomerekera ku rugamba. Ibitigiri vya nyuma vya Moscou vyo mu kwezi kw’icenda vyavuga ko abasirikare 5.937 bari bamaze kwicwa kuva  intambara itangura, umushikiranganji ajejwe kwivuna abansi Sergei Shoigu akaba yahakanye ivyavugwa ko igitigiri c’abapfuye kiruta aho. Ibitigiri vya Gen Milley  biri hejuru  cane gusumba. Mu ntambara ya Afghanistan mu 1979-89, bigereranywa ko hari hapfuye abasirikare b’abarusiya 15.000. Ukraine  ahanini ntisohora ibitigiri vy’abantu bapfira n’abakomerekera mu ntambara. Ariko mu kwezi kwa Myandagaro (8) umukuru w’ingabo, Valeriy Zaluzhniy, yasubiwemwo n’ibinyamakuru avuga ko abasirikare 9.000 bari bamaze kwicwa gushika ico gihe. ONU ivuga ko idafata ko ibitigri bitangwa n’abari muri iyo ntambara ari ivyo kwizigirwa. Gen Milley avuga kandi ko abantu bari hagati ya miriyoni 15 na 30 babaye impunzi kuva Uburusiya buteye ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (ukwezi kwa kabiri). ONU imaze guharura abantu miriyoni 7,8 bo muri Ukraine bahungiye i Buraya n’Uburusiya burimwo. Ariko aho ntibarimwo abahunze ingo zabo yamra bakaguma imbere muri Ukraine. Ku wa gatatu, Uburusiya bwamenyesheje ko ingabo zabwo zigiye gutangura kuva mu gisagara ca Kherson co mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko –igisagara gikomeye co nyene  caguye mu minwe y’ingabo z’Uburusiya. Inkuru y’uko Uburusiya bugiye kuva muri Kherson ishitse mu gihe preziza Vladmir Putin muri Nyakanga (ukwezi kw’icenda) yahamagaje ingabo z’integabizoza  zishika 300.000 kugira zije kugwana muri Ukraine. Abahinga ba gisirikare iburengerazuba no muri Ukraine ivyo babibonye nk’ikimenyetso c’uko ingabo z’Uburusiya zirwa cane ku rugamba.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulaya ku wa 24/09/2019: Sterling, Pogba, Maddison
text: Real Madrid iriko yihweza ingene yoronka umukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester City, umwongereza Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 24. Uyu amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo indwi mu nkino umunani kuva ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka ritanguye. (El Mundo Deportivo) Manchester United yatanguye ibiganiro n'umukinyi wo hagati Paul Pogba mu ntumbero yo kumusinyisha ayandi masezerano. Uyo mukinyi w'umufaransa w'imyaka 26 asigaje ikiringo c'imyaka ibiri muri uyo murwi. (Times) Liverpool iripfuza ko mu kwezi kwa mbere yogura umukinyi James Maddison w'imyaka 22 wa Leicester City.  (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Bayer Leverkusen, umudagi Kai Havertz, asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United, Arsenal na Chelsea avugwa ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa gutanga imiliyoni 90 z'amapawundi. Mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yinjije ibitsindo 17 mu nkino 34 yakinye muri Bundesliga. (Sun) Manchester United  iriko irategura amahera atari make kugira ngo izoshobore kugura abakinyi mu gihe c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi mu kwezi kwa mbere kuza. Abakinyi Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 21 akina hagati muri Newcaste, na Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 19 akina muri Red Bull Salzburg nibo basanzwe bariko bararonderwa cane n'uyo murwi. (Manchester Evening News) Hagati aho, umumenyereza wa Man United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ni umumenyereza agira kabiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri Premier League, inyuma ya Marco Silva wa Everton. (Sun) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Chelsea, umunya Brezili Willian w'imyaka 31, ariko yihweza na Juventus igashobora kumutwara mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka igihe amasezerano n'uyo murwi azoba arangiye. (Tuttosport, via Sky Sports) Chelsea kandi irizeye ko Fikayo Tomori, umwongereza w'imyaka 21 azokwemera ayandi masezerano y'imyaka itanu mu ndwi ziri imbere.  (La Gazzetta dello Sport) Umusatirizi wa Juventus akomoka muri Croatie, Mario Mandzukic w'imyaka 33, arizeye ko ashobora kwimukira muri Premier League mu kwezi ka mbere. (Tuttosport) AC Milan  iriko irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham, umunya Côte d'Ivoire, Serge Aurier afise imyaka 26. (Sport Mediaset, via Teamtalk)

headline: Super League: Arsenal, Liverpool, United, City, Chelsea na Tottenham yarivuyemwo
text: Ya mirwi yose itandatu y'Ubwongereza yari yagiye hamwe n'iyindi ngo itanguze rya higanwa European Super League yakuyemwo akarenge. Manchester City niyo yavuyemwo mbere inyuma y'aho Chelsea imenyeshereje ko yariko itegura urwandiko rwo gusezera iryo higanwa. Iyindi ine yari isigaye  - Arsenal, Liverpool, Manchester United na Tottenham - yaciye ikurikira. Super League ivuga ko igiye gusubira kwiga "inzira nyayo" yo gutunganya gushasha iyi nteguro. Iri higanwa ryari rigiye gutanguzwa n'imirwi 12 y'Uburayi rikamenyeshwa ku wa Mungu ryariyamirijwe n'abantu batari bake. Manchester City yemeje ko yatanguje ku mugaragaro integuro zo kuva  muri iri higanwa Super League. Liverpool yatangaje ko ihagaritse ingingo yari yafashe yo kwinjira muri iri higanwa ryaboneka ko rishaka kwiyonkora. Manchester United ivuga ko yumvise kandi igafata nkama "akamo k'abafana, reta y'Ubwongereza n'abandi bose bafise uruhara" mu gufata ingingo bavuga ko batagishijwe inama. Ku ruhande rwa Arsenal, mw'ikete ryuguruye yandikiye abafana bayo, yasavye imbabazi inemera ko yakoze "ikosa", ica yongerako y'uko ivuyemwo imaze kwumva akababaro kabo hamwe "n'abakunzi b'umupira bose". Umukuru wa Tottenham Daniel Levy avuga ko uyu murwi ubabajwe "n'ishavu hamwe n'umwikomo" vyatewe n'iyi ngingo yari yafashe yo kwinjira muri iryo higanwa. Chelsea yemeje ko yatanguje "integuro yo kuva ku rutonde rw'imirwi yatanguje iri higanwa" yari yinjiyemwo "mu ndwi iheze". Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yanditse kuri Twitter ati : "Ndashimye cane ingingo yaraye itangajjwe. Ni inyishu nziza ku bakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru, imirwi n'abanyagihugu mu gihugu hose. Dutegerezwa kubandanya dukingira umukino wacu dukunda". Umukuru wa UEFA - ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rya  Buraya - Aleksander Ceferin, yakiriza yompi izi ngingo, akavuga ati: "Ubu rero baragarutse mu ruhongore kandi ndazi ko tubazeyeko vyinshi, atari mu mahinganwa yacu gusa, ariko kandi muri uno mukino ku mugabane wa Buraya muri rusangi". "Ikintu nyamukuru ubu ni uko tubandanya n'ibikorwa, tukagarukana ubumwe bwarangwa mu nkino imbere y'uko ibi biba, hanyuma tukabandanya urugendo twese turi hamwe". Mw'itangazo ryasohowe, European Super League ivuga iti: "Turavye ingene ibintu bimeze, tugiye kwihweza izindi nzira twofata kugira ngo dutunganye gushasha uwu mugambi, igihe cose tugashira imbere intumbero yacu yo gushimisha abafana uko dushoboye kwose, kandi atawe turenganije mu muryango wose w'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru". Imirwi itandatu y'umupira w'amaguru ikomeye mu Bwongereza yari mu mirwi yari igiye gutanguza iri higanwa, iri kumwe n'iyindi yo muri Espagne ari yo Atletico Madrid, Barcelona na Real Madrid, hamwe na AC Milan, Inter Milan na Juventus yo mu Butaliyano, yari yatangaje imigambi yo gutanguza iri higanwa ryo ku ruhande ryari ryitezwe gukinwa hagati mu ndwi. Iri higanwa ryariyamirijwe n'abafana, abarongoye umupira w'amaguru, abashikiranganji bamwe bamwe mu Bwongereza hamwe na UEFA n'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru mu bihugu vyo ku mugabane  wose wa Buraya. Abafana hafi 1000 bariyegeranije hanze y'ikibuga ca Chelsea, Stamford Bridge, imbere y'urukino rwayihuje na Brighton nijoro ku wa kabiri, biyamiriza ingingo y'uyu murwi wo kwinjira muri iri higanwa. Icegera w'umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa Manchester United, Ed Woodward, yari yagiye mu biganiro vyo gutanguza iri higanwa, yaciye atangaza ko azotanga imihoho mu mpera z'uwu mwaka wa 2021. Abakinyi bakomakomeye b'iyi mirwi itandatu bari batangaje ko badashigikiye iri higanwa ryo ku ruhande. Kizigenza wa Liverpool, Jordan Henderson yavugiye ku mbuga hwaniro ko, ku ruhande rw'abakinyi bose bari hamwe, ata n'umwe ashigikiye ko iri higanwa Super League ribaho. Ubwo butumwa bwanakwiragijwe n'abandi bakinyi bagenziwe ba Liverpool buvuga buti: "Ntaryo twipfuza kandi ntidushaka ko ribaho". Inyuma y'aho Manchester City itangarije ko ikuyemwo akarenge, umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande, Umwongereza Raheem Sterling yaciye yandika ati: "Aho rero, bayi". Gushika ubu, nta murwi n'umwe wo muri Espagne/Spain canke mu Butaliyano urasohora itangazo rivuga aho uhagaze inyuma y'aho iyi mirwi itandatu y'Ubwongereza ikuriyemwo akarenge. Abarongoye Arsenal bavuga ko ata ntumbero bari bafise yo "gutera uwu mubabaro" kandi ko bari binjiye muri Super League kubera batashaka "gusigara inyuma", kandi ko bategura kazoza keza k'umurwi. Bati: "Intumbero yacu igihe cose ni ugufata ingingo nyazo ziteza imbere uyu murwi ukomeye, kugira dukingire kazoza kawo kandi dutere tuja imbere". "Aha twafashe ingingo itari yo, ibi turavyemera". Manchester United ivuga iti: " Twariyemeje gukorana n'abandi bose bahurikiye mu muryango w'abakunzi bumupira w'amaguru  kugira ngo dutorere umuti urama ibibazo vyose bihanze uwu mukino". Liverpool ivuga ko yumvirije "abaserukira abo bose bafise uruhara ku buzima bw'uyu murwi, baba abari muri wo canke hanze", imbere y'ugufata ingingo kandi ikabashimira ku "ntererano yabo ikomeye". Levy yavuze ko Tottenham yibaza ko vyari "nkenerwa" ko yinjira "mw'ihiganwa rishasha yibaza ko ryarondera gusaranganya uburyo bw'amahera ata wurenganijwe kandi mu ntumbero yo kwiyubaka mu buryo bw'amahera ariko yitayeho kunezereza abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru". Yongerako ati:  "Twipfuza gushimira abo banywanyi bose baduterereye ivyiyumviro vyabo". Chelsea ivuga ko imaze "gufata umwanya ikihweza neza iki kibazo", yatahuye ko "kubandanya iri muri iri higanwa ata nyungu vyozanira umurwi, abakunzi bacu canke abahurikiye mu muryango w'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru muri rusangi". Manchester City ivuga ko yemeje ku mugaragaro "integuro zo kuva mu murwi uriko urategura iri higanwa European Super League".

headline: Brazil: Abirabure bariyamiriza ivanguramoko n'ihohoterwa rikorwa n'igiporisi
text: Abirabure ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Brésil barakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba bakorerwa hamwe n'itotezwa bakorerwa n'igiporisi, hari ku musi bibuka ivanwaho ry'ubucakara muri ic ogihugu. Abari mu myiyerekano mu gisagara ca Rio de Janeiro bari bafise amabuji n'ivyapa vyanditseko ngo "Ntunyice, ni wice ivanguramoko", hari haciye indwi igiporisi giteye mu karere kamwe abaharurwa muri mirongo bakahasiga ubuzima. Mu gisagara ca São Paulo, ivyapa vyari vyanditseko ngo : "Abirabure bakeneye kubaho". Abahinga bavuga ko abirabure bicwa n'igiporisi ku rugero rw'incuro zitatu muri Brésil. Abari mu myiyerekano bagiriza Perezida Jair Bolsonaro ko ariko akora ihonyabwoko akoresheje igiporisi. Asanzwe ashigikiye amategeko atoroshe na gato yashizweho mu kurwanya ubukozi bw'ikibi, muri yo  hakaba harimwo gukora ibitero mu turere turwiriyemwo abirabure n'abakene. Abari mu myiyerekano kandi basaba ko isekeza ryo gucandaga Covid-19 rinyaruka, kubera iki kiza cihanye inkumbi mu birabure muri kino gihugu, kimwe mu bihugu bibangamiwe cane n'iki kiza. Mu gisagara ca Rio, abari mu myiyerekano bariyamirije igandagurwa ry'abantu 28 mu ndwi iheze muri karitiye ya Jacarezinho favela mu gihe igiporisi cahakora igitero, kivuga ko cariko kirahiga abakora magendo y'ibiyayuramutwe. Basaba ko ababikoze bashirwa imbere y'intahe. Nico gitero c'igiporisi cahitanye abantu benshi mu mateka y'ico gisagara Ababa muri ico gisagara bagiriza igiporisi ko kibakubagura, mu gihe amashirahamwe aharanira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu nayo avuga ko hari ivyemezo ko habaye ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, aho abaporisi batatinya kwica abagomba kwishikana canke ata ngorane bateye. Aya mashirahamwe avuga ko bamwe mu bishwe ata n'icabagira. Abari mu myiyerekano bazungurutse hagati mu gisagara, bafise ivyapa vyanditseko ubutumwa ngo: "Mbega igiporisi gikingiye ba nde?" hamwe na "Nta rusoro, nta kigoyi, nta Covid". Icapa kimwe cariko amafoto y'abagabo bishwe mu bitero vy'igiporisi. Brésil nico gihugu ku mugabane wa Amerika cakuyeho ubwa nyuma ubucakara mu 1888, igihe umwamikazi Isabel  atereye igikumu kw'itegeko riha ubwigenge abacakara. Abirabure ba Brésil bahimbaza isabukuru ry'ivanwaho ry'ubucakara ku wa 20 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, umusi bibukirako igandagurwa rya Zumbi dos Palmares yari arongoye umuryango w'abacakara bigumuye. Josiane Peçanha wo mw'ishirahamwe Afrodivas, yabwiye TV Globo mu myiyerekano yariko ibera mu karere ka Niterói, mu gisagara ca Rio ati: "Gushika ubu abirabure nta burenganzira bafise. Uyu ni umusi mwiza wo kwiyumvira ibikomere vy'ubucakara twagize muri Brésil". Muri Brésil, ibice hafi 57%  vy'abanyagihugu bose ni abirabure canke imvange, ariko ishirahamwe ryigenga, Brazilian Forum on Public Safety, rivuga ko bibiri vya bitatu (2/3) vy'abicwa ari abirabure canke imvange. Icegeranyo c'ikigo kijewe ibarura, IBGE, co mu 2019, kivuga ko bangana n'ica gatatu gusa mu nzego nyobozi z'amakompanyi, bakaba bangana n'ica kane gusa mu nama nshingamateka ya Brésil, ariko bakaba bangana na bitatu vya bine vy'abashomeri mu gihugu. Mu gisagara ca São Paulo, imyiyerekano yaratunganijwe kw'ibarabara rya Avenida Paulista, rimwe mu mabarabara makuru makuru y'iki gisagara, aho abayiteguye bavuga ko abantu 7000 ari bo bayitabiriye. Abari muri yo, bari bisize irangi ritukura ku minwe banasiga n'irangi kw'ibendera rya Brésil nk'ikimenyetso c'ihohoterwa bakorerwa. Umwe mu bari muri iyi myiyerekano, João de Oliveira, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ati: "Turi ng'aha kugira twiyamirize ububeshi ngo ubucakara bwarahavuye, hamwe n'amahano yabereye i Jacarezinho. Perezida  Bolsonaro n'icegera ciwe barashimagije ubu bwicanyi. Ariko akora ihonyabwoko. Turi ng'aha ngo tuvyiyamirize". Imyiyerekano kandi yarabaye no mu bindi bisagara bikuru bikuru harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Brasília, aho imyiyerekano yabereye hanze y'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu. Aciye kuri twitter, uyu mukuru w'igihugu -  yahoze ari intwazangabo mu gisirikare yashigikiye impinduka mu mategeko ziha ubudahangarwa abajejwe umutekano iyo bishe abantu bari ku kazi - yarakeje igiporisi kuri ico gitero. Perezida Bolsonaro yari aherutse guhakana ko ata vangura rishingiye ku rukoba rirangwa mu gihugu, n'aho imishamirano iheruka itari mike yerekanye ko igihugu kirangwamwo amacakubiri akomeye. Mu mwaka uheze, igandagurwa bunyamaswa ry'umwirabure yari mu minwe y'abazungu babiri bari bajejwe gucungera inzu y'akaguriro ryarateje uburakari mu gihugu.

headline: Umunyamakuru akaba n'umwanditsi kuri Afrika akomeye, Pierre Pean, yapfuye
text: Pierre Pean, umuhinga kuri Afrika akaba yaranditse n'ibitabo vyinshi yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo kuwa kane afise imyaka 81. Nk'uko bivugwa n'igitangazamakuru co mu Bufaransa, France 24, umunyamakuru Pierre Pean, umukozi w'itohoza abushitse, yibanze cane kuri Afrika, n'ibitangazamakuru. Yibanze kandi ku banyepolitike - cane cane kahise katabonwa kumwe k'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Francois Mitterrand mu gihe aba Nazi bari bacigaruriye Ubufaransa. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo tariki 25/07/2019 nk'uko umuryango wiwe wabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru, AFP. Umuhungu wiwe w'umwanditsi Jean Gregor, yabwiye AFP ko Pierre Pean yahitanywe n'uburwayi ku bitaro vya Argenteuil mu karere ka Val-d'Oise. Ikinyamakuru co kuri internet, France Bleu, canditse ko Pierre Pean atakunda ko bamwita umunyamakuru w'itohoza. Mu matohoza yiwe yibanda ku kwerekana ukuntu ivyo atohoza canke abo atohozako bagoranye. Yavuze ko yaba ashaka gutohoza yidegemvya, ku bintu yihitiyemwo kandi ku gushaka kwiwe, ntabwirizwe canke ngo ajane narwo afatiye ku bivugwa mu bitangazamakuru canke imanza zo mu ma sentare. Yarandanitse ku Rwanda igitabo yise "Noir Fureur Blanc Menteur: Rwanda 1990-1994", igitabo kitashimwe n'ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda. Muri ico gitabo casohotse mu 2005, Pierre Pean ashira akabazo ku nkuru ya jenoside yo mu Rwanda ku buryo ivugwa n'ubutegetsi. Ku bw'ico gitabo, uwo mwanditsi yararezwe muri sentare n'ishirahamwe SOS Racisme, rimwagiriza "kugira uruhara mu gukwega urwanko rufatiye ku moko", kuko yanditse ko Abatutsi "bafise umuco w'ikinyoma no guhishahisha." Urwo rubanza yararutsinze.

headline: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
text: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu. Ibizwi gushika ubu muri uwo mugambi:

headline: Akon-Uganda : Rurangiranwa muri rap Aliaune Thiam muri Uganda kurondera aho ashora imitahe
text: Prezida Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda yatangaje ko yanezerewe no kuba yavuganye na Akon mu rugendo arimwo muri ico gihugu. Akon, izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Aliaune Thiam, muri urwo rugendo  muri Uganda ari kumwe n'umugore wiwe Rozina Negusei. Yandika ku rubuga rwa twitter, umukuru wa Uganda, Yoweri Museveni,   yavuze ati: "Aliaune Thiam @Akon n'umugore wiwe baje muri Uganda kurondera aho boshora imitahe mu bisata bitandukanye birimwo ivy'umuyagankuba [amashanyarazi] n'iterambere ry'ibikorwa remezo. "Ndanezerewe no kuba twagiraniye ibiganiro bizoteza imbere abanya Uganda na Africa muri rusangi." Aliaune Thiam azwi cane nka Akon, n'umunyatugenegene akaba n'umuririmvyi w'umudiho wa rap azwi cane. Yavukiye muri Amerika ku bavyeyi bakomoka muri Senegal ariko yarabaye cane muri ico gihugu co  muri Africa y'uburengero. Thiam afise imigambi itandukanye y'iterambere muri Senegal nyene no mu bindi bice vya Afrika. Akon, w'imyaka 47, yatanguye kumenyekana  ku rukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere rw'indirimwo mu 2004. Mu ndirimbo ziwe harimwo  nka  "Smack That"  igaragaramwo umuririmvyi wa rap Eminem.

headline: U Burundi ngo naho atawurwaye coronavirus arahaboneka "buriteguye"
text: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi, Gaston Sindimwo, yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu citeguye kurwanya coronavirus naho ata wanduye uwo mugera arahaboneka. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu bike kw'isi gushika uyu munsi hataraboneka umugwayi wa coronavirus. Ariko mu ntumbero yo kuzitira bataronerwa, leta yaramaze gufata ingingo zo gukumira ico kiza. Muri izi harimwo guhimiriza abantu kudafata ingendo, baba abinjira mu gihugu canke abashaka gusohoka hamwe no guhagarika uruja n'uruza rw'indege mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Basaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kwegerana aho bishoboka, ndetse no gukoranako. Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu Gaston Sindimwo yadusobanuriye ko ari nayo mpamvu mu nama nshikiranganji y'uno munsi baramukanije badakorana mu ntoke nk'uko bimenyerewe. Yagiranye ikiganiro na Florentine Kwizera, ushobora kwumva aho hejuru.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Salah, Mane, Kounde, Ekitike, Pogba, De Jong, Keita, Palhinha
text: Umusatirizi wa Liverpool umunya-Misiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 29 ashobora guhitamwo kwinjira mu murwi w'abakeba muri Premier League mu ci riza mu gihe ata masezerano mashasha yo kuguma muri uyo murwi yoshikwako. (The Athletic - subscription required) Umusatirizi w'umunya-Senegal Sadio Mane w'imyaka 30 aripfuza kuva muri Liverpool muri rino ci, Bayern Munich ikaba yashimitse kugira irabe ko yomugura. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) Chelsea yatanguye ibiganiro na Sevilla mu ntumbero yo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 23 yafashije uyu murwi wo muri Espagne gutsindira igikombe ca Europa League mu 2020, akaba afise igiciro c'imiriyoni 50 z'amapawundi (amafaranga y'Ubwongereza yababa imiriyoni 62,7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika). (Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle United iri hafi yo kuronka umusatirizi wa Reims  umufaransa Hugo Ekitike w'imyaka 19, ku miriyoni zirenga 36 z'amapawundi. (Mail) Inyuma y'aho itangarije ko  Paul Pogba na Jesse Lingard bagiye, Manchester United yatanguye ibiganiro na Barcelona kugira irabe ko yoronka umunya-Hollande akina hagati, Frenkie de Jong w'imyaka 25 ku miriyoni zirenga 72,5 z'amapawundi. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) Ariko Manchester United  ishobora kubandanya urugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Serbia akina hagati muri  Lazio, Sergej Milinkovic-Savic w'imyaka  27, mu gihe vyokwanka ko ironka De Jong. (GiveMeSport) Juventus bafise icizere ko bamaze gushika ku masezerano yo kugarukana Pogba w'imtaka 29, amasezerano uyu mufaransa akina hagati afitaniye na  Manchester United akazorangira muri rino ci. (90min) Liverpool itegura guha amasezerano mashasha umunya-Guinea akina hagati Naby Keita, w'imyaka 27. Paris St-Germain iripfuza uyu mukinyi ariko umurwi wiwe wiyita Reds urizeye kugumana Keita nu gihe amasezerano yiwe azoba arangiye mu ci riza. (The Athletic - subscription required) Wolves iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Sporting Lisbon umunya Portugal Joao Palhinha w'imyaka 26, akaba yemeye ko ashobora kwimukira muri uyo murwi mu masezerano y'igihe kirekire ku miriyoni 20 z'amapawundi.  (Sun) Manchester City iracarondera umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza  Kalvin Phillips w'imyaka 26, ariko rero umurwi wiwe  Leeds United uracizeye ko ushobora kumugumana inyuma y'aho igarukiye ku nkombe  zo gukorokera mu cicaro ca kabiri.  (Sun) Real Madrid irashaka umukinyi wo hagati wa  Borussia Dortmund,umwongereza Jude Bellingham w'imyaka 18, ariko si imbere ya 2023.  (Bild - in German) Bayern Munich igiye kugerageza kurondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 29, asanzwe kandi aronderwa na  Inter Milan. (GiveMeSport) Lukaku ariteguye kwemera kugabanirizwa umushahara kugira ngo arabe ko vyokunda ko asubira mu murwi wa Inter Milan yahoze akinira.(Mail) Manchester United, mu bo irondera, ishira  imbere umukinyi w'inyuma wa Ajax umunya-Hollande Jurrien Timber w'imyaka 20, ariko kandi imaze kuganira incuro zibiri n'umunya-Portugal  David Carmo w'imyaka 22 akina inyuma muri Braga. (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umurwi Burnley uherutse gukoroka, umwongereza James Tarkowski w'imyaka 29, araronderwa na  Aston Villa, Everton, West Ham, Newcastle hamwe na Fulham.(Mirror) Villarreal iri mu biganiro bigeze kure mu rugamba rwo kurondera ko yogumana burundu umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham umunya - Argentina Giovani lo Celso w'imyaka 26, yari yatijijwe muri uyo murwi wo muri Espagne mu kwa mbere.  (Football Insider) Aston Villa irarondera abandi bakinyi batatu biyongera ku mufaransa akina hagati Boubacar Kamara w'imyaka  22 yaguzwe muri  Marseille, umunya-Brezil akina inyuma Diego Carlos w'imyaka 29 yaguzwe muri  Sevilla hamwe n'umusatirizi w'umunya-Brezil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 29 yahawe amasezerano ya burundu inyuma y'ikiringo yari amaze akinira uyo murwi atijijwe na Barcelona. Umunya-Uruguay Luis Suarez w'imyaka 35 ariko arasezera Atletico Madrid,  na we nyene ari mu bariko barihwezwa.  (The Athletic - subscription required) Uwahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubudagi  Mesut Ozil w'imyaka 33, nta mugambi wo kuva muri Fenerbahce, n'aho acinanata kugira arabe ko yoba mu bakinyi ba mbere batangura mu kibuga muri uyo murwi wo muri Turukiya. (Mail)

headline: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
text: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

headline: Mbali Sana: Steven Sogo aravuga ku rukurikirane rushasha rw'indirimbo ziwe
text: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Steven Sogo ubu aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, araganira na BBC Gahuzamiryango ku rukurikirane (album) rushasha rw'indirimbo ziwe aheruka gusohora yise Mbali Sana. Mbali Sana, canke Kure Cane mu Kirundi, ni urukurikirane rugira gatatu rwa Steven Sogo, akaba arusohoye nyuma y'imyaka indwi atanguye kurutegura. Steven Sogo aganira na Robert Patrick Misigaro wa BBC Gahuzamiryango, ku gituma vyatwaye igihe kirekire kugira Mbali Sana isohoke, igihe ashobora kuremeshereza igiteramo mu Burundi, n'ibindi... (Kanda aho hejuru mw'ifoto wumvirize)

headline: Uyu muringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA?
text: Hari akaringa gashasha gaherutse kwemerwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ko kokoreshwa mu gukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA. Ni akaringa gakozwe muri silicone  kinjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze kakarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. N'aho hari intambwe zimaze gushikwako mu kuvura no gukinga, umugera wa SIDA uracasasika inganda mu bihugu bitari bike cane cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibice bibiri vya bitatu vy'abantu bose banduye umugera wa SIDA kw'isi bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, bafise imyaka hagati ya 15 na 24, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe ONU. Mu buseruko n'ubumanuko bwa Afrika, abantu barenga imiriyoni 20 bagendana uwu mugera. Abagore bakiri bato nibo ahanini babangamirwa: ku ncuro zibiri ugereranije n'abagabo, abagore nibo bafise igihamana kibi co kwandura umugera wa SIDA. OMS iherutse gutanga uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uwu muringa kugira ngo abagore bashobore kwikingira mu gihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Mu kiganiro Africa Daily ca BBC, Doreen Morah Moracha w'imyaka 28 aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA avuga ko kwikingira ari co kintu ca mbere kiza imbere mu kurwanya uwu mugera. Moracha amaze imyaka 16 yose afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza. Kubw'iwe, gufata iyi miti ubuzima bwose si ikintu coroshe. Ati: "Nipfuza ko abandi bose bokwikingira uwu mugera wa SIDA, kubera burya hari abibaza ko ari ibintu vyoroshe, ariko gufata imiti ubuzima bwawe bwose si ikintu coroshe na gato". Bumwe mu buryo bukoreshwa cane mu kwikingira umugera wa SIDA, harimwo udukingirizo, harimwo mbere n'agakingirizo k'abagore. Umupfasoni Moracha avuga ko abagore batoroherwa kugakoresha kubera akenshi usanga atari bo bifatira ingingo. Avuga ko abagabo bobo boroherwa gukoresha agakingirizo kabo kubera akenshi umugabo ari we afata ingingo. Ati: "Iyo umugore asavye ko bokwikingira, umugabo atabishatse aca akamomora akagata, rero muri ico gihe umugore nta bubasha aba afise bwo gufata ingingo". Hari kandi ibinini bifatwa imbere canke inyuma y'imibonano mpuzabitsina (PREP) ku muntu atarandura uwu mugera, ariko ibi navyo ntivyoroshe kuronka. Uwo muringa uje kuba nk'inyishu kuri izo ngorane. Ni umuringa wambarwa mu kiringo c'imisi 28, hanyuma muri ico kiringo cose ugasohora umuti uzwi nka dapivirine utuma umuntu atandura umugera wa SIDA. Anna Kukundakwe ajejwe imigambi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko umugore we nyene ubwiwe ashobora kwishirira uru muringa mu gitsina, atarinze gufashwa n'umuganga. Ati: "Kenshi iyo umugore yipfuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsinda yikingiye, ntibimworohera gusaba ko uwo bashaka kuyikorana yambara agakingirizo. Ariko uwu muringa uramuha ububasha bwo kwikingira igihe abishatse mw'ibanga, kandi ntategerezwa kubwira umugabo ko awambaye". Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwu muringa, vyabonetse ko igihamana kibi co kwandura uwu mugera cagabanutse gushika ku bice vyababa 30% gusa, ariko Rachel Bagley arongoye igisata co gupima imiti mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, avuga ko bishobora kuja hasi gusumba. Uwu muringa wambarwa n'uyo mugore yiyizi ko atarandura umugera kandi yiyizi ko akunze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, umupfasoni Anna akavuga ko abadakunze gukora iyo mibonano batokwirukira uwo muringa. Ati: "Rero abagore boronswa inyigisho zikwiye mu buryo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo bashobore kwihitiramwo bo nyene uburyo bokoresha, nimba bipfuza gukoresha agakingirizo, ibinini canke uwu muringa". Igiciro c'uwo muringa ntikiramenyekana neza, ariko umupfasoni Bagley avuga ko utegerezwa kuzoba utazimvye, uri ku giciro kimwe n'ubundi bukingirizo. Yipfuza ko uwu muringa woba ku giciro giciriritse cane cane mu bihugu bikenye birangwamwo umugera ku rugero runini, mbere ugatangwa ku buntu.

headline: Iran: 'Nta gusubira inyuma' mu gihe imyiyerekano yujuje imisi 100
text: Inyuma y’imisi ijana itanguye, imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ubutegetsi imaze igihe kirekire kuva habaye impinduka za ki-Islam muri Irani mu 1979 irahungabanije ubutegetsi ariko ku kiguzi kinini c’ubuzima bw’abantu imaze guhitana. Abarenga 500 bari muri yo, harimwo abana 69 baramaze kwicwa, nk’uko bivugwa n’ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Human Rights Activists' News Agency, HRANA. Babiri muri yo baramaze kunyongwa abandi nabo bababa 26 barindiriye igihano nk’ico, mu co ishirahamwe Amnesty International rivuga ko ari "imanza z’amanyanga". N’aho hari imyiyerekano yari imaze kuba muri kahise igahungabanya Irani – mu 2017 gushika mu ntango za 2018, hamwe n’iyindi yo muri Munyunyo (11) 2019 – iya kino gihe ntisanzwe, kuko ihuriyemwo abanyagihugu bo mu gihugu cose kandi abagore bakaba ari bo bafashe iya mbere ku civugo kivuga ngo “Abagore, Ubuzima, Ubwigenge”. Impande zompi zafashe umurongo utoroshe, ubutegetsi butuza abari muri yo, aho abadahunze bapfungwa, bakaborezwa igufa, abapfa bagapfa. Bamwe mu bihangange vya Irani bafashe ingingo zo gushigikira imyiyerekano, ivyatumye bafatwa canke bakomoka. Taraneh Alidoosti, umukinyi w’amareresi azwi cane, apfungiwe mw’ibohero rizwi cane rya Evin  inyuma yo kwiyamiriza inyongwa ry’umuyabaga yari mu myiyerekano. Imbere y’aha, uyu mugore yari yasohoye isanamu yiwe atambaye igitambara co kwitwikira mu mutwe nk’uko bitegerezwa, afise n’igicapo kiriko icivugo c’iyi myiyerekano. Asghar Farhadi yahagarariye Alidoosti mw’ireresi yiwe, The Salesman, yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Narakoranye na Taraneh mu mareresi ane none ubu ari mw’ibohero kubera ashigikiye bagenziwe mu gihugu, be no kwiyamiriza imanza z’akarenganyo ziriko ziracibwa”. "Nimba kwerekana ko ushigikiye uwuharanira uburenganzira bwiwe ari icaha, ubwo rero amamiriyoni mirongo y’abanyagihugu muri kino gihugu ni abagizi ba nabi”. Uwundi mukinyi w’amareresi  azwi cane yahunze igihugu, Pegah Ahangarani yabwiye BBC ati: "Irani ntishobora gusubira mu gihe c’imbere ya Mahsa Amini", akaba ashaka kuvuga igihe c’umugore w’umunya-Iran iw’umu-kurde yapfiriye mw’ibohero ku wa 19 Nyakanga (9) bigaca bitera imyiyerekano. Hamid Farrokhnezhad, uwundi mukinyi w’amareresi w’umunya-Irani azwi cane, yahungiye muri Amerika muri kuno kwezi, avuga ko Indongozi y’ikirenga wa Irani, Ali Khamenei, ari "umutegetsi w’agahotoro". Amugereranya na Franco yahoze arongoye Espagne, Stalin yahoze arongoye Uburusiya, be na Mussolini yahoze arongoye Ubutaliyano, abo bose bakaba bazwi nk’abari barongoye intwaro mbi z’agahotoro. Ikindi kintu gitandukanya iyi myiyerekano n’iyabaye imbere y’aha, ni uko abri muri yo batanguye gukoresha vya biturika bihingurwa mu bitoro (cocktail Molotov). Ibi biherutse gukoreshwa ku birindiro vy’umurwi witwara gisirikare  Basija hamwe na Hawza, canke amashure y’idini yegukira abarongoye ishami rya Islam  ry’aba Shia. Umurwi uzwi nka Generation Z nawo warafashe iya mbere muri ino myiyerekano, mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa ruhasha y’idini itanguza ibindi bikorwa bisadanzwe nko guturira ibitambara vyo mu mutwe vyambarwa n’abategetsi b’aba-Islam. Uwundi murwi ugizwe n’urwaruka ni uwitwa "turban tossing" (twogereranya mu Kirundi na gukorora ibitambara) – aho abari muri wo bayomboka bagaca inyuma y’abategetsi b’Abashia, bagakubita ku bitambara vyabo bagaca biruka. Umusore w’imyaka 16, Arshia Emamgholizadeh, yarahagaritswe mu gisagara ca Tabriz  kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero mu kwezi guheze yagirizwa “gukorora igitambara”. Yapfunzwe imisi cumi imbere yo gupfungurwa. Haciye imisi ibiri, yariyahuye, ivyo umuryago wiwe uvuga ko vyatewe n’ingene yafashwe nabi mw’ibohero. Igihe yari apfunzwe, Arshia yarakubiswe amahiri yongera ahabwa n’ibinini bitazwi, nk’uko umwe mu begereye umuryango yabibwiye BBC igisata c’ururimi rw’igi perse. Mehran Samak w’imyaka 27 yararashwe mu mutwe mu gisagara ca Bandar Anzali kiri mu buraruko kubera yavugije ihona mu kwerekana umunezero igihe Irani itsindwa ikava mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, mu rukino rwabaye ku wa 29 Munyonyo. Gushika ubu, abagabo babiri ni bo bamaze kunyongwa inyuma yo kwagirwa n’ivyaha vyo guhungabanya umutekano bifatiye kuri ino myiyerekano,  mu co abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bavuga ko ari amakosa akomeye y’ubucamanza. Abenshi mu bamaze gucirwa manza zo gupfa bavuga ko bakorewe iyica rubozo.

headline: Diamond League Doha: Francine Niyonsaba ati 'Iyi ntsinzi ni iyo gutera intege abandi'
text: "Ni umunezero ntangere kubona ngarutse i Doha ubwa kabiri inyuma y'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ryo mu 2019 kandi nkaba ntsinze". "Ndanezerewe cane kandi ndashimira abamfashije bose. Narakoze cane kugira ngo mbe umunonotsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Mva mu gahutu gato, iyi ntsinzi ni iyo gutera intege abandi". Niyo majambo wa munonotsi rurangiranwa w'umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yavuze nijoro atahukanye intsinzi mu gusiganwa ku metero 3000 mu mahiganwa ya Diamond League Doha ku ruhande rw'abagore/abakobwa. Niyonsaba yatsinze umunyakenyakazi yahabwa amahirwe menshi,  Faith Kipyegon, ku mwanya w'iminota 8:37.70 nayo uyu mukeba akaba yarangije mu mwanya w'iminota 8:40:97. Iyi ni itsinzi ije ikurikira iyo yaheruka kuronka , mu kwandika amateka mashasha ku metero 2000 mw'ihiganwa Continental Tour Gold ryabereye i Zagreb mu gihugu ca Croatia, hari mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2021. Ico gihe, ku mwanya yakoresheje w'iminota itanu n'amasegonda 21.56, yasumbije Genzebe Dibaba yaheruka guca umuhigo mu mahiganwa yo mu kibuga cugaye (indoors) mu 2017, akaba yamusize amasegonda abiri. Muri uko kwezi nyene, uyu mononotsi w'imyaka 29 ubu yari yatsinze umunyakenyakazi Hellen Obiri  mu metero 5000 mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League i Zurich. Amateka yiyongera ku yandi kuri uyu munonotsi rurangiranwa yatanguye asiganwa ku metero 800 abikora bigacika mu gutsindira umudari w'ifeza mu mahiganwa ya Rio olympics yabereye i Rio muri Brezili, ariko mu nyuma urwego mpuzamakungu rukamufatira ingingo yo kudasubira guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1600. Uru rwego rwamwagiriza ko afise inkabuzo (imisemburo) y'igitsinagabo ya testosterone irenze urugero, agategekwa gufata imiti yo kugabanya uru rugero kugira ngo yemererwe gusubira guhiganwa kuri izo ntera. Kubera iyo ngingo yafatiwe mu 2018, Francine yaciye yimukira ku ntera yo hejuru, akaba amaze gusiganwa nko ku metero 2000, 3000, 5000, 10000 kandi hose agenda yerekana ubushobozi bwiwe. Mu kw'icenda kw'umwaka uheze, abajijwe ico avuga ku vyariko bisabwa na bamwe bamwe ko igisata kijejwe kwinonora imitsi, World Athletics, cokwongereza intera atosubira guhiganwamwo kubera urugero rwiwe rwa testosterone, Francine yaritwengeye yivugira ko yari yiteguriye guhindura. Ati: "Ndashobora kwimukira ku ntera zo hejuru! Canke nkaja mu rwego rwo gusimba!"

headline: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
text: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe.
