Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

headline: CAN 2021: Igikombe ca Afrika kiratangura vuba muri Cameroun
text: Ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika c'umupira w'amaguru ryari ryarigijwe inyuma buca ritangura muri Cameroun. Ibi ni ibikuru bikuru umuntu yokwitega hamwe n'ingorane zahabaye.

headline: DR Congo: Umusirikare wa MONUSCO yishwe ku kirindiro cayo i Minembwe
text: Ingabo zarungitswe kugarukana amahoro muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, MONUSCO, ziriyamiriza igitero cakozwe ku kirindiro cazo mu karere ka Minembwe mu ntara ya Kivu y’Epfo. MONUSCO ivuga ko iki gitero cakozwe n’umurwi w’inyeshamba Twirwaneho ku wa 30 z’ukwezi kw’icenda, isaha zine n’igice z’ijoro. Nk’uko MONUSCO ibivuga, umusirikare umwe wayo yarishwe n’abantu bitwaje inkoho bariko begera iki kirindiro cayo inyuma y’aho bavuganiye nayo ko bashaka kwishikana. Mw’itangazo yaraye isohoye, MONUSCO yibutsa ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kwaka ibirwanisho abarwanyi bihagarariwe n’Inama nkuru y’ishirahamwe ONU kandi ko bikorwa ata nkunzi. Ivuga ko gutera ingabo zarungitswe kugarukana amahoro bishobora gufatwa nk’icaha co mu ntambara. MONUSCO isaba reta gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo abakoze iki gitero bashengezwe. Ingabo zarungitswe kugarukana amahoro muri Congo zimaze imyaka irenga 20 ariko ntizirashobora kugarukana ituze mu buseruko bw’ico gihugu burangwamwo imirwi y’inyeshamba irenga 100. Abanyagihugu bo muri ako karere bakaba babona ko ataco ibamariye. Mu kw’indwi, haradutse imishamirano hagati ya MONUSCO n’abanyagihugu, aho abari muri yo baturiye bongera barasahura ibigo vyayo mu gisagara ca goma. Abashika 19 nibo bazwi ko baguye muri ino mishamirano.

headline: Umupfasoni Claudette avuga ko arenza 200kg ari mu maganya kubera ubuvyibuhe
text: Mu buzima busanzwe kuri we, Claudette Nyirangendo avuga ko ari nk'ukwurira umusozi buri musi, ibi bikavana n'ukwiremera kubera ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero ubu bwahagaritse ibikorwa biboneka ko ari ibisanzwe kuri buri muntu ariko kuri we bikaba amagorwa. Ntaherutse kwipimisha uburemere ariko ubu yibaza ko arenza ibiro 200. Ku myaka 43, uyu mupfasoni abaye mu maganya akavuga ko yipfuza kubona uburemere bw'umubiri wiwe bugabanutse. Claudette ati: "Ubuzima burandemereye cane, rimwe rimwe ndashobora kumara n'imisi ibiri canke itatu ntavuye mu gitanda, kubera ingorane zo gutambuka bivanye n'uko niremereye". Uyu munyarwandakazi Claudette arasigura ingene yari abayeho neza mu bwana bwiwe  n'igihe yari akiri umuyabaga. Yibuka ko ico gihe atari avyibushe uko avyibushe ubu. Avuga ko atazi igituma yavyibushe birenze urugero mu myaka itandatu iheze mu gihe afungura indya kama zo mu gihugu ciwe zisanzwe ziribwa n'abandi, nk'akarorero ibitoke n'imboga. Ubu buvyibuhe bwamuteye ibibazo vyinshi na cane cane iyo yibutse ko kimwe mu vyamutumye yahukana gifitaniye isano n'ubuvyibuhe bwiwe burenze urugero. Uyu mupfasoni avuga ko umugabo wiwe yaruhishijwe no kubandanya abana nawe kubera uburemere bwiwe, akavuga ko yama avyidoga igihe cose bamaranye bubakanye. Ati: "Jewe nari umuvyeyi n'umukenyezi mwiza, ariko ndibaza ko atashoboye kwihanganira ubuvyibuhe bwanje, bituma anta aca yigira kwiberaho ukwiwe. Ubu rero, mbeshejweho gusa n'umukobwa wanje amfasha ikintu ico ari co cose kuko ata bushobozi mfise bwo kwunama". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko yari yubakanye n'umugabo wa mbere bamaranye imyaka itari mike ariko akavamwo apfa akamusiga ari umupfakazi areze abana bane. Inyuma y'aho, yakundanye n'uwundi mugabo birangira barongoranye, bakaba bavyaranye umwana umwe imbere y'uko amuheba. Ubu aho ari, abanye n'uyu mwana wiwe akavuga ko abayeho mu buzima bugoye cane. Iyindi ngorane nini ni uko gutembera kuri we ari ikibazo gikomeye. Aho asanzwe aba, utuzu twa surwumwe turi hanze kandi ni duto cane ku buryo adashobora kwinjira kubera ubuvyibuhe bwiwe, ibi bikunyurwa n'uko adashobora no kwunama. Claudette ati: "Mfise umubabaro mwinshi cane kubona ubuvyibuhe bwanje bwanshikanye aho ntashoboye no kwifasha mu bintu vyanje vyihariye, aho no kwihagarika nkenera uwumfasha, aha nkavuga umukobwa wanje amfasha vyose kubera ntashobora gushika kuri karya kazu ka surwumwe, sinokwirwa mu muryango kandi uburemere bwanje ntibunyemerera kwunama". Hampande y'ibi, uyu mugore avuga ko kugirira isuku umubiri wiwe kenshi ari ingorane. Hari igihe vyanka ko ashika mu bwogero akenshi bikaba ngombwa ko yihanagura gusa. Muri kino gihe, ariko ararondera uburyo butandukanye kugira ngo atangure kugabanya ubuvyibuhe. Avuga ko ibikorwa vyinshi bimusaba ko aba ari hanze vyahagaze, akaba atazi ico yokora. Umwikomo niwo uranga ubuzima bwiwe kubera yama ariko yiyumvira ubuvyibuhe bwiwe, akicwa n'irungu ryo kwama yicaye muhira imisi yose adashobora gutembera canke guhagarara umwanya muremure. Hagati aho, Claudette aracafise icizere ko azohava atora inyishu y'ukungene yogabanya ubuvyibuhe. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi n'imbuga ngurukanabumenyi zitandukanye zivuga ibijanye n'amagara, ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero buvana n'amavuta arenze aguma yiyongera mu mubiri gushika ku rugero rwo kwonona amagara y'umuntu. Kugira ngo umuntu avugwe ko avyibushe kandi aremereye birenze urugero, bafatira ku burebure bw'umuntu n'uburemere afise. Abahinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu bavuga ko ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero ari bubi cane ku magara y'umuntu kandi ko bushobora gutuma yandura indwara canke zikiyongera, harimwo  umuvuduko w'amaraso, indwara z'umutima n'ibibazo vyo guhema. Ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero akenshi burava ku bintu bitandukanye harimwo gufungura indya zirimwo isukari nyinshi (glucoses). Kutagira imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri hamwe n'uduce ndangakamere mvukanwa twihariye, hakaba n'abandi bake baba bafise uduce ndangakamere hamwe n'imisemburo canke inkabuzo bidakora neza. Bavuga ko gufungura neza n'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri ari nzo nzira nkuru zo gutorera umuti ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero.

headline: USA: Inyuma y'impari abakenguzamateka bemeranije ko urubanza rwo kubogoza Trump rwogenda
text: Inama nkenguzamateka ya Amerika bumvikanye ku kungene urubanza rwo kubogoza Perezida Donald Trump rugiye kubandanya inyuma y'impari zamaze amasaha 13 baterana amajambo. Abagiriza Bwana Trump bo ku ruhande rw'aba Democrates bateranye amajambo n'abamuburanira, mu gihe abo mu mugambwe w'aba Republicains biyamirije ivyasabwa ko hotumwako ibindi vyabona. Urubanza ruza kubandanya uno munsi wa gatatu aho abamwagiriza baza gushikiriza ibirego vyabo, hanyuma abamuburanira nabo bisigure hongere habazwe n'ibibazo. Bwana Trump abaye umu perezida agize gatatu asabiwe kubogozwa mu mateka ya Amerika. Yagirizwa gukoresha ububasha ahabwa n'ubutegetsi mu gukora amakosa hamwe no kuburabuza inama nshingamateka yariko imukorako amatohoza. Arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Nk'uko bavyumvikanye mu ntahe y'icese ya mbere yabaye ejo ku wa kabiri, ikaba yagiye kurangira uno munsi ku wa gatatu, buri ruhande ruzoronka amasaha ashika 24 kugira ngo begeranye ibirego. Ico gikorwa gitegekanijwe gutangura kuri uyu wa gatatu ku muhingamo. Ivyo biheze, kumbure mu ntango z'indwi iza, abakenguzamateka bazoronswa akaryo ko kubaza ibibazo mu kiringo c'amasaha 16. Inyuma y'aho bazosubira bihweze ikibazo cerekeye gutumako ibindi vyabona. Abo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates bipfuza kwumviriza abahoze ari abahanuzi mu biro kwa perezida bakoranye hafi cane na Bwana Trump. Aho harimwo umukuru mfatakibanza w'ibiro vya Perezida, Mick Mulvaney, hamwe n'uwahoze ari umuhanuzi muvyo umutekano, John Bolton. Hagati aho, aba Republicains nka bose ntibipfuza ko abo bantu barengutswa. Biciye mu matora aho aba Republicains ari 53 aba Democrates 47, Inama nkenguzamateka yahagaritse integuro zitatu zose z'aba Democrates zari rijanye no kurondera ingene baronka inzandiko hamwe n'ivyemezo vyerekeye urubanza rw'ibogozwa rya Trump. Abakenguzamateka baburijemwo iciyumviro c'umukuru w'abakenguzamateka b'aba Democrates, Chuck Schumer, co gutumako impapuro ziri mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu zerekana ivyo Trump yakoranye n'igihugu ca Ukraine. Bahagaritse kandi umugambi wo gusaba impapuro z'ivyakozwe mu bunyamabanga bwa leta hamwe no mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bijejwe ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga. Abakenguzamateka b'aba Republicains kandi basubije inyuma umugambi w'aba Democrates wo kurengukisha Bwana Bolton yamenyesheje ko yari kwitaba akamo mu gihe bomutumako. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ry'ukwugurura ibikorwa, Adam Schiff, arongoye umurwi w'abashingamateka b'aba Democrates bagiriza Trump, yavuze ko Abanyamerika nka bose "batizeye ko urubanza ruzogenda neza". Ati: "Ntibizeye ko inama nkenguzamateka itazohengama. Barazi ko ibizova mu rubanza vyamaze gutegurwa". Umurwi w'abanyamategeko baburanira umukuru w'igihugu wari wasavye ko yambikwa izera bidatevye, bakavuga ko urwo rubanza "ruhonyanga ibwirizwashingiro". Mu gihe bariko baraterana amajambo, harageze igihe umucamanza Roberts anegura impande zompi azisaba kwibuka ko bariko babwira "urwego rwa mbere kw'isi rufata ingingo".

headline: Covid mu minsi iri imbere izoba ari nk'ibicurane - Abashakashatsi
text: Covid iri mu nzira yo gucika nk'ibicurane abantu basanzwe bamenyereye, nk'uko bivugwa n'abahinga babiri, abigisha bo kuri kaminuza ya Oxford Sir John Bell na Dame Sarah Gilbert, ari nabo batoye urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca. Ku mugera  washegeshe isi nk'uko, ivyo  abo bahinga bavuze bishobora kwumvikana nko kwubahuka cane. Ariko ico ibiza  vyabaye muri kahise vyerekana n'uko umugera utera mu mipfunda. Imipfunda ya mbere iba ikomeye cane, bigatera kurwara ukaremba, ariko mu nyuma umugera ukagenda woroha. Ivyo ntibivuze ko umugera uba wazimanganye, ahubwo ni ukubera ubudahangarwa tuba twubatse mu mubiri buheza bukagabanura ingaruka. Ubukari bw'ukurwara kwandurutse kuri uwo mugera buragabanuka cane n'ubwo tuguma dusubira kwandura kenshi kenshi. Incanco zakozwe ziduha ubushobozi bwo kwigwanira, izo ncanco zikigisha umubiri kumenya kugwanya uwo mugera. Ubukomezi bw'urukingo burashobora kugenda buragabanuka uko umwanya uhera, ariko buguma bukomeye bihagije kugira burinde umurwayi kuremba. Ivyo bisigura ko n'ubwo dushobora  kuja turandura kenshi muri kazoza, ukurwara bishobora kudakomera cane kuri benshi gutyo bigatuma ukwigwanira kw'umubiri kuguma kwinagura. Uko biboneka ku yindi migera, abantu bageze kure mu zabukuru  n'abafise umubiri utagishoboye kwirwanira neza bazoguma bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo gusinzikazwa n'iyo ndwara. Nico gituma bashobora gusubira gucandagwa muri kazoza. Ibi ntibivuze ko ata bantu bazosubira kwicwa na Covid - n'ibicurane bikaze mu gihe c'imbeho (hiver/winter) biracashoboye guhitana abantu bashika ibihumbi 25 - ahubwo izoshika ku rugero rw'aho iba nk'iyisanzwe  mu bantu. Ikibazo gikomeye n'ukumenya ryari tuzoshika aho.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Messi, Mbappe, Felix, Martinez, Ronaldo
text: Umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi yemeye kwongereza umwaka umwe mu masezerano afitaniye na Paris St-Germain akazotuma uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 35 aguma muri uno murwi uherutse gutsindira ihiganwa ry’Ubufaransa gushika mu 2024. (Le Parisien – mu gifaransa) PSG ntizorekura umusatirizi wayo, umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w’imyaka 24, mu kwa mbere, kugira ngo izomugurishe mu ci riza ku giciro nyaco. (Ben Jacobs, Twitter) Umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone yongereje akariro ku makuru avuga ko umusatirizi wa Portugal Joao Felix w’imyaka 23 ashobora kugurishwa, mu kuvuga ko ata “n’umwe ari kibirengeye” muri uyo murwi. (Goal) Arsenal yarashatse umukinyi w’inyuma wa Argentina Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24 mu ci riheze, ariko akaba yashimye gusubirana n’uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Ajax  Erik ten Hag muri Manchester United. (VI iciye muri Manchester Evening News) Chelsea iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Vasco da Gama umunyabrezili Andrey Santos w’imyaka 18. (Fabrizio Romano) Manchester United iripfuza kugura umunyegori wa Aston Villa  Emiliano Martinez w’imyaka 30 yagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu gufasha Argentina gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose. (Football Insider) Iciyumviro ca Al-Nassr co guha amasezerano y'agaciro k’imiriyoni 160 z’amapawundi (yababa imiriyoni 194 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika) umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, kirashigikiwe na reta ya Arabia Saoudite. (Ben Jacobs iciye kuri Express) Umurwi Eintracht Frankfurt wo mu Budagi  uvuga ko wari wahawe na Manchester United amahirwe yo kugura Ronaldo imbere y’uko ava i Old Trafford (ikibuga ca Man U. (DAZN iciye kuri Mail) Umumenyereza wa Barcelona Xavi yumvishije kizigenza wiwe, umunya-Espagne akina hagati Sergio Busquets w’imyaka 34 kuguma muri uno murwi gushika mu ci riza, hakwimukira mw’ihiganwa Major League Soccer ryo muri Amerika mu kwa mbere. (Sport – mu ki espagnol) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa Leeds United Raphinha w’imyaka 26 yakiniye Brezili inkino zitanu mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, aravugwa ko ashobora gusubira muri Premier League mu gihe yananiwe no kwiha ikibanza nyaco muri uno mwaka wa mbere w’inkino muri Barcelona. (Sport) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal  Mikel Arteta avuga ko ashobora "gukoresha umwanya w’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi wimirije" mu gihe arondera ingene yozibira igihengeri catewe n’ivunika ry’umusatirizi wa Brezili Gabriel Jesus w’imyaka 25 yavunitse mw’ivi. (Mirror)

headline: Kovid-19: Urwaruka rwibaza iki ku rukingo rwayo?
text: Urwaruka ahanini ruvuga yuko abavyeyi batarwizera mu kwihitiramwo iyo hageze gufata urucanco rwa Covid-19

headline: Malawi - Covid-19: Incanco 19.610 za AstraZeneca zataye igihe zaturiwe
text: Malawi yaturiye incanco 19.610 zataye igihe za AstraZeneca, kikaba kibaye igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika gikoze ivyo. Cakurikije impanuro z'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kugenzura ingwara 'Africa Centres for Disease Control' (Africa CDC) cemeje ko incanco zarengeje ikiringo ziba zitagikora. Bavuga ko izo ncanco zarengeje ikiringo kandi ko atacerekana na kimwe ko zobandanya gukoreshwa, hishimikijwe ingingo ngenderwako z'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS. Kibaye igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika gitaye izo ncanco zataye igihe ku mugaragaro. Abategetsi bavuga ko iyo ngingo igamije gutanga icizere kubanye Malawi kugira bazoze guhabwa incanco igihe zizoba zibonetse. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Gushika ubu, igitigiri c'abicandagisha Covid-19 kiri hasi cane, cane cane bivanye n'ibihuha bivugwa kuri izo ncanco. Abategetsi batinya ko gukoresha incanco zataye igihe vyotuma abantu babatakariza icizere. Reta ya Malawi ifise icizere ko ukwicandagisha kuzokwongerekana igihe bazoronka izindi ncanco z'umugambi wa Covax. Abanye Malawi barenga 330.000 baricandagishije.

headline: Ingwano ya Ukraine: Nta ntambwe kw'ihagarikwa ry'intambara inyuma y'ibiganiro hagati ya Kiyv na Moscou
text: Ikiringo ca mbere c'ibiganiro hagati y'abashikiranganji b'imigenderanire b'Uburusiya na Ukraine  ntaco cashitseko ku bijanye no guhagarika intambara, nk'uko bivugwa na UKraine. Inyuma y'ivyo biganiro vyabereye muri Turkia, umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe imigedneranire, Dmytro Kuleba, yavuze ko ivyasabwe na mugenziwe w'Uburusiya  Sergei Lavrov ari nko gusaba ko bamanika amaboko. Hagati aho Lavrov yavuze ko igitero ca gisirikare igihugu ciwe cagavye kiriko kiragenda uko categuwe. Ivyo biganiro vyabaye  Uburusiya bwaraye buteye ama bombe ku bitaro vy'abana, Ukraine ivuga ko ari "icaha co mu ntambara". Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu batatu barimwo umwana baguye muri ico gitero mu gisaga ca Mariupol kiri mu  bumanuko   bushira ubuseruko. Haheze indwi  zibiri Uburisiya bugavye igitero ku gihugu cose ca Ukraine, kuva ico gihe abantu miriyoni 2.3 bakaba bamaze guhunga igihugu. Aho abantu bugarijwe n'akaga kurusha ahandi ni muri  Mariupol, nk'uko Kuleba yabivuze, mu gihe abanyagihugu bagotewe mu bukonje bwinshi ata muyagankuba ata mazi. Yavuze yamara ko Uburusiya butiyemeje kutanga inzira abantu bocamwo  kandi ko  butemeye ivyasabwe na Ukraine ko hoba uguhagarika intambara  mu gihugu cose ku mvo z'impuhwe ku bantu. Yavuze ati : "Nshaka nongere kuvuga ko Ukraine itamanitse amaboko, kandi ntizomanika amaboko," yongerako ko afise ubushake bwo kubandanya ibiganiro. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umushikiranganji w'Uburusiya ajejwe imigenderanire nta na kimwe yemeye aca asubiramwo ivyo Uburusiya busaba ko Ukraine ivanwamwo ibigwanisho ikemera no kuba  igihugu ataho cegemiye. Yavuze ko Uburusiya burindiriye inyishu ya Kiyv. Lavrov yagirije  kandi Uburaya gukongereza ingwano mu kubandanya bahaba ibigwanisho Ukraine. Yavuze ko Uburusiya buzorinda ibihano vya Buraya hanyuma bugasohoka iyo ngwano "bwemye kandi butekanye ku mutima kurusha ubu". "Ndabarahiye ko tuzobaho muri ivyo bihano kandi tugakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ntizokwigere dusubira kuzera ku banya-Buraya, mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima bwacu." Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU António Guterres yavuze ko ico gitero "giteye ubwoba" nazo Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zagiriza Ubusiya "gukoresha bunyamaswa inguvu za gisirikare mu gutota abanyagihugu basazwe". Ariko mu kiganiro ciwe n'abamenyeshamakuru, Lavrov  yahakanye ibivugwa ko ari icaha c'intambara muri Mariupol , avuga ko ivyo bitaro vyo  kuvyariramwo vyari vyacumbitswemwo n'ingabo za Ukraine. Igisagara ca Mariupol - kibamwo abantu bashika  400.000  -  kimaze iminsi gikikujwe n'ingabo z'Ubususiya , igihe cose hageragejwe ko hoba guhagarika intabara kugira abanyagihugu basanzwe basohoke bikaba vyaranse. "Igisagara cose nta muyagankuba, nta mazi, nta vyo kurya  gifise, ico arico cose, abantu bariko baricwa n'umwumira", nk'uko Olena Stokoz wa Croix Rouge ya Ukraine yabwiwiye BBC kuri uyu wa gatatu.

headline: Christine Ntahe: Menya uyu murundikazi yahawe agashimwe ka Kenn Allen Global Award
text: Umupfasoni Christine Ntahe w'umurundikazi yahawe agashimwe mpuzamakungu ku bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu cane cane mu kwitaho abana bo mw'ibarabara. Ni agashimwe ahawe nk'umukorerabushake n'ishirahamwe International Association for Volunteer Effort kitiriwe Kenn Allen Global Award kaje kwiyongera ku bundi butari buke amaze kuronka kubera ibi bikorwa vyiwe amazemwo imyaka irenga 25. Christine Ntahe, Maman Dimanche nk'uko azwi cane i Bujumbura no mu gihugu, yabwiye BBC ko yatanguye gufasha abana bo mw'ibarabara mu 1994, igihe igihugu cari mu ndyane z'amoko zatanguye inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Ati: "Naciye ngerageza kuba hafi y'abana bo mw'ibarabara, mvuga nti nta mwana ategerezwa kuba mw'ibarabara, ibarabara ntirirera. Ntangura kubaba hafi igihe amasasu yari menshi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura no mu gihugu cose, jewe nkaba nahambije abana bo mw'ibarabara bo mu gisagara". Mu mwaka wa 2000, umupfasoni Ntahe yashinze ishirahamwe Bon Geste ryo gufasha abana ba ntahonikora uhereye ku bana bo mw'ibarabara, impfuvyi n'abandi ba ntahonikora mu Burundi, igihugu cagiye gica mu ndyane zatumye biyongera. Umupfasoni Ntahe avuga ko yatanguriye ku bana cumi bo mw'ibarabara, ubu akaba amaze kuramura abatari bake, mbere bamwe muri bo bahejeje amakaminuza, abandi bakaba baciga. Avuga ko bitamworoheye kubera ibibazo vy'amoko vyari bihanze igihugu ico gihe kuko wewe yakira uwo ari we wese ataravye amamuko yiwe. Ati: "Ndibuka ca gihe Uburundi bwari mu bihano, nahora ngenda kubatora n'amaguru hariya kuri Place de l'Indépendance [ikibanza citiriwe ukwikukira], tukaza n'amaguru, hari henshi twaca bakadutera amabuye, ntitwari tuzi abo ari bo". Ntahe avuga ko impande zompi zamurwanya kuko ata ruhande na rumwe rwemera ivyo akora. Ati: "Irya ntambara yari iy'ubwoko hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Hariho Abahutu bamwe bamwe bambwira bati ntitukwemera kuko ntamututsikazi n'umwe ashobora gukorera iciza umuhutu ataco ariko ararondera. "Abatutsi nabo bamwe bamwe bakambwira bati 'umviriza, ivyo ukora vyose wiruka inyuma y'abo bana b'Abahutu, nibo bazoza kugukata umutwe'. "Jewe rero nta hantu na hamwe nari mpagaze, uretse guhagararira ukuri, urukundo n'ugukorera Imana kuko nabona ko abana bariko bazira ubusa". Ni ivyo bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira abana vyamuhaye iritazirano rya "Maman Dimanche" rizwi cane i Bujumbura, avuga ko yahawe n'abo bana nyene asanzwe afasha. Avuga ko muri kino gihe afise abana bashika amajana abiri yama afungurira imisi yose muhira iwe. Kuva atanguye iki gikorwa, amaze kuramura amajana n'amajana, bamwe biga muri za kaminuza, zaba izo mu gihugu canke hanze, abandi nabo bakaba bakibandanya amashure mato n'ayisumbuye. "Ico babigiriye ntaco nzi, gusa barashimye, kandi iyo bashimye uvyakira uko. Jewe rero ni agashimwe kiyongera ku bundi, kuko n'umukuru w'igihugu yarampaye agashimwe mu 2012", niko Ntahe avuga. Ku bw'iwe, ivyo akora abikora nk'umuvyeyi arera abana biwe neza, hanyuma bakaramurwa. Ati: "Ubundi nta muntu yategerezwa gushimirwa ariko arakora ico yategerezwa gukora, kuko nico Imana ituremera kw'isi, kugira umuntu afashe aho ari mu vyo ashobora. "Mu mutima jewe nta kintu kinini nabona nkora co gushimirwa kuko mbona umengo hari vyinshi ntarakora. "Ariko gusa ibi vyerekana ko ivyo nkora bishimwa n'ababibona, mu kuvyerekana bakabicisha muri utu dushimwe n'imfashanyo nkenke baza barafashisha". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ata wundi mugambi afise uretse kubandanya afasha aba bana bo mw'ibarabara kuko babandanya biyongera. Ati: "Jewe umugambi ni uwo kubandanya ndabakurikirana, nongera ndabafasha kugira ngo bashike ku ndoto zabo. Ati: "Usanga abenshi ubabajije bavuga ko bashaka kwiga kugira ngo bazotere imbere. Bafise indoto, nanje indoto zanje ni ugushikana abo bana ku ndoto zabo". Uretse abo yafashije i Bujumbura, ubu baharurwa mu majana ane, hari abandi bo muri komine Mutambu y'intara ya Bujumbura bashika ku 600 yafashije kubera iyo komine yabaye ikiririmbiro ry'intambara. Christine Ntahe avuga ko ibibazo agira muri iki gikorwa ari vyinshi cane, cane cane bishingiye ku buryo, mu gihe "abana bo mw'ibarabara bakenera vyinshi kandi babandanya biyongera". Ati: "Abo bana baguma biyongera, ivyo kubafungurira ntibikwira, abana ugasanga barwara nkabura uburyo bwo kubavuza, ibi vyose ni ingorane zikomeye mu gihe ari jewe jenyene nibako". Christine Ntahe arashima ingene reta yitayeho ikibazo c'abana bo mw'ibarabara, ariko akavuga ko hari ingorane nyinshi. Hamaze kugeragezwa kenshi kuvana abo bana mw'ibarabara na cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, umwe wese akajanwa iyo akomoka kugira yitabweho n'abo aho avuka canke ubutegetsi bw'aho. Madame Ntahe yemeza ko hari ibintu bitagenze neza kuko "abenshi muri bo baca bagaruka". Ati: "Ntibaba bateguwe bikwiye, na cane cane abavyeyi babo, kuko abana bamaze umwanya munini mw'ibarabara, biragoye kubumvisha ko bosubira mu miryango yabo". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari uko hari abavyeyi barungika abana babo mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Hari umwana akubarira ati 'jewe ntaronse ibihumbi bitatu ku musi sintaha, mama ntankundira'. Ibaze rero abavyeyi baguma muhira bakarindira ko abana babo baja mw'ibarabara kubaronderera ibibabeshaho". Mu gihe hari abagiriza reta n'amashirahamwe yitaho agateka k'abana ko ikibazo cabananiye, umupfasoni Ntahe wewe yagiriza abavyeyi ko ari bo ntambamyi nyamukuru mu twigoro two kubakura mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Ni ukuri reta n'amashirahamwe bakora uko bashoboye ariko rero abavyeyi nabo ni intambamyi". Umupfasoni Ntahe arashima ibikorwa n'abajejwe agateka k'abana ariko agasaba reta gukora uko ishoboye igahimiriza abavyeyi bagakurikirana abana babo. Ati: "Abatishoboye rwose reta ikabafasha, ibahimirize kugira baje mu mashirahamwe kugira ngo bashobore gufasha abana babo". Atera akamo amashirahamwe afasha abana gushira hamwe inguvu kugira ngo bashobore gufasha aba bana. Asaba reta ko yohimiriza abatware ku nzego zo hasi gukurikirana abana babo, bakamenya iyo buri mwana ari.

headline: Covax: Côte d'Ivoire na Ghana vyatanguye gutanga incanco zo gukinga Covid
text: Ibihugu vya Africa vyatanguye gutera  incanco za Covid zatanzwe biciye ku rwego rwo gukora kugira incanco zisabikanywe kw'isi ata buryarya. Cote d'Ivoire ni kimwe mu bihugu vyaronkejwe izo ncanco zitangwa n'urwego rushigikiwe na ONU COVAX, aho gucanca  kwatanguye ku wa mbere. Na Ghana izotanguza isekeza ryo gucanca muri iyi ndwi. Umukuru wa Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo kuri uyu wa mbere niwe yabaye uwa mbere mu kuronka urwo rucanco rwa coronavirus ruciye muri iyo nzira. Akufo-Addo yahimirije abanyagihugu kwiteza incanco no kwirinda abashira  amakenga kuri iyo gahunda, izotuma hasohoka incanco ibihumbi 600 za Oxford-AstraZeneca mu gihugu cose kuva ku wa kabiri. Yavuze ati: "Ni ngombwa ko ntanga akarorero ko uru rucanco ata ngorane ruteye mu kuba uwa mbere mu kuruhabwa,kugira uwari we wese muri Ghana yumve ko atekaniwe mu kuruterwa". Mu ntango hazobanza kuvurwa abafise amahirwe mabi menshi yo kwandura-abarenza imyaka 60 canke basanganywe izindi ndwara - hamwe n'abakozi ba nkenerwa cane, nk'abo kwa muganga, abigisha, abaporisi mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru bamwe bamwe. Ariko abagore bafise inda n'abari munsi y'imyaka 18 ntibarabwa n'iryo sekeza ryo gucandaga. Abategetsi bavuga ko badafise amakuru akwiye ku ngaruka z'urwo rucanco kuri iyo migwi y'abantu. Muri Cote d'Ivoire, isanganywe gahunda nk'iyo yo muri Ghana, ku wa mbere mu gitondo abantu bari batanguye gutonda imirongo ku bituro vyo gucandaga kugira bahabwe urucanco rwa mbere rwa AstraZeneca. Nigeria yiteze kuronka incanco zingana hafi miriyoni zine imbere y'uko iyi ndwi ihera. Professeur Gavin Yamey, yagize uruhara mu kwubaka umugambi wa Covax, yavuze ko bikenewe cane ko hatangwa incanco kw'isi yose. Ati: "Vyari bibabaje kubona ingene ibihugu bitunze cane cane bisakumba, "Vyari vyacitse nko kwikwegerako, gutanganwa, kandi ivyo si ukuba ari bibi gusa, ni n'akaga ku magara y'abantu." Gahunda zo gucandaga zaratevye gutangura muri Africa, ariko uwo mugabane w'isi  hagaragaye ibitigiri bito  vy'abanduye n'abapfuye ugereranije n'ibihugu vy'i Buraya. Umugambi wa Covax wizeye gutanga incanco zingana na miliyaridi 2 ku bantu bo mu bihugu 190 mu kiringo kidashika umwaka.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya ku wa 09.07.2019: Griezmann, Pogba, James, Icardi, Sane, Bakayoko, Gomez
text: Atletico Madrid yatanguye umugambi w'uguhana umusatirizi w'umufaransa, Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 28 yitezwe kwimukira muri Barcelona ku giciro c'imiliyoni 107.5 z'amapawundi . (Guardian) Real Madrid iriko iraraba nimba yogurisha umunyakolombiya, James Rodriguez w'imyaka 27 kugira ngo irabe ko yokwegeranya amahera ashika imiliyoni 150 z'amapawundi ikeneye kugira ngo igure umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26. (Mail) Napoli iripfuza kugura uyo mukinyi James Rodriguez wa Real Madrid, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Inter Milan, umunya Argentine Mauro Icardi w'imyaka 26. (Goal.com) Bayern Munich yiteze ko mu ndwi iza, umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umudagi, Leroy Sane w'imyaka 23 azofata ingingo yo kuva muri Manchester City akijira muri uwo murwi.  (Mail) Umurwi Fenerbahce wo muri Turukiya uriteguye kugura umukinyi w'umudagi Mesut Ozil w'imyaka 30 asanzwe akinira Arsenal. (Fanatik) Arsenal, Manchester United na Paris St-Germain baripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa, Tiemoue Bakayoko w'imyaka 24, asanzwe akinira Chelsea. (RMC Sport) West Ham baripfuza gutanga amahera angana n'imiliyoni 43.5 z'amapawundi kuri Maxi Gomez w'imyaka 22 kugira basumvye Valencia mu ntumbero yo kugura uyo musatirizi wa Celta Vigo na Uruguay . (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United  Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 26 arizeye ko azoba yamaze kwinjira muri Inter Milan mu gihe uwo murwi uzoba uhura na Man United kw'igenekerezo rya 20 uku kwezi kw'indwi . (Mirror) Aston Villa yatanze amahera angana n'imiliyoni indwi z'amapawundi kugira ngo irabe ko yogura umunyegori wa Burnley, umwongereza Tom Heaton w'imyaka 33. (Sun) Arsenal iri mu gushika ku masezerano y'ukugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Saint-Etienne William Saliba, bikaba vyitezwe ko izotanga imiliyoni 25 z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kuronka uyo mukinyi w'umufaransa w'imyaka 18. (Evening Standard) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu mu murwi Liverpool, umunya Espanye Alberto Moreno w'imyaka 27, ari mu kwimukira muri Villarreal. (ESPN) Liverpool yafashe ikibazo c'ukugumya umusatirizi w'umudagi Divock Origi nk'icihutirwa. Mu gihe uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 24 asigaje umwaka umwe mu masezerano afitaniye na Liverpool, yahawe ayandi masezerano y'igihe kirekire. (Star) Manchester City iri hafi gushira umukono ku masezerano n'umukinyi w'umwongereza akina hagati muri West Brom, Morgan Rogers w'imyaka 17. (Mail) Everton iriteguye gutanga imiliyoi 35 z'amapawundi kugira ishobore kugura umukinyi Malcom asanzwe akinira Barcelone, ni mu gihe na Arsenal nayo nyene isanzwe iriko iraraba ko yogura uyo mukinyi w'umunyabrezili w'imyaka 23. (RMC Sport) Watford iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umufaransa Allan Saint-Maximin w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akinira umurwi Nice, ku miliyoni 25 y'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Aston Villa iripfuza ko yogumana vy'intizo umukinyi w'inyuma  wa Manchester United, Axel Tuanzebe w'imyaka 21, yari amaze umwaka wose w'inkino akinira Aston Villa. (Telegraph) Umukinyi w'umunya Espanye Ander Herrera  w'imyaka 29 ubu yinjiye muri  Paris St-Germain  avuga ko yavuze muri Manchester United yahora akinira kubera habaye ukutumvikana ku kibanza yahora ahabwa. (Express)

headline: Kylian Mbappe imbere ya Messi na Ronaldo mu bakinyi batunze cane ku rutonde rwa Forbes uyu mwaka
text: Kylian Mbappe aza mu kibanza ca mbere ku rutonde rwa Forbes  rw'abakinyi bafise amahera menshi - ubwa mbere umuntu atari Lionel Messi canke Cristiano Ronaldo abaye uwa mbere kuri urwo rutonde mu myaka icenda iheze. F﻿orbes igereranya ko uwo mukinyi w'imbere wa Paris St-Germain Mbappe w'imyaka 23, azoronka imiliyoni 128 z'amadolari muri uyu mwaka. U﻿wo bakinana na Mbappe muri PSG Messi ni uwa kabiri na miliyoni 120 z'amadolari hanyuma umukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester United Ronaldo akaza mu kibanza ca gatatu n'imiliyoni 100 z'amadolari. N﻿eymar na Mohammed Salah ni bo bakwiza igitigiri c'abakinyi batanu ba mbere. U﻿mukinyi w'imbere wa PSG na Brezil Neymar  azoronka amahera ashobora gushika imiliyoni 87 z'amadolari mu mwaka wa 2022-2023 hanyuma umukinyi w'imbere wa Liverpool Salah ayangana na miliyoni 53 z'amadolari. U﻿wundi mukinyi yigeze kuza ubwa mbere kuri urwo rutonde atari Messi na Ronaldo ni kizigenza w'umugwi w'Ubwongereza David Beckham mu mwaka wa 2013. M﻿bappe yashize umukono ku masezerano arimwo uturusho twinshi y'imyaka itatu na PSG mu kwezi kwa gatanu, biza kurangiza ibihuha vyamurungika mu mugwi wa Real Madrid mu ci. U﻿wo mufaransa yatwaye igikombe c'isi, amaze gutwara ibikombe 11 muri uwo mugwi, harimwo bine vy'ihiganwa ryo mu Bufaransa, kuva agiye muri uwo mugwi umutijwe na Monaco mu 2017. E﻿rling Haaland, amaze gutsinda ibitego 19 mu nkino 12 mu mugwi wa Manchester City kuva ashitse muri uwo mugwi avuye muri Borussia Dortmund, ari muri 10 ba mbere, ku nimero zitandatu. U﻿wo mukinyi w'imbere wa Norvege, n'umwe mu bakinyi bane bo mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza bari muri cumi ba mbere kuri urwo rutonde iruhande ya Ronaldo, Salah na mugenzi we bakinana muri Manchester City, Kevin de Bruyne.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19: Kuki basinyisha umuntu imbere y'urukingo?
text: Tubandanya kubashikiriza inyishu ku bibazo muturungikira ku kiza ca coronavirus Ikibazo duherako uno munsi ni ica Manariyo Osias, yabajije agira ati "mbe ni kubera iki umuntu imbere yo kumuha urukingo babanza kumuteza umukono ku rwandiko ruvuga yuko ataco azobaza nihaba ingaruka, kandi we izo ngaruka aba atazo azi?" Muganga Nduwayo Leonard akorera mu Bufaransa niwe atanga inyishu, akaba avugana na Robert Patrick Misigaro. (Umviriza aho hejuru)

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Lewandowski, Lingard, De Ligt, Firmino, Kimpembe
text: Umukinyi w’inyuma wa PSG umufaransa Presnel Kimpembe w’imyaka 26 aracaronderwa na Chelsea mu gihe uyo murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubufaransa Ligue 1 uri kw’isoko urondera uwundi mukinyi w’inyuma. (Goal) Chelsea iriko iratera intambwe mu biganiro vyo kurondera Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22, ariko Juventus ishaka ko bafatira ku ngingo ivuga ko uwukeneye uyu munya-Hollande ategerezwa kuriha imiriyoni 102 z’amapawundi. (Telegraph) Juventus iripfuza umusatirizi w’umudagi Timo Werner Chelsea ishaka gutanga mu masezerano yo kurondera De Ligt ariko iyi mirwi yompi ntirumvikana ku giciro. (Mail) Barcelona iriteguye gutanga amafaranga agera ku miriyoni 60 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leeds United, Raphinha, kugira ngo irabe ko yokubita hasi Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurwanira uyu munya-Brezili w’imyaka 25. (Times) Manchester City ishobora kugurisha umukinyi w’inyuma wayo Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27 mu gihe honyene hoboneka uwushobora kumusubirira, ni mu gihe uyu munya-Hollande avugwa ko ashobora gusubira muri Chelsea yahoze akinira. (Manchester Evening News) Tottenham iri mu biganiro bigeze kure kugira irabe ko yogura umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buryo Djed Spence w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akinira Middlesbrough,  ku giciro c’imiriyoni 15 z’amapawundi yongere itange n’uturusho. (Sky Sports) Juventus irashaka amasezerano yo kuguza umukinyi wayo wo hagati umufaransa Adrien Rabiot w’imyaka 27 n’umusatirizi wa Liverpool umunya-Brezili Roberto Firmino w’imyaka 30. (Calciomercato – mu gitaliyano) Umusatirizi wa Espagne Alvaro Morata avugwa ko aronderwa na Arsenal, agiye gusubira muri Atletico Madrid inyuma y’aho Juventus ifatiye ingingo yo kutagumana burundu uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 29 inyuma y’umwaka yari amaze akina muri uyu murwi w’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A yari yaratijijwemwo. (Goal) Arsenal yatanze igifovya c’amafaranga angana n’imiriyoni 38 z’amapawundi kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya-Argentina Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24 ariko umurwi wiwe Ajax wabateye akagere. Uyu murwi wo muri Hollande umushakako imiriyoni 43 z’amapawundi, Manchester United ikaba ishobora guca yongereza umurindi kugira ngo irabe ko yoshobora kumutahukana mu mpera z’iyi ndwi. (Mail) West Ham yongereje inguvu mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza Jesse Lingard w’imyaka 29 ataco irinze gutanga, ariko ishobora kubanza gusaba uyu musatirizi yahoze akinira Manchester United kubanza kwemera kugabanya umushahara asaba. (Guardian) Wolves yatsinze urugamba yarimwo irondera kugumana umukinyi wo hagati wa Portugal Ruben Neves w’imyaka 25, mu gihe imirwi yahora imurondera yagumanye amadidane ku giciro gisabwa c’imiriyoni 75 z’amapawundi. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Leeds United umwongereza Kalvin Phillips w’imyaka 26, yitezwe gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga muri Manchester City kuri uyu wa gatanu imbere y’uko yimukira muri uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa rya Premier League ku miriyoni 45 z’amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Manchester United yahambije Newcastle mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma w’umufaransa Benoit Badiashile w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akinira Monaco, ku giciro c’imiriyoni 50 z’amapawundi. (Nice-Matin – mu gifaransa) Umunyegori wa Argentina Sergio Romero w’imyaka 35 aripfuza gusubira muri Manchester United – haciye umwaka umwe gusa ayivuyemwo akimukira muri Venezia yo muri Serie A mu Butaliyano. (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Brezili Andreas Pereira w’imyaka 26 yipfuza kwigumira burundu muri Flamengo asanzwe yaratijijwemwo n’aho imirwi ya Fulham na Crystal Palace imurondera. (Goal) Nottingham Forest iri mu biganiro na Manchester City kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w’inyuma wa Burkina Faso Issa Kabore w’imyaka 21. (Guardian) Newcastle iriteguye kugura umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu w’umwongereza akina mu bakiri bato Jordan Hackett w’imyaka 18, inyuma y’aho aherewe uruhusha rwo kuva muri Tottenham. (Sun) Bayern Munich yanse igiciro kigira gatatu catanzwe na Barcelona ku musatirizi wa Pologne Robert Lewandowski w’imyaka 33, uyo murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ryo mu Budagi ukaba umushakako imiriyoni 43 z’amapawundi. (Bild – mu kidagi) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Watford umufaransa Moussa Sissoko ari hafi yo kwimukira mu murwi wo mu Bufaransa Nantes ku miriyoni 1,8 z’amapawundi. (Mail)

headline: Umwambaro wa ki Islamu w'umudeli, ushira imbere kwikwiza
text: Aba ba Islamukazi basanga kwambara umudeli mwiza bidasigura kutikwiza. Bafashe umugambi wo guhingura impuzu z'Abaislamukazi z'imideli myiza kandi bakambara bikwije.

headline: Jeanne Gapiya - Covid niyahera tuzosanga hari benshi bahitanywe na Sida
text: Jeanne Gapiya, umwe mu bazwi cane mu kurwanya Sida mu Burundi, avuga ko kwandura no kurwara Sida bishobora kwiyongera cane mu Burundi n'ahandi kuko uburyo bwo kubirwanya bwagabanutse cane kuva hateye ikiza ca Covid-19. Madame Gapiya ari mu bantu ba mbere bemanze ko bagendana umugera wa Sida mu Burundi mu myaka ya 1980,  igihe ibijanye n'uwo mugera vyari bikiri nk'ibitavugwa. Ishirahamwe ryiwe ryo gushigikira abagendana umugera wa Sida n'abarwaye iyo ndwara (ANSS)  rimaze hafi imyaka 30 kandi arashima aho we n'abandi bakora nkawe bari bagejeje igikorwa co kurwanya Sida. Madame Gapiya, atakiba mu Burundi igihe cose, avuga ko muri ino minsi yagiyeyo agasanga abarwayi ba Sida bamerewe nabi cane. Agira ati: "Nabonye umumama [umuvyeyi] aje kutwitura, yari amaze iminsi mu bitaro... nja kumuraba mbona umenga ni umwana w'imyaka nka  15. "Kubera dusanganywe ikigo gifasha abana barwaye cane , dushobora kuba turagumije, tubaha ivyo barya tubaha imiti gushika aho basubira kumera neza... "Ntangura kubwira abakozi nti jana urya mwana. Bati 'eka si umwana, ni umu mama w'abana 2'". Ibigo  birwanya Sida bisanzwe biha abarwayi bavyitura infungurwa zikenerwa cane kugira baronke intege zo kurinda iyo miti. Gapiya rero avuga ko yasanze ubu hari ubukene bw'ivyo kurya  kuko "uburyo twahora turonka ntabwo tukironka ngo tubafashe". Arongera ati: "Nagiye mu Kirundo, nsangayo uwundi muvyeyi tutazi ko tuzorokora,  afise igituntu akagira n'umugera, n'ibintu tutaheruka. "Ivyo vyose biterwa n'uko abantu bashonje kandi natwe ata buryo dufise bwo kubaha ivyo twahora tubaha". Madame Gapiya avuga ko imigambi mpuzamakungu yahora ibaha uburyo ubu yabuhindukirije mu kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19. Jeanne Gapiya avuga ko kuva habaye izi ngorane isi yose  irimwo z'ikiza ca Covid-19, gupima  umugera wa Sida bimaze kugabanuka ku rugero rwa 36%. Muri uwo mwanya  bisigura ko abagendana umugera batabizi bariko baranduza abandi. Agira ati: "Nitwagira imana n'ico kiza Covid tukagikira, tuzosanga twarasubiye inyuma, twarabuze abantu benshi cane". Ubundi avuga ko Uburundi bwari mu bihugu biteye imbere mu kurwanya Sida aho muri rusangi hagati ya  70 na 80% y'abategerezwa kuja ku miti  bayironka. Gusa urwo rugero ruracari hasi ku bana, rungana na 30%. Gapiya avuga ko abashikana ijwi kure ari ukubandanya basemerera kuko n'aho intambwe imaze guterwa, Uburundi n'ibindi bihugu na cane cane vyo muri Afrika y'ubuseruko n'iyo mu burengero ngo bikiri inyuma. Imiti igezweho ntirabishikamwo kandi abarwayi bayikenera kuko bishika bakananirwa n'iyo bari basanzweko. Avuga ko  we agira "amahirwe yo kuyironka kuko umushingatahe wanje akora muri Nations Unies [ONU]". "Uko siko ibintu vyategerezwa kugenda".

headline: Inyuma y’aho vyankiye ko agenda, Messi yakiniye Barcelona ubwa mbere
text: Lionel Messi yashoboye gukinira Barcelona ku ncuro ya mbere inyuma y'aho vyankiye ko ava muri uyu murwi, hari mu rukino rwa nijoro  rwa kivandimwe n'umurwi Gimnastic de Tarragona muri Espanye. Mu kwezi kw'umunani, uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yarasavye ko yova muri Barcelona ariko mu ndwi iheze akaba yafashe ingingo yo kuguma muri uyu murwi kubera habuze umurwi ushikana igiciro kimusabwako. Messi yashoboye gukina muri uru rukino rwarangiye Barcelona itsinze uyo murwi kuri 3-1. Yagiye gusubirizwa co kimwe n'abandi bari batanguranye igice ca mbere giheze. Muri uru rukino, Ousmane Dembele niwe yatanguye gutsinda, mu nyuma Antoine Griezmann na Phillipe Coutinho baza gutsinda ibindi kuri ya mipira itererwa ku metero 11 (penalties). Messi, umusatirizi amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, yavuga ko mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi harimwo ingingo yamwemerera kugenda ata gisabwe. Ibi vyamutumye mbere atanitabira umunsi wa mbere w'imyimenyerezo yo kwitegurira ihiganarwa ry'umwaka w'inkino waraye utanguye. Barcelona hamwe n'abarongoye ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, babandanije berekana ko iyi ngingo itari igifise agaciro, bikaba vyasabwa ko umurwi uwo ari wo wose womwipfuza wategerezwa kumugura ku giciro c'imiliyoni 700 z'ama euros. Messi yahavuye asubira mu myimenyerezo amaze kumenyesha ko adashaka kwitwarira Barcelona muri sentare. Ihiganwa rya La Liga ryaraye ritanguye icese, co kimwe na Premier League mu Bwongereza, ariko bikaba bitegekanijwe ko Barcelona ikina urukino rwa mbere ku wa 27 z/uku kw'icenda, aho izohura na Villarreal.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: umukuru wa Kharkiv yabwiye BBC ko ingabo za Russia zavuye muri ico gisagara
text: Umukuru w'igisagara ca  Kharkiv, Ihor Terekhov, yabwiye BBC ko Abarusiya bavuye mu micungararo y'ico gisagara berekeza ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. Avuga ko igihe kimwe ingabo z'Uburusiya zashoboye kwinjira mu gace gatoya k'ico gisagara co mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko,  ariko ko batahamaze igihe kinini. Avuga ati: "Abarusiya babandanije batera Kharkiv  amabombe y'urutavanako kubera bari bagumye hafi y'iki gisagara. Ariko kubera ubutwari bw'abajejwe gucungera umutekano wa Kharkiv n'ingabo za Akraine, Abarusiya bataye baromoka baja kure ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. "Ubu Kharkiv iratekanye kandi n'abantu batanguye kugaruka bukebuke muri iki gisagara. Abantu bose turabaha amazi, gaze n'umuyagankuba. Ikibazo gusa, ni uko amazu y'abantu yabomaguwe canke akononekara. Rero mu misi iri imbere tuzoba dufise igikorwa gikomeye co gusanura". "Haraciye imisi itanu ata ma bombe atewe muri kino gisagara. Icabaye conyene ni uko Abarusiya bagerageje gutera igisasu ca misire hafi y'ikibuga c'indege ca Kharkiv, ariko iyi misire yaciye isamburwa n'igisirikare ca Ukraine". Umukuru w'iki gisagara ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'aho ikigo cigisha ibijanye n'intambara Institute for the Study of War, kibona ko Ukraine "isa n'iyamaze gutsinda intambara ya Kharkiv". Mu mwihwezo iki kigo giherutse kugira ku bijanye n'iyi ntambara, abahinga bemerwa cane mu vya gisirikare bavuga ko Uburusiya bwananiwe no kugota iki gisagara ca Ukraine kigira kabiri - kandi ko bwahevye uwo mugambi. Amakuru ava ku rubuga rw'intambara avuga vyabaye ngombwa ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziva muri iki gisagara zirukanywe na Ukraine isa n'iyariko "iratsinda" urugamba rwo muri kino gisagara, nk'uko bivugwa n'iki kigo cubahwa cane muri Amerika. Amakuru ya nyuma yatangwa n'iki kigo yashigikira ibi vyavugwa, aho umuvugizi w'ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare wa Ukraine yasubirwamwo na AFP avuga ko muri ako karere, "umwansi ariko ashira inguvu zose gukura ingabo ziwe mu gisagara ca Kharkiv". Ni mu gihe abanyamakuru ba Reuters bavuga ko kino gisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko kimaze indwi zibiri gitekanye. Ariko bivugwa ko Moscou ikibandanya icucagira ibibombe mu turere two mu micungararo yaco - harimwo akarere ka Dergachi kari ku birometero 10 mu buraruko bwa Kharkiv. Mu masaha yitereye y'ejo ku wa gatanu, ibinyamakuru vy'Uburusiya vyatangaje ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zateye ikigo c'ububiko bw'ibirwanisho muri aka karere. Kharkiv, igisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko, rimwe na rimwe gikunze kwitwa igisagara ntavogerwa. Iri zina cararironse muri ino ntambara. Kuva igitero gitanguye, intumbero nyamukuru y'ingabo z'Uburusiya kwari ukwigarurira iki gisagara. Ariko, mu kiringo c'amezi arenga abiri, uretse ko zananiwe no gushika kuri iyo ntumbero kandi ko - ariko ibi bikavugwa n'iki kigo c'abahinga co mu Bwongereza - zahevye uwu mugambi. Ingabo za Ukraine zivugwa ko zirukanye iż'Uburusiya gushika ku rubibe, hakaba hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo zo muri za ntara zishaka kwiyonkora kuri Ukraine za Donetsk na Luhansk zikaba zegamiye Uburusiya, zirindirijwe kwinjira mu Burusiya. Hagati aho, ibi si ukuvuga ko zasubiye inyuma rwose nk'uko vyagenze mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Kubona Uburusiya bwashoboye gusa gushinga ku nguvu ubutegetsi bwabwo mu gisagara kimwe gusa ca Ukraine - Kherson - vyerekana ko igitero c'Uburusiya ataho kiragera mu bijanye n'intumbero bwari bufise kuri Ukraine, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'Ubwongereza bwo kwivuna abansi. Mu makuru ya nyuma bwatanze, ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ubutegetsi bwa gisivire na gisirikare bwashinzweho n'Uburusiya muri Kherson bwatangaje ko bugiye gusaba ako karere kegukira Uburusiya bubicishije muri kamarampaka. Buvuga ko mu gihe iyi kamarampaka yokunda, nta nkeka ko Uburusiya "buzokora amanyanga ku bizoyivamwo kugira bwerekane ko benshi bashigikiye ko biyonkora kuri Ukraine. Hagati aho, ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko kubona Uburusiya bwashoboye gushinga ku nguvu ubutegetsi bwabwo mu gisagara kimwe gusa ca Ukraine vyerekana ko intumbero shingiro yabwo yo "gushinga ubutegetsi bwegamiye Uburusiya mu turere twinshi twa Ukraine wananiwe".

headline: Tigray: Ethiopia igabisha ko ishobora gukoresha inguvu zose za gisirikare mu kurwanya TPLF
text: Ethiopia iragabisha ko ishobora "kukoresha ubushobozi bwayo bwose bwa gisirikare" mu kurwanya inyeshamba zirwanira mu ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bw'igihugu, inyuma y'uko zibandanije zisugereza ubundi burere. Izi nyeshamba zarigaruriye igisaga ca Lalibela, umurage mpuzamakungu wa UNESCO, mu ntara ya Amhara ihana urubibe na Tigray, hirya y'ejo ku wa kane. Reta ivuga ko mu gihe inyeshamba nazo zitogira ico zikoze ku gahengwe yatanze kugira ngo ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi bibandanye, bishobora kuyituma "yegeranya ikarungika inguvu zose za gisirikare z'igihugu". Intambara zarongerekanye kuva mu kwa gatandatu, igihe izi nyeshamba zihurikiye mu muhari TPLF (mu majambo yose ikaba ari "Tigray People's Liberation Front") n'incuti zawo, bigaruriye hafi intara yose ya Tigray mu gitero cari gikomeye. Igisirikare c'igihugu caciye kiva muri iyo ntara kinatangaza ko gihagaritse intambara. Ariko, inzira zose zinjira muri Tigray zokoreshejwe mu bikorwa vy'ubutabazi zagumye zugawe, abategetsi b'igihugu nabo babandanya barondera abarwanyi. Mu gihugu cose harabaye amakoraniro yo guhimiriza abanyagihugu kwiyandikisha ngo baje kurwanya izo nyeshamba. Izi nyeshamba zisaba ko haba ibiganiro vyo kurangiza intambara, ariko ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire bw'ico gihugu buvuga ko ivyo zakoze ari ububegito. Mw'itangazo bwasohoye, buvuga ko umuhari TPLF washize "reta mu bigeragezo kugira ngo urabe aho kwihangana kwayo kugera". Buvuga ko ari ngombwa koreta ihindura amayeri yayo mu gukingira igihugu inyuma y'aho ifatiye ingingo yo guhagarika intambara kugira ngo habe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi.

headline: Tanzania: Patiri imbere y'ubutungane yagirizwa vya mfura mbi yakoreye abana
text: Umupatiri wa Ekleziya Katolika mu buraruko bwa Tanzania yarengukishijwe imbere y’ubutungane yagirizwa ivya mfura mbi yakoreye abana, nk’uko bivugwa n’igipolisi. Aba bana ni abanyeshure bo kuva mu mwaka wa gatandatu gushika mu mwaka wa mbere w’ishure ryisumbuye bariko bitegurira gusangira, abandi gukomezwa. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Abepiskopi muri Tanzania, Patiri Charles Kitima, avuga ko Ekleziya izokorana n’ababijejwe kugira ngo ubutungane bukore muri uru rubanza. Patiri Kitima ati: “Twavuze ko turindiriye iyo ngingo [ya sentare] kugira ngo izindi ngingo zifatwe...ivyemezo ni bitangwe hanyuma nawe ahabwe akaryo ko kwiregura, ico nico turindiriye. “Ni ngombwa ko amategeko akora igikorwa cayo kandi Ekleziya izokwifatanya n’ababijejwe kugira ngo abakorewe ikibi batunganirizwe”. Patiri Kitima yabwiye BBC ko muri rusangi Ekleziya Katorika irwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana kuko isengero ritegerezwa kuba ikibanza c’amahoro kuri bose. Ati: “Reka twemere ko iki ari ikibazo kijanye na kamere ya nyene kubikora, dufise abapatiri barenga 3.000 muri kino gihugu ariko muri bo harimwo abo usanga bafise utunenge n’intege nke, ivyo bibaho”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko iki ari akabi kabishe kuko gituma abavyeyi n’abana bagira impungenge nyinshi, abana iyo bagiye mu bikorwa nk’ivyo baba bizeye ko bagiye guhura n’umuntu yari kubarera muri mutima. Ati: “Rero iyo bakorewe ibitabajanye ni ibintu bibabaza cane. “Twebwe nka Ekleziya turababazwa n’ingeso mbi z’umuntu umw’umwe ziteye kubiri kubiri n’ico twategerezwa kwubaka, kwubaka umuntu mu mico myiza. “Ureste ko iki ari igicumuro kandi kibabaza Imana, gifise n’ingaruka mbi ku bana, rero ni ngombwa ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko kw’isi abantu nk’abo bahari, ko rero dutegerezwa gufashanya nk’abanya muryango mu guhindura izo ngeso, kandi tugatanga inkuru iyo hari ikintu nk’iki kibaye. Avuga ko uburyo bwo gutanga inkuru muri Ekleziya butomoye, kuva hasi gushika hejuru ku Nama nkuru y’abepiskopi, abantu b’abahinga mu gutorera inyishu ibibazo nk’ivyo.

headline: Patrice Lumumba: kubera iki iryinyo ari ryo gisigarira conyene c’iyi ncungu?
text: Iryinyo ry’inzahabu ni co gisigarira conyene c’uwaharaniye intahe y’ukwikukira kwa Congo, Patrice Lumumba. Inyuma yo kugandagurwa mu 1961 n’umurwi w’abasirikare wari ujejwe kunyonga ushigikiwe n’Ububirigi bwahoze butwara iki gihugu mu gihe c’ubukoloni, ikiziga ciwe cahambwe mu mva ntoya, mu nyuma kirazurwa, gitwarwa ku birometero 200, kirahambwa gushasha, congera kirazurwa hanyuma kirahimbagurwamwo, impera ya vyose bagituriza aside (acide). Ibi vyagiye kwemezwa n’uwari umukuru w’igipolisi w’umubirigi, Gerard Soete, ari nawe yahagarikiye isamburwa ry’ibisigarira vya Lumumba, yongera atwara iri ryinyo. Yavuze kandi ko hari n’irindi rya kabiri n’intoke zibiri, ariko ibi ntibirashobora gutorwa. Iri ryinyo ryitezwe gushikirizwa umuryango wiwe mu birori bizobera i Buruseri (Bruxelles) mu Bubirigi. Iyi ngendo ya Soete yo kunyegeza ibihimba vy’umubiri yibutsa inyifato y’abategetsi ba gikoloni mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo aho babitwara iwabo ngo bizobe icibutso. Ariko kandi cabaye igikorwa ca nyuma c’agasuzuguro gakorewe uno mugabo yafatwa n’Ububirigi nk’umwansi. Soete, igihe yaboneka mw’ireresi yo mu 1999, yavuze ko iryo ryinyo n’intoke yatwaye vyari “nk’ubwoko bw’igikombe c’uruhigi”. Uru rurimi ruvuga ko ku bapolisi b’ababirigi, Lumumba – yashimagizwa ku mugabane wose nk’uwari ayoboye urugamba rwo kwikura mu buja -  atari umuntu. Ku mukobwa wa Lumumba, Juliana, ikibazo ni ukumenya nimba abakoze ibi bari koko ibiremwamuntu. Abaza ati: “Kugira ngo ukore ikintu nk’iki, uba ufise urwanko rungana gute?” Yabwye BBC ati: “Ibi bitwibutsa ivyakozwe n’aba-Nazi, kunyaga ibihimba vy’abantu – kandi iki ni icaha gikorerwa kiremwamuntu”. Lumumba yagiye kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere afise imyaka 34. Inyuma yo gutorwa mu myaka ya nyuma y’ubukoloni, yarongoye reta y’igihugu gishasha cari gihejeje kuronka intahe y’ukwikukira. Mu kwa gatandatu 1960, igihe yashikiriza ubutegetsi, Umwami Baudouin w’Ububirigi, yashimagije ubutegetsi bw’igikoroni anavuga ko sekuru wiwe, Léopold II, ari we “yateje imbere” igihugu. Ntiyigeze avuga ku miriyoni z’abakongomani bapfuye canke bakubaguwe mu gihe c’ubutegtsi bwiwe igihe yatwara icitwa État Indépendant du Congo /Congo Free State (Reta yigenga ya Congo) nk’icibare ciwe bwite. Uku kwanka kwemera amabi  yakozwe muri kahise kwerekanye ingene Ububirigi bwagiye buhakana ivyo bwakoze muri iki gihugu, bugiye gutangurwa kwemera muri iki gihe. Lumumba ntiyarya umunwa. Mw’ijambo yashikirije ritari ku rutonde rwari rwateguwe, umushikiranganji wa mbere yaneguye ubugome n’agasuzuguro vyakorewe Abakongomani. Muri iri jambo ryari riteye ubwoba, mbere bakaba bagenda bamuciramwo n’amashi menshi ariko aravuga,  hanyuma arangije bakamushimira cane, yasiguye “ubucakara buteye isoni badukoreye ku nguvu”. Ababirigi baguye mu gahundwe, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwigisha wa kaminuza Ludo De Witte yasohoye igitabo mbarutso ku vyerekeye igandagurwa ryiwe. Bwari bwo bwa mbere umwirabure w’umunyafrika yubahuka gushikiriza ijambo nk’iri imbere y’abanyabulaya. Umushikiranganji wa mbere - De Witte avuga ko yafatwa nk’umuntu atize mu binyamakuru vy’Ububirigi - yafashwe ko amaramaje umwami n’abandi bategetsi b’Ububirigi. Bamwe bavuga ko mu gushikiriza iri jambo yari ahejeje gutera igikumu ku rupfu rwiwe, ariko igandagurwa ryiwe mu mwaka wakurikiye ryakozwe mu buryo bwo kurwana ya ntambara y’ukwikekana (guerre froide/Cold War) n’Ububirigi bwarondera kugumana ijambo muri ico gihugu. Abanyamerika nabo nyene baragiye mu nteguro yo kumwica kubera babona ko yari guhava yiyegereza Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti be n’urwanko yari afitiye abakoloni, mu gihe umutegetsi umwe w’umwongereza yanditse avuga ko kumwica yari imwe mu nzira zari zihari. Hagari aho, bisa n’uko hariho akantu ko kwankiriza umuntu uravye ingene Lumumba yatyozwa n’ingene yahigwa. Uku kuzimanganya n’ikiziga ciwe, hamwe no kurondera gukuraho ivyemezo, bisa n’ugushaka kurondera kwibagiza Lumumba mu mitwe y’abantu. Nta cibutso ciwe cari kwubakwa, ibi bikaba vyari gushobora gutuma bavuga ko uyu muntu atigeze abaho. Kumuhamba vyonyene babonye ko bitari bihagije. Hagati aho, gushika ubu baracamwibuka. Ni cane cane umukobwa wiwe Juliana – yafashe iya mbere mu rugamba rwo kurondera ko iri ryinyo ritahukanwa, ubu akaba ari i Buruseri kuryakira. N’akamwenyuro, aributsa ubwana bwiwe. Nk’uwari akiri muto mu bana bose, akongera akaba umukobwa wenyene mu muryango, avuga ko yari afitaniye imigenderanire ya hafi cane na se wiwe. Juliana yari afise “imyaka idashika itanu” igihe se wiwe agenwa nk’umushikiranganji wa mbere. Aribuka ingene yemerewe kujana na se wiwe mu biro, “naricara ndaba dawe ariko arakora. Kuri jewe yari dawe”. Ariko aremeza ko se wiwe ari “uwo igihugu, kuko yapfiriye Congo... be n’iteka n’ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyo kurwanira agateka k’umunyafrika”. Yemeza ko guhabwa iri ryinyo mu Bubirigi no kuritahukana muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo ari ikimenyetso “kuko ibisigarira vyiwe bidakwiye mu bisanzwe. Ariko ni ngombwa ko agaruka mu gihugu ciwe aho amaraso yiwe yasesekeye”. Iri ryinyo rizozungurutswa muri iki gihugu kinini cane imbere y’uko rihambwa ku mugwa mukuru. Umuryango wa Lumumba waramaze imyaka myinshi utazi ivyashikiye serugo kuko ubutegetsi bwagumije agacerere ku rupfu rwiwe. Urugendo rw'iyicwa rya Lumumba kuva abaye umushikiranganji wa mbere gushika agandagurwe rwamaze amezi adashika indwi. Inyuma y’akanya gato igihugu kironse intahe y’ukwikukira, igihugu caciye cinjira mu ntambara n’intara ya Katanga iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko itunze ubutare yashaka kwiyonkora, inyuma yo gutangaza ko yikuye ku gihugu. Mu mvururu za poritike zakurikiye, ingabo z’Ububirigi zararungitswe ku rubuga kugira ngo zikingire Ababirigi, ariko kandi baca bafasha ubutegetsi bwa Katanga bwaboneka ko bwobwo budafise urwanko kuri abo bakoloni. Lumumba we nyene nk’umushikiranganji wa mbere yahavuye abogozwa n’umukuru w’igihugu, Joseph Kasavubu, hanyuma haciye indwi imwe gusa umukuru w’ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare ico gihe, Colonel Joseph Mobutu, aca afata ubutegetsi. Lumumba yaciye apfungwa ic’amaso, aratoroka hanyuma asubira gufatwa muri Kigarama (12) 1960, imbere y’uko apfungirwa mu burengero bw’igihugu. Kumushira aho hantu vyaboneka ko bishobora guteza akaguma, ariho reta y’Ububirigi yasaba ko yorungikwa muri Katanga. Ari mu ndege mu rugendo rwamushikanye muri iyo ntara ku wa 16 Nzero (1) 1961, yarakubaguwe. Amaze kwururutswa naho nyene yarakubiswe mu gihe abategetsi ba Katanga bariko biyumbira ico bamukoza. Amaherezo, hahavuye hemezwa ko ashirwa mu minwe y’umurwi w’abarashi wari ujejwe kunyonga hanyuma ku wa 17 Nzero araraswa arapfa, ari kumwe na bagenwize babiri. Iki nico gihe umukuru w’igipolisi Soete yaca aseruka. Amaze kubona ko ibiziga vyabo abantu bashobora kubibona, haciye hafatwa ingingo yo “kubizimanganya burundu. "Nta kimenyetso na kimwe gitegererwa kugumaho”, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwe mu babibonye yasubiwemwo na De Witte mu gitabo ciwe, The Assassination of Lumumba.  Afise imisumeno, aside (acide sulfurique), yambaye ivyomeke bipfuka mu maso (masques faciaux) afise na whisky, Soete yayoboye umurwi wo kwimura, gusambura no kuzimanganya ibisigarira vyiwe. Cari igikorwa yagiye kuvuga mu nyuma ko rwari urugendo rwo “mu muriro udahera”. Ariko haciye imyaka hafi 40 yose, mu 1999,  kugira ngo yemere ko yagize uruhara muri aka kabi, kandi ko gushika ubwo yari agifise iryiryo ryiwe. Avuga ko ibindi bihimba yari afise yabitaye. Juliana agira umubabaro ku mutima yibutse igihe yumva ko hari igihimba ca se wiwe kikiriho. N’ikigumbagumba cinshi, ati: “Uca utahura ingene niyumvise kuri iki kintu”. Nta wuzi ico Soete yakoresheje iri ryinyo ico gihe cose yarimaranye. Isanamu yaryerekanye riri mu gasandugu, ariko nta wuzi nimba yari arishize kumugaragaro. Ariko ryari rikiri mu minwe y’umuryango wiwe. Ryasubiye kuvugwa mu 2016 igihe umukobwa wa Soete, Godelieve, atanze ikiganiro ku kinyamakuru co mu Bubirigi, Humo, casohotse imbere gato y’isabukuru igira 55 y’igandagurwa rya Lumumba. Yagarutse ku magorwa se wiwe yagize ku mutima kubera ivyo yakoze. Madame  Soete kandi yiyumviriye ko umuryango wiwe ukwiye gusabwa ikigongwe ku mategeko abategetsi b’Ububirigi bahaye se wiwe. Avuga ko se wiwe yagumanye ububiko bwihariye kandi ko, n’aho inyuma y’aho apfiriye, vyinshi vyatawe, wewe yashoboye “gushingura ahadata ibintu bikomeye”. Bimwe muri ivyo bintu ni iri ryinyo yari yazanye kugira yereke uwariko aramugirisha ikiganiro hamwe n’uwafata amasanamu. Ryaciye rifatwa n’igipolisi c’Ububirigi inyuma y’aho De Witte yitwariye, hanyuma inyuma y’urubanza rwamaze imyaka ine, sentare yahavuye ifata ingingo y’uko risubizwa umuryango wa Lumumba. Mu rugamba rwo kubohoza iri ryinyo, umukobwa wa Lumumba yandikiye umwami Philippe ikete ry’icese riteye agahinda. Yabajije ati: “Kubera iki, inyuma y’iri gandagurwa ry’agahomerabunwa, ibisigarira vya Lumumba bibandanya kuba umushaha uyerera, ata n’imva yo kumushinguramwo”? Iri ryinyo ni ryamara gusubizwa, uyu yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere azoshingurwa burundu mu ntatemwa idasanzwe ku mugwa mukuru, Kinshasa. Georges Nzongola-Ntalaja, umuhinga muri kahise akaba ari we aserukira Congo muri ONU, avuga ati: “Ibi ni vyo dusanzwe dukora mu mico yacu, turakunda gushingura abacu bashengeye”. “Ni ihumure ku muryango no ku banyagihugu ba Congo kuko Lumumba ni incungu yacu kandi twipfuza kumushingurana iteka”. Ariko n’aho yoshinguranwa iteka, ni ngombwa kwibuka akahise. Igitabo ca De Witte, kije kuzimya imyaka myinshi y’agacerere, catumye hashingwa umurwi w’amatohoza mu nama nshingamateka mu 1999, ufise igikorwa co kwiga neza “ingene iri gandagurwa ryagenze neza na neza, n’uruhara abanyaporitike b’Ububirigi boba barabigizemwo”. Mu vyo washitseko, wanditse ko “amarangamutima ya poritike mpuzamakungu yari atandukanye” mu myaka ya 1960. Hagati aho, n’aho uterekanye urwandiko rutegeka igandangurwa rya Lumumba, iri tohoza ryasanze harimwo bamwe mu bari muri reta “bagize uruhara mu vyatumye agandagurwa”. Ico gihe, uwari umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire, Louis Michel, yarasavye “imbabazi” yongera avuga ko ababajwe cane n’ivyashikiye umuryango wa Lumumba n’abanyagihugu ba Congo. Prof. Nzongola-Ntalaja, avugana na BBC ku giti ciwe, ntiyemera ko Ububirigi bwemera koko uruhara rwabwo mw’iryo gandagurwa. Ati: “Ububirigi buranka kwemanga ivyo buzi ko bwakoze – rero ntibihagije”. Abashikirizamanza b’ababirigi  bafata iri gandagurwa nk’icaha co mu ntambara ariko 10 kuri 12 bikekwa ko babukoze barapfuye, kandi, inyuma y’imyaka cumi, itohoza rigenda buke buke cane. Gushikiriza iri ryinyo kizoba ari ikindi gikorwa mu nzira yo kunywanisha Ububirigi na DR Congo kuri kahise k’ubukoloni n’igandagurwa rya Lumumba. Umukobwa wiwe ati: “Ni intambwe – dukeneye gutera tuja imbere”. Ariko kandi, avuga ko no ku ruhande rw’abakongomani bakeneye kwikubita agashi, kuko bamwe muri bagenziwe hari abagize uruhara mu rupfu rwa se wiwe. “Ni ngombwa ko twemera kahise kacu – kaba keza canke kabi”. Asa n’uwuvuga ijambo afise igihagararo nk’ic’uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, avuga ati: “Turakeneye kumenya kahise kacu, kwubaka kazoza kacu no kubaho muri kubu”. Ihambwa ry’iri ryinyo – igikorwa gitegekanijwe kuba ku musi w’isabukuru y’imyaka 61 y’ijambo karuhariwe rya Lumumba ku musi w’ukwikukira – rizoba ari akaryo keza ku gukubitiza amaso inyuma kuri kahise.

headline: Abo umurongo ukaze mu bibanza bikomeye muri reta y'aba Taliban
text: Aba Taliban batangaje abagize reta mfatakibanza muri Afghanistan, baca banamenyesha ko ico gihugu kigiye kugengwa n'amategeko ya Islam. Iyo reta, igizwe n'abagabo gusa, irimwo abakuru bakuru mu ndongozi z'aba-Taliban bamwe bazwi cane mu bitero ku ngabo z'abanyamerika mu myaka 20 iheze. Reta izoba irongowe na Mullah Mohammad Hassan Akhund, umwe mu bashinze uwo muhari, nawe asanzwe ari ku rutonde rw'abatemerwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu azoba umugabo atinyitse cane aronderwa na FBI arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi ba Haqqani. Aba Taliban bigaruriye igihugu nka cose mu ndwi zitatu ziheze, birukanye abari batowe n'abanyagihugu. Itangazwa ry'abagize reta n'intambwe ikomeye igana ku butegetsi bw'aba Taliban.  Ubwo butegetsi buzohangana n'ibibazo bikomeye , hadasigaye inyuma ico gukomeza no guha amaragamo ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu hamwe no kwemerwa mu makungu. Kare aba-Taliban bari bavuze ko bashaka gushinga reta irimwo impande zose . Ariko abashikiranganji bose batangajwe ku wa kabiri basanzwe ari indongozi zizwi z'aba-Taliban , kandi nta mugore n'umwe arimwo. Reta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko ''zifise  impungenge" inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bashiriye ahabona abagize reta yabo y'abashikiranganji b'abagabo gusa kandi irimwo abantu bafitaniye isano n'ibitero ku ngabo z'Abanyamerika. Ubushikirangani bw'imigenderanire bwa Amerika buvga ko buriko burihweza iryo tangazo ryo ku wa kabiri. Umukenguzamateka wa Amerika Lindsey Graham yavuze ko iyo reta mfatakibanza ari umurongo "w'abamenanzugi hamwe  n'abanyamacuniro". N'umwe  mu bakuru b'aba Republicans yiyamirije ingingo bavuga ko "itiyumviriwe neza"  yo kuva muri Afghanistan yafashwe na prezida w'umu Democrat Joe Biden. Mw'itangazo ku wa kabiri, ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire (State Department) bwavuze buti: "Twabonye ko urutonde rw'amazina yatangajwe rugizwe gusa n'abasanzwe ari abanywanyi b'aba Taliban canke abo bakorana kandi ata mugore arimwo. "Turatewe impungenge kandi na  kahise ka bamwe bamwe muri bo." Ribandanya rivuga ko ''Amerika izofatira aba-Taliban ku vyo bakora, atari ku majambo." Itangazo rivuga ko Amerika "Izofatira aba-Taliban  ku vyo biyemeje" vyo gutanga inzira itekanye ku banyamahanga n'abanya-Afghanistan bafise ivyangombwa vyo kugira ingendo, harimwo no ''kwemerera indege ubu ziteguriye kuva muri Afghanistan". Ribandanya rivuga riti: ''Twibukije kandi ko twiteze ko aba-Taliban bazokora ibishoboka kugira ubutaka bwa Afghanistan ntibukoreshwe mu kubangamira ibindi bihugu". ''Isi iriko ibirabira hafi."  Itangazo ryitirirwa indongozi kizigenza y'aba-Taliban Mawlawi Hibatullah Akhundzada ryabwiye reta gushira mu ngiro itegeko rya Sharia. Iryo tangazo ryasohotse mu rurimi rw'icongereza rivuga  ko aba-Taliban "bashaka imigenderanire ikomeye kandi imeze neza n'ababanyi n'ibindi bihugu ishingiye ku kwubahana no kuvugana" - ariko harimwo kugabisha ko bazokwubahiriza amategeko n'amasezerano  mpuzamakungu "adateye kubiri n'itegeko rya Islam n'ayandi mateka y'igihugu". Hibatullah Akhundzada ntarigera aboneka ahagaragara. Ubu nibwo butumwa bwa mbere buvuye kuri we bugiye ahabona kuva aba-Taliban bigaruriye ubutegetsi mu kwezi guheze. Hassan Akhund, umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha w'imfatakibanza , yarabaye umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire kuva mu 1996 gushika mu 2001, igihe uwo mugwi wari ku butegetsi. Azwi cane cane mu burongozi bw'idini muri uwo mugwi kurusha mu ruhande rwa gisirikare. Igenwa ryiwe ribonwa nko guheberanira, inyuma y'ivyavuzwe ko hoba harabaye gusubiranamwo hagati y'indongozi z'aba-Taliban z'umurongo woroshe na bagenzi babo b'umurongo ukaze. Umuvugizi w'aba Taliban, Zabihullah Mujahid, yagize ati:"Turazi ko abanyagihugu bari barindiranye igishika reta nshasha. Turishuye ku cipfuzo c'abo." Sarajuddin Haqqani, umushikiranganji mushasha w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, ni we arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi uzwi kw'izina rya Haqqani ufitaniye ubucuti n'aba Taliban, ukaba ari na wo uri inyuma y'ibitero vyahitanye abantu benshi muri ico gihugu cari kimaze imyaka 20 mu ntambara. Bitandukanye n'aba Taliban, umuhari wa Haqqani wose wiswe umuhari w'iterabwoba ukorera mu mahanga na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Abandi bagenywe harimwo Mullah Yaqoob nk'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, Amir Khan Muttaqi, uwo imigenderanire n'amakungu hamwe n'abari mu bashinzwe umuhari w'aba Taliban Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar na Mullah Abdul Salam Hanafi nk'ivyegera. Yaqoob n'umuhungu w'uwashinze uwo muhari akaba yaranabaye umuyobozi wawo wo mu rwego rwo hejuru Mullah Omar. Baradar yigeze gutwara ibiro vy'uwo muhari bijejwe politike, anahagararira ishirwa ry'umukono ku masezerano yo kuva muri ico gihugu na Amerika. Abajijwe impamvu ata mupfasoni n'umwe arimwo, Ahmadullah Wasiq, wo mu mugwi ujejwe imico mu ba Taliban, yabwiye umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Secunder Kemani ko abagize reta bose bataragenwa.

headline: Ronaldo arashobora gutsinda bibiri uno munsi kugira ashika 100 mu murwi nserukiragihugu?
text: Cristiano Ronaldo arashobora gutsinda igitsindo kigira 100 kuri uyu wa Mungu mu gihe yoramuka avyifashemwo neza mu rukino ruza guhuza Portugal na Luxembourg mu nkino z'ukurondera uburenganzira bwo kuja mw'ihiganwa rya Euro 2020. Uyo musatirizi wa Juventus amaze gutsindira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal ibitsindo 98 akaba ashobora kuba umukinyi agize kabiri atsinze ibitsindo vyinshi mu murwi nserukiragihugu kw'isi. Ronaldo niwe mukinyi amaze gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi mu murwi nserukiragihugu. Niwe kandi mukinyi wa mbere ku mugabane wa Bulaya amaze gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi mu murwi nserukiragihugu. Gushika ubu, uwahoze ari umukinyi w'imurwi nserukiragihugu wa Irani, Ali Daei, niwe mukinyi amaze gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi kw'isi mu murwi nserukiragihugu, agakurikirwa na Cristiano Ronaldo arondera gushikana ibitsindo 100.

headline: Tokyo Olympics: 'Amafaranga, amazu, inka' - Ingene ibihugu bimwe bishimira abatahukanye imidari
text: Hari ibituma vyinshi umukinyi arondera gutsindira umudari mu nkino za Olympics... iteka, kwiyumva ko waranguye ikintu gikomeye, no kumenyekana. Ariko wari uzi ko ibihugu vyinshi bitanga utundi dushimwe ku bakinyi bavyo, harimwo amafaranga abona, amazu mbere n'inka? Mu gihe Comite International Olympique (CIO/IOC) ata mafaranga itanga ku babaye batatu bambere bakurira ingazi z'iteka (podium), ibihugu bitari bike biragerageza kuguma vyakije akariro ko guhiganwa mu gutanga udushimwe. Raba bimwe mu vyo abakinyi bo mu nkino za Olympics za Tokyo 2020 bashobora kuronka, uretse gutahana inzahabu. Umugore w'umunya-Philippines aterura ibiremereye cane Hidilyn Diaz yatumye igihugu cose kimerereza ku wa 26 ukwezi kw'indwi aho yatwara umudari wa mbere wa Olympic w'inzahabu w'ico gihugu kuva kibaho. Yarushije abandi mu mugwi w'abagore  batarenza ibiro 55 aca aba intwari  mu gihugu. Ariko ivyo Diaz yashitseko  vyaciye bihindura ubuzima bwiwe birenze urwego rw'inkino. Uretse kuronka agashimwe k'amafaranga abona arenga ibihumbi $600.000 (hafi miriyaridi 1,2 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) - arimwo ayatanzwe n'umugwi wa Philippines ujejwe inkino hamwe n'umukuru w'ico gihugu Rodrigo Dutertes ubwiwe- yahawe kandi inzu zibiri nshasha. Imwe muri izo ni appartement nziza cane yahawe n'umunya-Philippines akomoka mu Bushinwa afise itunga riharurwa muri za miriyaridi z'ama dorari,  Andrew Lim Tam. Si ikintu gito na gato ku mukinyi w'umugore asanzwe ahembwa $500 kw'ipete rya sergeant mu ngabo zo mu kirere za Philippines. Uvyemere canke ureke, uwo mudari yawutsindiye kandi ata hantu ho kwitegurira inkino za Olympics (gym) yari afise, ahubwo yiterateranije wenyene ivyo guterura aho we na bagenziwe bakinana bamariye amezi 18  baheze muri Malaysia mu gihe c'ikiza ca Covid-19. Udushimwe tw'amafaranga turatandukanye bivanye n'igihugu kimwe kimwe. ''Ibihugu bikukumba imidari myinshi", aho abakinyi bakoresha uburyo bwinshi mu kwitegura no mu bikoresho, akenshi nta kinini bikunda gutanga, kurusha ivyo usanga iteka rya Olympic ari ririni gusumba, aho rifatwa nk'ubutwari. Malaysia, igihugu kimaze gutwara imidari 11 yonyene mu nkino za Olympics 13, cemeye gutanga $241.000 ku wuzotahana umudari w'inzahabu mu nkino za Tokyo, ariko uwo n'ubu akaba akirindiriwe (agashimwe ku mudari w'ifeza ni $150.000 na $24.000 ku wa bronze). Kuva itari 2 ukwezi kw'umunani, Malaysia yari imaze kuronka umudari umwe gusa muri izo nkino: uwa bronze muri badminton y'abagabo bakina ari babiri babiri. Ku rundi ruhande, Australia, igeze ku midari irenga 500 kuva ku wa 29 ukwezi kw'indwi, yemeye gutanga ayari munsi  ya 10%  y'agaciro k'iyo midari kuri buri wese abaye muri batatu baronka imidari - aho muri izo nkino za Tokyo, Australia imaze kuronka imidari 30. Ubushinwa n'Uburusiya nivyo bihugu bifise ico vyisangije ubigereranije n'ibindi vya rutura mu kwegeranya imidari nyinshi. Abakinyi bavyo batahanye imidari ya Olympic uretse guhabwa amafaranga abona, bazohabwa n'utundi dushimwe tw'igihugu n'utwaho basanzwe baba. Ku vyerekeye Uburusiya, udushimwe turimwo imodoka nshasha n'amazu (appartements). Tumwe mu dushimwe ariko ntitumenyerewe. Abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bahiganwa mu gusoza ubwato Sizwe Ndlovu, Matthew Brittain, John Smith na James Thompson batsinze ihiganwa mu nkino za Londres mu 2012, bahawe inka umwe umwe. Bahawe ivyo bitunngwa na Jan Scannel, umugwizatunga akaba n'uwuremesha ibiganiro vyo guteka kuri television cane cane mu vyerekeye kwotsa inyama (barbecue). Mu bihugu vyinshi umudari wa Olympic ushobora kuguhesha akazi. Canke ukongerwa umushahara. Umugore wo mu Buhindi ahiganwa mu guterura ibiro vyinshi Mirabai Chanu yarahawe agashimwe ka $350.000 ku mudari w'ifeza yaronkeye Tokyo , ariko na cane cane icatanjgaje, yaciye yemererwa imbere y'abantu kuduzwa ipete mu kazi n'umukoreshab wiwe, kompanyi y'indarayi (inzira za gariyamoshi) y'Ubuhindi. Muri Korea y'Epfo, abatahanye imidari barahabwa amafaranga, ariko kamwe mu bushimwe buruta ubundi ku bagabo batahanye imidari, ni uguhabwa uruhusha rwo kutitaba ibikorwa vya gisirikare bitegerezwa kuri buri wese ku kiringo c'amezi 18. I Tokyo, ako gashimwe kari ako kwandura ku bakinyi babiri b'ico gihugu bitavye amahigwnwa ya golf , Sungjae Im na Si Woo Kim - yamara, nta n'umwe muri bo yatahanye umudari. Ivyo guha udushimwe abatahanye imidari ya Okympic si bishasha kuko vyatanguye mu myaka ya 1980. Ariko utwo dushirukabute twakomeje kugenda tuba tunini kuva ico gihe. Uwutabizi yobibaza umwozi wo muri Singapore Joseph Schooling:  amaze gutsinda rurangiranwa w'umunyamerika Michael Phelps ku mudari w'inzahabu ku metero 100 boga nk'abashaka kuguruka, yaciye ahabwa agashimwe ka $750.000 na reta yiwe. Ariko kuri benshi, bene utwo dushimwe tuza kubatezurira kuko benshi bahiganwa mu nkino ata benshi bazitaho mu binyamakuru, n'ababafata mu mugongo uretse mu rwego rwa Olympic ugasanga kubaronka ntivyoroshe. Abitaba amahiganwa ya Olympics muri Brezil, nk'akarorero, ahanini bakoresha uburyo buke reta ibaha, muri abo hakaba harimwo uwuhiganwa muri gym Rebeca Andrade, yashwangamuye isi mu gutsindira imidari ibiri mu mahiganwa y'abagore. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, Global Athlete, ikigo gikora ubushakashatsi cabajije abakinyi 500 bakomeye mu bitaba inkino za Olympic bo mu bihugu 48 bitandukanye, kibabaza ibijanye n'amafaranga. Hafi 60 kw'ijana bakibwiye ko ''bibona nk'abatagira amaragamo" mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Abakinyi mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo n'ibitahana imidari myinshi nka Amerika, bakoresheje  inzira zo guterereza abantu benshi mugabo batanga duke duke cane (crowdfunding) kugira baronke uburyo  bwo kwitegurira inkino za Tokyo. Nka  Bethany Shriever, umwongerezakazi  aja mu mahiganwa yo gutwara ikinga  mu nziza zigoye BMX (mubona kw'ifoto aho haruguru) nibwo buryo yakoresheje kugira ashike ku ndoto ziwe za Olympic inyuma y'aho mu 2017 hagabanuriwe amafaranga yo gushigikira abagore bakora bene ayo mahiganwa. Ikiza ca Covid-19 catumye ibintu bigora gusumba, inyuma y'aho hahagarikiwe hayuma hagafutwa amahiganwa aho abakinyi bahabwa amafaranga yo  guhagarara mu kibanza ca batatu ba mbere  hamwe n'udushimwe tw'amafaranga. Iciza n'uko ibi ari ibintu benshi mu bakinyi bavuzwe aho harugu, bitakibaraje ishinga, kubera udushimwe dushasha baronse, harimwo uwuterurira ibiro vyinshi Hidilyn Diaz, yavuze mu kiganiro aheje gutsinda  ati: "N'aho hari ikiza, turi ngaha kandi dutahanye umudari" akongerako ati "nta na kimwe kidashoboka".

headline: Ikiganiro ca Harry na Oprah: Yavuze iki kuri se, igikomangoma Charles?
text: Igikomangoma Harry n'umugore wiwe Meghan mu kiganiro na rurangiranwa Oprah Winfrey, Harry yavuze kuri se Igikomangoma Charles

headline: ONU ishinja M23 kurasa ibisasu mu kigo cayo
text: ONU ivuga ko inyeshamba zarashe ibisasu bitatu vya rokete mu kigo cayo mu buseruko bwa Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Nta makuru aramenyekana y'ivyoba vyononekaye muri ico gitero cagirijwe umugwi wa M23. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze yuko ibisasu bibiri vyaguye hafi y'ibirindiro vy'abasirikare bayo bahagarariye amahoro mu karere ka Kibindi muri Kivu ya ruguru. Uruhagarara ruracari rwose mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu mu gihe inyeshamba zibandanya kugaba ibitero ku basirikare ba leta. Kuwa gatatu umwe mu bakozi ba ONU bo ku rwego rwo hejuru yabwiye akanama kayo kajejwe umutekano yuko abarwanyi ba M23 bitwara nk'igisikare ceruye, hamwe n'ubushobozi bwo kunesha ingabo za ONU. Hagati aho intumwa idasanzwe ya ONU muri Congo yasavye ko haba, ubu bwa vuba kandi ata kirinze gusabwa, kwaka ibirwanisho imigwi yose yitwaje ibirwanisho muri ico gihugu, ibangamiye umutekano w'akarere k'ibiyaga binini. Umugwi M23 warongereje ibitero mu buseruko bwa Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo, unigarurira imiji ikomeye. Warakuwe mu biganiro vy'amahoro na reta ya Congo biriko birabera mu gihugu ca Kenya. Abantu barenga imihumbi 170 baramaze guta izabo kuva aho hatanguriye imirwano hagati y'abasirikare ba leta ya Congo n'inyeshamba za M23 mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa kane. Muri kuno kwezi ishirahamwe ry'ubuseruko bwa Afrika ryafashe ingingo yo kurungika abasirikare muri Congo gufasha leta y'ico gihugu kugarukana amahoro. BBC iracariko iragerageza kumanye ico M23 ivuga kuri ibi vyagiriji vy'igitero  ku basirikare ba ONU.

headline: U Rwanda rurababajwe n’icegeranyo c’abahinga ba ONU muri DR Congo
text: Reta y'u Rwanda ivuga ko ibabajwe n'utunenge turi mu cegeranyo c'umurwi w'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko ingabo zarwo zabonetse mu bice bitandukanye mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Mu rwandiko rwaraye rusohowe nijoro ku wa gatanu, reta y'u Rwanda yamirira kure ibiri muri ico cegeranyo co ku wa 23 z'ukwezi ka cumi na kabiri guheze, igashimangira ko "ata basirikare b'u Rwanda bari ku butaka bwa Congo, kandi ko ata bikorwa vya gisirikare biherutse guhuza igisirikare c'u Rwanda n'ica Congo". Iki cegeranyo gishasha c'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko amatohoza bakoze yerekana ibikorwa vy'ingabo z'u Rwanda n'iz'Uburundi muri ako karere ka Congo. ONU ivuga ko kwivanga kw'ingabo z'ikindi gihugu mu bikorwa vyo kurwanya inyeshamba muri DR Congo hatamenyeshejwe komite ya ONU biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Muri uru rwandiko, reta y'u Rwanda ivuga ko uyu murwi w'abahinga ba ONU wirengagije amakuru ngirakamaro n'insiguro vyatanzwe na reta y'u Rwanda, mu gihe bari "bahawe uburenganzira bwo gushikira inzego zitandukanye za reta, banoroherezwa kuvugana n'ivyabona kandi banahabwa n'inyishu ku bibazo vyose babajije". Reta y'u Rwanda ibona ko uyu murwi ata bwigenge ufise mu vyegeranyo vyawo, mbere ko abawugize bafata minenerwe amabanga yabo. U Rwanda ruvuga ko rushimishwa n'imigenderanire myiza irangwa hagati yarwo na Congo mu bisata bitandukanye, harimwo n'ugufashanya mu vya gisirikare, ariko bikagarukira gusa, nk'uko iri tangazo ribivuga, "ku guhanahana amakuru ku mirwi y'inyeshamba iri mu buseruko bwa Congo, itera umudugararo mu bihugu vyompi". Reta y'Uburundi yoyo ntaco irashikiriza kuri iki cegeranyo gishasha c'aba bahinga ba ONU kivuga ko hari ingabo z'u Burundi n'Imbonerakure babonetse mu duce twa Fizi na Uvira mu ntara ya  Kivu y'Ubumanuko hagati y'ukwa 11/2019 n'ukwa 07/2020. Hagati aho, mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze, umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Jean Claude Karerwa yabwiye BBC mu butumwa bwanditse , ata basirikare b'Uburundi bari mu kindi gihugu mu buryo butazwi.

headline: Slovenia: Igishusho ca Melania Trump, umugore wa perezida wa USA, caraturiwe
text: Igishusho c'umugore wa Perezida Trump,  Melania Trump cari gikozwe mu biti bivugwa ko caturiwe aho cari kimanitswe hafi y'aho avuka mu gihugu ca Slovenia mu Bulayi, baca baragikuraho. Brad Downey, umuhinga mu gushushanya yari yakoresheje ico gishusho, avuga ko caturiwe kw'igenekerezo rya 04 z'uku kw'indwi, umunsi Amerika ihimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira. Uyo munyamerika asanzwe aba mu gisagara ca Berlin mu Budagi yaciye asaba ko ico gishusho cari cononekaye gikurwaho ku munsi ukurikira. Igipolisi cabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko amatohoza yatanguye. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika ntivyashatse kugira ico bibivuzeko. Ico gishusho cari cakozwe mu giti gishirwa hanze y'igisagara ca Sevnica aho Melania yavukiye muri Slovenia. Cerekana Melania Trump yambaye ikanzu isa n'ubururu isa n'iyo yari yambaye igihe umugabo wiwe yimikwa catumye, abantu bavuga vyinshi igihe kimanikwa mu kw'indwi 2019. Bamwe mu baba muri ico gisagara bavuze ko ico gishusho kimuteje isoni nk'umugore w'umukuru w'igihugu. Bwana Downey yabwiye Rueters ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukumenya abasambuye ico gishusho n'ico bashaka. Kubw'iwe, ico gishusho cari gutuma haba ibiganiro ku bijanye n'icuka ca politike kiri muri Amerika, harimwo n'ikibazo nkoramutima c'abimukira. Umugore wiwe yavukiye yongera akurira muri Slovenia igihe iki gihugu cari kikiri intara y'icahoze ari Yougoslavia, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira muri Amerika mu myaka ya 1990. Ico gishusho muri Slovenia casambuye mu gihe ibishusho vy'abategetsi batandukanye ba Amerika bagize uruhara mu bucakara vyariko birabomorwa bivuye ku myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Mu majambo yiwe aherutse gushikiriza, harimwo n'iryo yavuze ku munsi wo guhimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira, Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yariyamirije bikomeye abonona n'abasambura ivyo bishusho. Kuva Trump atowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2016, Sevnica cabaye igisagara cakira ingenzi nyinshi ahanini zashaka kumenya vyinshi ku mamuko ya Melania Trump n'ubuto bwiwe. Mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze, igishusho cerekana Perezida Trump carubatswe muri Slovenia, mu buseruko bw'umugwa mukuru Ljubljana, naco nyene kikaba catateye impari nk'uko vyagenze ku gishusho c'umugore wiwe. Ico gishusho capima uburebure bw'imetero umunani naco nyene caraturiwe n'abantu batamenyekanye mu kwa mbere kw'uno mwaka.

headline: Tanzania ihakana gukubagura impunzi z'abarundi bivugwa na HRW
text: Reta ya Tanzania iriyamiriza ivyashikirijwe n'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch (HRW) ko ico gihugu gipfunga, kikaboreza igufa kikongera kigatahukana impunzi z'abarundi ku nguvu. Dr Hassan Abbas, umuvugizi wa reta ya Tanzania, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko izo nkuru za HRW ata ho zifatiye kandi ata kuri kurimwo. Uwo muvugizi avuga kandi ko ari "inkuru zo gupfundikanya", aho usanga bavuga ko bavuganye n'abantu badashaka ko amazina y'abo amenyekana. Avuga ko igihugu ca Tanzania gifise umuco wo kwakira impunzi kuva kera. Agira ati: "Twebwe twatanguye kwakira impunzi imbere y'uko amakungu ashiraho itegeko ritegeka ibihugu vyose gutanga ubuhungiro ku mpunzi no kuzikingira mu 1951. "Twebwe kuva mu myaka ya za 30 [1930] na 40 [1940] tuguma twakira impunzi, twakoresheje uburyo bwinshi bwa reta n'igihugu, twateguye ibibanza vyinshi cane twashizemwo amakambi y'impunzi z'ababanyi bacu igihe cose bagize ibibazo.
